text.body:
﻿
nātidīrghasamāso yathā—
balikarma svadhā homaḥ svādhyāyo 'tithisatkriyā |
pitṛbhūtaparabrahmamanuṣyāṇāṃ mahāmakhāḥ || 34 ||
nātisphuṭabandho yathā—
śūdreṣu dāsagopālakulamitrārdhasīriṇiḥ |
bhojyānnā nāpitaścaiva yaścātmānaṃ nivedayet || 35 ||
upacāravṛttimad (yathā)—
rājā 'sya jagato mātā pitā bhrātā suhṛd guruḥ |
sakhā 'dhidaivataṃ dhāma sthāma jīvitamucyate || 36 ||
(khaṇḍitam)
dharma eva druto/hato hanti dharmo rakṣati rakṣitaḥ |
tasmād dharmo na hantavyo mā no dharmo hato 'vadhīt || 37 || (manusmṛ. 8.15)
(khaṇḍitam) . . . . yathā—(manu. 9.138)
punnāmno narakādasmāt trāyate pitaraṃ sutaḥ |
tena puttra iti prāp‍to/prokto manuḥ svāyambhuvo 'bravīt || 38 ||
svakīyā nāyikā| sā tridhā ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ cottamā| tatrọdhā dharmakarmopayogitvāt (॰ ॰ ॰ ॰) sā bhedau (?) caratāṃ dharmamiti ca ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ tāt uttamā ca tadadhika ॰ ॰ ॰gahetu ॰ ॰ ॰ ‍āt| parasparānurāgo hi dārakarmaṇi parārdhya (॰ ॰ ॰ ) maṅgalaṃ gītaśca| ayamarthaḥ ॰ ॰ ॰ tinamātmānaṃ manyeta tāṃ, tathā 'pi ॰ ॰ yetṃ 'yasyāṃ vāṅ‍manaśrcakṣuṣoranubandhaḥ tasyāmṛddhiḥ, netarāmāśrayeta' iti tasyā kriyāṃ ananyapūrvāyāṃ śāstrato 'dhigatāyāṃ dharmo 'rthaḥ putrñaḥ saṃbandhaḥ, śuddhiḥ, anu ॰ ॰ kṣatā, ratiḥ| na tu paratayāsurabhūpunarbhūveś‍yāsu| yathocyate, 'dharmaviruddhaḥ kāmaḥ parastrīṣu| arthaviruddho veś‍yāsu punarbhūṣu ca| tasmāt kulastrīṣveva kāmaṃ kāmayeteti na ॰ ॰ yathā kāmasevā (?) haranti ॰ ॰| svakīyaiva nāyikā dharmaśrṛṅgāram| yathocyate—
proṣitāyāṃ vrajantyastaṃ prajā dharmo yaśaḥ sukham |
nivartante nivṛttāyamaho! bandhuḥ kulaṅganā || 39 ||
.......dhīrodāttaśca nāyaka iti| 1prāka‍pratipāditapravṛttinivṛttiniyamarūpa—
1. dra. pṛ. 998
jośera—rāghavayoḥ 49—bhāvakramaḥ
jośeraḥ rāghavaḥ jośeraḥ rāghava 1. amarṣaḥ 16 19 26. madaḥ 8 9 2. aśru 27 44 27. mohaḥ 9 45 3. asūyā 17 20 14 xx 4. ālasyam 25 30 28. ratiḥ 1 1 5. āvegaḥ 26 42 29. romāñca 4 4 6. īrṣyā 18 21 30. vitarka 13 15 7. ugratā XX 22 31. viṣādaḥ XX 38 8. utsāhaḥ XX 16 32. vismayaḥ 20 24 9. unmādaḥ XX 34 33. vaivarṇyam XX 39 10. krodhaḥ 15 18 34. vyādhiḥ XX 33 11. garvaḥ XX 6 35. śamaḥ 32 49 12. glāniḥ XX 10 36. śokaḥ XX 37 13. capalatā 24 28 37. śramaḥ XX 36 14. cintā 10 12 38. smṛtiḥ 10 13 15. jaḍatā 29 47 39. svap‍na 22 26 16. jugupsā 19 23 40. svarabheda XX 41 17. dainyam XX 40 41. sveda 6 33 18. dhṛtiḥ 5 5 42. harṣaḥ 3 3 19. nidrā 21 25 43. hāsaḥ 7 8 20. nirvedaḥ XX 48 44. mohaḥ 14 XX 21. prabodhaḥ 23 27 45. aspaṣṭa XX 7 22. pralayaḥ 28 46 46. " XX 11 23. prītiḥ 2 2 47. " XX 17 24. bhayam XX 31 48. " XX 29 25. matiḥ 12 14 49. " XX 43
śṛṅgāravibhāvahetavaḥ — śṛṅgāraprabhavā eva | te ratyādayo bhāvā ekonapañcāśaditi yaduktaṃ (pṛ. 614) nādhikāḥ, na nyūnāḥ' iti; tatra—
(1. ratiḥ —8)
mano 'nukūleṣvātmanaḥ sukhānubhavo ratiḥ |
sā cāṣṭadhā— naisargikī, sāṃsargikī, ābhiyogikī, ādhyātmikī, aupamānikī, vaiṣayikī, sāmprayogikī, ābhimānikī ceti |
(1.1 naisargikī)
janmāntaravāsanā nisargaḥ, tadutthā naisargikī |
sā ca jātā, anubandhinī pravṛddhā, saṃvṛttā, anuvartinī ceti pañcadhā | tatrālambanavibhāvādutpannamātrā jātā | yathā—
iyaṃ mahendraprabhṛtīnadhiśriyaścaturdigīśānavamatya māninī |
arūpahāryaṃ madanasya nigrahāt pinākapāṇiṃ patimāp‍tumicchati || (kusaṃ. 5.53)
utpatteranantaramuddīpanairuddīpyamānā sānubandhatvādanubandhinī; yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.64)
yathāśrutaṃ vedavidāṃ vara ! tvayā jano 'yamuc‍caiḥ padalaṅghanotsukaḥ |
tapaḥ kiledaṃ tadavāp‍tisādhanaṃ manorathānāmagatirna vidyate || 13 ||
satyanubandhe saṃskārasyānavarataprabodhāt smaraṇecchādveṣaprayat‍najanmabhirmanovāgbuddhi— śarīrāṅgai(rambhai)ranubhāvaissañcāribhissaṃsṛjyamānā prāp‍taprakarṣāvasthā pravṛddhā; yathā—
alaṃ vivādena yathā śrutastvayā tathāvidhastāvadaśeṣamastu vaḥ |
mamātra bhāvaikarasaṃ manassthitaṃ na kāmavṛttirvacanīyamīkṣate || 14 ||
atha pṛthagālambanā 'nubhavasaṃskāroddīpanasmṛtyādijanmānubhavasañcārisaṃbhave tulyabala— bhāvantarasaṃparkīṇī saṃpṛktā; yathā—
santāpasantatimahāvyasanāya tasyāmāsaktametadanapekṣitahetu cetaḥ |
prāyaśśubhaṃ ca vidadhātyaśubhaṃ ca jantossarvaṅkaṣā bhagavatī bhavitavyataiva || 15 ||
balīyasā bhāvāntareṇābhibhūtāpi, saṃskāramātreṇānuvartata ityanuvartinī; yathā—
śailātmajāpi piturucchiraso 'bhilāṣaṃ vyarthaṃ samīkṣya lalitaṃ vapurātmanaśca |
sakhyossamakṣamiti cākṣikajātalajjā śūnyā jagāma bhavanābhimukhī kathañcit || 16 || (kusaṃ. 4.75)
(1.2 sāṃsargikī)
saṃsarge bhavā sāṃsargikī |
sā ca pūrvavadeva jātādibhedāt pañcadhā | tatra—
jātā yathā—(megha.104)
bhittvā sadyaḥ kisalayapuṭān devadārudrumāṇāṃ ye tatkṣīrasratisurabhayo dakṣiṇena pravṛttāḥ |
āliṅgyante guṇavati ! mayā te tuṣārādrivātāḥ pūrvaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadi kila bhavedaṅgamebhistaveti || 17 ||
anubandhinī yathā—(kunda. 4.20)
dyūte paṇaḥ praṇayakeliṣu kaṇṭhapāśaḥ krīḍāpariśramaharaṃ vyajanaṃ ratānte |
śayyā niśīthakalahe hariṇekṣaṇāyāḥ prāp‍taṃ mayā vidhivaśādidamuttarīyam || 18 ||
pravṛddhā yathā—
āyāte dayite marusthalabhuvāṃ sañcintya durlaṅghatāṃ gehinyā paritoṣabāṣpataralāmāsajya dṛṣṭiṃ mukhe |
dattvā pīluśamīkarīrakavalaṃ celāñcalenādarā— dunmṛṣṭaṃ karabhāsyakesarasaṭābhārāgralag‍naṃ rajaḥ || 19 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(urāca. 2.28)
yasyāṃ te divasāstayā saha tathā nītāḥ punaḥ/yathā sve gṛhe yatsaṃbandhakathābhireva niyataṃ dīrghābhirasthīyata |
ekassaṃprati nāśitapriyatamastāmeva pāpaḥ kathaṃ rāmaḥ pañcavaṭīṃ vilokayatu vā gacchatvasaṃbhāṣya/vya vā || 20 ||
anuvartinī yathā—(kirātā. 8.37)
priyeṇa saṃgṛhya vipakṣasannidhāvupāhitāṃ vakṣasi pīvarastane |
srajaṃ na kācid vijahau jalāvilāṃ vasanti hi premṇi guṇā na vastuni || 21 ||
(1.3 ābhiyogikī)
abhiyogaprabhavā ābhiyogikī | sāpi pañcadhā | tatra jātā yathā—(māmā. 1.30)
stimitavikāsitānāmullasad‍bhrūlatānāṃ masṛṇamukulitānāṃ prāntavistārabhājām |
pratinayananipāte kiñcidākuñcitānāṃ vividhamahamabhūvaṃ pātramālokitānām || 22 ||
anubandhinī yathā—(māmā. 1.31)
alasavalitamugdhas‍nigdhanisspandamandai— radhikavikasadantarvismayasmeratāraiḥ |
hṛdayamaśaraṇaṃ me pakṣmalākṣyā kaṭākṣai— rapahṛtamapaviddhaṃ pītamunmūlitaṃ ca || 23 ||
pravṛddhā yathā—(māmā. 1.43)
paś‍yāmi tāmitaïtaḥ purataśca paścā— dantarbahiḥ parita eva vivartamānām |
uddha‍u‍ddhamugdhakanakābjanibhaṃ vahantī— māsaṅgatiryagapavartitadṛṣṭivaktram || 24 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(māmā. 1.32)
yāntyā muhurvilulitādharamānanaṃ tad āvṛttavṛntaśatapatranibhaṃ vahantyā |
digdho 'mṛtena ca viṣeṇa ca pakṣmalākṣyā gāḍhaṃ nikhāta iva me hṛdaye kaṭākṣaḥ || 25 ||
anuvartinī yathā—(māmā. 4.1)
yad vyālavraṇitasuhṛtpramohamugdhaṃ saujanyād vihitavatī gatavyatha mām |
tatkāmaṃ prabhavati pūrṇapātravṛttyā svīkartuṃ mama hṛdayaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ca || 26 ||
(1.4 ādhyātmikī)
adhyātmabhavā ādhyātmikī | ātmaiva tāmanubhavati, na cakṣurādaya ityarthaḥ | sāpi pañcadhā | tatra—
jātā yathā—(śāku. 5.13)
kā svidavakuṇṭhanavatī nātiparisphuṭaśarīralavāṇyā |
madhye tapodhanānāṃ kisalayamiva pāṇḍupatrāṇām || 27 ||
anubandhinī yathā—(vikramo. 4.39)
tanvī meghajalārdrapallavatayā dhautādharevāśrubhiḥ śūnyevābharaṇaiḥ svakālavirahād viśrāntapuṣpodgamā |
nūnaṃ maunamivāsthitā madhulihāṃ śabdairvinā lakṣyate caṇḍī māmavadhūya pādapatitaṃ jātānutāpeva sā || 28 ||
pravṛdghā yathā—(śāku. 5.23)
mayyevamasmaraṇadāruṇacittavṛttau vṛttaṃ rahaḥpraṇayamapratipadyamāne |
bhedād bhruvoḥ kuṭilayoratilohitākṣyā bhag‍naṃ śarasanamivātiruṣā smarasya || 29 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(śāku. 5.19)
idamupagatamevaṃ rūpamakliṣṭakānti prathamaparigṛhītaṃ syānnavetyavyavasyan |
bhramara iva vibhāte kundamantastuṣāraṃ na ca khalu paribhoktuṃ nāpi śak‍nomihātum ||
anuvartinī yathā—(śāku. 5.31)
kāmaṃ pratyādiṣṭāṃ smarāmi na parigrahaṃ munestanayām |
balavattu dūyamānaṃ pratyāyatīva māṃ cetaḥ || 31 ||
(1.5 aupamānikī)
. . . . aupamānikī | sāpi pañcadhā | tatra jātā yathā—(megha. 101)
ś‍yāmāsvaṅgaṃ, cakitahariṇīprekṣite dṛṣṭipātaṃ vaktracchāyāṃ śaśini, śikhināṃ barhabhāreṣu keśān |
utpaś‍yāmi pratanuṣu nadīvīciṣu bhrūvilāsān hantaikasmin k‍vacidapi na te caṇḍi ! sādṛś‍yamasti || 32 ||
anubandhinī yathā—(megha. 102)
tvāmālikhya praṇayakupitāṃ dhāturāgaiśśilāyā— mātmānaṃ te caraṇapatitaṃ yāvadicchāmi kartum |
asasrastāvanmuhurupacitairdṛṣṭirālupyate me krūrastasnnipi na sahate saṅgamaṃ nau kṛtāntaḥ || 33 ||
pravṛddhā yathā—(urāca. 6.26)
api janakasutāyāstac‍ca tac‍cānurūpaṃ sphuṭamiva śiśuyugme naipuṇonneyamasti |
nanu punariva tanme gocarībhūtamakṣṇorabhinavaśatapatraśrīmadāsyaṃ priyāyāḥ ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(śāku. 2.3)
na namayitumadhijyamasmi śakto dhanuridamāhitasāyakaṃ mṛgeṣu |
saha vasatimupetya yaiḥ priyāyāḥ kṛta iva mṛgdhavilokitopadeśaḥ || 35 ||
anuvartinī yathā—(rāmābhyudaye)
yat tvannetrasamānakānti salile mag‍naṃ tadindīvaraṃ meghairantaritaḥ priye tava mukhacchāyānukārī śaśī |
ye 'pi tvadgamanānukārigatayaste rājahaṃsā gatāḥ tvatsādṛś‍yavinodamātramapi me daivena na kṣamyate || 36 ||
(1.6. vaiṣayikī)
viṣayebhyo bhavā vaiṣayikī | sāpi prañcadhā śabdasparśarūparasagandhabhedāt | tatra— śabde jātā yathā—
vilāsamasṛṇollasanmusalaloladoḥ kandalī— parasparapariskhalad‍valayanissvanoddanturāḥ |
haranti kalahuṃkṛtiprasabhakampitorassthala— truṭad‍gamakasaṃkulāḥ kalamakaṇḍanīgītayaḥ || 37 ||
anubandhinī yathā—(rat‍nā. 28)
durvārāṃ madanaśaravyathāṃ vahantyā kāminyā yadabhihitaṃ purassakhīnām |
tadbha‍ūyaḥ śukaśiśuśārikābhiruktaṃ dhanyānāṃ śravaṇapathātithitvameti || 38 ||
pravṛddhā yathā—(māmā. 6.8)
mlānasya jīvakusumasya vikāsanāni saṃtarpaṇāni sakalendriyamohanāni |
ānandanāni hṛdayaikarasāyanāni (diṣṭyā mayā) parigatāni vaco 'mṛtāni || 39 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(māmā. 6.9)
nairāś‍yakātaradhiyo hariṇekṣaṇāyāḥ śrutvā nikāmakaruṇaṃ ca manoharaṃ ca |
vātsalyade/mohaparidevitamudvahāmi cintāviṣādavipadaṃ ca mahotsavaṃ ca || 40 ||
anuvartinī yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.38)
gītāntareṣu śramavārileśaiḥ kiṃcitsamucchvāsitapatraśobhaṃ (lekham) |
puṣpāsavāghūrṇitanetraśobhi priyāmukhaṃ kimpuruṣaś‍cucumba || 41 ||
sparśe jātā yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.11)
badh‍nannaṅgeṣu romāñcaṃ kurvan manasi nirvṛtim |
netre cāmīlayanneṣa priyāsparśaḥ pravartate || 42 ||
anubandhinī yathā—(māmā. 4.8)
tanme manaḥ kṣipati yatsarasaprahāramālekya māmagaṇitaskhaladuttarīyā |
trastaikahāyanakuraṅgaviloladṛṣṭirāśliṣṭavatyamṛtasaṃvalitairivāṅgaiḥ || 43 ||
pravṛddhā yathā—(urāca. 1.35)
viniścetuṃ śakyo na sukhamiti vā duḥkhamiti vā pramādo pramoho nidrā vā kimu viṣavisarpaḥ kimu madaḥ |
tava sparśe sparśe mama hi parimụ̄dhendriyagaṇo vikāraścaitanyaṃ bhramayati ca saṃmīlayati ca || 44 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(vikramo. 4.68)
samarthaye yat prathamaṃ priyāṃ prati kṣaṇena tanme parivartate 'nyathā |
ato vinidre sahasā vilocane karomi na sparśavibhāvitapriyaḥ || 45 ||
anuvartinī yathā—(vikramo. 3.13)
yadayaṃ rathasaṃkṣobhādaṃsenāṃso nipīḍitaḥ |
ekaḥ kṛtī śarīre 'smin śeṣamaṅgaṃ bhuvo bharaḥ || 46 ||
rūpe jātā yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.67)
harastu kiṃcitparilup‍tadhairyaścandrodayārambha ivāmburāśiḥ |
umāmukhe bimbaphalādharoṣṭhe vyāpārayāmāsa vilocanāni || 47 ||
anubandhinī yathā—(māmā. 1.39)
jagati jayinaste te bhāvā navendukalādayaḥ prakṛtimadhurāḥ santyevānye mano madayanti ye |
mama tu yadiyaṃ yātā loke vilocanacandrikā nayanaviṣayaṃ janmanyekaḥ sa eva mahotsavaḥ || 48 ||
pravṛddhā yathā—(māmā. 5.9)
saṃbhūyeva sukhāni cetasi paraṃ bhūmānamātanvate yatrālokapathāvatāriṇi ratiṃ prāp‍noti netrotsavaḥ |
yadvālendukaloc‍cayādapacitaiḥ sārairivotpāditaṃ tat paś‍yeyamanaṅgamaṅgalagṛhaṃ bhūyo 'pi tasyā mukham || 49 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—
kapole jānakyāḥ karikalabhadantadyutimuṣi smarasmeraṃ gaṇḍoḍḍamarapulakaṃ vaktramalam |
muhuḥ paś‍yan śṛṇvan rajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭagranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ paribṛḍhaḥ || 50 ||
anuvartinī yathā—(māmā. 2.24)
nyastālaktakaraktamālyavasanā pāṣāṇḍacaṇḍālayoḥ pāpārambhavatormṛgīva vṛkayorbhīrurgatā gocaram |
seyaṃ bhūrivasorvasoriva sutā mṛtyormukhe vartate hā dhik kaṣṭamaniṣṭamastakaruṇaḥ ko 'yaṃ vidheḥ prakramaḥ || 51 ||
rase jātā yathā—
ayaṃ te vidrumacchāyo marumārga ivādharaḥ |
kasya no kurute mugdhe pipāsākulitaṃ manaḥ || 52 ||
anubandhinī yathā—(śāku. 3.21)
aparikṣatakomalasya yāvat kusumasyeva navasya ṣaṭ‍padena |
adharasya pipāsatā mayā te sadayaṃ sundari ! gṛhyate raso 'sya || 53 ||
pravṛddhā yathā—(śāku. 3.22)
muhuraṅgulisaṃvṛtādharoṣṭhaṃ pratiṣedhākṣaraviklabābhirāmam |
mukhamaṃsavivarti pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kathamapyunnamitaṃ na cumbitaṃ tu || 54 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—
śikhariṇi k‍va nu nāma kiyac‍ciraṃ kimabhidhānamasāvakarot tapaḥ |
taruṇi ! yena tavādharapāṭalaṃ daśati bimbaphalaṃ śukaśāvakaḥ || 55 ||
anuvartinī yathā—
nirānandaḥ kaunde madhuni vidhuro bālavakule na sāle sālambo lavamapi lavaṅge na ramate |
priyaṅgau nāsaṅgaṃ racayati na cūte vicarati smaraṃllakṣmīlīlākamalamadhupānaṃ madhukaraḥ || 56 ||
gandhe jātā yathā—(māmā. 7.5)
prāsādānāmupari valabhījālavātāyanebhyo bhrāntāvṛttiḥ pariṇatasurāgandhasamparkahṛdyaḥ |
mālyāmodī muhurupacitassphārakarpūravāso vāyuryūnāmabhimatavadhūsannidhānaṃ vyanakti || 57 ||
anubandhinīṃ yathā—(raghu. 3.3)
tadānanaṃ mṛtsurabhi kṣitīśvaro rahaḥ samāghrāya na tṛp‍timāyayau |
karīva siktaṃ pṛṣataiḥ payomucāṃ śucivyapāye vanarājipalvalam || 58 ||
pravṛddhā yathā—(māgha. 6.12)
surabhiṇi śvasite dadhatastṛṣaṃ navasudhāmadhure ca tavādhare |
alamaleriva gandharasāvamū mama na saumanasau manaso mude || 59 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.76)
ārdrakesarasugandhi te mukhaṃ mattamattanayanaṃ svabhāvataḥ |
atra labdhavasatirguṇāntaraṃ kiṃ vilāsini ! madaḥ kariṣyati || 60 ||
anuvartinī yathā—
gehājireṣu navaśālikaṇāvapātagandhānubhāvasubhageṣu kṛṣīvalānām |
ānandayanti musalollasanāvadhūtapāṇiskhalad‍valayapaddhatayo vadhūbhyaḥ || 61 ||
(1.7 sāmprayogikī)
saṃprayogaprayojanā sāmprayogikī | sāpi pañcadhaiva | tatra jātā yathā—
uttiṣṭhantyā ratānte bharamuragapatau pāṇinaikena kṛtvā dhṛtvā cānyena vāso vigalitakabarībhāramaṃse vahantyāḥ |
bhūyastatkālakāntidviguṇitasurataprītinā śauriṇā vaḥ śayyāmāliṅgya nītaṃ vapuralasalasad‍bāhu lakṣmyāḥ punātu || 62 ||
anubandhinī yathā—
unnamayya sakacagrahamāsyaṃ cumbati priyatame haṭhavṛttyā |
huṃ vimuñca ma ma meti ca mandaṃ jalpitaṃ jayati mānavatīnām || 63 ||
pravṛddhā yathā—
dhanyāsstha yāḥ kathayatha priyasaṅgame 'pi visrabdhacāṭukaśatāni ratāntareṣu |
nīvīṃ prati praṇihite tu kare priyeṇa sakhyaḥ ! śapāmi yadi kiñcidapi smarāmi || 64 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—
adyāpi tat kanakakuṇḍalaghṛṣṭagaṇḍa— māsyaṃ smarāmi viparītaratābhiyoge |
āndolanaśramajalasphuṭagharmabindu— muktāphalaprakaravicchuritaṃ priyāyāḥ || 65 ||
anubandhinī yathā, uttaracarite citradarśanāntaraṃ rāmasya—(urāca. 1.27)
kimapi kimapi mandaṃ mandamāsattiyogā— daviralitakapolaṃ jalpatorakrameṇa |
sapulakaparimbhavyāpṛtaikaikadoṣṇo— raviditagatayāmā rātrireva vyaraṃsīt || 66 ||
(1.8 ābhimānikī)
abhimānaprabhavā ābhimānikī | sāpi pañcadhā | tatra jātā yathā—(urāca. 2.19)
akiñcidapi kurvāṇaḥ saukhyairduḥkhānyapohati |
tat tasya kimapi dravyaṃ yo hi yasya priyo janaḥ || 67 ||
anubandhinī yathā—
yadeva rocate mahyaṃ tadeva kurute priyā |
iti vetti na jānāti tat priyaṃ yat karoti sā || 68 ||
pravṛddhā yathā—(urāca. 1.39)
advaidhaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoranuguṇaṃ sarvāsvavasthāsu yad visrambho hṛdayasya yatra jarasā yasminnahāryo rasaḥ |
kālenāvaraṇātyayāt pariṇate yat s‍nehasāre sthitaṃ bhadraṃ tasya sumānuṣasya kathamapyekaṃ hi tat prāpyate || 69 ||
sampṛktā yathā—(urāca. 1.38)
iyaṃ gehe lakṣmīriyamamṛtavarttirnayanayo— rasāvasyāḥ sparśo vapuṣi bahulaścandanarasaḥ |
ayaṃ bāhuḥ kaṇṭhe śiśiramasṛṇo mauktikasaraḥ kimasyā na preyo yadiparamasahyastu virahaḥ || 70 ||
anuvartinī yathā—(raghu. 15.61)
ślāghyastyāgo 'pi vaidehyāḥ patyuḥ prāgvaṃśavāsinaḥ |
ananyajānerāsīd yat saiva jāyā hiraṇmayī || 71 ||
(2. prītiḥ —8)
ratireva asaṃprayogaprayojanā prītiḥ | sāpi sāmprayogikīṃ vinā ābhyāsikyā saha rativadaṣṭaprakāraiva | punaśca jātādibhedāt pratyekaṃ pañcadhā | atra (2.1) naisargikī
jātā yathā— (śāku. 7.17)
ālakṣyadantamukulānanabaddhahāsairavyaktavarṇaramaṇīyavacaḥ pravṛttīn |
aṅkāgatān praṇayinastanayān vahanto dhanyāstadaṅgarajasā paruṣībhavanti || 72 ||
anubandhinī yathā—(vikramo.5.12)
iyaṃ te jananī prāp‍tā tvadālokanatatparā |
s‍nehaprasravanirbhinnamudvahantī stanāṃśukam || 73 ||
prakṛṣṭā yathā—(raghu. 3.26)
tamaṅkamāropya śarīrayogajaiḥ sukhairniṣiñcantamivāmṛtaṃ tvaci |
upāntasammīlitalocano nṛpaścirāt sukhasparśarasajñatāṃ yayau || 74 ||
samparkiṇī yathā—
apariṣvajya bharataṃ nāsti me gacchato dhṛtiḥ |
asmad‍‍viyogaduḥkhāntaṃ na tvenaṃ draṣṭumutsahe || 75 ||
anugāminī yathā—(vikramo. 5.14)
ahaṃ hi putriṇāmagryaḥ satputreṇa tavāmunā |
paulomīsambhaveneva jayantena purandaraḥ || 76 ||
(2.2) sāṃsargikī
jātā yathā—(urāca. 1.32)
diṣṭyā saiṣa mahābāhurañjanānandavardhanaḥ |
yasya vīryeṇa kṛtino vayaṃ na bhuvanāni ca || 77 ||
anubandhinī yathā—(urāca. 1.9)
viśvambharā bhagavatī bhavatīmasūta rājā prajāpatisamo janakaḥ pitā te |
teṣāṃ vadhūstvamasi nandini ! pārthivānāṃ yeṣāṃ kuleṣu savitā ca gururvayaṃ ca ||
prakṛṣṭā yathā—(mavīca. 1.21)
utpattirdevayajanād brahmavādī nṛpaḥ pitā |
suprasannojjvalā mūrtirasyāḥ s‍nehaṃ karoti me || 79 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(vikramo. 1.14)
yāvat punariyaṃ subhrūrutsukābhiḥ samutsukā |
sakhībhiryāti saṃyogaṃ latābhiśśrīrivārtavī || 80 ||
anubandhinī yathā—(raghu. 13.72)
laṅkeśvarapraṇati/yabhaṅgadṛḍhavrataṃ tad vandyaṃ yugaṃ caraṇayorjanakātmajāyāḥ |
jyeṣṭhānuvṛttijaṭilaṃ ca śiro 'sya sādhoranyopāvanamabhūdubhayaṃ sametya || 81 ||
(2.3) ābhiyogikī
jātā yathā—(śāku. 7.26)
putrasya te raṇaśirasyayamagrayāyī duṣyantaṃ ityabhimato bhuvanasya bhartā |
cāpena yasya vinivartitakarmajātaṃ tatkoṭimatkuliśamābharaṇaṃ maghonaḥ || 82 ||
anubandhinī yathā—(raghu. 13.72)
durjātabandhurayamṛkṣaharīśvaro me paulastya eṣa samareṣu puraḥ prahartā |
ityādareṇa kathitau raghunandanena vyatkramya lakṣmaṇamubhau bharato vavande || 83 ||
prakṛṣṭā pravṛddhā yathā—(urāca. 3.24)
dadatu taravaḥ puṣpairarghyaṃ phalaiśca madhuś‍cyutaḥ sphuṭitakamalāmodaprāyāḥ prayā/vāntu vanānilāḥ |
kalamaviralaṃ rajayatkaṇṭhāḥ k‍vaṇantu śakuntayaḥ punaridamayaṃ devo rāmaḥ svayaṃ vanamāgataḥ || 84 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(vārā. 7.40.23)
tadaṅgeṣu jarāṃ yātu yat tvayopakṛtaṃ mama |
naraḥ pratyupakārāṇāmāpatsu labhate phalam || 85 ||
anugāminī yathā—(śāku. 7.2)
antargataprārthanamantikasthaṃ jayantamudvīkṣya kṛtasmitena |
āmṛṣṭa—vakṣo—haricandranāṅkā mandāramālā hariṇā pinaddhā || 86 ||
(2.4) ādhyātmikī
jātā yathā—(kirātā. 11.8)
paritastaṃ pṛthāsūnurlobhena paritastera |
avijñāte 'pi bandhau hi balāt prahlādate manaḥ || 87||
anubandhinī yathā—(vikramo. 5.9)
bāṣpānvitā nipatitā mama dṛṣṭirasmin vātsalyabandhi hṛdayaṃ manasaḥ pramodaḥ |
sañjātavepathubhirujjhitadhairyavṛttiricchāmi cainamadayaṃ parirabdhumaṅgaiḥ || 88 ||
prakṛṣṭā yathā—(śāku. 7.19)
anena kasyāpi kulāṅkureṇa spṛṣṭasya gātreṣu sukhaṃ mamaitat |
kāṃ nirvṛtiṃ cetasi tasya kuryād yasyāyamaṅgāt kṛtinaḥ prārūḍhaḥ || 89 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(urāca. 6.11)
virodho viśrāntaḥ prasarati raso nirvṛtighana— stadauddhatyaṃ k‍vāpi vrajati vinayaḥ prahvayati mām |
jhaṭityasmin dṛṣṭe kimapi paravānasmi yadi vā mahārghastīrthānāmiva hi mahatāṃ ko 'pyatiśayaḥ || 90 ||
anugāminī yathā—(urāca. 5.16)
yadṛcchāsaṃvādaḥ kimu guṇagaṇānāmatiśayaḥ purāṇo vā janmāntaranibiḍabaddhaḥ paricayaḥ |
nijo vā sambandhaḥ kimu vidhivaśāt ko 'pyavidito mamaitasmin dṛṣṭe hṛdayamavadhānaṃ racayati || 91 ||
(2.5) aupamānikī
jātā yathā—(urāca. 5.3)
munijanaśiśurekaḥ sarvataḥ saṃprakopānnava iva raghuvaṃśasyāprasiddhaḥ/ddhi-prarohaḥ |
dalitakarikapolagranthiṭaṅkāraghorajvalitaśarasahastraḥ kautukaṃ me karoti |
anubandhinī yathā—(urāca. 4.19)
kuvalayadalas‍nigdhaś‍yāmaḥ śikhaṇḍakamaṇḍano vaṭupariṣadaṃ puṇyaśrīkaśśriyaiva sabhājayan |
punariva śiśurbhūtvā vatsaḥ sa me raghunandano jhaṭiti kurute dṛṣṭaḥ ko 'yaṃ dṛśoramṛtāñjanam || 93 ||
prakṛṣṭā yathā—(urāca. 4.22)
vatsāyāśca raghūdvahasya ca śiśāvasminnabhivyajyate sampṛktiḥ pratibimbiteva nikhilā saivākṛtiḥ sā dyutiḥ |
sā vāṇī vinayaḥ sa eva sahajaḥ puṇyānubhāvo 'pyasau hā hā devi ! kimutpathairmama manaḥ pāriplavaṃ dhāvati || 94 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(urāca. 5.4)
atiśayitasurāsuraprabhāvaṃ śiśumavalokya tavaiva tulyarūpam |
kuśikasutamakhadviṣāṃ pramāthe dhṛtadhanuṣaṃ raghunandanaṃ smarati || 95 ||
anugāminī yathā—(urāca. 5.17)
tadākārādhikākāramāliṅgya tvāṃ sudurlabham |
vatsacchadmā punarvatsassa evāliṅgyate mayā || 96 ||
(2.6) vaiṣayikī punaḥ pañcadhā | tatra—
śabde jātā yathā—(urāca. 5.17)
ete te kuhareṣu gadgadanadgodāvarīvārayo meghāliṅgitatuṅganīlaśikharāḥ kṣīṇībhṛto dakṣiṇāḥ |
anyonyapratighātasaṃkuladalatkallolakolāhalai— rutālāsta ime gabhīrapayasaḥ puṇyāḥ saritsaṅgamāḥ || 97 ||
anubandhinī yathā—
nādhanyaiḥ kṣaṇadāvirāmamadhurāḥ kiñcid‍‌vinidrālasa— śrotraikavramugdhacāraṇavadhūdantacchādāyāsinaḥ |
śrūyante mṛdupītavaktramarutaḥ paurāṇarītikrama— vyālolāṅguliruddhamuktasuṣiraśroṇīravā veṇavaḥ || 98 ||
prakṛṣṭā yathā—
avyāt svarlokacūḍāmaṇipaṭalaśikhāśreṇiśoṇīkṛtāṅghrau kṣoṇībhāraṃ vinetuṃ jaṭharajuṣi jagad‍bāndhave devakī vaḥ |
rājñāmuddāmadoṣṇāṃ raṇaśirasi lasatkīkasacchedabhīmāḥ śastrāṇāṃ k‍vāṇakārāḥ pratihitaguravo yacch‍rute/rdohado/no 'bhūt || 99 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(urāca. 6.17)
atha ko 'yamindramaṇimecakacchavirdhvaninaiva baddhapulakaṃ karoti mām |
navanīlanīradharadhīragarjitakṣaṇalabdhakuṭmalakadambadanturam || 100 ||
anugāminī yathā—(māmā. 6.4)
asmākamekapada eva marud‌vikīrṇajīmūtajālarasitānukṛtirninādaḥ |
gambhīramaṅgalamṛdaṅgasahasrajanmā śabdāntaragrahaṇaśaktimapākaroti || 101 ||
sparśe jātā yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.15)
bhāgīrathīnirjharaśīkarāṇāṃ vọdhā muhuḥ kampitadevadāruḥ |
yad‍vāyuranviṣṭamṛgaiḥ kirātairāsevyate bhinnaśikhaṇḍibarhaḥ || 102 ||
anubandhinī yathā—(māgha. 13.16)
iha/bha—tuṅgakumbhaghaṭitetaretarastanabhāradūravinivāritodaram/rāḥ |
pariphullegaṇḍaphalakāḥ parasparaṃ parirebhire kukurakauravastriyaḥ || 103 ||
prakṛṣṭā yathā—(urāca. 6.8)
dinakarakulacandra candraketo ! sarabhasamehi dṛḍhaṃ pariṣvaje tvām |
tuhinaśakalaśītalaistavāṅgaiḥ śamamupayātu mamāpi cittadāhaḥ || 104 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(māmā. 9.38)
tadetadasitollasaddyuti śarīramasminnabhū— nmamāpi dṛḍhapīḍanairapi na tṛp‍tirāliṅganaiḥ |
yadullasitavibhramāñcitanipītavatyaḥ purā navapraṇayavibhramākulitamālatīdṛṣṭayaḥ || 105 ||
anugāminī yathā—(śāku. 4.11)
ramyāntaraḥ kamalinībharitaissarobhiśchāyādrumairniyamitārkamayūrakhatāpaḥ |
bhūyāt kuśeśayarajomṛdureṇurasyāḥ śāntānukūlapavanaśca śivaśca panthāḥ ||
rūpe jātā yathā—(māmā. 7.5)
ayamabhinavameghaś‍yāmalottuṅgasānu— rmadamukharamayūrīmuktasaṃsaktakekaḥ |
śakuniśabalanīlānokahas‍nigdhavarṣā/rṣmā vitarati bṛhadaśamā parvataḥ prītimakṣṇoḥ || 107 ||
anubandhinī yathā—(visā.1.25, bārā.5.38)
sāmyaṃ saṃprati sevate vicakilaṃ ṣāṇmāsikairmauktikai— rbāhlīkīdaśanavraṇāruṇadalaiḥ puṣpairaśoko 'rcitaḥ |
hūṇīnāṃ kurute madhūkakusumaṃ lāvaṇyaluṇṭākatāṃ lāṭīnābhinibhaṃ cakāsti ca patadvṛntāgrataḥ kesaraḥ || 108 ||
prakṛṣṭā yathā—
pṛṣṭheṣu śaṅkhaśakalacchaviṣu cchadānāṃ rājībhiraṅkitamalaktakalohinībhiḥ |
gorocanāharitababhrubahiḥpalāśamāmodate kumudamambhasi palvalasya || 109 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—
abhīkapītāntikadhūsarebhyo garbhasthatāmbūlarasāruṇebhyaḥ |
pariśramaṃ karṣati kāñcanāraṃ pāñcālanārīdaśanacchadebhyaḥ || 110 ||
anugāminī yathā—
tiktāvilāsānyadhunā purāṇamāñjiṣṭhacelacchavidhūsarāṇi |
alambusāyāḥ kusumāni sīm‍ni lolanti mandaṃ marudāhatāni || 111 ||
rase jātā yathā—
ucchvasyocchvasya dīrghaṃ kathamapi śanakaiḥ pāṭalāgandhagamyaṃ prabhraṣṭaṃ karkarītaḥ sphuṭasitasikatāsekasatkarṇikāyāḥ |
durād dhārānipātapravitatakaṇikāsicyamānānena svacchaṃ dhanyena vāri drutatuhinajaḍaṃ pīyate pāṇinaiva || 112 ||
anubandhinī yathā—
ikṣudaṇḍasya madya/ṇḍasya dadh‍naḥ piṣṭakṛtasya ca |
varāhasya ca māṃsasya saiṣa gacchati phālgunaḥ || 113 ||
prakṛṣṭā yathā—(mavīca. 3.2)
saṃjñapyate vatsatarī sarpiṣyannaṃ ca pacyate |
śrotriya ! śrotriyagṛhānāgato 'si juṣasva naḥ || 114 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(māgha. 3.81)
lavaṅgamālākalitāvataṃsāste nārikelāntarapaḥ pibantaḥ |
āsvāditārdrakramukāḥ samudrādabhyāgatasya pratipattimāpuḥ || 115 ||
anugāminī yathā—(raghu.4.65)
vinayante sma tadyodhā madhubhirvijayaśramam |
āstīrṇājinarat‍nāsu drākṣāvalayabhūmiṣu || 116 ||
gandhe jātā yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.9)
kapolakaṇḍūḥ karibhirvinetuṃ vighaṭṭitānāṃ saraladrumāṇām |
yatra srutakṣīratayā prasūtaḥ sānūni gandhaḥ surabhīkaroti || 117 ||
anubandhinī yathā—
vānti kahlārasubhagāḥ sap‍tacchadasugandhayaḥ |
śephālīkalikākośakaṣāyāmodino 'nilāḥ || 118 ||
prakṛṣṭā yathā—
asesaïhlādaṃ sadaruṃmii aṇehiṃ muhehiṃ |
aṅgha āharapuraoṇaaa vasāgaṃdhagabbhimā sihicāḷā(?) || 119 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—
mūle vṛntaṃ tadanu cipiṭaṃ kubjapṛṣṭhaṃ ca kiñcid— vyāvṛttāntacchadamatha tataḥ śliṣṭamutpiñjalāgram |
vātoddha‍ūtādavanamukhaṃ bandhinīmuktasandhe— rgandhāndhāḷiskhalitakusumaṃ pāṭalaṃ pāṭalāyām(?) || 120 ||
anugāminī yathā—
śūnyagrāmaṭikopakaṇṭharacitakṣudraikakūpīpayaḥ— paryāsāhitasekaśākikaharitkacchapradeśodbhavāḥ |
asmin hanta ! haranti hālikaratakrīḍāvimardasphuṭat— pak‍vorbārukagandhagandhitajarad‍gomāyavo vāyavaḥ || 121 ||
(2.7) ābhyāsikī(/sāmprayogikī)
jātā yathā—(śāku. 2.5)
medaśchedakṛśodaraṃ laghu bhavatyutthānayogyaṃ vapuḥ sattvānāmupalakṣyate vikṛtimaccittaṃ bhayakrodhayoḥ |
utkarṣaḥ sa ca dhanvināṃ yadiṣavaḥ sidhyanti lakṣye cale mithyaiva vyasanaṃ vadanti mṛgayāmīdṛg vinodaḥ kutaḥ || 122 ||
anubandhinī yathā—(raghu. 9.63)
vyāghrānabhīrābhimukhotpatitān guhābhyaḥ phullāsanāgraviṭapāniva vāyurugṇān |
śikṣāviśeṣalaghuhastatayā nimeṣāt tūṇīcakāra śarapūritavaktrarandhrān ||
prakṛṣṭā yathā—(raghu. 9.69)
iti vismṛtānyakaraṇīyamātmanaḥ sacivāvalambitadhuraṃ dharādhipam |
parivṛddharāgamanubaddhasevayā mṛgayā jahāra catureva kāminī || 124 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(raghu. 9.67)
api turagasamīpādutpatantaṃ mayūraṃ na sa rucirakalāpaṃ bāṇalakṣīcakāra |
sapadi gatamanaskaścitramālyānukīrṇe rativigalitabandhe keśapāśe priyāyāḥ || 125 ||
anugāminī yathā—(śāku. 2.6)
gāhantāṃ mahiṣāṃ nipānasalilaṃ śṛṅgairmuhustāḍitaṃ chāyābaddhakadambakaṃ mṛgakulaṃ romanthamabhyasyatu |
visrabdhaṃ kriyatāṃ varāhatatibhirmustākṣatiḥ palvale viśrāmaṃ labhatāmidaṃ ca śithilajyābandhamasmaddhanuḥ || 126 ||
(2.8) abhimānikī
jātā yathā— (urāca. 5.2)
kirati kalitakiñcitkoparajyanmukhaśrī— ravirataguṇaguñjatkoṭinā kārmukeṇa |
samaraśirasi cañcatpañcacūḍaścamūnā— mupari śaratuṣāraṃ ko 'pyayaṃ vīrapotaḥ || 127 ||
anubandhinī yathā—
herambadantamusalollikhitaikabhitti vakṣo viśālaviśikhavraṇalāñchitaṃ me |
romāñcakañcukitamad‍bhutavīralābhāt satyaṃ bravīmi parirabdhumivecchati tvām || 128 ||
prakṛṣṭā yathā—(urāca. 6.18)
dattendrābhayadakṣiṇairbhagavato vaivastatādā mano— rda‍ṛp‍tānāṃ damanāya dīpitanijakṣātrapratāpāg‍nibhiḥ |
ādityairyadi vigraho nṛpatibhiḥ sadyo mamaitat tato dīp‍tāgrasphuradugradīdhitiśikhānīrājitajyaṃ dhanuḥ || 129 ||
saṃpṛktā yathā—(vesaṃ. 4.1)
rājño mānadhanasya kārmukabhṛto duryodhanasyāgrataḥ pratyakṣaṃ kurubāndhavasya miṣataḥ karṇasya śalyasya ca |
pītaṃ tasya mayādya pāṇḍavavadhūkeśāmbarākarṣiṇaḥ koṣṇaṃ jīvata eva tīkṣṇakarajakṣuṇṇādasṛg vakṣasaḥ || 130 ||
anugāminī yathā—(vikramo. 2.16)
mayā nāma jitaṃ yasmāt tvayā 'yaṃ samudīryate |
jayaśabdaḥ sahasrākṣādāgataḥ puruṣāntaram || 131 ||
saiṣa bhāvo ratirnāma kāmakalpadrumāṅkuraḥ |
sauhṛdāṅkurakandaśca dviprakāro 'pi darśitaḥ || 132 ||
bhāvāntarebhyaḥ sarvebhyo ratibhāvaḥ prakṛṣyate |
kavivargaḥ samagro 'pi tamenamanudhāvati || 133 ||
nisargasaṃsargamukhaiḥ prabhedairjanmānubandhātiśayādibhiśca |
idaṃ viniścitya niveśayantaḥ kavīndrabhāvaṃ kavayo labhante || 134 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājabhojadevaviracite śṛṅgāraprakāśe ratiprakāśano nāma
|| trayodaśaḥ prakāśaḥ || 13 ||
kāmapat‍n‍yāvubhe hyete ratiprīti tayorasau |
prakāśo bhojadevena hanta gāḍhaṃ prakāśitaḥ ||
sanātanasya me puṇyaṃ mahadeva na saṃśayaḥ |
yasyāgre bhojakośo 'yaṃ vivṛtā 'tmā 'vatiṣṭhate ||
atha
śrṛṅgāraprakāśe caturdaśaḥ prakāśaḥ
harṣādibhāvaprapañcapañcakaprakāśaḥ
(3. harṣaḥ)*
manorathāvāp‍tau manaḥ prasādo harṣaḥ | sa janmani yathā—(mavīca 1.13)
rakṣogh‍nāni ca maṅgalāni sudine kalpyāni dārakriyā vaidehyāśca raghūd‌vahasya ca kule dīkṣāpraveśaśca naḥ |
āsthāpyāni ca tāni tāni jagatāṃ kṣemāya rāmātmano daityāreścaritādbhutānyatha khalu vyagrāḥ pramodāmahe || 1 ||
anubandhe yathā—(raghu. 3.16)
janāya śuddhāntacarāya śaṃsate kumārajanmāmṛtasammitākṣaram |
adeyamāsīd dvayameva bhūpateḥ śaśiprabhaṃ chattramubhe ca cāmare || 2 ||
prakarṣe yathā—(urāca. 5.24)
jātasya te piturapīndrajito nihantu— rvatsasya vatsa! kati nāma dinānyamūni |
tasyāpyapatyamanutiṣṭhati vīradharmaṃ diṣṭyā gataṃ daśarathasya kulaṃ pratiṣṭhām || 3 ||
saṃpṛkte yathā—(vikramo. 5.16)
āśvāsitasya mama nāma sutopalabdhyā sadyastvayā saha kṛśodari! viprayogaḥ |
vyāvartitātaparujaḥ prathamābbhravṛṣṭyā vṛkṣasya vaidyuta ivāg‍nirupasthito 'yam || 4 ||
anuvṛttau yathā—(rat‍nā. 4.13)
vivṛddhiṃ kampasya prathayatitarāṃ sādhvasavaśā— davispaṣṭāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ tirayati muhurbāṣpasalilaiḥ |
*614 pṛṣṭhagatamud‌deśakramamanusṛtya bhāvā atra nopasthāpyante mudriteṣu saṃskaraṇeṣu vyutkrameṇopasthāpitatvāt |
skhaladvarṇāṃ vāṇīṃ jaḍayatitarāṃ gadgaditayā
jarāyāḥ sāhāyyaṃ mama hi paritoṣo 'dya kurute || 5 ||
(4. romāñcaḥ)
ātmano vikṣobhajanmā antaśśarīrocch‌vāso romāñcaḥ | tasya janmani yathā—(śāku. 3.12)
unnamitaikabhrūlatamānanamasyāḥ padāni racayantyāḥ |
kaṇṭakitena prathayati mayyanurāgaṃ kapolena || 6 ||
anubandhe yathā—(raghu. 6.81)
sā yūni tasminnabhilāṣabandhaṃ śaśāka śālīnatayā na vak‍tum |
romāñcalakṣyeṇa sa gātrayaṣṭiṃ bhittvā nirākramadarālakeś‍yāḥ || 7 ||
prakarṣe yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.68)
vivṛṇvatī śailasutā 'pi bhāvamaṅgaiḥ k‍vacit/sphurad‌bālakadambakalpaiḥ |
sācīkṛtā cārutareṇa tasthau mukhena paryastavilocanena ||
samparke yathā—(urāca. 3.42)
sasvedaromāñcitakampitā sā jātā priyasparśasukhena vatsā |
marunnavāmbhaḥpravidhūtasiktā kadambayaṣṭiḥ sphuṭakorakeva || 9 ||
anubandhe yathā—(jāha. 10.86)
ekasmin śayane mayā mayasutāmāliṅgaya nidrālasā— munnidraṃ śayitena maccaraṇayoḥ saṃvāhanavyāpṛtā |
pādāgreṇa tilottamā stanataṭe sas‍nehamāpīḍitā harṣāvegasamarpitāni pulakānyadyāpi no muñcati || 90 ||
(5. dhṛtiḥ)
abhīṣṭaprāp‍teradhikā 'spṛhā dhṛtiḥ |
tajjanmani yathā—(kirātā. 6.18)
anusānu puṣyitalatāvitatiḥ phalitorubhūruhaviviktavanaḥ |
dhṛtimātatāna tanayasya harestapase 'dhivastumacalāmacalaḥ || 11 ||
anubandhe yathā—
viṣayapatiralabdho dhenubhirdhātupūtaṃ katicidabhimatāyāṃ sīm‍ni sīrā vahanti |
śithilayati na bhāryāṃ cātitheyīṃ saparyā— miti sukṛtamanena vyañjitaṃ naḥ phalena || 12 || (?)
prakarṣe yathā—(rat‍nā‍. 4. 19)
yāto vikramabāhurātmasamatāṃ prāp‍teyamurvītale sāraṃ sāgarikā sasāgaramahīprāp‍tyekahetuḥ priyā |
devī prītimupāgatā ca bhaginīlābhājjitāḥ kosalāḥ kiṃ nāsti tvayi satyamātyavṛṣabhe yasmin karomi spṛhām || 13 ||
saṃparke yathā—(māmā. 2.3)
nikāmaṃ kṣāmāṅgī sarasakadalīgarbhasubhagā kalāśeṣā mūrtiśśaśina iva netrotsavakarī |
avasthāmāpannā madanadahanoddāhavidhurā— miyaṃ naḥ kalyāṇī ramayati mano mohayati ca || 14 ||
anugame yathā—
abhyuṣṇāt saghṛtādannādacchidrād vāsasaḥ sitāt |
aparapreṣyabhāvācca bhūri vāñchan vinaś‍yati || 15 ||
(6. hāsaḥ)
harṣādibhirmanovikāsaviśeṣo hāsaḥ |
tajjanma yathā—
etat kiṃ śirasi sthitaṃ mama pituḥ? khaṇḍaḥ sudhādīdhiteḥ lalāṭaṃ kimidaṃ? vilocanamidaṃ; haste 'sya kiṃ? pannagaḥ |
itthaṃ krauñcaripoḥ kramādupagate digvāsasaḥ śūlinaḥ praś‍ne vāmakaroparodhasubhagaṃ devyāḥ smitaṃ pātu vaḥ || 16 ||
anubandhe yathā—
mātarjīva! kimetadañjaligataṃ tātena gopāyyate? vatsa! svādu phalaṃ; prayacchati na me; gatvā gṛhāṇa svayam |
gauryetthaṃ gadite guhe vighaṭayatyākṛṣya sandhyāñjaliṃ śambhorbhinnasamādhiruddharabhaso hāsod‍gamaḥ pātu vaḥ || 17 ||
prakarṣo yathā—
sa eṣa bhuvanatrayaprathitasaṃyamaḥ śaṅkaro bibharti vapuṣā 'dhunā virahakātaraḥ kāminīm |
anena kila nirjitā vayamiti priyāyāḥ karaṃ kareṇa paritāḍayan jayati jātahāsaḥ smaraḥ || 18 ||
saṃparko yathā—(khaṇḍayaśāstiḥ 30)
vapurdalanasambhramāt svanakharaṃ prana/viṣṭe ripau k‍va yāta iti vismayāt prahitalocanaḥ sarvataḥ |
vṛtheti karadhūtibhirnipatitaṃ punardānavaṃ nirīkṣya bhuvi reṇuvajjayati jātahāso hariḥ || 19 ||
anugamo yathā—(rat‍nā. 1.2)
autsukyena kṛtatvarā sahabhuvā vyāvartamānā hniyā taistairbandhuvadhūjanasya vacanairnītā ' 'bhimukhyaṃ punaḥ |
paś‍yantī paramāttasādhvasarasā gaurī nave saṅgame saṃrohatpulakā hareṇa hasatā ' 'śliṣṭā śivāyāstu vaḥ || 20 ||
(7. garvaḥ)
ātmotkarṣasambhāvanayā parāvajñānaṃ garvaḥ |
tajjanma yathā—(urāca. 2.39)
yaḥ prāpat prasabhaṃ purā 'mṛtahṛtau vahniprabhābhāsuraiḥ pakṣālīkalitā parapraharaṇairdheryocitaṃ maṇḍanam |
tenāsmadbha‌‍ujapañjare 'tra viphalotphālān muhuḥ kurvatā vyālolena garutmatā 'pi suciraṃ krīḍāśakuntāyitam || 21 ||
anubandho yathā—(vesaṃ. 3.7)
astrajvālāvalīḍhapratibalajaladheṃrantaraurvāyamāṇe senānāthe sthite 'smin mama pitari gurau sarvadhanvīśvarāṇām |
karṇālaṃ sambhrameṇa, vraja kṛpa! samaraṃ, muñca hārdikya! śaṅkāṃ tāte cāpadvitīye vahati raṇadhuraṃ ko bhayasyāvakāśaḥ ? || 22 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(vesaṃ. 3.46)
dhṛtāyudho yāvadahaṃ tāvadanyaiḥ kimāyudhaiḥ |
yadvā na siddhamastreṇa mama tat kena setsyati || 23 ||
saṃparko yathā—
cakraṃ vā madhuhā kṛtāntagṛhiṇīdattāgrapañcāṅgulaṃ vajraṃ bhūdharapakṣaśoṇitasurāpānonmadaṃ vā vṛṣā |
śūlaṃ vā 'ndhakaraktabindunicitaṃ gṛh‍ṇātu śūlāyudho dhṛṣṭadyum‍namahaṃ nihanmi samare kaścit paritrāyatām || 24 ||
anugamo yathā—(urāca. 2.31)
mainākaḥ kimayaṃ ruṇāddhi gagane manmārgamavyāhataṃ śaktistasya kutaḥ? sa vajrapatanād bhīto mahendradāpi |
tārkṣyaḥ? so 'pi samaṃ nijane vibhunā jānāti māṃ rāvaṇam āḥ; jñātaṃ sa jaṭāyureṣa jarasā kliṣṭo vadhaṃ vāñchati || 25 ||
(8. madaḥ)
madirādyupayogānmanassammohānandasaṃbhedo madaḥ |
tajjanma yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.78)
pārvatī tadupayogasambhavāṃ vikriyāṃ gatavatī manoharām |
apratarkyavidhiyoganirmitāmāmrateva sahakāratāṃ yayau || 26 ||
anubandho yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.80)
ghūrṇamānanayanaṃ skhalatpadaṃ svedabinduma—dakāraṇasmitam |
ānanena na tu tāvadīśvaraścakṣuṣā ciramumāmukhaṃ papau || 27 ||
saṃparko yathā—(kirātā. 9.73)
śīdhupānavidhureṣu vadhūnāṃ nigh‍natāmupagateṣu vapuṣṣu |
īhitaṃ ratirasāhitabhāvaṃ vītalakṣyamapi kāmiṣu reje || 28 ||
anugamo yathā—(kirātā. 9.77)
āmodavāsitacalādharapallaveṣu nidrākaṣāyitavipāṭalalocaneṣu |
vyāmṛṣṭapatralatikeṣu vilāsinīnāṃ śobhāṃ babandha vadaneṣu madasya śeṣāḥ || 21 ||
(9. utsāhaḥ)
puruṣārtheṣvāparisamāp‍teḥ prayat‍naviśeṣa utsāhaḥ |
tajjanma yathā—(rāca. 15.67)
mūrdh‍nā jām‍bavato 'bhivādya caraṇāvāpṛcch‌ya senāpatīn āśvāsyāśrumukhān muhuḥ priyasakhān preṣyān samādiśya ca |
ārambhaṃ jagṛhe mahendrasikharādambhonidherlaṅghane raṃhasvī radhunāthapādarajasāmuccaiḥ smaran mārutiḥ || 30 ||
anubandho yathā—(raghu. 6.76)
putro raghustasya padaṃ praśāsti mahākratorviśvajitaḥ prayoktā |
caturdigāvarjitasambhṛtāṃ yo mṛtpātraśeṣāmakared vibhūtim || 31 ||
prakarṣo yathā—
diḍyātaṅgaghaṭāvibhaktacaturāghāṭā mahī sādhyate; siddhā sāpi; vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñcitāḥ paśyata |
viprāya pratipādyate; kimaparaṃ; rāmāya tasmai namo yasmādāvirabhūt kathāddha‍utamidaṃ yatraiva cāstaṃ gatam || 32 ||
samparko yathā—(raghu. 5.28)
athādhiśiś‍ye prayataḥ pradoṣe rathaṃ raghuḥ kalpitamastragarbham |
sāmantasambhāvanayaiva dhīraḥ kailāsanāthaṃ tarasā jigīṣuḥ || 33 ||
anugamo yathā—(urāca. 6.13)
śak‍tyā vakṣasi mag‍nayā saha mayā mụ̄dhe plavaṅgādhipe vidrāṇeṣu ca vidravatsu kapiṣu prāp‍tāvakāśe dviṣi |
mā bhaiṣṭeti nirundhataḥ kapibalān yasyodbhaṭabhrūsthite marmacchedavisaṃsthulākṣarajaḍā vācastvayā na śrutāḥ || 34 ||
(10. matiḥ)
śāstraparibhāvanayā 'rthanirdhāraṇaṃ matiḥ | tasyā
janma yathā—(śāku. 5.2)
ramyāṇi vīkṣya madhurāṃśca niśamya śabdān paryutsuko bhavati yat sukhito 'pi jantuḥ |
taccetasā smarati nūnamabodhapūrvaṃ bhāvasthitāni/sthirāṇi jananāntarasauhṛdāni || 35 ||
anubandho yathā—(urāca. 6.12, māmā. 1.27)
vyatiṣajati padārthānāntaraḥ ko 'pi hetu— rna khalu bahirupādhīn pratīyaḥ saṃśrayante |
vikasati hi pataṅgasyodaye puṇḍarīkaṃ dravati ca himaraśmāvudgate candrakāntaḥ || 36 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(urāca. 3.47)
eko rasaḥ karuṇa eva nimittabhedād bhinnaḥ pṛthak pṛthagiva śrayate vivartān |
āvartabudbudataraṅgamayān vikārā— nambho yathā salilameva hi tat samagram || 37 ||
samparko yathā— (māmā. 8.14)
yātā nu tad bhagavatī bhavanaṃ sakhī no jīvantyupaiṣyati na vetyatha śaṅkito 'smi |
prāyeṇa bāndhavasuhṛtpriyasaṅgamādi saudāmanīsphuraṇacañcalameṣa saukhyam || 38 ||
anugamo yathā—
tadetat tarkāṇāmapathamapadaṃ viśvavacasā— manādhāraṃ buddherniyatakaraṇagrāmasuhṛdaḥ |
yadāloke yūnāṃ kanakaphalakasphārajaghanā ghanā lokā tanvī kimapi kamanīyaṃ janayati || 39 ||
(11. vitarkaḥ)
artheṣu yathāmati ūho vitarkaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.41)
śirīṣapuṣpādhikasaukumāryau bāhū tadīyāviti me vitarkaḥ |
parājitenāpi kṛtau harasya yau kaṇṭhapāśo makaradhvajena || 40 ||
anubandho yathā—(śāku. 2.9)
citra niveś‍ya parikalpitasattvayogā rūpoccayena vidhinā manasā kṛtā nu |
strīrat‍nasṛṣṭiraparā pratibhāti sā me dhāturvibhutvamanucintya vapuśca tasyā || 41 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(vikramo. 1.10)
asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatirabhūccandro nu kāntipradaḥ śrṛṅgāraikarasaḥ svayaṃ nu madano māso nu puṣpākaraḥ |
vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ sa viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhavenmanoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ || 42 ||
saṃparko yathā—(kusaṃ. 7.67)
na nūnamārūḍharuṣā śarīramanena dagdhaṃ kusumāyudhasya |
vrīḍādamuṃ devamudīkṣya manye saṃnyastadehaḥ svayameva kāmaḥ || 43 ||
anugamo yathā—(śāku. 1.19)
asaṃśayaṃ kṣatraparigrahakṣamā yadāryamasyāmabhilāṣi me manaḥ |
saṃtā hi sandehapadeṣu vastuṣu pramāṇamantaḥ karaṇapravṛttayaḥ || 44 ||
(12. vismayaḥ)
atiśayitapadārthadarśanāccittavistāro vismayaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—
imau rambhāstambhāvupari viparītau kamalayo— stadūrdhvaṃ rat‍nāś‍masthalamatha durūhaṃ kimapi tat |
tataḥ kumbhau paścād bisakisalaye kandalamatho tadanvindāvindīvaramadhukarāḥ; kiṃ punaridam? || 45 ||
anubandho yathā—(nīti. 67)
ito vasati keśavaḥ kulamitastadīyadviṣām itaśca śaraṇārthinaḥ śikhariṇāṃ gaṇāḥ śerate |
ito 'pi baḍabānalaḥ saha samastasaṃvartakai— raho vitatamūrjitaṃ bharasahaṃ ca sindhorvapuḥ || 46 ||
prakarṣo yathā—
kṛṣṇonādya/mba! gatena rantumadhunā mṛd bhakṣitā svecchayā satyaṃ kṛṣṇa! ka evamāha? musalī, mithyā 'mba! paś‍yānanam |
vyādehīti vidārite 'tha vadane dṛṣṭvā samagraṃ jagad mātā yasya jagāma vismayapadaṃ pāyāt sa vaḥ keśavaḥ || 47 ||
saṃparko yathā—(urāca. 6.31, māmā. 9. 12)
dalati hṛdayaṃ gạ̄dhodvegaṃ dvidhā tu na bhidyate vahati vikalaḥ kāyo mohaṃ na muñcati cetanām |
jvalayati tanūmantardāhaḥ karoti na bhasmasāt praharati vidhirmarmacchedī na kṛntati jīvitam || 48 ||
anugamo yathā—
vīcīvyāp‍taviyanniruddhavasudhaṃ k‍vāgādharandhraṃ payo golāṅgūlasalīlapāṇitulitāḥ kṣudrāḥ k‍va te kṣmābhṛtaḥ |
baddhvā dāśarathistathāpi jaladhiṃ pratyājahāra priyāṃ grāvāṇo 'pi taranti vāriṇi yadā puṃso 'nukūlo vidhiḥ || 49 ||
(13. vaiklabyam)
raudrādidarśanānmanaso vaiklabyaṃ bhayam |
tajjanma yathā—
mantrām mṛtyujito japadbhirasakṛd dhyāyadbhiriṣṭān surān śuṣyattālubhirākulākulapadairnirvāgbhirutkāmpibhiḥ |
adhvanyairiha jīviteśamahiṣavyādhrūmradhūmāvilā laṅghayante karimāṃsaghasmararaṇatkauleyakāḥ pallayaḥ || 50 ||
anubandho yathā—(mavīca. 2.20)
sattvabhraṃśaviṣādibhiḥ kathamapi trastaiḥ kṣaṇaṃ vetribhi— rdṛṣṭo dṛṣṭivighātajihmitamukhairavyāhataprakramaḥ |
rāmānveṣaṇatatparaḥ parijanairunmuktahāhāravaḥ kanyāntaḥpurameva hā praviśati kruddho munirbhārgavaḥ || 51 ||
prakarṣo yathā—
varāhaḥ kalyāṇaṃ vitaratu sa vo yasya śaśabhṛ— tkalākoṭīkāntaṃ kramavigaladabhyuddha‍ṛtibhayā |
mithassaṃmūrcchadbhiścaturudadhikallolapaṭalai— ranāmṛṣṭaṃ daṃṣṭrāśikharamadhiśete vasumatī || 52 ||
(14. trāsaḥ)
raudrādijanmā cittacamatkāraḥ trāsaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—(kirātā. 8.45)
parisphuranmīnavighaṭṭitoravaḥ surāṅganāstrāsaviloladṛṣṭayaḥ |
upāyayuḥ kampitapāṇipallavāḥ sakhījanasyāpi vilokanīyatām || 53 ||
anubandho yathā—
kiṃ mugdhe! śukapañjareṇa rasike! kiṃ śārikānveṣaṇe svacche! muñcasi kiṃ na citraphalakaṃ kiṃ vīṇayā rāgiṇi! |
nāyaṃ bhūṣaṇasaṃgrahasya samayo līlāvati! tvaryatā— mityāsan puravidrave bhavadaristrīṇāṃ vayasyāgiraḥ || 54 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(dhva.lo. 2.5/6)
sa pātu vo yasya hatāvaśeṣāstattulyavarṇāñjanarañjiteṣu |
lāvaṇyayukteṣvapi vitrasanti daityāḥ svakāntānayanotpaleṣu || 55 ||
saṃparko yathā—(tima. 46)
śrutvā yaṃ sahasā gataṃ nijapurāt trāsena nirgacchatāṃ śatrūṇāmavarodhanairjalalavaprasyandatāmyatpuṭāḥ |
śubhre veś‍mani pallavinyupavane vāpyāṃ navāmbhoruhi krīḍādrau ca muhurmuhurvivalitagrīvairvimuktā dṛśaḥ || 56 ||
anugamo yathā—
ajja vi harī camakkaï kaha kaha vi ṇa maṃdareṇa daliāiṃ |
candakalākaṃdalakomalāi lacchīe aṃgāi || 57 ||
(adyāpi hariścamatkṛtaḥ kathaṃ kathamapi na mandareṇa dalitāni |
candrakalākandalakomalāni lakṣmyā aṅgāni ||)
(15. śaṅkā)
aniṣṭāgamotprekṣaṇaṃ śaṅkā | tasyā
janma yathā—(mavīca. 2.1)
dūrāddavīyo dharaṇīdharābhaṃ yastāṭakeyaṃ tṛṇavad vyadhūnot |
hantā subāhorapi tāṭakāriḥ sa rājaputro hṛdi bādhate mām || 58 ||
anubandho yathā—(māmā. 8.13)
kimapi kimapi śaṅke maṅgalebhyo yadanyad viramatu parihāsaścaṇḍi! paryutsuko 'smi |
kalayasi pari/kalitoṣaṃ vallabhe! dehi vācaṃ bhramati hṛdayamantarvihvalaṃ nirdayā 'si || 59 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(māmā. 8.12)
mama hi kuvalayākṣīṃ pratyaniṣṭaikabuddhe— raviratamanubandhotkampa evāntarātmā |
sphurati ca khalu cakṣurvāmametacca kaṣṭaṃ vacanamiha bhavatyoḥ sarvathā hā hato 'smi || 60 ||
saṃparko yathā—(mavīca. 4.11)
hā vatsāḥ! kharadūṣaṇatriśiraso vadhyāsstha pāpasya me hā hā vatsa vibhīṣaṇa! tvamapi me kāryeṇa heyaḥ sthitaḥ |
hā madvatsala vatsa rāvaṇa! mahat paś‍yāmi te saṅkaṭaṃ vatse kekasi! hā hatā 'si nacirāt trīn putrakān drakṣyasi || 61 ||
anugamo yathā—(bārā. 9.55)
helākhaṇḍitacaṇḍahemahariṇairbāṇaiḥ kulaṃ vidviṣāṃ śeṣībhūtavibhīṣaṇaṃ guṇanidhau kṛtvā tu rāme sthite |
pratyujjīvanaśaṅkayā yadacito laṅkāpateḥ kātarai— rno muk‍tāḥ kusumastrajo na ca surairāsphālito dundubhiḥ || 62 ||
(16. stambhaḥ)
bhayānurāgādijanmā ceṣṭāpratighātaḥ stambhaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—(raghu. 2.31)
vāmetarastamya bhujaḥ praharturnakhaprabhābhūṣitakaṅkapatre |
saktāṅguliḥ sāyakapuṅkha eva citrārpitārambha ivāvatasthe || 63 ||
anubandho yathā—(seba. 2.42)
sāaradaṃsaṇahitthā akkhittovasariavevamāṇasarīrā |
sahasā lihia vva ṭhiā ṇippaṃdaṇirāaloaṇā kaïṇivahā || 64 ||
(sāgaradarśanatrastāḥ ākṣip‍tāpasṛtavepamānaśarīrāḥ |
sahasā likhitā iva sthitāḥ nisspandanirāyatalocanāḥ kapinivahāḥ ||)
prakarṣo yathā—(urāca. 5.13)
vyatikara iva bhīmastāmaso vaidyutaśca praṇihitamapi cakṣurgrastamuktaṃ hinasti |
atha likhitamivaitat sainyamaspandamāste niyatamajitavīrye jṛmbhate jṛmbhakāstram || 65 ||
saṃparko yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.85)
taṃ vīkṣya vepathumatī sarasāṅgayaṣṭirnikṣepa eva padamuddha‍ṛtamudvahantī |
mārgācalavyatikarākuliteva sindhuḥ śailādhirājatanayā na yayau na tasthau ||
anugamo yathā—(raghu. 2.32)
bāhupratiṣṭambhavivṛddhamanyurabhyarṇamāgaskṛtamaspṛśadbhiḥ |
rājā svatejobhiradahyatāntarbhogīva mantrapratibaddhavīryaḥ || 67 ||
(17. svedaḥ)
śramānurāgādyapekṣamanaḥkṣobhajanmā vapurjalodbhedaḥ svedaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.36)
himavyapāyād viśadādharāṇāmāpāṇḍarībhūtamukhacchavīnām |
svedodgamaḥ kiṃpuruṣāṅganānāṃ cakre padaṃ patraviśeṣakeṣu || 68 ||
anubandho yathā—(kirātā. 17.8)
tasyāhavāyāsavilolamauleḥ saṃrambhatāmrāyatalocanasya |
nirvāpayiṣyanniva roṣatastaṃ pras‍nāpayāmāsa mukhaṃ nidāghaḥ || 69 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(sūmu. 10)
karasparśānandāt pulakitapṛthūrojakalaśe śramāmbho vāmārdhe vamati madanākūtasulabham |
vibhorvāraṃ vāraṃ kṛtasamādhikoddha‍ūlanavidhiḥ/dhe— stanau bhasmas‍nānaṃ kathamapi samāp‍taṃ vijayate || 70 ||
samparko yathā—(māgha. 10.80)
prāpya manmathamadādatibhūmiṃ durvahastanabharāḥ suratasya |
śaśramuḥ śramajalārdralalāṭaśliṣṭakeśamasitāyatakeś‍yaḥ || 71 ||
anugamo yathā—(raghu. 8.51)
surataśramavāribindavo na tu tāvad viramanti te mukhe |
svayamastamitāsyaho! bata kṣayiṇāṃ dehabhṛtāmasāratā || 72 ||
(18. svarabhedaḥ)
harṣādijanmā vāgbhaṅgaḥ svarabhedaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—
vāsiṣṭhaiḥ sukṛtodbhavo 'dhvaraśatairastyag‍nikuṇḍodbhavo bhūpālaḥ paramāra ityadhipatiḥ sap‍tābdhikāñcerbhuvaḥ |
adyāpyudgataharṣagadgadagiro gāyanti yasyārbude viśvāmitrajayojjhitasya bhujayorvisphūrjitaṃ gurjarāḥ || 73 || (tima.)
anubandho yathā—(raghu. 8.43)
vilakāpa sa bāṣpagadgadaḥ sahajāmapyavadhūya dhīratām |
abhitap‍tamayo 'pi mārdavaṃ bhajate; kaiva kathā śarīriṣu || 74 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(urāca. 1.12)
ānandāśrutaraṅgalocanayugaṃ mārgārpitaṃ bibhratī harṣād gadgadayā girā parijanaṃ vyāpārayantī muhuḥ |
saiṣā svāśayanirvikalpahṛdayā saukhyācciraprārthitā— dambā niṣkaruṇena dagdhavidhinā dūraṃ visaṃvāditā || 75 ||
saṃparko yathā—(sūmu. 3)
pi pi priya sa sa svayaṃ mu mu mukhāsavaṃ dehi me ta ta tyaja du du drutaṃ bha bha bha bhājanaṃ kāñcanam |
iti skhalitajalpitaṃ madavaśāt kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ prage hasitahetave sahacarībhiradhyaiyata || 76 ||
anugamo yathā—(kirātā. 9.50)
pāṇipallavavidhūnanamantassītkṛtāni nayanārdhanimeṣāḥ |
yoṣitāṃ rahasi gadgadavācāmastratāmupayayurmadanasya || 77 ||
(19. vepathuḥ)
bhayānurāgādyapekṣacittavikṣobhajaḥ kampo vepathuḥ |
tajjanma yathā—(daa. 2.23)
mā garvamud‌vaha kapolatale cakāsti kāntasvahastalikhitā mama mañjarīti |
anyā 'pi kiṃ sakhi! na bhājanamīdṛśānāṃ vairī na ced bhavatu vepathurantarāyaḥ || 78 ||
anubandho yathā—(māmā. 7.2)
rambhoru! saṃhara bhayaṃ kṣamate vikāramutkampitasstanabharasya na madhyabhāgaḥ |
itthaṃ tvayaiva kathitapraṇayaprasādaḥ saṅkalpanirvṛtiṣu saṃstuta eṣa dāsaḥ || 79 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(mavīca. 2.21)
ātaṅkaśramasādhvasavyatikaṃrotkampaḥ kathaṃ sahyatā— maṅgairmugdhamadhūkapuṣparucibhirlāvaṇyasārairayam |
unnaddhastanakumbhakuṅ‌malaguruśvāsāvabhug‍nasya te madhyasya trivalītaraṅgakajuṣo bhaṅgaḥ priye! mā ca bhūt || 80 ||
samparko yathā—(māmā. 1.38)
vāraṃvāraṃ tirayati dṛśāvudgato bāṣpapūra— statsaṅkalpopahitajaḍima stambhamabhyeti gātram |
sadyaḥ svidyannayamaviratotkampalolāṅgulīkaḥ pāṇirlekhāvidhuṣu nitarāṃ vartate; kiṃ karomi || 81 ||
anugamo yathā—
papphuria uṭṭhadalaaṃ (atraiva pṛ. 10.365)
(20. vrīḍā)
varṇanānurāgādijanmā manassaṅkoco vrīḍā | tasyā
janma yathā—(raghu. 7.23, kuṃsa. 7.75)
tayorapāṅgapratisāritāni kiñcid vyavasthāpitasaṃhṛtāni |
hnīyantraṇāmānaśire manojñāmanyololāni vilocanāni || 82 ||
anubandho yathā—(vesaṃ. 4.15)
adyauvāvāṃ raṇamupagatau tātamambāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā ghrātastābhyāṃ śirasi vinato 'haṃ ca duśśāsanaśca |
tasmin bāle prasabhamariṇā prāpite tāmavasthāṃ pārśvaṃ pitrorapagataghṛṇaḥ kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi gatvā || 83 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(urāca. 5.6)
dviṣannihatarakṣasāṃ sutasuhṛdvadhūbāndhava— pralāpamatidussahaṃ prathitakhedamākarṇayan |
nijānyapi mukhānyaho namitakandharo durmanā na saṃprati daśānanaḥ suciramīkṣate lajjayā || 84 ||
samparko yathā—(sūmu. 16)
pratyagrārikṛtābhimanyunidhanaproddha‍ūtatīvrakrudhaḥ kīrṇā bāṣpakaṇaiḥ patanti dhanuṣi vrīḍājaḍā dṛṣṭayaḥ |
pārthasyākṛtaśātravapratikṛtarentaśśucā muhyato hā vatseti girassphuranti na punarniryānti kaṇṭhād bahiḥ || 85 ||
anugamo yathā—(sūmu. 10)
keyūrīkṛtakaṅkaṇāvalirasau karṇāvataṃsīkṛta— vyālolālakapaddhatiḥ pathi puro baddhāñjaliḥ pṛcchati |
yāvat kiñcidudantamātmakamitustāvat sa evetyatha vrīḍāvakritakaṇṭhanālamabalā kaiḥ kairna bhinnā rasaiḥ || 86 ||
(21. avahittham)
iṅgitākāragopanamavahittham | tasya
janma yathā—(śāku. 2.18)
k‍va vayaṃ k‍va parokṣamanmatho mṛgaśāvaiḥ samamedhito janaḥ |
parihāsavijalpitaṃ sakhe! paramārthena na gṛhyatāṃ vacaḥ || 87 ||
anubandho yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.84)
evaṃvādini devarṣau pārśve pituradhomukhī |
līlākamalapatrāṇi gaṇayāmāsa pārvatī || 88 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(gāsa. 2.99)
pāaḍia—saṇehasabbhāva—vibbhamaṃ tīe jaha tumaṃ diṭhṭho |
saṃvaraṇa—vāvaḍāe aṇṇo vi jaṇo taha ccea || 89 ||
(prakaṭitasnehasadbhāvavibhramaṃ tayā yathā tvaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ |
saṃvaraṇavyāpṛtayā 'nyo 'pi janastathaiva ||)
saṃparko yathā—(śāku. 2.11)
abhimukhe mayi saṃhṛtamīkṣitaṃ hasitamanyanimittakṛtodayam |
vinayavāritavṛttiratastayā na vivṛto madano na ca saṃvṛtaḥ || 90 ||
anugamo yathā—
pramlānotpalakomale sakhi! dṛśau nīlāñjanenāñcite karpūracchuraṇācca gaṇḍaphalake saṃvardhitaḥ pāṇḍimā |
śvāsāḥ santu ca kandukabhramibhuvaḥ kiṃ tu prabhā—vāhinā— maṅgānāṃ kraśimānamutkaṭamamuṃ ko nāma notprekṣate || 91 ||
(22. capalatā)
manaso 'sthairyaṃ capalatā | tasyā
janma yathā—(raghu. 7.6, kusaṃ. 7.57)
ālokamārgaṃ sahasā vrajantyā kayācidud‍veṣṭanavāntamālyaḥ |
bandhuṃ na sambhāvita eva tāvat kareṇa ruddho 'pi ca keśapāśaḥ || 92 ||
anubandho yathā—(raghu. 7.7, kusaṃ. 7.58)
prasādhikālambitamagrapādamākṣipya kācid dravarāgameva |
utsṛṣṭalīlāgatirāgavākṣādalaktakāṅkāṃ padavīṃ tatāna || 93 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(raghu. 7.8, kusaṃ. 7.59)
vilocanaṃ dakṣiṇamañjanena saṃbhāvya tadvañcitavāmanetrā |
tathaiva vātāyanasannikarṣaṃ yayau śalākāmaparā vahantī || 94 ||
saṃparko yathā—(raghu. 7.9, kusaṃ. 7.60)
jālāntarapreṣitadṛṣṭiranyā prasthānabhinnāṃ na babandha nīvīm |
nābhipraviṣṭābharaṇaprabheṇa hastena tasthāvavalambya vāsaḥ || 95 ||
anugamo yathā—(raghu. 7.11, kusaṃ. 7.62)
tāsāṃ mukhairāsavagandhagarbhairvyāp‍tāntarāḥ sāndrakutūhalānām |
vilolanetrabhramarairgavākṣāḥ sahastrapatrābharaṇā ivāsan || 96 ||
(23. ālasyam)
śrṛṅgārādibhirmānasaḥ kriyāvidveṣa ālasyam | tasya
janma yathā—(gāsa. 2.48)
ṇiddālasa—parighummira—taṃsa—valaṃtaddha—tāraāloā |
kāmassa vi duvvisahā diṭṭhi—ṇivāā sasimuhīe || 97 ||
(nidrālasa—parighūrṇana—śīla—tiryag‌valadardhatārakālokāḥ |
kāmasyāpi durviṣahā dṛṣṭinipātāḥ śaśimukhyāḥ ||)
anubandho yathā—
ārdrāḥ srajo malayajodakamacchamekaṃ vāsaśca vāsavaripurmamṛṣe 'lasāṅgaḥ |
sañcikliśe kalitarudraniketanādribhariṇa tatkṣaṇamasau maṇibhūṣaṇānām || 98 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(gāsa. 3.61)
ghariṇi—ghaṇatthaṇa—peḷaḷaṇa—suhelli—paḍiassa hoṃtapahiassa |
avasaüṇaṃgāraa—vāravịdhiḍhadiahā suhāventi || 99 ||
(gṛhīṇīghanastanapreraṇasukhakelipatitasya bhaviṣyatpathikasya |
apaśākunāṅgārakavāraviṣṭidivasāḥ sukhāpayanti ||)
samparko yathā—(māmā. 1.31)
alasalulitamugdhasnigdhanisspandamandairadhika—vikasadantarvismayasmeratāraiḥ |
hṛdayamaśaraṇaṃ me pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kaṭākṣairapahṛtamapaviddhaṃ pītamunmūlitaṃ ca || 100 ||
anugamo yathā— uttiṣṭhantyā ratānte॰ (atraiva 10.21, 13.62)
(24. nidrā)
indriyāṇāṃ nimīlanaṃ nidrā | tasyā
janma yathā—
pṛṣṭhabhrāmyadamandamandaragirigrāvāgrakaṇḍūyanā— nnidrāloḥ kamaṭhākṛterbhagavataḥ śvāsānilaḥ pātu vaḥ |
yatsaṃskārakalānuvartanavaśād velācchalenāmbhasāṃ yātāyātamaharniśaṃ jalanidhernādyāpi viśrāmyati || 101 ||
anubandho yathā—(kirātā. 16.27)
āsāditā tatprathamaṃ prasahya pragalbhatāyāḥ padavīṃ harantī |
sahe/bheva bhīmā vidadhe gaṇānāṃ nidrā nirāsaṃ pratibhāguṇasya || 102 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(raghu. 7.62)
tato dhanuṣkarṣaṇamūḍhastamekāntaparyastaśirastrajālam |
tasthau dhvajastambhaniṣaṇṇadehaṃ nidrāvidheyaṃ naradevasainyam || 103 ||
samparko yathā—(kirātā. 16.30)
aṃsasthalaiḥ kecidabhinnadhairyāḥ skandheṣu saṃśleṣavatāṃ tarūṇām |
madena mīlannayanāḥ salīlaṃ nāgā iva strastakarā niṣeduḥ || 104 ||
anugamo yathā—(māgha. 11.4)
praharakamapanīya svaṃ ninidrāsatoccaiḥ pratipadamupahūtaḥ kenacijjāgṛhīti |
muhuraviśadavarṇāṃ nidrayā śūnyaśūnyāṃ dadadapi giramantarbudhyate no manuṣyaḥ || 105 ||
(25. sup‍tam)
nidrādikāryaṃ sup‍tam | tasya
janma yathā—
āśleṣiṇaḥ pṛthutaraklamapītaśītamāyāminīṃ ghanamado rajanīryuvānaḥ |
ūrvormuhurvalanabandhanasandhilolapādāntasaṃvalitatūlapaṭāḥ svapanti || 106 ||
anugamo yathā—(gāsa. 7.17)
osuaï diṇṇapaḍivakkhaveaṇaṃ pasịdhilehi aṃgehiṃ |
ṇivvattia-suraa-rasāṇubaṃdhasuhaṇibbharaṃ suṇhā || 107 ||
(avasvapiti dattapratipakṣavedanaṃ praśithilairaṅgaiḥ |
nirvartitasuratarasānubandhasukhanirbharaṃ snuṣā ||)
prakarṣo yathā—(sūmu. 15)
laghuni tṛṇakuṭīre kṣetrakoṇe yavānāṃ navakalamapalālastrastare sopadhāne |
pariharati suṣup‍tiṃ hālikadvandvamārāt kucakalaśamahoṣmābaddharekhastuṣāraḥ || 108 ||
samparko yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.57)
tribhāgaśeṣāsu niśāsu ca kṣaṇaṃ nimīlya netre sahasā 'pyabudhyata |
k‍va nīlakaṇṭha! vrajasītyalakṣyavāgasatyakaṇṭhārpitabāhubandhanā || 109 ||
anugamo yathā—(gāsa. 1.26)
ṇa kuṇaṃco cia māṇaṃ ṇisāsu suha-sutta-dara-vibuddhāṇaṃ |
suṇṇaïa-pāsa-parimūsaṇa-veaṇaṃ jaï si jāṇaṃto || 110 ||
(nākariṣya eva mānaṃ niśāsu sukhasup‍tadaravibuddhānām |
śūnyokṛtapārśvaparimoṣaṇavedanāṃ yadyajñāsyaḥ ||)
(26. prabodhaḥ)
nidrātyayeṣu cetanālābhaḥ prabodhaḥ | tasyaṣa
janma yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.85)
sa vyabudhyata budhastavocitaḥ śātakumbhakamalākaraiḥ samam |
mūrcchanāparigṛhītakaiśikaiḥ kinnarairuṣasi gītamaṅgalaḥ || 111 ||
anubandho yathā—(murā. 3.21)
pratyagronmeṣajihmā kṣaṇamanabhimukhī rat‍na/kalyadīpaprabhāṇā— mātmavyāpāragurvī janitajalalavā jṛmbhitaiḥ svāṅgabhaṅgaiḥ |
nāgāṅkaṃ moktumicchoḥ śayanamuruphaṇācakravāḷopadhānaṃ nidrācchedābhitāmrā ciramavatu harerdṛṣṭirākekarā vaḥ || 112 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(māgha. 11.6)
kṣaṇaśayitavibuddhāḥ kalpayantaḥ prayogān udadhimahati rājye kāvyavad durvigāhe |
gahanamapararātraprāp‍tabuddhiprasādāḥ kavaya iva mahīpāścintayantyarthajātam || 113 ||
samparko yathā—(raghu. 9.71)
uṣasi sa gajayūthakarṇatālaiḥ paṭupaṭahadhvanibhirvidhūtanidraḥ |
aramata madhurasvarāṇi śrṛṇvan vihagavikūjitavandimaṅgalāni || 114 ||
anugamo yathā—
vistrambhādupasṛjya pīḍana—namatprottuṅgapīnastane śvāsāvega vikampinā stanayugenāpīḍite vakṣasi |
īṣanmīlitanetrayā ślathabhujāpāśaṃ cirādāgato nādhanyaḥ parirabhyate dayitayā jāgratsvapatyā niśi || 115 ||
caturviṃśatirityete bhāvā harṣādisaṃjñakāḥ!
(saṃprayogāśrayāḥ prok‍tāstaistairyuk‍tairnidarśanaiḥ)||1
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyante vipralambhasamāśrayāḥ |
caturviṃśatirutkaṇṭhācintāsmṛtyādayo 'pare || 116 ||
(27. utkaṇṭhā)
tatra prāyeṇa vipralambhāśrayabhāvacaturviṃśādikaṃ udāhniyante | tatra manaso 'śāntirutkaṇṭhā | tasyā
janma yathā—(amaru. 99)
deśairantaritā śataiśca saritāmurvībhṛtāṃ kānanai— ryat‍nenāpi na yāti locanapathaṃ kānteti jānannapi |
ud‍grīvaścaraṇārdharuddhavasudhaḥ kṛtvā 'śrupūrṇe dṛśau tāmāśāṃ pathikastathā 'pi kimapi dhyāyan muhurvīkṣate || 117 ||
anubandho yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.95)
paśupatirapi tānyahāni kṛcchrādagamayadadrisutāsamāgamotkaḥ |
kamaparamavaśaṃ na viprakuryurvibhumapi taṃ yadamī spṛśanti bhāvāḥ || 118 ||
1. idamasmābhirapūri
prakarṣo yathā—(māmā. 9.46)
prayāntīva prāṇāḥ sutanu ! hṛdayaṃ dhvaṃsata iva javalantīvāṅgāni prasarati samantādiva tamaḥ |
tvarāprastāvo 'yaṃ na khalu parihāsasya viṣaya— stadakṣṇorānandaṃ vitara mayi mā bhūrakaruṇā || 119 ||
samparko yathā—(māmā.1.18)
bhūyo bhūyassavidhanagarīrathyayā paryaṭantaṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā bhavanavalabhītuṅgavātāyanasthā |
sākṣāt kāmaṃ navamiva ratirmālatī mādhavaṃ yad gạ̄dhotkaṇṭhā lulitalulitairaṅgakaistāmyatīti || 120 ||
anugamo yathā—(śāku. 4.6)
yāsyatyadya śakuntaleti hṛdayaṃ saṃspṛṣṭamutkaṇṭhayā kaṇṭhaḥ stambhitabāṣpavṛṣṭikaluṣaścintājaḍaṃ darśanam |
vaiklabyaṃ mama tāvadīdṛśamaho snehādaraṇyaukasaḥ pīḍyante gṛhiṇaḥ kathaṃ nu tanayāviśleṣaduḥkhairnavaiḥ || 121 ||
(28. cintā)
dṛṣṭaśrutānumiteṣu prāp‍tiparihārārthamupāyaparibhāvanā manasaścintā | tasyā janma yathā—
sandhyā rāgavatī svabhāvakuṭilā gaṅgā dvijihvaḥ phaṇī vakro 'ntarmalinaḥ śaśī ca satataṃ jātyaiva mūrkho vṛṣā |
itthaṃ durjanasaṅkule patigṛhe vāsaḥ kathaṃ sahyatāṃ devyāḥ pāṇiniviṣṭamāsyamasakṛc‍cintānvitaṃ pātu vaḥ || 122 ||
anubandho yathā—(megha. 100)
aṅgenāṅgaṃ pratanu tanunā gāḍhatap‍tena tap‍taṃ sāsreṇāsradravam aviratotkaṇṭhamutkaṇṭhitena |
uṣṇocchvāsaṃ samadhikatarocchvāsinā dūravartī saṅkalpaistairviśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ || 123 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(māmā. 5.10)
līneva pratibimbiteva likhitevotkīrṇarūpeva ca pratyup‍teva ca vajralepaghaṭitevāntarnikhāteva ca |
sā naścetasi kīliteva viśikhaiścetobhuvaḥ pañcabhi— ścintāsantatitantujālanibiḍasyūteva lag‍nā priyā || 124 ||
saṃparko yathā—(mahānāṭakaṃ 3.24)
hṛdayānnāpayāto 'si dikṣu sarvāsu dṛśyase |
vatsa rāma ! gato 'sīti santāpādanumīyase || 125 ||
anugamo yathā—
vrīhiḥ stambakariḥ prabhūtapayasaḥ pratyāgatā dhenavaḥ pratyujjīvitamikṣuṇā bhṛśamiti dhyāyannapetānyadhīḥ |
sāndrośīrakuṭumbinīstanabharavyālup‍tagharmaklamo deve nīramudāramujjhati sukhaṃ śete niśi grāmaṇīḥ || 126 ||
(29. smṛtiḥ)
manasi anubhūtārthapratibimbanaṃ smṛtiḥ | tasyā
janma yathā—(raghu. 13.35)
atrānugodaṃ mṛgayānivṛttastaraṅgavātena vinītakhedaḥ |
rahastvadutsaṅganiṣaṇṇamūrdhā smarāmi vānīragṛheṣu sup‍tim/sup‍taḥ || 127 ||
anubandho yathā—(raghu. 13.28)
pūrvānubhūtaṃ smaratā ca rātrau kampottaraṃ bhīru tavopagūḍham |
guhāvisārīṇyativāhitāni mayā kathañcid ghanagarjitāni || 128 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(urāca. 1.18)
samayassa vartata ihaiṣa māṃ samanandayat sumukhi ! gautamārpitaḥ |
ayamāgṛhītakamanīyakaṅkaṇastava mūrtimāniva mahotsavaḥ karaḥ || 129 ||
saṃparko yathā—(urāca. 2.27)
purā yatra srotaḥ pulinamadhunā tatra saritāṃ viparyāsaṃ yāto ghanaviralabhāvaḥ kṣitiruhām |
bahordṛṣṭaṃ kālādaparimiva manye vanamidaṃ niveśaśśailānāṃ tadidamiti buddhiṃ draḍhayati || 130 ||
anugamo yathā—(śāku. 6.9)
itaḥ pratyādeśāt svajanamanugantuṃ vyavasitā gṛhe tiṣṭhetyuc‍cairvadati guruśiṣye gurusame |
punardṛṣṭiṃ bāṣpaprasarakaluṣāmarpitavatī mayi krūre yattat saviṣamiva śalyaṃ dahati mām || 131 ||
(30. krodhaḥ)
manaḥpratikūleṣu taikṣṇyapratibandhaḥ(prabodhaḥ) krodhaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.71)
tapaḥparāmarśavivṛddhamanyorbhrūbhaṅgaduṣprekṣya/kṣamukhasya tasya |
sphuran‍nudarciḥ sahasā tṛtīyādakṣṇaḥ kṛśānuḥ kila niṣpapāta || 132 ||
anubandho yathā—(vesaṃ. 3.32)
yo yaśśasra bibharti svabhujagurumadaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ yo yaḥ pāñcālagotre śiśuradhikavayā garbhaśayyāṃ gato vā |
yo yastatkarmasākṣī carati mayi raṇe yaśca yaś‍ca pratīpaḥ krodhāndhastasya tasya svayamapi jagatāmantakasyāntako 'ham || 133 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(vesaṃ. 3.47)
kṛṣṭā yena vilolakeśanivahā pāñcālarājātmajā yenāsyāḥ paridhānamapyapahṛtaṃ rājñāṃ gurūṇāṃ puraḥ |
yasyorassthalaśoṇitāsavamahaṃ pātuṃ pratijñātavān so 'yaṃ madbha‍ujapañjare nipatitaḥ saṃrakṣyatāṃ kauravāḥ || 134 ||
samparko yathā—(urāca. 2.13)
iyaṃ sā lolākṣī tribhuvanalalāmaikavasatiḥ sa cāyaṃ duṣṭātmā svasurapakṛtaṃ yena mama tat |
itastīvraḥ kāmo gururayamitaḥ krodhadahanaḥ kṛto veṣaścāyaṃ kathamidamiti bhrāmyati manaḥ || 135 ||
anugamo yathā—(mavīca. 2.46)
amṛtādhmātajīmūtas‍nigdhasaṃhananasya te |
kuṭhāraḥ kambukaṇṭhasya kaṣṭaṃ kaṇṭhe luṭhiṣyate || 136 ||
(31. amarṣaḥ)
kṛtāparādheṣu krodhāpraśāntiramarṣaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—(mavīca. 2.9)
arthitve prakaṭīkṛte 'pi na phalaprāp‍tiḥ prabhoḥ pratyuta duhyan dāśarathirviruddhacarito yuktastayā kanyayā |
utkarṣaṃ ca parasya mānayaśasorvisraṃsanaṃ cātmanaḥ strīrat‍naṃ ca jagatpatirdaśamukho dṛp‍taḥ kathaṃ mṛṣyate || 137 ||
anubandho yathā—(dhvanyāloka 3)
nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayastatrāpyasau tāpasaḥ so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ jīvatyaho rāvaṇaḥ |
dhigdhikchakrajitaṃ prabodhitavatā kiṃ kumbhakarṇena vā svargagrāmaṭikāviluṇṭhanaparaiḥ pīnaiḥ kimebhirbhujaiḥ || 138 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(vesaṃ. 3.23)
tātaṃ śastragrahaṇavimukhaṃ niścayenopalabhya tyaktvā śaṅkāṃ khalu nidadhataḥ pāṇimasyottamāṅge |
aśvatthāmā karadhṛtadhanuḥ pāṇḍupāñcālasenā— tūlotkṣepapralayapavanaḥ kiṃ na yātaḥ smṛtiṃ te || 139 ||
samparko yathā—(mavīca. 2.29)
yatkṣatriyeṣvapi punassthitamādhipatyaṃ taireva saṃprati dhṛtāni punardhanūṃṣi |
unmādyatāṃ bhujamadena mayā 'pi teṣāmucchṛṅkhalāni caritāni punaśśrutāni || 140 ||
anugamo yathā—(vesaṃ. 1.8)
lākṣāgṛhānalaviṣānnasabhāpraveśaiḥ prāṇeṣu vittanicayeṣu ca naḥ prahṛtya |
ākṛṣṭapāṇḍavavadhūparidhānakeśāḥ svasthā bhavanti/ntu mayi jīvati dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ || 141 ||
(32. asūyā)
pararddha‍yasahanamasūyā | tasyā
janma yathā—(raghu. 9.64)
nirghātograiḥ kuñjalīnān jighāṃsurjyānirghoṣaiḥ kṣobhayāmāsa siṃhān |
nūnaṃ teṣāmabhyasūyāparo 'bhūd vīryodagre rājaśabde mṛgāṇām || 142 ||
anubandho yathā—(raghu. 3.49)
hariryathaikaḥ puruṣottamaḥ smṛto maheśvarastryambaka eva nāparaḥ |
tathā vidurmāṃ munayaśśatakratuṃ dvitīyagāmī na hi śabda eṣa naḥ || 143 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(raghu. 7.34)
pramanyavaḥ prāgapi kosalendre pratyekamāttasvatayā babhūvuḥ |
tato nṛpāścakṣamire sametāḥ strīrat‍nalābhaṃ na tadātmajasya || 144 ||
saṃparko yathā—(urāca. 5.34)
vandyāste na vicāraṇīyacaritāstiṣṭhantu huṃ vartate sundastrīdamane 'pyakuṇṭhayaśaso loke mahānto hi te |
yāni trīṇi kutomukhānyapi padānyāsan kharāyodhane yadvā kauśalamindrasūnudamane tatrāpyabhijño janaḥ || 145 ||
anugamo yathā—(raghu. 3.63)
asaktamadriṣvapi sāravattayā na me tvadanyena visoḍhamāyudham |
avehi māṃ prītamṛte turaṅgamād varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti tamāha vāsavaḥ || 146 ||
(33. īrṣyā)
samāneṣu dānamānādyamarṣaṇamīrṣyā | tasyā
janma yathā—
gotrād gotramupaiti yā calatayā, yā pādamūlāt prabho— rbhraṣṭā, yā ca piturmamaiva kaṭake dṛṣṭā vahantī ja(ḍa)lam |
seyaṃ sāgarikā tvayā paśupate ! mūrdhānamāropite— tyuktaḥ kopakaṣāyapāṭaladṛśā gauryā haraḥ pātu vaḥ || 147 ||
anubandho yathā—
kuviā a sac‍cahāmā same vi vahuāṇa ṇavara māṇakkhalaṇe |
pāaḍia-hiaa-sāro pemāsaṃghasariso paaṭṭarha maṇṇū || 148 ||
(kupitā ca satyabhāmā same 'pi vadhūnāṃ kevalaṃ mānaskhalane |
prakaṭitahṛdayasāraḥ premāśaṃsāsadṛśaḥ pravartate manyuḥ ||)
prakarṣo yathā—(vesaṃ. 3.45)
ayaṃ yāvat pāpo na nidhanamupeyādariśaraiḥ parityaktaṃ tāvat priyamapi mayā 'straṃ raṇamukhe |
balānāṃ nāthe 'smin parikupitabhīmārjunabhaye samutpanne rājā priyasakhabalaṃ vettu samare || 149 ||
saṃparko yathā—(amaru. 60)
lākṣālakṣma lalāṭapaṭṭamabhitaḥ keyūramudrā gale vaktre kajjalakālimā nayanayostāmbūlarāgo 'paraḥ |
dṛṣṭvā kopavidhāyi maṇḍanamidaṃ prātaściraṃ preyasaḥ krīḍātāmarasodare mṛgadṛśaḥ śvāsāḥ samāp‍tiṃ gatāḥ || 150 ||
anugamo yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.49)
nirvibhujya daśanacchadaṃ tato vāci bharturavadhīraṇāparā |
śailarājatanayā samīpagāmālalāpa vijayāmahetukam || 151 ||
(34. ugratā)
doṣato vāgdaṇḍapāruṣyamugratā | tasyā
janma yathā—(vikramo. 5.1)
ātmano vadhamāhartā k‍vāsau vihagataskaraḥ |
yena tatprathamaṃ steyaṃ gop‍tureva gṛhe kṛtam || 152 ||
anubandho yathā—(rāca. 19.89)
tenātha nātha durudāharaṇātapena saumyā 'pi nāma paruṣatvamabhiprapannā |
jajvāla tīkṣṇaviśadāḥ sahasodgirantī vāgārciṣāṣastapanakāntaśileva sītā || 153 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(vesaṃ. 3.24)
kṛtamanumataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vā yairidaṃ gurupātakaṃ manujapaśubhirnirmaryādairbhavadbhirudāyudhaiḥ |
narakaripuṇā sārdhaṃ teṣāṃ sabhīmakirīṭinām ayamahamasṛṅ‍medomāṃsaiḥ karomi baliṃ diśām || 154 ||
samparko yathā—(māmā. 5.31)
praṇayasakhīsalīlaparihāsarasādhigatai— rlalitaśirīṣapuṣpahananairapi tāmyati yat |
vapuṣi vadhāya tatra tva śastramupakṣipataḥ patatu śirasyakāṇḍayamadaṇḍa ivaiṣa bhujaḥ || 155 ||
anugamo yathā—(māmā. 8.8)
k‍va tvatpriyaḥ k‍va ca tapasvijanasya hantā kanyāviṭaḥ patirasau parirakṣatu tvām |
śyenāvapātacakitā vanavartikeva kiṃ ceṣṭase nanu cirāt kabalīkṛtā 'si || 156 ||
(35. unmādaḥ)
kāmādyabhiṣaṅgātiśayādasambaddhapralāpa unmādaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—(mavīca. 1.55)
ehyehi vatsa raghunandana ! pūrṇacandra cumbāmi mūrdhani cirāya pariṣvaje tvām |
āropya vā hṛdi divāniśamudvahāmi vande 'thavā caraṇapuṣkarakadvayaṃ te || 157 ||
anubandho yathā—(vikramo. 4.33)
taraṅgabhrūbhaṅgā kṣubhitavihagaśreṇiraśanā vikarṣantī phenaṃ vasanamiva saṃrambhaśithilam |
yadāviddhaṃ yāti skhalitamabhisandhāya bahuśo nadībhāveneyaṃ dhruvamasahanā sā pariṇatā || 158 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(māmā. 9.27)
naveṣu lodhraprasaveṣu kāntirdṛśaḥ kuraṅgeṣu gajeṣu yātam |
latāsu namratvamiti pramathya vyaktaṃ vibhaktā vipine priyā 'smin || 159 ||
saṃparko yathā—(vikramo. 4.33)
haṃsa ! prayaccha me kāntāṃ gatirasyāstvayā hṛtā |
sambhāvitaikadeśena deyaṃ yadabhiyujyate || 160 ||
anugamo yathā—(māmā. 9.42)
bhramaya jaladānambhogarbhān pramodaya kokilān/cātakān kalaya śikhinaḥ kekotkaṇṭhān kaṭhoraya ketakān |
virahiṇi jane mūrcchāṃ labdhvā vinodayati vyathā— makaruṇa ! punassaṃjñāvyādhiṃ vihā/dhāya kimīhase || 161 ||
(36. vyādhiḥ)
bhayānurāgādijanmā manaśśarīrābhiṣaṅgo vyādhiḥ | tasya
janma yathā—(māmā. 3.9)
yadindāvānandaṃ praṇayini jane vā na bhajate vyanaktyantastāpaṃ (tadayamati)dhīro 'pi viṣamam |
priyaṅguśyāmāṅgaprakṛtirapi vā (cā)pāṇḍumadhuraṃ vapuḥ kṣāmaṃ kṣāmaṃ vahati ramaṇīyañca(śca) bhavati || 162 ||
anubandho yathā—(māmā. 2.1)
manorogastīvro viṣamiva visarpannavirataṃ pramāthī nirdhūmaṃ javalati vidhutaḥ pāvaka iva |
hinasti pratyaṅgaṃ javara iva garīyānita ito na māṃ trātuṃ tātaḥ prabhavati, nacā 'mbā, na bhavatī || 163 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.55)
tadāprabhṛtyunmadanā piturgahe lalāṭikācandanadhūsarālakā |
na jātu bālā labhate sma nirvṛtiṃ tuṣārasaṅghātaśilātaleṣvapi || 164 ||
saṃparko yathā—(rat‍nā. 2.12)
sthitamurasi viśālaṃ padminīpatrametat kathayati na tathā 'ntarmanmathotthāmavasthām |
atiśayaparitāpamlāpitābhyāṃ yathā 'syāḥ stanayugapariṇāhaṃ maṇḍalābhyāṃ bravīti || 165 ||
anugamo yathā—(māmā. 6.6)
iyamavayavaiḥ pāṇḍukṣāmairalaṅkṛtamaṇḍanā kalitakusumā bālevāntarlatā pariśoṣiṇī |
vahati ca varārohā ramyāṃ vivāhamahotsava— śriyamudayinīmatyarthaṃ ca vyanakti manorujam || 166 ||
(37. glāniḥ)
manaḥpīḍādijanmā śarīrāvasādo glāniḥ | asyā
janma yathā—
prakṛtyā ramaṇīyo 'pi kṣīyamāṇaḥ pratikṣaṇam |
duḥkhamāvahati prātaḥ śaśīvāpāṇḍuracchaviḥ || 167 ||
anubandho yathā—(urāca. 3.5)
kisalayamiva mugdhaṃ bandhanād vipralūnaṃ hṛdayakusumaśoṣī dāruṇo dīrghaśokaḥ |
glapayati paripāṇḍu kṣāmamasyāḥ śarīraṃ śaradija iva gharmaḥ ketakīgarbhapatram || 168 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(māmā. 1.25)
parimṛditamṛṇālīmlānamaṅgaṃ pravṛttiḥ kathamapi parivāraprārthanābhiḥ kriyāsu |
kalayati ca himāṃśorniṣkalaṅkasya lakṣmī— mabhinavakaridantacchedakāntaḥ kapolaḥ || 169 ||
samparko yathā—(śāku. 3.7)
kṣāmakṣāmakapolamānanamuraḥ kāṭhinyamuktastanaṃ madhyaḥ kṣāmataraḥ prakāmavinatāvaṃsau chaviḥ pāṇḍurā |
śocyā ca priyadarśanā ca madanakliṣṭeyamālakṣyate patrāṇāmiva śoṣaṇena marutā spṛṣṭā latā mādhavī || 170 ||
anugamo yathā—(kirātā. 18.6)
nipatite 'dhiśirodharamāyate samamaranni(t‍ni)yuge 'yugacakṣuṣaḥ |
tricatureṣu padeṣu kirīṭinā lulitamauli madādiva caskhale || 171 ||
(38. śramaḥ)
niratiśayaprayāsajanmā (ma)naḥśarīrāyāsāḥ śramaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—
tanuriyaṃ taralāyatalocane śvasitakampitapīnaghanastanī |
śramamapāsya gatā tapase punaḥ kimiti sambhramakāriṇi khidyate || 172 ||
anubandho yathā—(māmā. 3.8)
skhalayati vacanaṃ te saṃśrayatyaṅgamaṅgaṃ janayati mukhacandrodbhāsinaḥ svedabindūn |
mukulayati ca netre sarvathā subhru ! kheda— stvayi vilasati tulyaṃ vallabhālokanena || 173 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(śāku. 1.26)
srastāṃsāvatimātralohitatalau bāhū ghaṭotkṣepaṇād adyāpi stanavepathuṃ na jahati śvāsaḥ pramāṇādhikaḥ |
baddhaṃ karṇaśirīṣarodhi vadane dharmāmbhasāṃ jālakaṃ bandhe sraṃsini caikahastayāmitāḥ paryākulā mūrdhajāḥ || 174 ||
saṃparko yathā—(śāku. 5.6)
autsukyamātramavasāyayati pratiṣṭhā kliśnātiṃ labdhaparipālanavṛttireva |
naiva śramāpanayanāya na ca śramāya rājyaṃ svahastadhṛtadaṇḍamivātapatram || 175 ||
anugamo yathā—(kirātā. 8.3)
nivṛttavṛttorupayodharaklamaḥ pravṛttinirhrādivibhūṣaṇāravaḥ |
nitambinīnāṃ bhṛśamādadhe dhṛtiṃ nabhaḥprāyāṇādavanau parikramaḥ || 176 ||
(39. viṣādaḥ)
daivādibhissaṃrambhavighāto viṣādaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—
helollolakṣubhitakaruṇojjṛmbhaṇastambhanārthaṃ yo yo yat‍naḥ kathamapi samādhīyate tannamantaḥ (taṃ tamantaḥ ?) |
bhittvā bhittvā prasarati balāt ko 'pi cetovikāra— stoyasyevāpratihataravaḥ saikataṃ setumoghaḥ || 177 ||
anubandho yathā—(urāca. 3.45)
vyarthaṃ yatra kapīndrasakhyamapi me, kleśaḥ kapīnāṃ vṛthā prajñā jāmbavato na yatra, na gatiḥ putrasya vāyorapi |
mārgaṃ yatra na viśvakarmatanayaḥ kartuṃ nalo 'pi kṣamaḥ saumitrerapi patriṇāmaviṣaye tatra priyā k‍vāpi me || 178 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(vesaṃ. 5.12)
hate droṇe ca bhīṣme ca yadāsīdavalambanam |
vatsasya me suhṛt preyān rādheyaḥ so 'pyayaṃ hataḥ || 179 ||
saṃparko yathā—(vesaṃ. 6.1)
tīrṇe bhīṣmamahodadhau, kathamapi droṇānale nirvṛte karṇāśīviṣabhogini praśamite, śalye ca yāte divam |
bhīmena priyasāhasena rabhasādalpāvaśeṣe jaye sarve jīvitasaṃśayaṃ vayamamī vācā samāropitāḥ || 180 ||
anugamo yathā—(māmā. 4.3)
cirādāśātantus‍truṭatu (bisinīsūtra)bhiduro mahān ādhirvyādhirniravadhiridānīṃ prasaratu |
pratiṣṭhāmavyājaṃ vrajatu mayi pariplavadhurā vidhiḥ svāsthyaṃ dhattāṃ, bhavatu kṛtakṛtyaśca madanaḥ || 181 ||
(40. mohaḥ)
itikartavyatāyāmanāloko mohaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—(māmā. 9.8)
na yatra pratyāśāmanupatati no vā rahayati pratikṣip‍taṃ cetaḥ praviśati ca mohāndhatamasam |
akiñcitkurvāṇāḥ paśava iva tasyāṃ vayamaho vidhāturvāmatvād vipadi parivartāmaha ime || 182 ||
anubandho yathā—(urāca. 3.17)
pihitanayano bāṣpāmbhobhirmuhustvatisambhṛtai— rdhanuṣi vinamanmadhye svinnāṃ nidhāya tanuṃ tataḥ |
śithilacaraṇoddhāraḥ kṛcchrāt padāt padamāvahan kathamayamaho ! cintāśūnyo na yāti na tiṣṭhati || 183 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(urāca. 1.35)
viniścetuṃ śakyo na sukhamiti vā duḥkhamiti vā pramādo nidrā vā kimu viṣavisarpaḥ kimu madaḥ |
tava sparśe sparśe mama hi parimụ̄dhendriyagaṇo vikāraścaitanyaṃ bhramayati ca saṃmīlayati ca || 184 ||
samparko yathā—(urāca. 2.23)
vatsasyābhayavāridheḥ pratibhayaṃ śaṅke kuto rākṣasāt trastaścaiṣa munirvirauti manaso 'pyastyeva me sambhramaḥ |
mā hāsījjanakātmajāmiti gurus‍nehānmuhuryācate na sthātuṃ na ca gantumākulatayā mūḍhasya me niścayaḥ || 185 ||
anugamo yathā—(raghu. 6.12)
tā rāghavaṃ dṛṣṭibhirāpibantyo nāryo na jagmurviṣayāntarāṇi |
taha hi sarvendriyavṛtirāsāṃ sarvātmanā cakṣuriva praviṣṭā || 186 ||
(41. śokaḥ)
iṣṭavirahādibhirmanovaidhuryaṃ śokaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—(urāca. 3.38)
hā hā devi ! sphuṭati hṛdayaṃ sraṃsate dehabandhaḥ śūnyaṃ manye jagadaviralajvālamantarjvalāmi |
sīdannandhe tamasi vidhuro majjatīvāntarātmā viṣvaṅ‍mohaḥ sthagayati kathaṃ mandabhāgyaḥ karomi || 187 ||
anubandho yathā—(raghu. 8.57)
navapallavasaṃstare 'pi te mṛdu dūyeta yadaṅgabharpitam |
tadidaṃ visahiṣyate kathaṃ tava vāmoru ! citādhirohaṇam || 188 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(mavīca. 4.55)
prāṇāḥ prayānti paritastamasāvṛte 'smin marmacchido mama rujaḥ prasarantyapapūrvāḥ |
akṣṇormukhendumupadhehi giraṃ ca dehi hā putra ! mayyakaruṇaḥ sahasaiva mā bhūḥ || 189 ||
samparko yathā—(raghu. 9.80)
śāpo 'pyadṛṣṭatanayānanapadmaśobhe sānugraho bhagavatā mayi pātito 'yam |
kṛṣyāṃ dahannapi khalu kṣitimindhaneddho bījaprarohajananīṃ jvalanaḥ karoti || 190 ||
anugamo yathā—(raghu. 8.93)
tasya prasahya hṛdayaṃ kila śokaśaṃkuḥ plakṣapraroha iha saudhatalaṃ babādhe |
prāṇantahetumapi taṃ bhiṣajāmasādhyaṃ lābhaṃ priyānugamanatvarayā sa mene || 191 ||
(42. dainyam)
sattvatyāgādanutkarṣo dainyam | tasya
janma yathā—(raghu. 14.67)
nṛpasya varṇāśramapālanaṃ yat sa eva dharmo manunā praṇītaḥ |
nirvāsitā 'pyevamatastvayā 'haṃ tapasvisāmānyamavekṣaṇīyā || 192 ||
anubandho yathā—(śāku. 4.17)
asmān sādhu vicintya saṃyamadhanānuc‍caiḥkulaṃ cātmana— stvayyasyāḥ kathamapyabāndhavakṛtāṃ s‍nehapravṛttiṃ ca tām |
sāmānyapratipattipūrvakamiyaṃ dāreṣu dṛś‍yā tvayā bhāgyāyattamataḥ paraṃ na khalu tad vācyaṃ vadhūbandhūbhiḥ || 193 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(vesaṃ. 5.5)
dāyādā na yayorbalena gaṇitāstau droṇabhīṣmau hatau karṇasyātmajamagrataḥ śamayato bhītaṃ jagat phalgunāt |
vatsānāṃ nidhanena me (ripu)rasau śeṣapratijñastvayā mānaṃ vairiṣu muñca tāta ! pitarāvandhāvimau pālaya || 194 ||
samparkau yathā—(vesaṃ. 5.13)
andho 'nubhūtaśataputravipattiduḥkhaḥ śocyāṃ daśāmupagataḥ sa tu bhāryayā 'ham |
tasminnaśeṣitasuhṛdga‍urubandhuvarge duryodhane( 'pi hi kṛto) bhavatā nirāśaḥ ||
anugamo yathā—(bhallaṭaśatakaṃ 7)
māne necchati vārayatyupaśame kṣmāmālikhantyāṃ hi māṃ svātantrye parivṛtya tiṣṭhati karau vyādhūya dhairye gate |
tṛṣṇe ! tvāmanubadh‍natā phalamiyat prāp‍taṃ mayā yāvatā yaḥ spṛṣṭo na padā sa eva caraṇau spraṣṭuṃ na saṃmanyate || 196 ||
(43. vaivarṇyam)
viṣādādijanma kānteranyathātvaṃ vaivarṇyam | tasya
janma yathā—(māmā. 10.4)
ujjvalālokayā s‍nigdhā tvayā tyaktā na rājate |
malīmasamukhī vartiḥ pradīpaśikhayā yathā || 197 ||
anubandho yathā—(raghu. 6.67)
sañcāriṇī dīpaśikheva rātrau yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃvarā sā |
narendramārgāṭṭa iva prapede vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ || 198 ||
prakarṣo yathā—
sahi ! sāhasu teṇa samaṃ ahaṃ pi kiṃ ṇiggaā pahāaṃmi |
aṇṇa c‍cia dīsaï jeṇa dappaṇe kā vi sā sumuhī || 199 ||
(sakhi ! sādhaya tena samamahamapi kiṃ nirgatā prabhāte |
anyaiva dṛśyate yena darpaṇe kā 'pi sā sumukhī ||)
samparko yathā—(māmā. 4.4)
samānapremāṇaṃ janamasulabhaṃ prārthitavato vidhau vāmārambhe mama samucitaiṣā pariṇatiḥ |
tathā 'pyasmin dānaśravaṇasamaye 'syāḥ pravigalat— prabhaṃ prātaścandradyuti vadanamantardahati mām || 200 ||
anugamo yathā—(kirātā. 10.63)
svayaṃ saṃrādhyeśaṃ śatamakhamakhaṇḍena tapasā parocchittyā labhyāmabhilaṣati lakṣmīṃ harisute |
manobhiḥ sāvegaiḥ praṇayavihatidhvastarucayaḥ sagandharvā dhāma tridaśavanitāḥ svaṃ pratiyayuḥ || 201 ||
(44. āvegaḥ)
pratīkārāśayā manovyākulatā ' 'vegaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—(māgha. 10.82)
prekṣaṇīyakamiva kṣaṇamāsan hrītabhaṅguravilocanapātāḥ |
sambhramadrutagṛhītadukūlacchādyamānavapuṣaḥ suratāntāḥ || 202 ||
anubandho yathā—(māgha. 10.83)
aprabhūtamatanīyasi tanvī kāñcidhām‍ni pihitaikaratoru |
kṣaumamākulakarā vicakarṣa krāntapallavamabhīṣṭatamena || 203 ||
prakarṣo yathā—
śūnyā diśaḥ sapadi vīkṣya śucā varākī mṛtyormukhaṃ viśati vā śamayannirāśāḥ |
etā matā śvapacapātakadīparogā— dāgaccha X X X paraṃparikṣayā vaḥ || 204 ||
saṃparko yathā—(rat‍nā. 3.17)
alamalamatimātraṃ sāhasenāmunā te tvaritamayi ! vimuñca tvaṃ latāpāśamenam |
calitamiva niroddha‍uṃ jīvitaṃ jīviteśe kṣaṇamiha mama kaṇṭhe bāhupāśaṃ nidhehi || 205 ||
anugamo yathā—(raghu. 5.49)
sa cchinnabandhadrutayugyaśūnyaṃ bhag‍nākṣaparyastarathaṃ kṣaṇena |
rāmāparitrāṇavihastayodhaṃ senāniveśaṃ tumulaṃ cakāra || 206 ||
(45. aśru)*
duḥkhakrodhānanandajaṃ nayanajalamaśru | tasya
janma yathā—(śāku. 4.15)
utpakṣmaṇornayanayoruparuddhavṛttiṃ bāṣpaṃ kuru sthiratayā vihatānubandham |
asminnalakṣitanatonnatabhūmibhāge mārge padāni khalu te viṣamībhavanti || 207 ||
anubandho yathā—(vikramo. 5.15)
kiṃ sundari ! praruditāsi mamopapanne vaṃśasthiteradhigamānmahati pramode |
pīnonnatastananipātibhirānayantī muktāvalīviracanāṃ punaruktamasrai || 208 ||
prakarṣo yathā—
tataḥ kairapyukte pariṇayavidhau kāṣṭhamunibhiḥ purāṇairātaṅkaglapitahṛdayena kṣitibhṛtā |
*mohaḥ(/s‍nehaḥ) dvirupāttaḥ ud‍deśe (dra. pṛ. 614)
vinā vācaṃ naitat kṣamamiti vidhāyānanamadhaḥ patadvāṣpāmbhobhirlikhitamiva dattaṃ prativacaḥ || 209 ||
samparko yathā—(urāca. 1.29)
ayaṃ tāvad bāṣpas‍traṭita iva muktāmaṇisaro visarpan dhārābhirluṭhati dharaṇīṃ jarjharakaṇaḥ |
niruddho 'pyāvegaḥ sphuradadharanāsāpuṭatayā pareṣāmunneyo bhavati ca bharādhyātahṛdayaḥ || 210 ||
anugamo yathā—(sūmu. 2)
akṛtakabalārambhairvaktrairbhayasthagitekṣaṇaiḥ kimapi valitagrīvaṃ sthitvā muhurmṛgapaṅktayaḥ |
gaganamasakṛt paśyantyetāstathāśrughanairmukhaiḥ— rnipatati yathā śṛṅgāgrebhyo bhramannayanodakam || 211 ||
(46. pralayaḥ)
sarvendriyāstamayaḥ pralayaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.73)
tīvrābhiṣaṅgaprabhaveṇa vṛttiṃ mohena saṃstambhayatendriyāṇām |
ajñātabhartṛvyasanā muhūrtaṃ kṛtopakāreva ratirbabhūva || 212 ||
anubandho yathā—(raghu. 14.54)
tato 'bhiṣaṅgānilavipraviddhā prabhraśyamānābharaṇaprasūnā |
svamūrtilābhaprakṛtiṃ dharitrīṃ lateva sītā sahasā jagāma || 213 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(vesaṃ. 4.10)
paryāp‍tanetramacirodgatacandrakāntamudbhidyamānanavayauvanaramyacihnam |
prāṇāpahāriparivartitadṛṣṭi dṛṣṭaṃ karṇena tat kathamivānanapaṅkajaṃ te || 214 ||
samparko yathā—(raghu. 3.61)
raghurbhṛśaṃ vakṣasi tena tāḍitaḥ papāta bhūmau saha sainikāśrubhiḥ |
muhūrtamātrādavadhūya ca vyathāṃ sahotthitaḥ sainikaharṣanisvanaiḥ || 215 ||
anugamo yathā—(vikramo. 1.9)
āvirbhūte śaśini tamasā mucyamāneva rātriḥ naiśasyārcirhutabhuja iva cchinnabhūyiṣṭhadhūmā |
mohenāntarvaratanuriyaṃ lakṣyate muktakalyā gaṅgā rodhaḥprasarakaluṣā gṛh‍ṇatīva prasādam || 216 ||
(47. jāḍyam)
manasaḥ kriyāsvapāṭavaṃ jāḍyam | tasya
janma yathā—(sūmu. 38)
āhāre viratiḥ samastaviṣayagrāme nivṛttiḥ parā nāsāgre nayanaṃ yadetadaparaṃ yac‍caikaniṣṭhaṃ manaḥ |
maunaṃ cedamidaṃ ca śūnyamakhilaṃ yad viśvamābhāti te tad brūyāḥ sakhi ! yoginī kimasi bhoḥ kiṃ vā viyoginyasi || 217 ||
anubandho yathā—(mahānāṭaka 5.3)
śithilaśithilaṃ nyasya svairaṃ dhanuśśikhare śiro nayanasalilaiḥ kurvan maurvīlatāmaparāmiva |
ahaha vikalaḥ śrutvā śrutvā ghanastanitadhvaniṃ kimapi kimapi dhyāyannāryo na yāti na tiṣṭhati || 218 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(śāku. 4.1)
vicintayantī yamananyamānasā taponidhiṃ vetsi na mānupasthitam |
smariṣyati tvāṃ na sa bodhito 'pi san kathāṃ pramattaḥ prathamoditāmiva || 219 ||
samparko yathā—(māmā. 1.33)
paricchedātītaḥ sakalavacanānāmaviṣayaḥ punarjanmanyasminnanubhavapathaṃ yo na gatavān |
viveka—pradhvaṃsādupacita—mahāmoha—gahano vikāraḥ ko 'pyantarjaḍayati ca tāpaṃ ca tanute || 220 ||
anugamo yathā—(māmā. 3.5)
āścaryamutpaladṛśo vadanāmalendusānnidhyato mama muhurjaḍimānametya |
jātyena candramaṇineva mahīdharasya sandhāryate dravamayo manaso vikāraḥ || 221 ||
(48. jugupsā)
padārthanindanaṃ jugup‍sā | tasyā
janma yathā—(urāca. 2.10)
re hasta ! dakṣiṇa mṛtasya śiśordvijasya jīvātave visṛja śūdramunau kṛpāṇam |
rāmasya gātramasi nirbharagarbhakhinnasītāvivāsanapaṭoḥ karuṇā kutaste ? || 222 ||
anubandho yathā—(urāca. 1.49)
visrambhādurasi nipatya jātanidrāmunmucya priyagṛhiṇīṃ gṛhasya śobhām |
ātaṅkasphuritakaṭhoragarbhagurvīṃ kravyādbha‍yo balimiva dāruṇaḥ kṣipāmi || 223 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(urāca. 3.26)
tvaṃ jīvitaṃ tvamasi me hṛdayaṃ dvitīyaṃ tvaṃ kaumudī nayanayoramṛtaṃ tvamaṅge |
ityādibhiḥ priyaśatairanurudhya mugdhāṃ tāmeva śāntamathavā kimataḥ pareṇa || 224 ||
samparko yathā—(vesaṃ. 3.13)
dhik sānujaṃ kurupatiṃ dhigajātaśatruṃ dhig bhūpatīn viphalaśastrabhṛto dhigasmān |
keśagrahaḥ khalu tadā drupadātmajāyāḥ droṇasya cādya likhitairiva vīkṣito yaiḥ || 225 ||
anugamo yathā—(mavīca. 1.38)
sarvadoṣānabhiṣvaṅgadām‍nāyasamatāṃ gatāḥ |
yuṣmākamabhyupagamāḥ pramāṇaṃ puṇyapāpayoḥ || 226 ||
(49. nirvedaḥ)
vairāgyādibhirmanaḥkhedo nirvedaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—
śītenoddha‍ṛṣitasya māṣaśimivac‍cintārṇave majjataḥ śāntāg‍iṃnasphuṭitādharasya dhamataḥ kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭhasya me |
nidrā kā(k‍vā) 'pi vimāniteva dayitā santyajya dūraṃ gatā satpātrapratipāditeva vasudhā na kṣīyate śarvarī || 227 ||
anubandho yathā—(vaiśa. 93)
mātarlakṣmi ! bhajasva kaṃcidaparaṃ matkāṅ‍‌kṣiṇī mā sma bhū— rbhogebhyaḥ spṛhayālavo tava vaśe; kā nisspṛhāṇāmasi |
sadyassyūtapalāśapatrapuṭikāpātrīpavitrīkṛtaiḥ bhikṣāsak‍tubhireva samprati vayaṃ vṛttiṃ samīhāmahe || 228 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(urāca. 6.33)
k‍va tāvānānando niratiśayavisrambhabahulaḥ k‍va te 'nyonyaṃ yatra k‍vacana gahanāḥ kautukarasāḥ |
sukhe vā duḥkhe vā k‍va nu khalu tadaikyaṃ hṛdayayo— stathāpyeṣa prāṇaḥ sphurati na tu tāpo viramati || 229 ||
saṃparko yathā—(sūmu. 6)
ayaṃ śūnyo grāmaḥ surasadanametac‍ca patitaṃ puraḥ śuṣkā vāpī tarurayamitaḥ śīrṇaviṭapaḥ |
vayaṃ caite pānthāḥ parikṛśadaśābhāgyagatayaḥ samānaiḥ saṃyogaḥ kaṭurapi mano me ramayati || 230 ||
anugamo yathā—
jarāmaraṇadaurgatyavyādhayastāvadāsatām |
manye janmaiva dhīrāṇāṃ bhūyobhūyas‍trapākaram || 231 ||
(50. śamaḥ)
tattvajñānādibhirmanaḥkaṣāyoparamaśśamaḥ | tasya
janma yathā—
sthitiḥ puṇye 'raṇye saha paricayo hanta hariṇaiḥ phalairmūlairvṛttiḥ pratinadi ca talpāni dṛṣadaḥ |
itīyaṃ sāmagrī bhavati viratiṃ saṃspṛhayatāṃ naṃ vā gehaṃ vā sadṛśamupaśāntasya manasaḥ || 232 ||
anubandho yathā—(vaiśa. 12)
avaśyaṃ yātāraścirataramuṣitvā 'pi viṣayāḥ viyoge ko bhedastyajati na jano yat svayabhimān |
vrajantaḥ svātantryāt paramaparitāpāya manasaḥ svayaṃ tyaktā hyete śamasukhamanantaṃ vidadhati || 233 ||
prakarṣo yathā—(bhallaṭaśatakaṃ 69)
yadā ' 'sīdajñānaṃ smaratimirasaṃskārajanitaṃ tadā dṛṣṭiṃ nārīmayamidamaśeṣaṃ jagadapi |
idānīmasmākaṃ paṭutaravivekāñjanajuṣāṃ samībhūtā dṛṣṭis‍tribhuvanamapi brahma manute || 234 ||
saṃparko yathā—
alamaticapalatvāt svap‍namāyopamatvāt pariṇativirasatvāt saṅgamena priyāyāḥ |
iti yadi śatakṛtvastattvamālocayāma— stadapi na hariṇākṣīṃ vismaratyantarātmā || 235 ||
anugamo yathā—(bārā. 1.35)
yanmīmāṃsayataḥ śrutīḥ śatapathāḥ sākṣātkṛtabrahmaṇo viśvāmitramahāmunerapi ca yad vartāmahe cetasi |
apyullīḍhakaṣāyapālanadhiyāṃ sadyaḥ samādhiślathaṃ tat saṅgītakamantareṇa hṛdayaṃ harṣānnarīnartitam || 236 ||
ete ratyādayo bhāvāḥ śṛṅgāravyaktihetavaḥ |
kārts‍nyādekonapañcāśad bhedā eṣāṃ prakāśitāḥ || 237 ||
janmānubandhātiśayasamparkānugamā iti |
yuñjīta sarvabhāveṣu vargayorubhayorapi || 238 ||
yadapi ca gaditaṃ prakarṣagāmī bhavati raso rativismayādireva |
tadapi na samañjasaṃ prakṛṣṭāḥ pratinijabhedamamī hi sarva eva || 239 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śṛṅgāraprakāśe harṣādibhāvaprapañcako nāma
|| caturdaśaḥ prakāśaḥ || 14 ||
etatprakāśatritayaṃ prakāśacatuṣṭayātmeti vibhāvanīyam |
ṣaṭ‍‌triṃśatā hanta yato 'tra rakṣāṃ prakāśacakre sukhamaś‍nuvīta ||
iti revāprasādasya kāśyapasya dvivedinaḥ |
sanātanasya me prājñavaryeṣu praṇayāñjaliḥ ||
atha
śṛṅgāraprakāśe pañcadaśaḥ prakāśaḥ
ratyālambanavibhāvaprakāśaḥ
yaduktaṃ1 'taiḥ savibhāvānubhāvaiḥ prakāśamānaḥ śṛṅgāro viśeṣataḥ svadate', tatra prāyeṇa ratiprītyai vibhāvādīn udāharaṇato vakṣyāmaḥ |
dvividho vibhāvaḥ — ālambanavibhāva uddīpanavibhāvaśca |
yamālambya ratyādaya utpadyante sa ālambanavibhāvo nāyakādiḥ | tatra—
(1. nāyakaḥ)
nāyakaścaturdhā dhīrodātta—dhīroddhata—dhīralalita—dhīrapraśāntabhedāt |
(dhairyam)
dhairyaṃ hi nāma nāyakavyapadeśaheturindriyāvikārakāraṇaṃ cittadharmaḥ, yena satāṃ
satyapi garvādihetau guṇasamūhe notsekādayo jāyante || 1 ||
(1. dhīrodāttaḥ)
tad(dhairyaṃ) yatra guṇasanniveśacārutvādudāttaṃ sa dhīrodāttaḥ | yathā—
kulamamalinaṃ bhadrā mūrtirmatiḥ śrutaśālinī || 2 || (pṛ. 1005)
(2. dhīroddhataḥ)
yatra guṇānāṃ hīnādhikayogādupahataṃ (dhairyaṃ) sa dhīroddhataḥ | yathā— (urāca. 6.19)
dṛṣṭistṛṇīkṛtajagattrayasattvasārā dhīroddhatā namayatīva gatirdharitrīm |
kaumārake 'pi girivad gurutāṃ dadhāno vīro rasaḥ kimayametyuta darpa eṣaḥ || 3 ||
(3. dhīralalitaḥ)
yatra tu sanniveśasaukumāryād vilāsamasṛṇaṃ (dhairyaṃ) sa dhīralalitaḥ | yathā—(kusaṃ.2.64)
atha sa lalitayoṣidbhrūlatācāruśṛṅgaṃ rativalayapadāṅke cāpamāsajjya kaṇṭhe |
sahacaramadhuhastanyastacūtāṅkurās‍traḥ śatamukhamupatasthe prāñjaliḥ puṣpadhanvā || 4 ||
(4. dhīrapraśāntaḥ)
tatra tvamīṣāmeva śās‍trārthāvagamapariṇatyā tadatisattvottaraṃ sa dhīrapraśāntaḥ | yathā—
1. atraiva 616 pṛṣṭhe prathamapaṅktau |
anākṛṣṭasya viṣayairvidyānāṃ pāradṛśvanaḥ |
tasya dharmaraterāsīd vṛddhatvaṃ jarasā vinā || 5 || (raghu. 1.23)
