ta ete guṇaprakṛtipravṛttiparigrahabhedād yathāsambhavaṃ dvādaśadhā bhavanti |
1. guṇataḥ uttamaḥ, madhyamaḥ, kaniṣṭha iti |
2. prakṛteḥ sāttviko rājasastāmasa iti |
3. pravṛtteranukūlo dakṣiṇaḥ śaṭho dhṛṣṭa iti |
4. parigrahādasādhāraṇaḥ sādhāraṇa iti | teṣu—
(1. guṇataḥ)
mahākulīnatādicaturviṃśatiguṇayogāduttamaḥ; yathā—
rāmo 'sau jagatīha vikramaguṇairyātaḥ prasiddhiṃ parā— masmadbhāgyaviparyayād yadi paraṃ devo na jānāti tam |
vandīvaiṣa yaśāṃsi gāyati marud yasyaikabāṇāhati— śreṇībhūtaviśālasālavivarodgīrṇaiḥ svaraiḥ sap‍tabhiḥ || 6 ||
pādonaguṇasampadyogānmadhyamaḥ yathā—(vesaṃ. 5.27)
sakalaripujayāśā yatra baddhā sutaiste tṛṇamiva paribhūto yasya garveṇa lokaḥ |
raṇaśirasi nihantā tasya rādhāsutasya praṇamati pitarau vā madhyamaḥ pāṇḍavo 'yam || 7 ||
ardhaguṇasampadyogāt kaniṣṭhaḥ; yathā—
nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayastatrāpyasau tāpasaḥ || 8 || (644)
(2. prakṛteḥ)
sattvotkarṣāt sāttvikaḥ; yathā—(urā. 6.13)
śak‍tyā vakṣasi mag‍nayā saha mayā mụ̄dhe plavaṅgādhipe vidrāṇeṣu ca vidravatsu kapiṣu prāp‍tāvakāśo dviṣi |
mā bhaiṣṭeti nirundhataḥ kapibalānyasyodbhaṭabhrūsthite— rmarmacchedaviṃsasthulākṣarapadā vācastvayā na śrutāḥ || 9 ||
rajaütkarṣād rājasaḥ; yathā—(raghu. 19.13)
aṅkamaṅkaparivartanocite tasya ninyaturaśūnyatāmubhe |
vallakī ca hṛdayaṅgamasvanā mañjuvāgapi ca vāmalocanā || 10 ||
tamo 'tiśayāt tāmasaḥ; yathā—
yo yaḥ śas‍traṃ bibharti svabhujagurumadaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ॰ || 11 ||(pṛ.514)
(3. pravṛtteḥ)
hṛdayaṅgamapravṛttiranukūlaḥ; yathā—
kimiti kabarī yādṛk‌tādṛg ? dṛśau kimakajjale ? na khalu likhitāḥ pātrāṅgulyaḥ patrāvalyaḥ kimadya kapolayoḥ |
ayamayamayaṃ kiñca klāmyatyasaṃsmaraṇena te śaśimukhi ! sakhīhastanyasto vilāsaparicchadaḥ || 12 ||
auparodhikapravṛttirdakṣiṇaḥ; yathā—(rat‍nāva. 1.25)
devi ! tvanmukhapaṅkajena śaśinaśchāyātiraskāriṇā paś‍yābjāni vinirjitāni sahasā gacchanti vicchāyatām |
śrutvā te parivāravāravanitāgītāni bhṛṅgāṅganā līyante kamalodareṣu śanakaiḥ sañjātalajjā iva || 13 ||
prātikūlikapravṛttiḥ śaṭhaḥ; yathā—(murā. 1.1)
dhanyā keyaṃ sthitā te śirasi ? śaśikalā; kiṃ nu nāmaitadasyāḥ ? nāmaivāsyāstadetat paricitamapi te vismṛtaṃ kasya hetoḥ ? |
nārīṃ pṛcchāmi nenduṃ kathayatu vijayā na pramāṇaṃ yadīndu— rdevyā nihnotumicchoriti surasaritaṃ śāṭh‍yamavyāt prabhorvaḥ || 14 ||
nirapatrapapravṛttirdhṛṣṭaḥ; yathā—
vāco bhāmini ! kiṃ tavādya paruṣāḥ subhru ! bhruvorvibhramo viśrāntaḥ kuta eṣa lolanayane ! kiṃ lohite locane |
svedaḥ kiṃ nu ghanastani ! stanataṭe muktāphalālītulāṃ dhatte, muñca ruṣaṃ mamātra dayite ! leśo 'pi nāstyāgasaḥ || 15 ||
(4. parigrahāt)
ananyajānirasādhāraṇaḥ; yathā—(urāca. 1.37)
āvivāhasamayād gṛhe vane śaiśave tadanu yauvane punaḥ |
svāpaheturanupāsito 'nyayā rāmabāhurupadhānameṣa te || 16 ||
anekajāniḥ sādhāraṇaḥ; yathā—(śāku. 6.12)
ekaikamatra divase divase madīyaṃ nāmākṣaraṃ gaṇaya gacchasi yāvadantam |
tāvat priye ! madavarodhagṛhapraveśaṃ netā janastava samīpamupaiṣyatīti || 17 ||
athaiṣāmeva tridhā vyatikare caturuttaraṃ śatam | tatra—
(dhīrodāttaḥ —8)
dhīrodāttaḥ sāttvikaḥ; sa tūttama eva; anukūladakṣiṇā 'sādhāraṇasādhāraṇabheda— vyatikarādaṣṭaprakāraḥ | tatra
1. dhīrodāttānukūlo yathā—
ātaṅkaśramasādhvasavyatikarotkampaḥ kathaṃ sahṛtām || 18 || (pṛ.834)
2. dhīrodāttadakṣiṇo yathā—(śāku. 6.5)
ramyaṃ dveṣṭi, yathā purā prakṛtibhirna pratyahaṃ sevyate śayyopāntavivartanairvigamayatyunnida eva kṣapāḥ |
dākṣiṇyena dadāti vācamucitāmantaḥpurebhyo yadā gotreṣu skhalatistadā bhavati ca vrīḍāvanamraściram || 19 ||
3. dhīrodāttāsādhāraṇo yathā—(mavīca. 2.27)
munirayamatha vīrastādṛśastatpriyaṃ me viramatu parikampaḥ kātare ! kṣatriyā 'si |
jagati vitatakīrtterdarpakaṇḍūladoṣṇaḥ parisaraṇasamartho rāghavaḥ kṣatriyo 'ham || 20 ||
4. dhīrodāttasādhāraṇo yathā—(raghu. 1.65)
kintu vadhvāṃ tavaitasyāmadṛṣṭasadṛśaprajam |
na māmavati sadvīpā rat‍nasūrapi modinī || 21 ||
5. dhīrodāttānukūlāsādhāraṇo yathā—(urā. 2.14)
vicitramaṇisaṅkarasphuraduruprabhābhāsuraṃ nimeṣavimukhī dṛśaṃ mama muhuḥ samāpādayan |
kuraṅgatilakānane tava tadeṇacarmāṃśukaṃ kariṣyati payodhare suradhanurvilāsodayam ||
6. dhīrodāttānukūlasādhāraṇo yathā—(śāku. 3.17)
parigrahabahutve 'pi dve pratiṣṭhe kulasya me |
samudraraśanā corvī sakhī ca yuvayoriyam || 23 ||
7. dhīrodāttadakṣiṇāsādhāraṇo yathā—
devi ! tvadvadanāravindasuhṛdāmeṣāṃ sarojanmanāṃ paś‍ya vyomani lohitāyati ravāveṣā daśā vartate |
itthaṃ saṅkucadambujānukaraṇavyojapanītāñjaleḥ śambhorvañcitapārvatīkamucitaṃ sandhyārcitaṃ pātu vaḥ || 24 ||
8. dhīrodāttadakṣiṇasādhāraṇo yathā—(vikra. 3.13)
anena kalyāṇi ! mṛṇālakomalaṃ vratena gātraṃ glapayasyakāraṇam |
prasādamākāṅ‍kṣati yastavotsukaḥ sa kiṃ tvayā dāsajanaḥ prasādyate || 25 ||
(dhīroddhataḥ —44)
dhīroddhatastu tāmasaḥ madhyamakaniṣṭhakānukūladakṣiṇaśaṭhadhṛṣṭāsādhāraṇasādhāraṇa— vyatikarāt catuścatvāriṃśatprakāraḥ |
1. dhīroddhatamadhyamo yathā—(māmā. 5.61)
praṇayisakhīsalīlaparihāsarasādhigatai— lailitaśiriṣapuṣpahananairapi tāmyati yat |
vapuṣi vadhāya tatra tava śastramupakṣipataḥ patati śirasyakāṇḍayamadaṇḍa ivaiṣa bhujaḥ || 26 ||
2. dhīroddhatakaniṣṭho yathā—(jāha. 10.86)
ekasmiñchayaneṃ mayā mayasutāmāliṅgya nidrālasā— munnidaṃ śayitena me caraṇayoḥ saṃvāhanavyāpṛtā |
pādāgreṇa tilottamā stanataṭe sas‍nehamāpīḍitā harṣāvegasamarpitāni pulakānyadyāpi no muñcati || 27 ||
3. dhīroddhatānukūlo yathā—(māmā. 5.27)
tvatpāṇipaṅkajaparigrahadhanyajanmā bhūyāsamityabhiniveśakadarthyamānaḥ |
bhrāmyan nṛmāṃsapaṇanāya paretabhūmau ākarṇya bhīru ! ruditāni tavāgato 'smi || 28 ||
4. dhīroddhatadakṣiṇo yathā—
atrāntare raṇita/lalitahāralatānitamba || 29 || (pṛ. 648, 884)
5. dhīroddhataśaṭho yathā—
caṃdo vi rāiṃ āhiṃḍiūṇa gosammi hoi vicchāo |
tuṃ puṇa jāāparimalapasāhaṇo sohasi bhamaṃto || 30 ||
(candro 'pi rātrimāhiṇḍya prabhāte bhavati vicchāyaḥ |
tvaṃ punarjāyāparimalaprasādhanaḥ śobhase bhraman ||)
6. dhīroddhatadhṛṣṭo yathā—(māgha. 11.34)
navanakhapadamaṅgaṃ gopayasyaṃśukena sthagayasi punaroṣṭhaṃ pāṇinā dantadaṣṭam |
pratidiśamaparas‍trīsaṅgaśaṃsī visarpan navaparimalagandhaḥ kena śakyo varītum ? || 31 ||
7. dhīroddhatāsādhāraṇo yathā—(māmā.5.32)
dhairyaṃ nidhehi hṛdaye hata eṣa pāpaḥ kiṃvā kadācidapi kenacidanvabhāvi |
sāraṅgasaṃhṛtividhāvibhakumbhakūṭakuṭṭākapāṇikuliśasya hareḥ pramādaḥ || 32 ||
8. dhīroddhatasādhāraṇo yathā—
lākṣāgṛhānalaviṣānnasabhāpraveśaiḥ || 33 || (pṛ. 359)
9. dhīroddhatāsādhāraṇānukūlo yathā—(māmā. 7.4)
adyorjitaṃ vijitameva mayā kimanyadadyotsavaḥ phalavato mama yauvanasya |
yasya prasādasumukhena samudyateyaṃ devena bāndhavadhurā makaradhvajena || 34 ||
10. dhīroddhatasādhāraṇānukūlo yathā—(vesaṃ. 1.20)
cañcadbha‍ujabhramitacaṇḍagadābhighātasaṃcūrṇitoruyugalasya suyodhanasya |
styānāvabaddhaghanaśoṇitaśoṇapāṇiruttaṃsayiṣyati kacāṃstava devi ! bhīmaḥ || 35 ||
11. dhīroddhatāsādhāraṇadakṣiṇo yathā—(māmā. 6.20)
āmūlakaṇṭakitakomalabāhunālamārdrāṅgulīdalamanaṅganidāghatap‍taḥ |
asyāḥ kareṇa karamākalayāmi kāntamāraktapaṅkajamiva dviradaḥ sarasyāḥ || 36 ||
12. dhīroddhatadakṣiṇasādhāraṇo yathā—
ākṛṣṭāṃ naṭarāvaṇena sahasā dṛṣṭvā puro jānakīṃ— mantaḥ—kṣobha—vijṛmbhamāṇa—bhayada—bhrūbhaṅga—bhīmākṛteḥ |
śārṅgāsphālakṛtodyame bhayakaraspṛṣṭāgrabhūmeḥ krudhā rādhāṃ/māṃ vīkṣya hareḥ prakānti jayati vrīḍāvanamraṃ mukham || 37 ||1
13. dhīroddhatāsādhāraṇaśaṭho yathā—
vanabhuvi saha patyā prasthitāṃ vīkṣya sītāṃ gṛhiṇamanuyiyāsurjānakī śokaniṣṭhā |
guru—gurujana—lajjā ' 'namra—vaktrā 'mbujena bhrukuṭipuṭanibandhād vāritā lakṣmaṇena || 38 ||2
14. dhīroddhatasādhāraṇaśaṭho yathā—
taṃ tiasakusumadāmaṃ hariṇā ṇiggahia—surahi—gaṃdhāmoaṃ |
appapiṇaïaṃ pi dūmia—paṇaïṇi—hiaeṇa ruppiṇīa viiṇṇaṃ || 39 ||
(tat tridaśakusumadāma hariṇā nirgatasurabhigandhāmodam |
ātmanā nītamapi dūna—praṇayinī—hṛdayena rukmiṇyai vitīrṇam ||)
15. dhīroddhatāsādhāraṇadhṛṣṭo yathā—(vesaṃ. 2.20)
nyastā na bhrukuṭirna vāṣpasilelanācchadite locane nītaṃ nānanamanyataḥ saśapathaṃ nāhaṃ spṛśan vāritaḥ |
tanvyā mag‍napayodharaṃ bhayavaśādāviddhamāliṅgitaṃ bhaṅktāsyā niyamasya bhīṣaṇamarunnāyaṃ vayasyo mama || 40 ||
16. dhīroddhatasādhāraṇadhṛṣṭo yathā—
śaure ! kasmād pidhatse daśanapadamidaṃ cārukeś‍yāhitaṃ te cārutvaṃ kīdṛgasya śritapaśuvapuṣā keśinā nirmitasya |
1. 'sītāharaṇaprasaṅgaḥ prayujyate | upasthitaś‍ca prekṣakeṣu rāmo 'pi | nāsahiṣṭāsau dṛś‍yamidam | kruddhaḥ sa bhīmākṛtirjātaḥ | viṣṇutvasaṃskārastu tatra jajāgāra asmarac‍ca śārṅgasphālanāyāḥ saḥ | upasthitā tu tasyāgre sītā | tāṃ vīkṣya svīye vibhrame savrīḍo rāmo mukhaṃ nanāme'—ti ghaṭanājātaṃ manasi kṛtvā niṣkraṣṭavyotra tātparyārthaḥ | (naṭa = natha | śārṅgā = aṅgā |) 2. sītā rāmamanugatā | lakṣmaṇo 'pi gṛhiṇamagrajamanuyiyāsāñcakāra | sve 'dhyavasāye sītā lajjitu— mārabdhā guravaḥ paś‍yantīti dhyātvā | tāmenāṃ namravaktrāmbujo lakṣmaṇo vārayāmāsa bhrukuṭipuṭabandhadvārā | ayamatrādhārabhūto 'rthaḥ | draṣṭavyā 'tra padyasūcī | saṃpūrṇe śṛṅgāraprakāśe ś‍loka eṣa vāratrayamud‍dhṛtaḥ—866 pṛṣṭhe, 965 pṛṣṭhe, 1408 pṛṣṭhe ca | 965 pṛṣṭhe rāghavagranthe pratīkamātram | atra pāṭhabhedāḥ—'jānakī śokaniṣṭhā rā. (pṛ.1551), jānakīṃ cākariṣṭā(?)jo.(pṛ.602),rā.(pṛ.994), jānakī sā kaniṣṭhā jo (pṛ.676) | aho sevāṃ sarasvatyāḥ |
naivaṃ dhṛṣṭa ! bravīmi vrajayuvatimahaṃ bāḍhameṣa vrajāmī— tyevaṃ gopyā 'vatād vaḥ kṣaṇakapaṭagirā prīṇitaḥ kaiṭabhāriḥ || 41 ||
17. dhīroddhatānukūlamadhyamo yathā—(māmā.5.26)
maraṇasamaye tyaktāśaṅkaṃ pralāpanirargala— prakaṭitanijas‍nehaḥ so 'yaṃ sakhā pura eva te |
sutanu ! visṛjotkampaṃ sampratyasāviha pāpmanaḥ phalamanubhavatyugraṃ pāpaṃ pratīpavipākinaḥ || 42 ||
18. dhīroddhatadakṣiṇamadhyamo yathā—
jaṃ ca aliovaāraṃ, jaṇassa dakkhiṇṇaāeĕ gheppaï hiaaṃ |
jaï so vi siṇeho c‍cia, ṇa ṇāma sabbhāvakeavāṇa viseso || 43 ||
(yac‍ca alīkopacāraṃ janasya dakṣiṇatayā gṛhyate hṛdayam |
yadi so 'pi s‍neha eva na nāma sadbhāvakaitavayorviśeṣaḥ ||)
19. dhīroddhataśaṭhamadhyamo yathā—(māgha. 3.16)
yāṃ yāṃ priyaḥ praikṣata kātarākṣīṃ sā sā hriyā namramukhī babhūva |
niśśaṅkamanyāḥ samamāhiterṣyāstatrāntare jagh‍nuramuṃ kaṭākṣaiḥ || 44 ||
20. dhīroddhatadhṛṣṭamadhyamo yathā—
surakusumehiṃ kalusiaṃ jaï tehiṃ cia puṇo pasāemi tumaṃ |
to pemmassa kisoari ! avarāhassa a ṇa me khamaṃ hoi kaaṃ || 45 ||
(surakusumaiḥ kaluṣitāṃ yadi taireva punaḥ prasādayāmi tvām |
tataḥ premṇaḥ kṛśodari ! aparādhasya ca na me kṣamaṃ bhavati kṛtam ||)
21. dhīroddhatāsādhāraṇamadhyamo yathā—yathā—(raghu. 7.70)
iti sa śirasi vāmaṃ pādamādhāya rājñāmudavahadanavadyāṃ tāmavadyādapetaḥ |
turagakhurarajobhistasya rukṣālakāntā samaravijayalakṣmīḥ saiva mūrtā babhūva || 46 ||
22. dhīroddhatasādhāraṇamadhyamo yathā—(vesaṃ. 1.21)
manthāyastārṇavāmbhaḥplutakuharavalanmandaradhvānadhīraḥ koṇāghāteṣu garjatpralayaghanaghaṭānyonyasaṅghaṭṭacaṇḍaḥ |
kṛṣṇākrodhāgradūtaḥ kuruśatanidhanotpātanirghātavātaḥ kenāsmatsiṃhanādapratirasitasakho dundubhistāḍito 'yam || 47 ||
23. dhorāddhatāsādharaṇānukūlamadhyamo yathā—(vesaṃ. 2.17)
kiṃ no vyāp‍tadiśāṃ prakampitabhuvāmakṣauhiṇīnāṃ phalaṃ kiṃ droṇena ? kimaṅgarājaviśikhairevaṃ yadi klāmyasi |
bhīru ! bhrātṛśatasya me bhujavanacchāyāṃ sukhopasthitā tvaṃ duryodhanakesarīndragṛhīṇī, śaṅkāspadaṃ kiṃ tava ? || 48 ||
24. dhīroddhatasādhāraṇānukūlamadhyamo yathā—(vesaṃ. 1.24)
catvāro vayamṛtvijaḥ, sa bhagavān karmopadeṣṭā hariḥ saṃgrāmādhvaradīkṣito narapatiḥ, pat‍nī gṛhītavratā |
kauravyāḥ paśavaḥ, priyāparibhavakleśopaśāntiḥ phalaṃ rājanyopanimantraṇāya rasati sphītaṃ yaśodundubhiḥ || 49 ||
25. dhīroddhatāsādhāraṇadakṣiṇamadhyamo yathā—(raghu. 7.67)
itaḥ parānarbhakahāryaśāstrān vaidarbhi ! paś‍yānumatā mayā 'si |
evamvidhenāhavaceṣṭitena tvaṃ prārthyase hastagatā mamaibhiḥ || 50 ||
26. dhīroddhatasādhāraṇadakṣiṇamadhyamo yathā—(vesaṃ. 1.10)
tathābhūtāṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpasadasi pāñcālatanayāṃ vane vyādhaiḥ sārdhaṃ suciramuṣitaṃ valkaladharaiḥ |
virāṭasyāvāse sthitamanibhṛtā/nucitā—rambhanibhṛtaṃ guruḥ khedaṃ khinne mayi bhajati nādyāpi kuruṣu ? || 51 ||
27. dhīroddhatāsādhāraṇaśaṭhamadhyamo yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.74)
tamāśu vigh‍naṃ tapasastapasvī vanaspatiṃ vajra ivāvarudhya |
strīsannikarṣaṃ parihartumicchannantardadhe bhūtapatiḥ sabhūtaḥ || 52 ||
28. dhīroddhatasādhāraṇaśaṭhamadhyamo yathā—
rādhā rodhasi yāmune parisare rādhā latāveśmanāṃ rādhā tāsu niśāsu dattasamayā rādhā dhvajasyotsave |
ityevaṃ samayā śriyaṃ viluṭhitaḥ kaṇṭhodare śārṅgiṇo gīrgumphaḥ śvasitānumeyamahimā rāghāmayaḥ pātu vaḥ || 53 ||
29. dhīroddhatāsādhāraṇadhṛṣṭamadhyamo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.83)
nirvāyatāmāli ! kimapyayaṃ vaṭuḥ punarvivakṣuḥ sphuritottarādharaḥ |
na kevalaṃ yo mahato 'pabhāṣate śṛṇoti tasmādapi yaḥ sa pāpabhāk || 54 ||
30. dhīroddhatasādhāraṇadhṛṣṭamadhyamo yathā—
tvayā kṣāntaṃ kṣāntaṃ kuru mukhamito māṃ prati kṛtaṃ nidhehīmaṃ pṛṣṭhe mama karamayaṃ kāntanihitaḥ |
sakhīnāṃ nirbandhānmama ca dhṛtapāṇeḥ | praṇamataḥ priye ! kā ruṭ prīte mayi paramagụ̄dhāstava ruṣaḥ || 55 ||
31. dhīroddhatānukūlakaniṣṭho yathā—
sa eṣa bhuvanatrayaprathitasaṃyamaḥ śaṅkaraḥ || 56 || (pṛ. 540)
32. dhīroddhatadakṣiṇakaniṣṭho yathā—(amaruka. 81)
kapole patrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto niḥśvāsairayamamṛtaśūnyo(hṛdyo) 'dhararasaḥ |
muhurlag‍naḥ kaṇṭhe taralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭīṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam || 57 ||
33. dhīroddhataśaṭhakaniṣṭho yathā—
āḥ sīte patigarvavibhramabharabhrāntabhramad‍bāndhava॰ || 58 || (pṛ. 640)
34. dhīroddhatadhṛṣṭakaniṣṭho yathā—(rāca. 19.67)
jāgarṣi jānaki ! viṣīdasi kiṃ viśeṣā— dadyāpi tāpasi ! na taṃ (tad) na (vi)jahāsi vāmyam |
dhig daivameva mayi nāma vaśaṃvadasya viśvaprabhormama puraḥ pariśoṣameṣi || 59 ||
35. dhīroddhatāsādhāraṇakaniṣṭho yathā—(vesaṃ. 2.11)
tad bhīrutvaṃ tava mama puraḥ sāhasānīdṛśāni ślāghā sā 'smad‍vapuṣi vinayavyutkrame 'yeṣa rāgaḥ |
tac‍caudāryaṃ mayi jaḍamatau cāpale ko 'pi panthāḥ khyāte tasmin vitamasi kule janma kaulīnametat || 60 ||
36. dhīroddhatasādhāraṇakaniṣṭho yathā—
jātaṃ me paruṣeṇa bhasmarajasā tac‍candanoddha‍ūlanaṃ॰ || 61 || (pṛ. 703)
37. dhīroddhatāsādhāraṇānukūlakaniṣṭho yathā—(māmā. 7.2)
rambhoru! saṃhara bhayaṃ kṣamate vikāramutkampinaḥ stanabharasya na madhyabhāgaḥ |
itthaṃ tvayaiva racitaḥ praṇayaprasādaḥ saṅkalpanirvṛtiṣu saṃstuta eṣa dāsaḥ || 62 ||
38. dhīroddhatasādhāraṇānukūlakaniṣṭho yathā—(urā. 2.27)
vadata vadata satyaṃ rūpamīdṛk kadācid yadi punarabalāyā dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ mukhādi |
jagati jitasamastārāticakre yatheṣṭaṃ nanu kimiva na dṛṣṭaṃ matprasādād bhavadbhiḥ || 63 ||
39. dhīroddhatāsādhāraṇadakṣiṇakaniṣṭho yathā—(megha. 108)
bhūyaścāha tvamapi śayane kaṇṭhalag‍nā purā me nidrāṃ labdhvā kimapi rudatī sasvaraṃ viprabuddhā |
sāntarhāsaṃ kathitamabhavat pṛcchātaśca tvayā me dṛṣṭaḥ svap‍ne kitava! ramayan kāmāpi tvaṃ mayeti || 64 ||
40. dhīroddhatasādhāraṇadakṣiṇakaniṣṭho yathā—(gāsa. 1.22)
ṇavavahuppemma—taṇuio paṇaaṃ paḍhamaghariṇīe rakkhaṃto |
alihiaduppariallaṃ pi ṇei raṇṇaṃ dhaṇuṃ vāho || 65 ||
(navavadhūprema tanūkṛtaḥ praṇayaṃ prathamagṛhiṇyā rakṣan |
alikhita/atanūkṛtaṃ duṣparipālyadurākarṣaṃmapi nayatyaraṇyaṃ dhanurvyādhaḥ ||)
41. dhīroddhatāsādhāraṇaśaṭhakaniṣṭho yathā—(vesaṃ. 2.13)
diṣṭyā 'rdhaśrutavipralabdhavacanakrodhādahaṃ no gato diṣṭyā no paruṣaṃ ruṣārdhakathite kiñcinmayā vyāhṛtam |
māṃ pratyāyayituṃ vimūḍhahṛdayaṃ diṣṭyā kathāntaṃ gatā mithyādūṣitayā 'nayā virahitaṃ diṣṭyā na jātaṃ jagat || 66 ||
42. kṣīroddhatasādhāraṇaśaṭhakaniṣṭho yathā—(amaru. 60)
lākṣālakṣma lalāṭapaṭṭamabhitaḥ koyūramudrā gale vaktre kajjalakālimā nayanayostāmbūlarāgo 'paraḥ |
dṛṣṭvā kopavidhāyi maṇḍanamidaṃ prātaściraṃ preyasaḥ krīḍātāmarasodare mṛgadṛśaḥ śvāsāḥ samāp‍tiṃ gatāḥ || 67 ||
43. dhīroddhatāsādhāraṇadhṛṣṭakaniṣṭho yathā—(vesaṃ. 2.16)
vitara dhavaladīrghāpāṅgasaṃsarpi cakṣuḥ parijanapathavartinyatra kiṃ saṃbhrameṇa? |
smitamadhuramudāraṃ devi! māmālapoccaiḥ prabhavati mama pāṇyorañjalistvaṃ spṛśāsmān || 68 ||
44. dhīroddhatasādhāraṇadhṛṣṭakaniṣṭho yathā—(rāca. 19.86)
etarhi māmavaniputri! bhajaikanāthaṃ ratnākaraṃ śaśadharaprabhavā nadīva |
tasmin nirojasi na rājasi martyamātre muktāvalī mṛtaśarīra ivāvanaddhā || 69 ||
(dhīralalitaḥ —44)
dhīralalitastu rājasaḥ | so 'pyuttamamadhyamānukūladakṣiṇaśaṭhadhṛṣṭāsādhāraṇa— sādhāraṇādibhedāt catuścatvāriṃśatprakāra eva | tatra—
1. dhīralalitottamo yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.20)
evamindriyasukhasya vartmanaḥ sevānādanugṛhītamanmathaḥ |
śailarājabhavane sahomayā māsamātramavasad vṛṣadhvajaḥ || 70 ||
2. dhīralalitamadhyamo yathā—(vikra. 3.19)
sāmantamaulimaṇirañjitaśāsanāṅkamekātapatramavanerna tathā prabhutvam |
asyāḥ sakhe! caraṇayoradhigamya kāntamājñākaratvamahamadya yathā kṛtārthaḥ || 71 ||
3. dhīralalitānukūlo yathā—(ra. 3.5)
na me hniyā śaṃsati kiṃcidīpsitaṃ spṛhāvatī vastuṣu keṣu māgadhī |
iti sma pṛcchatyanuvelamādṛtaḥ priyāsakhīruttarakosaleśvaraḥ || 72 ||
4. dhīralalitadakṣiṇo yathā—(rat‍nā. 1.22)
anaṅgo 'yamanaṅgatvamadya nindiṣyati dhruvam |
yadā tena tu saṃprāp‍taḥ pāṇisparśotsavastava || 73 ||
5. dhīralalitaśaṭho yathā—
vāsaḥ samprati keśava! k‍va bhavato mugdhekṣaṇe! nanvidaṃ vāsaṃ brūhi śaṭha! prakāmasubhage tvadgatrasaṃśleṣataḥ |
yāminyāmuṣitaḥ k‍va dhūrta! vitanurmuṣṇāti kiṃ yāminī? śaurirgopavadhūṃ chalaiḥ parihasannevaṃvidhaiḥ pātu vaḥ || 74 ||
6. dhīralalitadhṛṣṭo yathā—(rat‍nā. 2.17)
dṛṣṭiṃ ruṣā kṣipasi bhāmini! yadyapīmāṃ s‍nigdheyameṣyati tathā 'pi na rūkṣabhāvam |
tyaktvā tvarāṃ vraja tava skhalitairayaṃ hi khedaṃ karaṣyiti gururniyataṃ nitambaḥ || 75 ||
7. dhīralalitāsādhāraṇo yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.23)
sa mādhavenābhimatena sakhyā ratyā ca sāśaṅkamanuprayātaḥ |
prānteṣu saṃsaktanameruśākhaṃ sthāṇvāśramaṃ haimavataṃ jagāma || 76 ||
8. dhīralalitasādhāraṇo yathā—(rat‍nā. 2.8)
durvārāṃ madanaśaravyathāṃ vahantyā kāminyā yadabhihitaṃ puraḥ sakhīnām |
tad bhūyaḥ śiśuśukaśārikābhiruktaṃ dhanyānāṃ śravaṇapathātithitvameti || 77 ||
9. dhīralalitāsādhāraṇānukūlo yathā—(māmā. 1.39)
jagati jayinastete bhāvā navendukalādayaḥ prakṛtimadhurāḥ santyevānye mano madayanti ye |
mama tu yadiyaṃ yātā loke vilocanacandrikā nayanaviṣayaṃ janmanyekaḥ sa eva mahotsavaḥ || 78 ||
10. dhīralalitasādhāraṇānukūlo yathā—(vikra. 1.20)
eṣā mano me prasabhaṃ śarīrāt pituḥ padaṃ madhyamamutpatantī |
surāṅganā karṣati khaṇḍitāgrāt sūtraṃ mṛṇālādiva rājahaṃsī || 79 ||
11. dhīralalitāsādhāraṇadakṣiṇo yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.48)
tanmuhūrtamanumantumarhasi prastutāya niyamāya māṃ prati |
tvāṃ vinodanipuṇaḥ sakhījano valguvādini! vinodayiṣyati || 80 ||
12. dhīralalitasādhāraṇadakṣiṇo yathā—
vāco bhāmini! kiṃ tavādya paruṣāḥ subhru! bhruvorvibhramaḥ || 81 || (pṛ. 863)
13. dhīralalitāsādhāraṇaśaṭho yathā—(urāca. 1.46)
apūrvakarmacaṇḍālamayi mugdhe! vimuñca mām |
śritā 'si candana bhrāntyā durvipākaṃ viṣadrumam || 82 ||
14. dhīralalitasādhāraṇaśaṭho yathā—
dūrādeva vilokya dugdhadhavalāṃ rādhāmukhendudyutiṃ mugdhe mohini! muñca māṃ haladharasyaiṣā prabhā dṛś‍yate |
itthaṃ vyājavisarjitavrajavadhūharṣaprasannānanaḥ kṛṣṇo vāñchitasaṅgamadviguṇitapremotsavaḥ pātu vaḥ || 83 ||
15. dhīralalitāsādhāraṇadhṛṣṭo yathā—
klāmyantī yadupekṣitāsi purataḥ kāmo yadagre hataḥ kliṣṭaṃ yat tapasā vapuryadapi ca proktā vaṭucchādmanā |
tat sarvaṃ praṇatasya me 'dya dayite dākṣāyāṇi! kṣamyatā— mityuktvā caraṇābjayorvijayate luṇṭhan śivāyāḥ śivaḥ || 84 ||
16. dhīralalitasādhāraṇadhṛṣṭo yathā—(rat‍nā. 2.20)
prasīdeti brūyāmidamasati kope na ghaṭate kariṣyāmyevaṃ no punariti bhavedabhyupagamaḥ |
na me doṣo 'stīti tvamidamapi vijñāsyasi mṛṣā kimetasmin vaktuṃ kṣamamiti na vedmi priyatame! || 85 ||
17. dhīralalitānukūlottamo yathā—(vikra. 1.11)
yadṛcchayā tvaṃ sakṛdapyavandhyayoḥ pathi sthitā sundari! yasya netrayoḥ |
tvayā vinā so 'pi samutsuko bhavet sakhījanaste kimutārdrasauhṛdaḥ || 86 ||
18. dhīralalitadakṣiṇottamo yathā—
pratyagrojjhitagokulasya śayanādutsvap‍namūḍhasya mā mā gotraskhalitādupaitu ca divā rādheti bhīroriti |
rātrāvasvapato divā ca vijane lakṣmīti cābhyasyato rādhāṃ saṃsmarataḥ śriyaṃ ramayataḥ khedo hareḥ pātu vaḥ || 87 ||
19. dhīralalitaśaṭhottamo yathā—
keyaṃ mūrdh‍nyandhakāre timiramiha kutaḥ subhru! kāntenduyukte || 88 || (pṛ. 555)
20. dhīralalitadhṛṣṭottamo yathā—(rat‍nā. 4.1)
savyājaiḥ śapathaiḥ priyeṇa vacasā cittānuvṛttyā 'dhikaṃ vailakṣyeṇa pareṇa pādapatanairvākyaiḥ sakhīnāṃ punaḥ |
pratyāpattimupāgatā mayi tathā devī rudatyā yathā prakṣālyeva tayaiva bāṣpasalilaiḥ kopo 'panītaḥ svayam || 89 ||
21. dhīralalitāsādhāraṇottamo yathā—
āghūrṇad‍vapuṣaḥ skhalanmṛdugiraḥ kiñcitskhalad‌vāsaso revatyaṃsaniṣaṇṇanissahabhujasyātāmranetradyuteḥ |
śvāsāmodamadāndhaṣaṭpadakulavyālup‍takaṇṭhastrajaḥ pāyāsuḥ parimantharāṇi halino mattasya yātāni vaḥ || 90 ||
22. dhīralalitasādhāraṇottamo yathā—
kālindījalakuñjavañjulavanacchāyāniṣaṇṇātmano rādhābaddhanavānurāgarasikasyotkaṇṭhayā gāyataḥ |
tat pāyādupalaskhalajjalabhavajjhaṅkārasaṃmūrchitaṃ gītaṃ lambitakarṇatarṇakakulairākarṇय़mānaṃ hareḥ || 91 ||
23. dhīralalitāsādhāraṇānukūlottamo yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.51)
muñca kopamanimittakopane! sandhyayā praṇamito 'hamanyayā |
kiṃ na vetsi sahadharmacāriṇaṃ cakravākasamavṛttimātmanaḥ || 92 ||
24. dhīralalitasādhāraṇānukūlottamo yathā—(vikra. 1.6)
gataṃ bhayaṃ mīru! surārisambhavaṃ trilokarakṣī mahimā hi vajriṇaḥ |
tadetadunmīlaya cakṣurāyataṃ niśāvasāne nalinīva paṅkajam || 93 ||
25. dhīralalitāsādhāraṇadakṣiṇottamo yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.52)
nirmiteṃṣu pitṛṣu svayaṃbhuvā yā tanuḥ sutanu! pūrvamujjhitā |
seyamastamudayaṃ ca sevate tena mānini! mamātra gauravam || 94 ||
26. dhīralalitasādhāraṇadakṣiṇottamo yathā—(rat‍nā. 1.20)
pratyagramajjanaviśeṣaviviktamūrtiḥ kausumbharagarucirasphuradaṃśukāntā |
vibhrājase makaraketanamarcayantī bālapravālaviṭāpiprabhavā lateva || 95 ||
27. dhīralalitāsādhāraṇaśaṭhottamo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.61)
na vedmi saṃprārthitadurlabhaḥ kadā sakhībhirāstrāntaravīkṣitāmimām |
tapaḥkṛśāmabhyupapatsyate sakhīṃ vṛṣeva sītāṃ tadavagrahakṣatām || 96 ||
28. dhīralalitasādhāraṇaśaṭhottamo yathā—
nirmag‍nena mayāmbhasi smarabharāt pālī(ālī) samāliṅgitā kenālīkamidaṃ tavādya kathitaṃ rādhe! mudhā tāmyasi |
ityutsvap‍naparamparāsu śayane śrutvā giraṃ śārṅgiṇaḥ savyājaṃ śithilīkṛtaḥ kamalayā kaṇṭhagrahaḥ pātu vaḥ || 97 ||
29. dhīralalitāsādhāraṇadhṛṣṭottamo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.84)
ito gamiṣyāmyathaveti vādinī cacāla bālā stanabhīnnavalkalā |
svarūpamāsthāya ca tāṃ kṛtasmitaḥ samālalamve vṛṣarājaketanaḥ || 98 ||
30. dhīralalitasādhāraṇadhṛṣṭottamo yathā—(rat‍nā. 3.14)
ātāmratāmapanayāmi vilakṣa eṣa lākṣākṛtāṃ caraṇayostava devi! mūrdh‍nā |
kopoparāgajanitāṃ tu mukhendubimbe hartuṃ kṣamo yadi paraṃ karuṇā mayi syāt || 99 ||
31. dhīralalitānukūlamadhyayo yathā—(vesaṃ. 2.9)
kiṃ kaṇṭhe śithīlīkṛto bhujalatāpāśaḥ pramādānmayā nidrācchedavivartaṣvabhimukhaṃ nādyāpi sambhāvitā |
anyastrījanasaṅkathālaghurahaṃ svap‍ne tvayā lakṣito doṣaṃ paś‍yasi kiṃ priye! parijanopālambhayogye mayi || 100 ||
32. dhīralalitadakṣiṇamadhyamo yathā—
gacchāmyacyuta! darśanena bhavataḥ kiṃ tṛp‍tirutpadyate ? kiṃtvevaṃ vijanasthayorhatajanaḥ sambhāvayatyanyathā |
ityāmantraṇabhaṅgisūcitavṛthāvasthānakhedālasā— māśliṣyan pulakotkarāñcitatanurgopīṃ hariḥ pātu vaḥ || 101 ||
33. dhīralalitaśaṭhamadhyamo yathā—
satyānyastakarasya vāridhitaṭe saṃpaś‍yato vīrudhaḥ smṛtvā yāmunakūlakampitalatāveśmāntarakrīḍitam |
gopīnāmahaṭhopacāramadhurapremārdrabhāvaśriyā— mutkaṇṭhābharamantharaṃ madhuriporgītaṃ śivāyāstu vaḥ || 102 ||
34. dhīralalitadhṛṣṭamadhyamo yathā—
kaṇṭhe hāralatāyogye yena pāśastavārpitaḥ |
gṛhītaḥ sāparādho 'yaṃ mucyate sa kathaṃ karaḥ || 103 ||
35. dhīralalitāsādhāraṇamadhyamo yathā—(megha. 100)
śabdākhyeyaṃ yadapi kila te yaḥ sakhīnāṃ purastāt karṇe lolaḥ kathayitumabhūdānanasparśalobhāt |
so 'tikrāntaḥ śravaṇaviṣayaṃ locanābhyāmadṛś‍ya— stvāmutkaṇṭhāviracitapadaṃ manmukhenedamāha || 104 ||
36. dhīralalitasādhāraṇamadhyamo yathā—
dūre gokulanātha! gokulamitaḥ sañcāraśūnyā diśa— styaktvā māṃ dhanikādayo 'pi hi gatā māsātikhedālasāḥ |
vistīrṇā vanarājikeyamaparā 'jānāṃ puro nirgamāt khinnā 'smi pratipālayetyabhihito gopyā hariḥ pātu vaḥ || 105 ||1
37. dhīralalitāsādhāraṇānukūlamadhyamo yathā—(māmā. 8.2)
niś‍cyotante sutanu! kabarībindavo yāvadete yāvanmadhyaḥ stanamukulayornārdrabhāvaṃ jahāti |
yāvat sāndrapratanupulakodbhedavatyaṅgayaṣṭi— stāvad gāḍhaṃ vitara sakṛdapyaṅgapālīṃ prasīda || 106 ||
38. dhīralalitasādhāraṇānukūlamadhyamo yathā—(vesaṃ. 1.2)
kālindyāḥ pulineṣu kelikupitāmutsṛjya rāse rasaṃ gacchantīmanugacchato 'śrukaluṣāṃ kaṃsadviṣo rādhikām |
tatpādapratimāniveśitapadasyodbha‍ūtaromodgate— rakṣuṇṇo 'nunayaḥ prasannadayitādṛṣṭasya puṣṇātu vaḥ || 107 ||
39. dhīralalitāsādhāraṇadakṣiṇamadhyamo yathā—
vrīḍāyogānnatavadanayā sannidhāne gurūṇāṃ vaddhotkamprastanakalaśayormanyumantarniyamya |
tiṣṭhetyuktaṃ kimiva na tayā yat samutsṛjya bāṣpaṃ mayyāsaktaścakitahariṇīhārinetratribhāgaḥ || 108 ||
1. śrīkṛṣṇo gā iva mahiṣīrapyajāś‍cāpi cārayati smeti śrībhāgavatāt prasiddham |
40. dhīralalitasādhāraṇadakṣiṇamadhyamo yathā—
s‍nātā tiṣṭhati kuntaleśvarasutā, vāro 'ṅgarājasvasu— rdyūte rātririyaṃ jitā kamalayā, devī prasādyā 'dya ca |
ityantaḥpurasundarīḥ prati mayā vijñāya vijñāpite devenāpratipattimūḍhamanasā dvitrāḥ sthitaṃ nāḍikāḥ || 109 ||
41. dhīralalitāsādhāraṇaśaṭhamadhyamo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.58)
yadā budhaiḥ sarvagatastvamucyase na vetsi bhāvasthāmimaṃ kathaṃ janam |
iti svahastālikhiśca mugdhayā rahasyupālabhyata candraśekharaḥ || 110 ||
42. dhīralalitasādhāraṇaśaṭhamadhyamo yathā—(amaru. 19)
dṛṣṭvaikāsanasaṃsthite priyatame paścādupetyādarā— dekasyā nayane nimīlya vihitakrīḍānubandhacchalaḥ |
īṣadvartitakandharaḥ sapulakasvedollasanmānasā— mantarhāsalasatkapolaphalakāṃ dhūrto 'parāṃ cumbati || 111 ||
43. dhīralalitāsādhāraṇadhṛṣṭamadhyamo yathā—(sūmu. 23)
prasāde vartasva, prakaṭaya mudaṃ, saṃhara ruṣaṃ priye! śuṣyatyaṅgānyamṛtamiva te siñcatu vacaḥ |
nidhānaṃ saukhyānāṃ kṣaṇamabhimukhaṃ sthāpaya mukhaṃ na mugdhe! pratyetuṃ prabhavati gataḥ kālahariṇaḥ || 112 ||
44. dhīralalitasādhāraṇadhṛṣṭamadhyamo yathā—
ādhātuṃ vinayaṃ nirāgasi jane kupyantu nāmeśvarā— stena smāraya/svāśaya śuddhireva suvacā prāyaḥ prabhūṇāṃ puraḥ |
mithyā mānini! manyase yadi tadā nityaṃ manovartinī vācyā tāmarasākṣi! sākṣipadake kā vā tvadanyā mayā || 113 ||
(dhīrapraśāntaḥ—8)
dhīrapraśānto 'pi dhīrodāttavadaṣṭadhaiva | tasya tu dhīrapraśāntānukūlapratibhedā yadyapi vidyante; tathāpi sattvātirekādagāḍhasambhogatvena nopalakṣyante | tathā hyetad‌viṣaye subhāṣitānītthamadhyagīṣmahi—
tat pāṇḍityaṃ na patati punaryena saṃsāracakre sā sanmaitrī na calati punaryā sukhe cāsukhe ca |
sambhogāste ma/ra—tiṣu viduṣāṃ ye na vācyāḥ pareṣāṃ taccaiśvaryaṃ jagati mahatāṃ yat pareṣāṃ sukhāya || 114 ||
puruṣārthāntare punarasya dhīrodāttādibhyo 'pi mahān viśeṣa iva labhyate | tadyathā—
kimapyahiṃsyastava cenmato 'haṃ yaśaśśarīre bhava me dayāluḥ |
ekāntāvidhvaṃsiṣu mad‌vidhānāṃ piṇḍeṣvanāsthā khalu bhautikeṣu || (raghu. 2.57)
yathā vā—(kirātā. 2.30)
sahasā vidadhīta na kriyāmāvivekaḥ paramāpadāṃ padam |
vṛṇate hi vimṛś‍yakāriṇaṃ guṇalubdhāḥ svayameva sampadaḥ || 116 ||
athaiṣāmapi mithassaṃsargabhedā bhavanti | te tu yadyapi bahutvāt saṃkhyātumaśakyāstathāpi leśataḥ kathyante | teṣu —
dhīrodāttapraśānto yathā—
atithibhirgatameva gṛhāgatairapathikāgamanā ca niśīthinī |
tadadhunā pratijāgṛhi putrakān praviśa veś‍ma kuṭumbini! śemahe || 117 ||
dhīroddhatapraśānto yathā—(bārā. 2.63)
atithirasi kimanyad devadevo guruste vayamapi ca sadārāḥ sāg‍nayo 'smin vasāmaḥ |
tadanu/pasara gṛhānnastvaṃ bhṛgoḥ putrabhāṇḍaṃ vaṭupariṣadabhīṣṭāssantvanadhyāyaceṣṭāḥ || 118 ||
dhīrapraśāntamadhyamo yathā—
viṣayapatiralubdho dhenubhirdhāma pūtaṃ katicidabhimatāyāṃ sīm‍ni sīrā vahanti |
śithilayati na bhāryā cātitheyīṃ saparyāmiti sukṛtamanena vyañjitaṃ naḥ phalena || 119 ||
dhīralalitakaniṣṭho yathā—
śataṃ vārānuktaḥ priyasakhi! vacobhiḥ suparuṣaiḥ sahastraṃ nirdhūtaḥ padanipatitaḥ pārṣṇihatibhiḥ |
kiyatkṛtvo baddhāḥ punariha na vedmi bhrukuṭaya— stathā 'pi kliṣṭātmā kṣaṇamapi na dhṛṣṭo viramati || 120 ||
evamanye 'pi vijñeyā bhedāḥ saṃbhedato mithaḥ |
caturṇāmapi lakṣyeṣu nāyakānāṃ manīṣibhiḥ || 121 ||
dhīrodāttādibhedena caturaścaturo 'pi ca |
catuśśatavidhāvan vetti nāyakān sa kaviḥ kaviḥ || 122 ||
parigrahapravṛttibhyāṃ guṇaprakṛtiyogataḥ |
cāturvidhyācca dhairyasya nāyakatvaṃ niyamyate || 123 ||
iti nigadita eṣa nāyakānāmasadṛśabhaṅgimanoharaḥ prapañcaḥ |
nijanijapaṭubhaṅgimaṅganānāṃ bahubidhabhedavatīmato 'bhidhāsye || 124 ||1
(2. nāyikāḥ)
tatra nāyikā api catastraḥ svakīyā, parakīyā, punarbhūḥ, sāmānyā ca | tatra svakīyā yathā—
atithibhirgatameva gṛhāgataiḥ॰ (pṛ. 879)
parakīyā yathā—(raghu. 16.8)
kā tvaṃ śubhe! kasya parigraho vā kiṃ vā madabhyāgamakāraṇaṃ te |
ācakṣva matvā vaśināṃ raghūṇāṃ manaḥ parastrīvimukhapravṛtti || 125 ||
punarbhūryathā—(māgha. 16.81)
yāmūḍhavānūḍhavarāhamūrtirmuhūrtamādau puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ |
tenohyate sāmpratamakṣataiva kṣatāriṇā samyagasau punarbhūḥ || 126 ||
sāmānyā yathā—
madodayāndolitatāmralocanāḥ surāṅgānāstūrṇamito 'pasarpata |
iyaṃ punaścitraśikhaṇḍimaṇḍalī k‍va paṇyanāryaḥ? k‍va ca nāma tāpasāḥ? || 127 ||
tatra svakīyā parakīyā ca uttamā, madhyamā, kaniṣṭhā, ụ̄dhā, anụ̄dhā, dhīrā, adhīrā, mugdhā, madhyā, pragalbhā ca |
uttamā yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.49)
sarvopamādravyasamuccayena yathāprade/veśaṃ viniveśitena |
sā nirmitā viśvasṛjā prayat‍nādekatra saundaryadidṛkṣayeva || 128 ||
1. 'iti mahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevakṛtau śrṛṅgāraprakāśe ratyālambanaprakāśano nāma pañcadaśaḥ prakāśaḥ || 15 ||' iti tvatra yojayitumucitam |
madhyamā yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.325)
na devakanyakā nāpi gandharvakulasambhavā |
tathā 'pyeṣā manobhaṅgaṃ vidhātuṃ vedhaso 'pyalam || 129 ||
kaniṣṭhā yathā—(gāsa. 2.19)
ajja kaïmo hu diaho vāhavahū rūvajovvaṇummattā |
sohaggaṃ dhaṇuruṃpacchaleṇa racchāsu vikkhiraï || 130 ||
(adya katamo 'pi divaso vyādhavadhū rūpayauvanonmattā |
saubhāgyaṃ dhanustaṣṭatvakchalena rathyāsu vikirati ||)
ụ̄dhā yathā—(kusaṃ. 7.95)
navapariṇayalajjābhūṣaṇāṃ tatra gaurīṃ vadanamapaharantīmabjasaṅkāśamīśaḥ |
api śayanasakhībhyo dattavācaṃ kathaṃcit prathamamukhavikāsairhāsayāmāsa gūḍham || 131 ||
anụ̄dhā yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.50)
tāṃ nāradaḥ kāmacaraḥ kadācit kanyāṃ kila prekṣya pituḥ samīpe |
samādideśaukavadhūṃ bhavitrīṃ premṇā śarīrārdhaharāṃ harasya || 132 ||
dhīrā yathā—(māmā. 6.6)
iyamavayavaiḥ pāṇḍukṣāmairalaṅkṛtamaṇḍanā kalitakusumā vallīvāntarlatā pariśoṣiṇī |
vahati ca varārohā ramyāṃ vivāhamahotsava— śriyamudayinīmatyarthaṃ ca vyanakti manorujam || 133 ||
adhīrā yathā—
jhijjaṃti valaṃti samūsasaṃti sijjaṃti kaṃṭaïjjaṃti |
aṃgāi tassa purao ṇa āṇimo kaha hu vijjaṃti || 134 ||
(jīryante valanti samucchvasanti svidyanti kaṇṭakīyanti |
aṅgāni tasya purato na jānīmaḥ kathaṃ khalu vidyante ||)
﻿
mugdhā yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.143)
mānayogyāṃ karomīti priyasthāne kṛtāṃ sakhīm |
bālā bhrūbhaṅgajihmākṣī paś‍yati sphuritādharā || 135 ||
madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 9.81)
daṃtakkhaaṃ kaole kaaggahuvvelliaṃ ca dhammillaṃ |
ṇiddālasaṃ ca diṭṭhiṃ, bahueĕ bahumaṇṇaï aṇaṃgo || 136 ||
(dantakṣataṃ kapole kacagrahodvellitaṃ ca dhammillam |
nidrālasāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ vadhvā bahumanyate anaṅgaḥ ||)
pragalbhā yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.261)
kadā nau saṅgamo bhāvītyākīrṇe vaktumakṣamam |
avetya kāntamabalā līlāpadmaṃ nyamīlayat || 137 ||
punarbhūrakṣatā, kṣatā, yātāyātā yāyāvarā ca |
akṣatā yathā—
avāp‍takanyātulayā satyavatyā samāgataḥ |
vimuktacintayā reje rājā rājīvalocanaḥ || 138 ||
kṣatā yathā—
mayena nirmitāṃ laṅkāṃ labdhvā mandodarīmapi |
reme mūrto daśāgrīvalakṣmīmiva vibhīṣaṇaḥ || 139 ||
yātāyātā yathā—
sāvajñāḥ patipādayordhṛtaguruvrīḍā gurūṇāṃ tatau ? sonmāthā mamatāmukhe sthita/smita—kṛtāvajñā sakhīsaṃsadi |
śakrābhyarthanayā kathañcana punaḥ pratyāgatāyā gṛhe tārāyāstaralaṃ skhalanti gagane garbhālasā dṛṣṭayaḥ || 140 ||
yāyāvarā yathā—
krameṇa sadbhartṛcatuṣṭayāditi prasūya sā 'ṣṭau tanayāṃstanūdarī |
darīṣu vindhyādrivarasya mādhavī mahat tapastap‍tumathopacakrame || 141 ||
﻿
sāmānyā ụ̄dhā, anụ̄dhā, svayaṃvarā, svairiṇī, veśyā ca |
ụ̄dhā yathā—(kirātā. 3.36)
tuṣāraleśākulitotpalābhe paryaśruṇī maṅgalabhaṅgabhīruḥ |
agūḍhabhāvā 'pi vilokane sā na locane mīlayituṃ viṣehe || 142 ||
anụ̄dhā yathā—(mavīca. 1.30)
kanyārat‍namayonijanma bhavatāmāste vayaṃ cārthino rat‍naṃ yat k‍vacidasti tat pariṇamatyasmāsu śakrādapi |
kanyāyāśca parārthataiva hi matā, tasyāḥ pradānādahaṃ bandhurvo bhavitā, pulastyapulahapraṣṭhāśca sambandhinaḥ || 143 ||
svayaṃvarā yathā—(raghu. 6.67)
sañcāriṇī dīpaśikheva rātrau yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃvarā sā |
narendramārgāṭṭa iva prapede vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ || 144 ||
svairiṇī yathā—(sūmu. 10)
ādye jagmuṣi tāmracūḍarahi/site śrotraṃ prabuddhā darāt/javāt kiñcid vāsavadiṅmukhaṃ pravikasad dṛṣṭvā gavākṣādhvanā |
santrāsena samīritā priyatamapremṇā niruddhā śanai— rutthānopaniveśanāni kurute kalpe/talpe muhuḥ svairiṇī || 145 ||
veśyā tu gaṇikā, vilāsinī rūpājīvā ca |
gaṇikā yathā—
tatajātiṣu tumbururgarurgurukalpaḥ suṣireṣu nāradaḥ |
vitateṣu viśeṣahetavo mama viśvāvasupādapāṃsavaḥ || 146 ||
vilāsinī yathā—(megha. 35)
pādanyāsak‍vaṇitaśanāstatra līlāvadhūtaiḥ rat‍nacchāyākhacitavalibhiścāmaraiḥ klāntahastāḥ |
veśyāstvatto nakhapadasukhān prāpya varṣāgrabindū— nāmokṣyanti tvayi madhukaraśreṇidīrghān kaṭākṣān || 147 ||
﻿
rūpājīvā yathā—(kuṭṭanī. 44)
ayameva dahyamānasmaranirgatadhūmavartikākāraḥ |
cikurabharastava sundari ! kāmijanaṃ kiṅkarīkurute || 148 ||
(1. svakīyā)
atha svakīyānāmuttamādibhede vyatikaraprastāre tricatvāriṃśacchatam | tatra— svakīyā uttamā yathā—(śāku. 1.17)
sarasijamanuviddhaṃ śaivalenāpi ramyaṃ malinamapi himāṃśorlakṣma lakṣmīṃ tanoti |
iyamadhikamanojñā valkalenāpi tanvī kimiva hi madhurāṇāṃ maṇḍanaṃ nākṛtīnām || 149 ||
uttamā dhīrā yathā—(gāsa. 1.88)
jāṇaï jāṇāveuṃ aṇuṇaa—viddavia—māṇaparisesaṃ |
païrik‍kammi vi viṇaāvalaṃbaṇaṃ sa c‍cia kuṇaṃtī || 150 ||
(jānāti jñāpayitumanunayavidrāvitamānapariśeṣam |
parikrame 'pi vinayāvalambanaṃ satyamiva kurvatī ||)
uttamā 'dhīrā yathā—(gāsa. 4.23)
piadaṃsaṇa—suharasamaüliāiṁ jaï se ṇa hoṃti acchīiṃ |
tā keṇa kaṇṇaraïaṃ lakkhijjaï kuvalaaṃ tissā || 151 ||
(priyadarśanasukharasamukulite yadi tasyā na bhavato akṣiṇīṃ |
tadā kena karṇaracitaṃ lakṣyate kuvalayaṃ tasyāḥ ||)
uttamā ụ̄dhā yathā—(raghu. 7.25)
nitambagurvī guruṇā prayuktā vadhūrvidhātṛpratimena tena |
cakāra sā mattacakoranetrā lajjāvatī lājavisargamag‍nau || 152 ||
uttamānụ̄dhā yathā—(śāku. 2.10)
anāghrātaṃ puṣpaṃ kisalayamalūnaṃ kararuhai— ranāviddhaṃ rat‍naṃ madhu navamanāsvāditarasam |
akhaṇḍaṃ puṇyānāṃ phalamapi/miva ca tadrūpamanaghaṃ na jāne bhoktāraṃ kamiha samupasthāsyati vidhiḥ || 153 ||
﻿
uttamā dhīrọdhā yathā—(caupa. 11)
adyāpi tanmanasi saṃparivartate me rātrau mayi kṣutavati kṣitipālaputryā |
jīveti maṅgalavidhiṃ parihṛtya kopāt karṇe kṛtaṃ kanakapatramanālapantyā || 154 ||
uttamā dhīrānụ̄dhā yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.1)
atha viśvātmane gaurī sandideśa mithaḥ sakhīm |
dātā me bhūbhṛtāṃ nāthaḥ pramāṇīkriyatāmiti || 155 ||
uttamā 'dhīrọdhā yathā—
sasvedaromāñcitakampitāṅgī jātā priyasparśasukhena vatsā |
marunnavāmbhaḥpravidhūtasiktā kadambayaṣṭiḥ sphuṭakorakeva || 156 ||
uttamā 'dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—(māmā. 1.29)
atrāntare kimapi vāgvibhavātivṛttavaicitryamullasitavibhramamutpalakṣyāḥ |
tad bhūrisāttvikavikāramapāstadhairyamācāryakaṃ kimapi mānmatha़/?/māvirāsīt || 157 ||
uttamā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 7.78)
muddhe apattiaṃtī, pavāla—aṃkuraa—vaṇṇa—lohiae |
ṇiddhoa—dhāurāe kīsa sahatthe puṇo dhuasi || 158 ||
(mugdhe ! apratyayantī pravālāṅkurasavarṇalohitau |
nirdhautadhāturāgau kasmāt svahastau punardhāvayasi ||)
uttamādhīrā mugdhā yathā—(jāha. 10.50)
dvitrāṇyatha rathād bhūmau padānyādhāya nissahā |
yeyamatra kiyad dūramiti papraccha maithilī || 159 ||
uttamā dhīrā mugdhā yathā—(vajjāla. pṛ.379)
kaïā gao pio ajja putti ! ajjeṇa kaï diṇā hoṃti ? |
ekko, eddahametto bhaṇiuṃ mohaṃ gaā bālā || 160 ||
{kadā gataḥ priyaḥ ? adya putri ! adyeti kati dināni bhavanti ? |
ekaḥ, etāvanmātre bhaṇite mohaṃ gatā bālā ||}
uttamā ụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 1.15)
kiṃ kiṃ de paḍihāsaï ? sahīhiṃ haa pucchiāeṁ muddhāe |
paḍhamuggaa—dohaliṇīe ṇavaraṃ daïaṃ gaā diṭṭhī || 161 ||
﻿
(kiṃ kiṃ te pratibhāsate ? sakhībhiriti pṛṣ‍ṭāyā mugdhāyāḥ |
prathamodgatadohadinyāḥ kevalaṃ dayitaṃ gatā dṛṣṭiḥ ||)
uttamā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
jāva ṇa uṭṭhaṃti vācia/valia—thaṇaā se duddhagaṃdhiamuhīe |
tāva c‍cia thutthukkāriāi maaṇeṇa aṃgāi || 162 ||
(yāvanna uttiṣṭhataḥ valita/pīna—stanau dugdhagandhimukhyāḥ |
tāvadeva 1thūthū—kṛtāni madanena aṅgāni ||)
uttamā dhīrọdhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa.7.47)
pucchijjaṃtī ṇa bhaṇaï gahiā pipphuraï cuṃbiā ruaï |
tuṇhikkā ṇavavahuā kaāvarāheṇa daïeṇa uvaụ̄dhā || 163 ||
(pṛcchyamānā na bhaṇati, gṛhītā prasphurati, cumbitā roditi |
tūṣṇīkā navavadhūḥ kṛtāparādhena dayitenopagụ̄dhā ||)
uttamā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
taha muddhāe pulāio piavaro pakkhumeṇae/vasumelae kaha vi |
jaha se paḍhamaṃ hiae pacchā hatthammi vi valaggo || 164 ||
(tathā mugdhayā pralokitaḥ priyavaraḥ pakṣmaṇaikenāpi |
yathā tasya prathamaṃ hṛdaye paścāt haste 'pi vilag‍nā ||)
uttamā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
bālattaṇadullaliāe ajja aṇajjaṃ kaaṃ ṇavavahūe |
bhāāmi ghare eāiṇi tti ṇiṃto paī ruddho || 165 ||
(bālatvadurlalitayā 'dya anāryaṃ kṛtaṃ navavadhvā |
bibhemi gṛhe ekākinīti niryan patī ruddhaḥ ||)
uttamā adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—(dra. chāyā pariśiṣṭa—4)
ṇisuṇaï ahomuhaṃ taṃsa—valia—seāsaaṃta—gaṃḍaalā |
hiaïcchia—vara—vārejja—haaha(?) saṃkittaṇaṃ kumārī || 166 ||
uttamā madhyā yathā—
aṃtaraaṃti samuṇṇaa—paoharā piaamāe muhaaṃdaṃ |
mā raïviāsiṇī cia kamalacchāā visaṃvaaï || 167 ||
﻿
(antarayataḥ samunnatayayodharau priyatamāyā mukhacandram |
mā ravivikāsinyeva kamalacchāyā visamvadati ||)
uttamā dhīrā madhyamā yathā—(amaru.)
durādutsukamāgate vivalitaṃ, saṃbhāṣiṇi sphāritaṃ, saṃśliṣyatyaruṇaṃ, gṛhītavasane kopāñcitabhrūlatam |
māninyāścaraṇānativyatikare bāṣpāmbupūrekṣaṇāt cakṣurjātamaho prapañcacaturaṃ jātāgasi preyasi || 168 ||
uttamā dhīrā madhyamā yathā—
ātaṅkaśramasādhvasavyatikarotkampaḥ kathaṃ sahyatām || 169 || (pṛ.834)
uttamā ụ̄dhā madhyamāṃ yathā—
kaha mā jhijjaü majjho imāeĕ kaṃdoṭṭadalasaricchehiṃ |
ṇaaṇehiṃ jo ṇa dīsaï ghaṇa—thaṇa—hara—ruddha—pasarehiṃ || 170 ||
(kathaṃ mā kṣīyatāṃ madhyo 'syāḥ kuvalayadalasadṛkṣābha़yā/?/m |
nayanābhyāṃ yo na dṛś‍yate ghanastanabhararuddhaprasarābhyām ||)
uttamā anụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—(māmā. 4.8)
tanme manaḥ kṣipati yat sarasaprahāramālokya māmagaṇitaskhaladuttarīyā |
trastaikahāyanakuraṅgaviloladṛṣṭirāśliṣṭavatyamṛtasaṃvalitairivāṅgaiḥ || 171 ||
uttamā dhīrọdhā madhyā yathā—
niś‍cyotante sutanu ! kabarībindavo yāvadete || 172 || (877)
uttamā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—(māmā. 2.2)
jvalatu gagane rātrau rātrāvakhaṇḍakalaḥ śaśī dahatu madanaḥ kiṃ vā mṛtyoḥ pareṇa vidhāsyataḥ |
mama tu dayitastātaḥ ślāghyo jananyamalānvayā kulamamalinaṃ na tvevāyaṃ jano na ca jīvitam || 173 ||
uttamā adhīrọdhā madhyā yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.5)
evamāli ! nigṛhītasādhvasaṃ śaṅkaro rahasi sevyatāmiti |
sā sakhībhirupadiṣṭamākulā nāsmarat pramukhavartini priye || 174 ||
﻿
uttamā 'dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa 3.78)
seacchaleṇa pecchaha taṇue aṃgammi se amāaṃtaṃ |
lāvaṇṇaṃ osaraï vva tivali—sovāṇa—paṃtīe || 175 ||
(svedacchalena prekṣadhvaṃ tanuke 'ṅge tasyā amāt |
lāvaṇyamapasaratīva trivalīsopānapaṅktibhiḥ ||)
uttamā pragalbhā yathā—
ṇihuaṃ khu ṇīsasijjaï ruvvaï rāīsu taṃ pi ṇīsad‍daṃ |
vahuā païmmi kaāvarāhe hiaïcchiāṇiṇhuvijjaṃti || 176 ||
(nibhṛtaṃ khalu niḥśvasyate rudyate rātriṣu tadapi niśśabdam |
patyau kṛtāparādhe hṛdayepsitāni hnūyante ||)
uttamā dhīrā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 1.48)
aṇṇadaïā/mahilāpasaṃgaṃ de deva karesu amha daïassa |
purisā ek‍kaṃta—rasā ṇa hu dosa—guṇe viāṇaṃti || 177 ||
(anyadayitā/mahilā—prasaṅgaṃ he deva ! kurvasmākaṃ dayitasya |
puruṣā ekāntarasā na khalu doṣaguṇau vijānanti ||)
uttamā 'dhīrā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 2.47)
ṇa muaṃti dīhasāsaṃ ṇa ruaṃti ciraṃ, ṇa hoṃti kisiāo |
dhaṇṇāo tāo jāṇaṃ bahuvallaha vallaho ṇa tumaṃ || 178 ||
(na muñcanti dīrghaśvāsaṃ na rudanti ciraṃ na bhavanti kṛśāḥ |
dhanyāstā yāsāṃ bahuvallabha ! vallabho na tvam ||)
uttamā ụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 1.23)
āṇāsaāiṁ deṃtī taha surae harisa—viasia—kavolā |
gose vi oṇaa—muhī, aha setti piaṃ ṇa saddahimo || 179 ||
(ājñāśatāni dadatī tathā surate harṣavikasitakapolā |
prātarapyavanatamukhī iyaṃ seti priyāṃ na śraddadhmaḥ ||)
uttamā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(kusaṃ. 7.19)
patyuḥ śiraścandrakalāmanena spṛśeti sakhyā parihāsapūrvam |
sā rañjayitvā caraṇau kṛtāśīrmālyena tāṃ nirvacanaṃ jaghāna || 180 ||
﻿
uttamā dhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—(rat‍nā. 2.21)
bhrūbhede sahasodgate 'pi vadanaṃ nītaṃ parāṃ namratā— mīṣanmāṃ prati bhedakāri hasitaṃ noktaṃ vaco niṣṭhuram |
antarbāṣpajaḍīkṛtaṃ prabhutayā cakṣurna visphāritaṃ kopaśca prakaṭīkṛto dayitayā muktaśca na praśrayaḥ || 181 ||
uttamā dhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.83)
nirvāyatāmāli ! kimapyayaṃ vaṭuḥ punarvivakṣuḥ sphuritottarādharaḥ |
na kevalaṃ yo mahatāṃ vibhāṣate śṛṇoti tasmādapi yaḥ sa pāpabhāk || 182 ||
uttamā 'dhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—(amaru. 75)
kathamapi kṛtapratyāsaktau priye skhalitottare virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaṃ prakalpitamaśrutam |
asahanasakhīśrotraprāp‍tipramādasasaṃbhramaṃ vivalitadṛśā śūnye gehe samucchavasitaṃ tataḥ || 183 ||
uttamā 'dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(śāku. 3.7)
kṣāmakṣāmakapolamānanamuraḥ kāṭhinyamuktastanaṃ madhyaḥ klāntataraḥ prakāmavinatāvaṃsau chaviḥ pāṇḍurā |
śocyā ca priyadarśanā ca madanakliṣṭeyamālakṣyate patrāṇāmiva śoṣaṇena marutā spṛṣṭā latā mādhavī || 184 ||
madhyamā yathā—
nīlendīvaraśaṅkayā nayanayorbandhūkabuddha‍yā 'dhare pāṇau padmadhiyā madhūkakusumabhrāntyā tathā gaṇḍayoḥ |
līyante kabarīṣu bāndhavakulavyāmohajātaspṛhā durvārā madhupāḥ; kiyanti taruṇa ! sthānāni rakṣiṣyasi ? || 185 ||
madhyamā dhīrā yathā—(amaru. 81)
kapole patrālīkaratalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto niḥśvāsairayamamṛtahṛdyo 'dhararasaḥ |
muhuḥ kaṇṭhe lag‍nastaralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭīṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam || 186 ||
﻿
madhyamā adhīrā yathā—(gāsa. 3.22)
pia—saṃbharaṇa—paloṭṭaṃta—vāha—dhāra—ṇivāa—bhīāe |
dijjaï vaṃkaggīvāe dīvao pahia—jāāe || 187 ||
(priyasaṃsmaraṇapraluṭhad‍bāṣpadhārānipātabhītayā |
dīyate vakragrīvayā dīpakaḥ pathikajāyayā ||)
madhyamọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 1.13)
ghariṇīeṁ mahāṇasa—kamma—lagga—masimalii/maïlieṇa hattheṇa |
chittaṃ muhaṃ hasijjaï, caṃdāvatthaṃ gaaṃ païṇā || 188 ||
(gṛhiṇyā mahānasakarmalag‍namasīmalinetena/nena hastena |
spṛṣṭaṃ mukhaṃ hasyate candrāvasthaṃ gataṃ patyā ||)
madhyamā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—(gāsa. 6.75)
kassa karo bahupuṇṇapphalekkataruṇo tuhaṃ visammihaï |
thaṇapariṇāhe vammahaṇihāṇakalase vva pāroho || 189 ||
(kasya karo bahupuṇyaphalaikatarostava viśramiṣyati |
stanapariṇāhe manmathanidhānakalaśa iva prarohaḥ ||)
madhyamā dhīrọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 4. 84)
pisaa pie ! kā kuviā suaṇu ! tumaṃ paraaṇammi ko kovo |
kā hu paro ṇāha ! tumaṃ kīsa appuṇṇāṇa me sattī || 190 ||
(prasīda priye ! kā kupitā sutanu ! tvaṃ parajane kaḥ kopaḥ |
kaḥ khalu paro, nātha ! tvaṃ kimityapuṇyānāṃ me śaktiḥ ||)
madhyamā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—(rat‍nā 2.1)
dullahajaṇāṇurāo, lajjā guruī paravvaso appā |
piasahi ! visamaṃ pemmaṃ, maraṇaṃ saraṇaṃ ṇavaramekkaṃ || 191 ||
(durlabhajanānurāgaḥ lajjā gurvī paravaśa ātmā |
prayasakhi ! viṣamaṃ prema maraṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ kevalamekam ||)
madhyamā adhīrọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 1.74)
diḍhamaṇṇudūmiāeṁ vi gahio daïammi pecchaha imāe |
osaraï vāluāmuṭhṭhiu vva māṇo surasuraṃto || 192 ||
﻿
(dṛḍhamanyudūtanayā 'pi gṛhīto dayite paś‍yatānayā| apasarati vālukāmuṣṭiriva mānaḥ surasurāyamāṇaḥ||)
madhyamā adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—(līlāvatī 423)
tassa maalaṃchaṇassa va karaphaṃsasamuggaeṇa seeṇa| sasimaṇighaḍiā vāollia vva vārīmaī jāā|| 193||
(tasya mṛgalāñchanasyeva karaspaऱśasamudratena svedena| śaśimaṇighaṭitā puttalikeva vārimayī jātā||)
madhyamā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 4. 7)
hatthesu a pāesu a aṃguligaṇaṇāe vavagaā/aïgaā diahā| eṇhiṃ uṇa keṇa gaṇijjaü tti bhaṇiuṃ mohaṃ gaā/ruaï muddhā|| 194||
(hastayośca pādayoścāṅgūligaṇanayā vyapagatā divasāḥ| idānīṃ punaḥ kena gaṇyatāmiti bhaṇitvā mohaṃ gatā/roditi mugdhā||)
madhyamā dhīrā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 2. 70)
jhaṃjhāvāuttiṇṇiagharavivara/paloṭṭha—salila—dhārāhiṃ| kuḍu—lihiohi—diahaṃ rakkhaï muddhā/ajjā karaalehiṃ|| 195||
(jhañjhāvātottṛṇīkṛtagṛhavivaraprapatat(?)—saliladhārābhiḥ| ku़ḍyalikhitāvadhidivasaṃ rakṣati mugdhā/āryā karatalaiḥ||)
madhyamā 'dhīrā muga़dhā yathā—
keligottakkhalie/kkhalaṇe varassa papphullaïṃ(?) dihiṃ dei| bahu—vāsaa—vāsahare vahue vāholliā diṭṭhī|| 196||
(keligotraskhalite/skhalane varasya praphullāṃ dhṛtiṃ dadāti| bahuvāsakavāsagṛhe vadhvā bāṣpāndritā dṛṣṭiḥ||)
madhyamọdhā mugdhā yathā—(5. 16, dra. 27. 15)
vāhittā paḍivaaṇaṃ ṇa dei, rūsei ekkamekkassa| valii paricuṃviā taha vi haraï hiaaṃ ṇavaraṃ sā|| 197||
(vyāhṛtā prativacanaṃ na dadāti ruṣyatyekaikasya| asatī kāryeṇa vinā pradīpyamāne nadī—kacche||) ﻿
madhyamā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.52)
mā ṇaṃ pucchaha diṇṇā, jassa tumaṃ so pio tti sahiāo |
siṭ‌ṭhaṃ cia ghaṇapulaehiṃ hoṃtavahūeṁ aṃgehiṃ || 118 ||
(mainaṃ pṛcchata dattā yasya tvaṃ sa priya iti sakhyaḥ |
śiṣṭameva ghanapulakairbhaviṣyadvadhvā aṅgaiḥ ||)
madhyamā dhīrọdhā mugdhā yathā—(HOS saṃskaraṇe gātheyaṃ nāsti)
cuṃbaṇabiliaṇamille sīso appa ṇa viiṇṇapaḍiveaṇeṇa |
. . . . pavahu kaïomocchīsī païṇo rāvaaṃ maüṇī || 199 ||
madhyamā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
hiaa—daïammi vi pie gurupurao lajjiāe muddhāe |
sahi savvo araghaḍio/ṭhṭhio vi hoi viralaṃgulī hattho || 200 ||
(hṛdayadayite 'pi gurupurata īpsitāyā mugdhāyāḥ |
sakhi! sarvo 'dharaghaṭito 'pi/sthito 'pi bhavati viralāṅgulirhastaḥ ||)
madhyamā 'dhīrọdhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.52)
kaṃḍujjuā varāī ajja tae sā kaāvarāheṇa |
alasāia—ruṇṇa—viaṃbhiāi diaheṇa sikhkhaviā || 201 ||
(kāṇḍarjukā varākī adya tvayā sā kṛtāparādhena |
alasāyitaruditavijṛmbhitāni divasena śikṣitā ||)
madhyamā 'dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
vara—phaṃsa—muuliacchī siṇṇūsaliahiṃ bāhulaïāhiṃ |
lajjālasā kilammaï muddhavahū guruaṇasamakkhaṃ || 202 ||
(varasparśamukulitākṣī khinnaromāñcitābhyāṃ bāhulatikābhyām |
lajjālasā kilamyati mugdhavadhūrgurujanasamakṣam ||)
madhyamā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 2.50)
ajjāe ṇavaṇahakkhaa—ṇirikkhaṇe gurua—jovvaṇuttuṃgaṃ |
paḍimāgaa—ṇia—ṇaaṇuppalacciaṃ hoi thaṇavaṭhṭhaṃ || 203 ||
(āryāyā navanakhakṣitanirīkṣaṇe gurukayauvanottuṅgam |
pratimāgatanijanayanotpalārcitaṃ bhavati stanapṛṣṭham ||)
﻿
madhyamā dhīrā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 4.27)
iṃsaṃ jaṇeṃti vaḍ‌̣dheṃti vammahaṃ vippiaṃ sahāveṃti |
virahe ṇa deṃti mariuṃ aho guṇā tassa bahumaggā || 204 ||
(īrṣyāṃ janayanti vardhayanti manmathaṃ vipriyaṃ sāhayanti |
virahe na dadati martumaho guṇāstasya bahumārgāḥ ||)
madhyamā adhīramadhyā yathā—(gauḍavaho 690, gāsa. 933)
uvvahaï daïa-gahiāharoṭhṭha-jhijjaṃta-rosa-paḍirāaṃ |
pāṇosaraṃtamaïraṃ va paḍihacasaaṃ muhaṃ bālā || 205 ||
(udvahati dayitagṛhītādharoṣṭhakṣīyamāṇaroṣapratirāgam |
pānāpasaranmadiramiva sphaṭikacaṣakaṃ mukhaṃ bālā ||)
madhyamọdhā madhyā yathā—
ṇiddālasa—parighummira—taṃsavalaṃtaddha—tāraolāo |
kāmasya vi duvvisahā diṭhṭhiṇivāā sasimuhīe || 206 ||
(nidrālasaparighūrṇanaśīlatryaśravaladardhatārakālokāḥ |
kāmasyāpi durviṣahā dṛṣṭinipātāḥ śaśimukhyāḥ ||)
madhyamā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—(līlāvatī 489)
taṃ siddhakumāraṃ pecchiūṇa eehi sahi ! aṇajjehiṃ |
aviṇaamaggaṃ haa—loaṇehiṃ ṇīahmi, kiṃ bhaṇimo? || 207 ||
(taṃ siddhakumāraṃ prekṣya etābhyāṃ sakhi ! anāryābhyām |
avinayamārgaṃ hatalocanābhyāṃ nītā 'smi, kiṃ bhaṇāmi ||)
madhyamā dhīrọdhā madhyā yathā— (gāsa. 2.60)
acchoḍia—vatthaddhaṃta—patthie! maṃtharaṃ tumaṃ vacca |
ciṃtesi thaṇaharāāsiassa majjhassa vi ṇa bhaṃgaṃ || 208 ||
(balādākṛṣṭavastrārdhāntaprasthite! mantharaṃ tvaṃ vraja |
cintayasi stanabharāyāsitasya madhyasyāpi na bhaṅgam? ||)
madhyamā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—(līlāvatī 323)
tā kiṃ bahuehi vi ciṃciehi ṇalakūvaro varo hou |
vittāhivassa taṇao gaamuha! tuha pasāeṇa || 209 ||
﻿
(tat kiṃ bahubhirapi cintitaiḥ nalakūbaro varo bhavatu |
vittādhipasya tanayo gajamukha! tava prasādena ||)
madhyamā 'dhīrọdhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 6.2)
ajjaṃ pi tāva ekkaṃ mā maṃ vārehi piasahi! ruaṃtiṃ |
kalliṃ uṇa tammi gae jaï ṇa muā tā ṇa rodissaṃ || 210 ||
(adyāpi tāvadekaṃ mā māṃ vāraya priyasakhi! rudatīm |
kalye punastasmin gate yadi na mṛtā rodiṣye ||)
madhyamā 'dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—(māmā. 7.2)
rambhoru! saṃhara bhayaṃ kṣamate vikāramutkampinaḥ stanabharasya na madhyabhāgaḥ |
itthaṃ tvayaiva kathitapraṇayaprasādaḥ saṅkalpanirvṛtiṣu saṃstuta eṣa dāsaḥ || 211 ||
madhyamā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 1.24)
piaviraho appiadaṃsaṇaṃ garuāiṃ do vi dukkhāiṃ |
jīe tumaṃ kārijjesi tīe ṇamo āhijāīe || 212 ||
(priyaviraho 'priyadarśanaṃ ca guruke dve api duḥkhe |
yayā tvaṃ kāryase tasyai nama ābhijātyai ||)
madhyamā dhīrā pragalbhā yathā—(amaruka. 69)
purā 'bhūdasmākaṃ tanuriyamabhinnaiva niyataṃ tato nu tvaṃ preyān vayamapi hatāśā priyatamāḥ |
idānīṃ nāthastvaṃ vayamapi kalatraṃ; kimaparaṃ mayā ' 'p‍taṃ prāṇānāṃ kuliśakaṭhinānāṃ phalamidam || 213 ||
madhyamā adhīrā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 1.43)
virahāṇalo sahijjaï āsābaṃdheṇa vallahajaṇassa |
ekkaggāmapavāso hu māe! maraṇaṃ visesei || 214 ||
(virahānalaḥ sahyata āśābandhena ballabhajanasya |
ekagrāmapravāsaḥ khalu mātarmaraṇaṃ viśeṣayati ||)
madhyamọdhā pragalbhā yathā—
pahavaṃti ccia purisā mahilāṇaṃ suhaa! kiṃ tha vi/lio si |
aṇurāaṇolliāe ko doso āhiāīe || 295 ||
﻿
(prabhavantyeva puruṣā mahilānāṃ subhaga! kimatra vrīḍito 'si |
anurāganoditāyāḥ ko doṣa ābhijātyāḥ? ||)
madhyamā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(gādhārat‍nakośe. 395)
jiaü tti paasaṇāhaṃ varagottaṃ varapariaṇāhi soumaṇā |
chikkā, kaeṇa ṇamiussāṇurasūraṃ paloei || 216 ||
('jayatu' iti padasanāthaṃ varagotraṃ parijanaiḥ śrotumanāḥ |
chikkā kṛtena namituṃ sā sūryaṃ pralokayati ||)
madhyamā dhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 945)
aṇuvattaṃto amhārisaṃ jaṇaṃ suhaa! āhijāīe |
ciṃtesi vi ṇo hiae aṇāhijāī suhaṃ jiaï || 217 ||
(anuvartamāno 'smādṛśaṃ janaṃ subhaga! ābhijātyā |
cintayasi punarhṛdaye anābhijātiḥ sukhaṃ jīvati ||)
madhyamā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—
X X X X si eṇṇiṃ tūmati ghūmei |
aliakuviehi kumarīhiṃ risaṃ viṇiuhi uppariaṃ || 218 ||
madhyamā 'dhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 2.95)
kelīa vi rūseuṃ ṇa tīrae tammi cukkaviṇaammi |
jāiaehiṃ va māe! imehiṃ avasehiṃ aṃgehiṃ || 299 ||
(kelyā 'pi roṣituṃ na śakyate tasmiṃś‍cyutavinaye |
yācitakairiva mātarebhiravaśairaṅgaiḥ ||)
madhyamā 'dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(līlīvatī 567)
ṇa sahaï kālakkhevaṃ hiaaṃ maaṇa—huavaha—palittaṃ |
tassa vi saṃdehagaaṃ jīaṃ ṇa suaṃ via tae || 220 ||
(na sahate kālakṣepaṃ hṛdayaṃ madanahutavahapradīp‍tam |
tasya ca sandehagataṃ jīvitaṃ na śrutamiva tayā ||)
kaniṣṭhā yathā—(gāsa. 3.40)
aṃdha—ara—vora—pattaṃ va māuā! maha païṃ viluppaṃti |
īsāaṃti mahaṃ via ccheppāhiṃto phaṇo jāo || 221 ||
﻿
(andhakarabadarapātramiva mātaraḥ! mama patiṃ vilumpanti |
īrṣyanti mahyameva lāṅgūlebhyaḥ/śephobhyaḥ phaṇo jātaḥ ||)
kaniṣṭhā dhīrā yathā—(gāsa. 1.33)
uṇhāi ṇīsasanto kiṃ ti maha parammuhīeṁ saaṇaddhe |
hiaaṃ palīvia vi aṇusaeṇa puṭṭhiṃ palīvesi || 222 ||
(uṣṇāni niśśvasan kimiti mama parāṅmukhyāḥ śayanārdhe |
hṛdayaṃ pradīpyāpyanuśayena pṛṣṭhaṃ pradīpayasi ||)
kaniṣṭhā adhīrā yathā—(gāsa. 2.46)
ummūleṃti va hiaaṃ imāi re! tuha virajjamāṇassa |
avahīraṇa-vasa-visaṃṭhula-valaṃta-ṇaaṇaddha-diṭṭhāiṃ || 223 ||
(unmūlayantīva hṛdayamimāni re! tava virajyamānasya |
avadhīraṇa—vaśa—visaṃṣṭhula—valannayanārdhadṛṣṭāni ||)
kaniṣṭhọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 6.44)
daïa—kaaggaha—lulio dhammillo sīhugaṃdhiaṃ vaaṇaṃ |
sa/maaṇammi ettiaṃ cia pasāhaṇaṃ haraï juvaīṇaṃ || 224 ||
(dayitakaragrahalulito dhammillaḥ sīdhugandhitaṃ vadanam |
śayane/madane etāvadeva prasādhanaṃ harati yuvatīnām ||)
kaniṣṭhā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—(gāsa. 2.96)
upphulliāi khellaü mā ṇaṃ vāreha hou parikhāmā |
mā jahaṇabhāragaruī purusāaṃtī kilimmihii || 225 ||
(utphullikayā khelatu maināṃ vārayata bhavatu parikṣāmā |
mā jaghanabhāragurvī puruṣāyantī klamiṣyati ||)
kaniṣṭhā dhīrọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.75)
teṇa ṇa marāmi maṇṇūhiṃ pūriā ajja, jeṇa, re suhaa! |
toggaamaṇā maraṃtī mā tujjha puṇo vi laggissaṃ || 226 ||
(tena na mriye mantubhiḥ pūritā 'dya yena re subhaga! |
tvadgatamanā mriyamāṇā mā tava punarapi lagiṣyāmi ||)
﻿
kaniṣṭhā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—
taha pūriamoḍ‌ḍhaṇaaṃ vara-saüṇaggahaṇa-gaṃṭhi-baṃdhehiṃ |
bhaggamaraṇaggahāe jaha rakkhākaṃḍaaṃ jāaṃ || 227 ||
(tathā pūritamuttarīyaṃ varaśakunaṃ gahanagranthibandhaiḥ |
bhag‍namaraṇagrahāyāḥ yathā rakṣākāṇḍakaṃ jātaḥ ||)
kaniṣṭhā 'dhīrọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 255)
ṇivvuttaraā vi vahū suraavirāmaṭṭhiiṃ aāṇaṃtī |
aviraahiaā aṇṇaṃ pi kiṃ pi atthi tti ciṃtei || 228 ||
(nirvṛttaratā 'pi vadhūḥ suratavirāmasthitijānatī |
aviratahṛdayā 'nyadapi kimapyastīti cintayati ||)
kaniṣṭhā adhīrā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 1.47)
hoṃtapahiassa jāā 1āucchaṇa—jīadhāraṇarahassaṃ |
pucchaṃtī bhamaï gharaṃ ghareṇa piavirahasahirīo || 229 ||
(bhaviṣyatpathikasya jāyā āpṛcchana—jīvadhāraṇārahasyam |
pṛcchantī bhramati gṛhaṃ gṛheṇa priyavirahasahanaśīlāḥ ||)
kaniṣṭhọdhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 5.33)
pusaï khaṇaṃ, dhuvaï khaṇaṃ paphphoḍaï takkhaṇaṃ aāṇaṃtī |
muddhavahū thaṇavaṭṭe diṇṇaṃ daïeṇa ṇakkhapaaṃ || 230 ||
(proñchati kṣaṇaṃ dhunoti kṣaṇaṃ prasphoṭati tatkṣaṇamajānatī |
mugdhavadhūḥ stanapṛṣṭhe dattaṃ dayitena nakhapadam ||)
kaniṣṭhā anụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 2.94)
sā tuha sahatthadiṇṇaṃ phaggucchavakaddamaṃ thaṇucchaṃge |
parikuviā iva sāhaï salāhirī gāmakumarīṇaṃ || 231 ||
(sā tvayā svahastadattaṃ phalgūtsavakardamaṃ stanotsaṅge |
parikupiteva sādhayati ślāghanaśīlā grāmakumārīṇām ||)
1. āpṛcchanaṃ virahaḥ | pravāsasyāpṛcchāpūrvakatvāt | tathā ca meghe 'āpṛcchasva priyasakhe' ti kālidāsaḥ | ﻿
kaniṣṭhā dhīrọdhā mugdhā yathā—
gharamaṃdhaṇa-vaṇṇaa-laggaviṃducittalia-pahmala-kavolaṃ |
ia ṇaaṃgi muhammi ṇaṃ te lihida vva paī puloei || 232 ||
(gṛhamanthana-varṇaka-lag‍na-bindu-citrita-pakṣmala-kapolam |
he natāṅgi! mukhe nanu te likhita iva patiḥ pralokayati ||)
kaniṣṭhā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
uvvāsiaṃ khu gāmaṃ, gahavaï—dhūāeṃ kassa pukkarimo |
aṇumagga-lagga-vodraha—kkiṃsua-kaliaṃ haraṃtīe || 233 ||1
(ud‌vāsitaṃ khalu grāmaṃ gṛhapatiduhitrā kasya kathayāma |
anumārgalag‍na—taruṇa—kiṃśuka—kalikāṃ harantyā ||)
kaniṣṭhā 'dhīrọdhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.14)
acchīiṃ tā thaïssaṃ dohiṃ vi hatthehiṃ tammi diṭṭhammi |
aṃgaṃ kalaṃbakusumaṃ va pulaïaṃ kahaṃ ṇu ḍhakkissaṃ || 234 ||
(akṣiṇī tāvat sthagayiṣyāmi dvābhyāmapi hastābhyāṃ tasmin dṛṣṭe |
aṅgaṃ kadambakusumamiva pulakitaṃ kathaṃ nu sthagayiṣye? ||)
kaniṣṭhā adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 7.42)
gijjaṃte maṃgalagāiāhi varagotta-diṇṇaaṇṇāe |
souṃ vva ṇiggao uvaha hoṃtabahūāeṃ romaṃco || 235 ||
(gīyamāne maṅ‌galagāyikābhirvaragotradattakarṇāyāḥ |
śrotumiva nirgataḥ paś‍yata bhaviṣyad‍vadhūkāyā romāñcaḥ ||)
kaniṣṭhā madhyā yathā—
dukkhaṃ deṃto vi suhaṃ || 236 || (pṛ. 613 dra.—pa.4)
kaniṣṭhā dhīrā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 2.92)
āaṃbaṃta—kavolaṃ khaliakkharajaṃpiriṃ phuraṃtoṭṭhiṃ |
mā chivasu tti bhaṇaṃtīṃ/sarusaṃ samosaraṃtiṃ piaṃ bharimo || 237 ||
(ātāmrāntaḥ kapolāṃ skhalitākṣarajalpanaśīlāṃ sphuradoṣṭhīm |
mā spṛśeti bhaṇantīṃ/saroṣaṃ samapasarpantīṃ priyāṃ smarāmaḥ ||)
1. jo.rā. chāyāṃ na dadataḥ | ﻿
kaniṣṭhā adhīrā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 1.26)
a/ṇakuṇaṃto ccia māṇaṃ ṇisāsu suha-sutta-dara-vibuddhāṇaṃ |
suṇṇaïa-pāsa-parimūsaṇa-veaṇaṃ jaï si jāṇaṃto || 268 ||
(nākariṣya evaṃ mānaṃ niśāsu sukhasup‍tadaravibuddhānām |
śūnyīkṛtapārśvaparimoṣaṇavedanāṃ yadi teṣāṃ ajñāsyaḥ ||)
kaniṣṭhọdhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 4.6)
avvo aṇuṇaa—saha—kaṃkhirīa akaaṃ kuṇaṃtīe |
saralasahāo vi pio aviṇaamaggaṃ balā ṇīo || 239 ||
(kaṣṭam aho anunayasukhakāṅkṣaṇaśīlayā akṛtaṃ kurvatyā |
saralasvabhāvo 'pi priyo 'vinayamārgaṃ balānnītaḥ ||)
kaniṣṭhā anụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—
attā! vuḍ‍ḍhakumārī, pecchaha, upphulliāe khelaṃtī |
vivarīa—suraa—ūsava—vilāsiṇīṇaṃ joggaṃ pi karei || 240 ||
(śvaśr‌vaḥ! vṛddhakumārī prekṣadhvamutphullikayā khelantī |‍
viparītasuratotsavavilāsinīnāṃ yogya/yāmiva karoti ||)
kaniṣṭhā dhīrọdhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 1.90)
kiṃ dāva kaā ahavā karesi kārissi suhaa! ettāhe |
avarāhāṇaṃ alajjira! sāhasu kaare khamijjaṃtu || 241 ||
(kiṃ tāvat kṛtā athavā karoṣi kariṣyasi subhagedānīm |
aparādhānāmalajjālo! kathaya katare kṣamyantām ||)
kaniṣṭhā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—
kelipasaro viaṃbhaï lajjā taṇuāi gāmakumarīṇaṃ |
esa sahāo/vo sahi! kiṃ imāṇa mahumāsadiahāṇaṃ || 242 ||
(keliprasaro vijṛmbhate, lajjā tanukāyate, grāmakumārīṇām |
eṣa svabhāvaḥ sakhi! kimeṣāṃ madhumāsa—divasānām ||)
kaniṣṭhā 'dhīrọdhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 786)
āucchaṇovaūhaṇakaṃṭhesamosariavāhulahaāe |
valaāi pahiacalaṇe vahūeṃ ṇialā via paḍaṃti || 243 ||
﻿
(āpṛcchanopagūhakaṇṭhasama/pasṛtabāhulatikāyāḥ| valayāni pathikacaraṇayorvadhvāḥ nigaḍā iva patanti||)
kaniṣṭhā adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—
ṇavavaratūrā aṇṇāṇa—rahasavisappaṃtapulaïaṃgīe |
hoṃtavahuāe pecchaha ṇa māi seo imo aṃge || 244 ||
(navavaratūryākarṇana—rabhasavisarpaṇapulakitāṅgyāḥ |
bhaviṣyadvadhvāḥ prekṣata na māti svedo 'yamaṅge ||)
kaniṣṭhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 2. 84)
aṇṇua! ṇāhaṃ kuviā avaūhasu kiṃ muhā pasāesi ?|
tuha maṇṇusamuppāaeṇa majjha māṇeṇa vi ṇa kajjaṃ || 245 ||
(ajña! nāhaṃ kupitā upagūha kiṃ mudhā prasādayasi ?|
tava manyusamutpādakena mama mānenāpi na kāryam ||)
kaniṣṭhā dhīrā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 3.75)
ujjhasi piāe samaaṃ, taha vi hu re! bhaṇasi kīsa kisia tti |
uvari bhareṇa a aṇṇua! muaï vaïllo vi aṃgāiṃ || 246 ||
(uhyase priyayā samagrastathā 'pi khalu re! bhaṇasi kimiti kṛśeti |
upari bhareṇa ca ajña! muñcati balīvardo 'pyaṅgāni||)
kaniṣṭhā adhīrā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.61)
ṇīsāsukkaṃpiapulaehi jāṇaṃti ṇacciuṃ dhaṇṇā |
amhārisīhiṃ diṭṭhe piaṃmi appā vi vīsario || 247 ||
(niḥśvāsotkampitapulakitairjānanti nartituṃ dhanyāḥ |
asmādṛśībhirdṛṣṭe priye ātmā 'pi vismṛtaḥ ||)
kaniṣṭhọdhā pragalbhā yathā—
sāloe vvia sūre॰ || 248 || (pṛ. 569)
kaniṣṭhā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.5)
dukkhehi labbhaï pio laddho dukkhehi hoi sāhīṇo |
laddho vi aladdho vvia/ccia jaï jaha hiaaṃ taha ṇa hoi || 249 ||
(duḥkhairlabhyate priyo labdho duḥkhairbhavati svādhīnaḥ |
labdho 'pyalabdha eva yadi hṛdayaṃ tathā na bhavati||)
kaniṣṭhā dhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 706)
avasara rottuṃ cia ṇimmiāiṃ mā pusasu me haacchīṇi |
daṃsaṇamettuṃmaïehiṃ jehiṃ sīlaṃ/hiaaṃ tuha ṇa ṇāaṃ || 250 ||
(apasara roditumeva nirmite mā proñcha me hatākṣiṇī |
darśanamātronmattābhyāṃ yābhyāṃ śīlaṃ/hṛdayaṃ tava na jñātam ||)
kaniṣṭhā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—
cheavaro pariāṇaï pariṇaaṇe c‍cea/vaṃcaṇasīlasaṃpattī |
aṇikupac‍cia—vaṃkila—thoa—thimiya—suhaāṇa/bhumaāeṁ diṭhṭhīe || 251 ||
(chekavaraḥ parijānāti pariṇayane eva śīlasampattiḥ |
anikuñcita/tiraścīnavakraśīlasthūlastimitasubhagāyā/bhruvā dṛṣṭyā ||)
kaniṣṭhā adhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 3.73)
avvo dukkaraāraa ! puṇo vi tattiṃ karesi gamaṇassa |
ajja vi ṇa hoṃti saralā veṇīe taraṃgiṇo ciurā || 252 ||
(aho duṣkarakāraka ! punarapi cintāṃ karoṣi gamanasya |
adyāpi na bhavanti saralā veṇyāstaraṅgiṇaścikurāḥ ||)
kaniṣṭhā adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(vajjāla. 472)
āsaṇṇakuḍuṃge juṇṇadeule bahujuāṇasaṃkiṇṇe |
thero paï tti mā ruasu putti ! diṇṇā si suggāme || 253 ||
(āsannanikuñje jīrṇadevakule bahuyuvasaṃkīrṇe |
sthaviraḥ patiriti mā rudihi putri ! dattā 'si sugrāme ||)
dhīrā yathā—(amaruka. 38)
kopo yatra bhrukuṭiracanā vigraho yatra maunaṃ yatrānyonyasmitamanunayo dṛṣṭipātaḥ prasādaḥ |
tasya premṇastadidamadhunā vaiśasaṃ paś‍ya jātaṃ tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi, na ca me manyumokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ || 254 ||
dhīrọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 2.29)
taha māṇo māṇadhaeṁ tīa emea duramaṇubaddho |
jaha se aṇuṇīa pio ekkaggāma vvi/c‍cia paüttho || 255 ||
(tathā māno mānadhanāyā tayā evameva dūramanubaddhaḥ |
yathā tasyā anunīya priya ekagrāma eva proṣitaḥ ||)
dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.67)
dhīrāvalaṃbirīe vi guruaṇapurao tumammi bolīṇe |
paḍio se acchiṇimīlaṇeṇa pamhaṭṭhio bāho || 256 ||
(dhairyāvalambanaśīlāyā api gurujanapuratastvayi vyatikrānte |
patitastasyā akṣinimīlanena pakṣmasthito bāṣpaḥ ||)
adhīrā yathā—
diṭṭhe jaṃ pulaïjjasi tharaharasi piammi jaṃ samāsaṇṇe |
taṃ saṃbhāsaṇaseolliphaṃsaṇe kiṃ vi lajjihisi ? || 257 ||
(dṛṣṭe yat pulakāyase tharaharāyase priye yat samāsanne |
tat saṃbhāṣaṇasvedādrīkṛtasparśe kimiti lajjiṣyase ? ||)
adhīrọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.12)
ghettūṇa cuṇṇamuṭhṭhiṃ harisūsasiāe haliajāāe |
phisalemi tti piaama—hatthe gaṃdhoaaṃ jāaṃ || 258 ||
{gṛhītvā cūrṇamuṣṭiṃ harṣocchvasitāyāḥ halikajāyāyāḥ |
skhalāmīti priyatama—haste gandhodakaṃ jātam ||}
adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—
vara—gottuggīā—aṇṇaṇeṇa romāṃca—sea—salilehiṃ |
viuḍijjaï hoṃtavahūe ua vārijjamaṃḍaṇaaṃ || 259 ||
{varagotrodgītākarṇanena romāñcasvedasalilaiḥ |
vikriyate bhaviṣyad‍vadhvāḥ paś‍ya vivāhamaṇḍanakam ||}
ụ̄dhā yathā—(gāsa. 7.17)
osuaï/suaï diṇṇapaḍivakkhaveaṇaṃ pasịdhilehiṃ aṃgehiṃ |
ṇivvattia-suraa-rasāṇubaṃdha-suha-ṇibbharaṃ so/suṇhā || 260 ||
(avasvapiti/svapiti dattapratipakṣavedanaṃ praśithilairaṅgaiḥ |
nirvirttitasuratasaubhagānubandhasukhanirbharaṃ s‍nuṣā |)
anụ̄dhā yathā—(gāsa.6.73)
rūaṃ siṭṭhaṃ cia se asesapurise ṇiattiaccheṇa |
bāholleṇa imīe ajaṃppamāṇeṇa vi muheṇa || 261 ||
(rūpaṃ śiṣṭameva tasyāśeṣapuruṣe nivartitākṣeṇa |
bāṣpārdreṇāsyā ajalpatā 'pi mukhena ||)
dhīrā mugdhā yathā—(amaruka. 41)
paṭālag‍ne patyau namayati mukhaṃ jātavinayā haṭhāśleṣaṃ vāñchatyapaharati gātrāṇi śanakaiḥ |
na śak‍notyākhyātuṃ smitamukhasakhīdattanayanā hriyā klāmyatyantaḥ prathamaparihāse navavadhūḥ || 262 ||
dhīrọdhā mugdhā yathā—
aviāviakkharavaā cireṇa aṇubaṃdhapucchia—palattā |
ṇavavahupaḍhamullāvā varassa hiae ṇa dāsaṃti/māeṃti || 263 ||
(avibhāvitākṣarapadā cireṇa anubandhapṛṣṭapralapiṃtāḥ |
navavadhūprathamollāpā varasya hṛdaye na mānti ||)
dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 2.37)
phurie vāmacchi ! tue jaï ehii so pio jja sā suiraṃ |
viṇimīlia dāhiṇaaṃ tue a eaṃ paloissaṃ || 264 ||
(sphurite vāmakṣi ! tvayi yadyeṣyati sa priyo 'dya tat sucarim |
vinimīlya dakṣiṇaṃ tvayaivaitaṃ pralokiṣye ||)
adhīrā mugdhā yathā—
pāapaḍaṇāṇa muddhe ! rahasa—balāmoḍicuṃbiavvāṇaṃ |
daṃsaṇamettapasijjiri ! cuk‍kā si bahuāṇa suhāṇa || 265 ||
(pādapatanānāṃ mugdhe ! rahasi balātkāracumbitavyānām |
darśanamātraprasvedanaśīle ! vañcitā 'si bahukānāṃ sukhānām ||)
adhīrọdhā mugdhā yathā—(amaruka. 12)
praharaviratau madhye vā 'hnastato 'pi pare 'pi vā kimuta sakale yāte vā 'hni priya ! tvamihaiṣyasi |
iti dinaśataprāpyaṃ deśaṃ priyasya yiyāsato harati gamanaṃ bālā ' 'lāpaissabāṣpajhalajjhalaiḥ || 266 ||
adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
hiaïcchiavarahūe suammi ghaṇapulaajjhaṃpiā bālā |
seaṇhaviā hūā pacchā salileṇa sahiāhiṃ || 267 ||
(hṛdayepsitavarahūte śrute ghanapulakacchāditā bālā |
svedas‍napitā bhūtā paścāt salilena sakhībhiḥ ||)
ụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 553)
sahi sāhasu sabbhāveṇa pucchimo kiṃ asesamahilāṇaṃ |
vaḍ‍ḍhaṃti karaṭṭhiā vvia valaā daïe paütthammi || 268 ||
(sakhi sāhasa—sadbhāvena pṛcchāmaḥ kimaśeṣamahilānām |
vardhante karasthitā eva valayā dayite proṣite ||)
anụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
kassa bharisi tti bhaṇie॰ || 269 || (pṛ. 639)
dhīrā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 4.9)
jaṃ jaṃ pihulaṃ aṃgaṃ taṃ taṃ jāaṃ kisoari ! kisaṃ te |
jaṃ jaṃ taṇuaṃ taṃ taṃ pi ṇiṭṭhiaṃ, kiṃ ttha māṇeṇa ? || 270 ||
(yad yat pṛthulamaṅga tattat jātaṃ kṛśodari ! kṛśaṃ te |
yadyat tanukaṃ tattadapi niṣṭhitaṃ, kimatra mānena ? ||)
dhīrọdhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 5.93)
aïkovaṇā vi sāsū ruāviā gaavaīa soṇhāe |
pāapaḍaṇoṇaāe dosu vi galiesu valaesu || 271 ||
(atikopanā 'pi śvaśrū roditā gatapatikayā s‍nuṣayā |
pādapatanāvanatayā dvayorapi galitayorvalayayoḥ ||)
dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 3.96)
pecchaï aladdhalakkhaṃ dīhaṃ ṇīsasaï suṇṇaaṃ hasaï |
jaha jaṃpahi aphuḍatthaṃ taha se hiaaṭṭhiaṃ kiṃ pi || 272 ||
(paś‍yatyalabdhalakṣyaṃ dīrghaṃ niḥśvasiti śūnyaṃ hasati |
yathā jalpatyasphuṭārthaṃ tathā tasyā hṛdayasthitaṃ kimapi ||)
adhīrā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 743ve.)
bhiuḍīa puloissaṃ ṇibbhacchissaṃ parammuhī hossaṃ |
jaṃ bhaṇaha taṃ karissaṃ sahīoṃ ! jaï taṃ ṇa pacchissaṃ || 273 ||
(bhrukuṭyā pralokayiṣye nirbhartsayiṣye parāṅmukhī bhaviṣyāmi |
yad bhaṇata tat kariṣye sakhyaḥ ! yadi taṃ na prekṣiṣye ||)
adhīrọdhā madhyā yathā—
dṛṣṭe locanavartmanā॰ || 274 || (pṛ. 472)
adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—
jaṃ aṇuṇaaṃ kumārīṇaṃ suhaassa jā dik pasāhiakulassa |
kīsa vi sesaṃ piasahi ! maha haahiaeṇa pāraddhī || 275 ||
(yamanunayaṃ kumārīṇāṃ subhagasya ca yā dṛk prasādhitakulasya |
kasmādapi śeṣaṃ priyasakhi ! mama hatahṛdayena prārabdham ||)
ụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 5.59)
raï—virama—lajjiāe appatta—ṇiasaṇāe sahasa vva |
ḍhakkaṃti piapariraṃbhaṇeṇa jahaṇaṃ kulavahue || 276 ||
(rativirāmalajjitā aprāp‍tanivasanāḥ sahasaiva |
sthagayanti priyaparimbhaṇena jaghanaṃ kulavadhvaḥ ||)
anụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—
varakittaṇa—balia—parammuhīe sūei hoṃtavahuāe |
aṇurāaṃ dūradalaṃtasīvaṇo kaṃcuo c‍cea || 277 ||
(varakīrtanavalitaparāṅmukhyāḥ sūcayati bhaviṣyad‍vadhvāḥ |
anurāgaṃ dūradalatsīvanaḥ kañcuka eva ||)
dhīrā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 6.64)
ṇa vi taha aṇālavaṃtī hiaaṃ dūmei māṇiṇī ahiaṃ |
jaha dūra—viaṃbhia—garua—rosa—majjhattha—bhaṇiehiṃ || 278 ||
(nāpi tathā 'nālapantī hṛdayaṃ dunoti māninyadhikam |
yathā dūravijṛmbhitagurukaroṣamadhyasthabhaṇitaiḥ ||)
dhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—
pekkhasi aṇimisaṇaaṇo jaṃpasi karakamala—ḍhaïa—aharoṭṭho |
paṭṭhiṃ ṇa desi saaṇe tahāvi de suhaa ! kuppāmo || 279 ||
{prekṣase 'nimiṣanayano jalpasi karakamalasthagitādharoṣṭhaḥ |
pṛṣṭhaṃ na dadāsi śayane tathāpi te subhaga ! kupyāmaḥ ||}
dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 5.70)
aṇṇāṇa vi hoṃti muhe paṃhaladhavalāi dīhakasaṇāiṃ |
loaṇāi suṃdarīṇaṃ taha vi khu daṭṭhuṃ ṇa jāṇaṃti || 280 ||
(anyāsāmapi santi mukhe pakṣmaladhavalāni dīrghakṛṣṇāni |
kumārīṇāṃ locanāni tathā 'pi draṣṭuṃ na jānanti ||)
adhīrā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 3.44)
vevirasiṇṇakaraṃguliparikkhalaṃtaṃmi/ggahakkhasia lehaṇīmagge |
sotthi vvia ṇa samappaï piasahi ! lehammi kiṃ lihimo ? || 281 ||
(vepanaśīlasvinnakarāṅgulipariskhalite/parigrahasavalite lekhanīmārge |
svastyeva na samāpyate priyasakhi ! lekhe kiṃ likhāmaḥ ? ||)
adhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.68)
bharimo se saaṇaparammuhīeĕ vialaṃtamāṇapasarāe |
kaïavasuttuvvattaṇatthaṇakalasaharapellaṇasuhelliṃ || 282 ||
(smarāmastasyāḥ śayanaparāṅ‍mukhyāḥ vigalanmānaprasarāyāḥ |
kaitavasup‍tod‍vartanastanakalaśa/harapīḍanasukhakelim ||)
adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(līlāvatī. 490)
jāṇāmi c‍cia piasahi ! dūraviruddhaṃ kumārabhāvassa |
taha vi haavammaheṇaṃ alajjirāṇaṃ dhure juttā || 283 ||
(jānāmyeva priyasakhi ! dūraviruddhaṃ kumārabhāvasya |
tathā 'pi hatamanmathenāhamalajjāvatīnāṃ dhuri niyuktā ||}
ụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 3.98)
huṃ huṃ de ha/bhaṇasu puṇo ṇa suaṃ ti karei kālavikkheaṃ |
ghariṇī—hiaasuhāiṃ païṇo kaṇṇe bhaṇaṃtassa || 284 ||
(huṃ huṃ tāvad/he bhaṇa punarna śrutamiti karoti kālavikṣepam |
gṛhiṇī hṛdayasukhāni patyuḥ karṇe bhaṇataḥ ||)
anụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—
hiaïcchi/ṭṭhiassa dijjaü kisiāattiṃ ṇa pecchaha piucchā ! |
hiaïcchia/hiaaṭṭhio mha katto bhaṇiuṃ mohaṃ gaā kumarī || 285 ||
(hṛdayepsi/ṣasthitasya dayitāṃ kṛśāyantīṃ na prekṣasī pitṛṣvasaḥ ! |
'hṛdayepsito 'smākaṃ kutaḥ' bhaṇitvā mohaṃ gatā kumārī ||)
mugdhā yathā—
muddhattaṇeṇa vahuā jaṃte/citte(ṇite) vakkhāraāhi sahisatthe |
aṇumaggapaattā/ṭṭā piaameṇa hasiūṇa paḍiruddhā || 286 ||
(mugdhatvena vadhūḥ yāti vāsakagṛhān sakhīsārthe |
anumārgapravṛtta—priyatamena hasitvā pratiruddhā ||}
madhyā yathā—(vajjā. 318)
aṃtoku/kaḍhaṃta—maaṇa—ggi—tāviaṃ vahaï kaṇaa—kaṃttillaṃ |
upphiṇiaṃ lāaṇṇassa rasaṃ ghaṇathaṇaharaṃ vālā || 287 ||
(antaḥk‍vathanmadanāg‍nitāpitaṃ vahati kanakakāntiyuktam |
utphālitaṃ lāvaṇya/ṇyasya—rasaṃ ghanastanabharaṃ bālā ||)
pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 3.99)
khiṇṇassa ure païṇo ṭhavei gimhāvaraṇharamiassa |
ollaṃ galaṃtaüpphaṃ ṇhāṇasuaṃdhaṃ cihurabhāraṃ || 288 ||
(khinnasyorasi sthāpayati patyuḥ grīṣmāparāh‍ṇaramitasya |
ārdraṃ galatpuṣpaṃ s‍nānasugandhaṃ cikurabhāram ||)
śatametat svakīyānāṃ tricatvāriṃśaduttaram |
uttamādivibhedena nāyikānāmudāhṛtam || 289 ||
śrutipravṛttito dharmastathā 'rtho 'patyalakṣaṇaḥ |
prāyo visrambhajaḥ kāmaḥ svakīyāsveva tiṣṭhati || 290 ||
guṇapariṇayadhairyāmaugdhyādiyogavyatikaraparipāṭyā vistṛto 'yaṃ prakāraḥ |
nijayuvatiṣu samyag dharmakāmārthahetoramumatha parakīyāsūktavat kīrtayāmaḥ ||
(2. parakīyā)
tatra parakīyā uttamā yathā—(gāsa. 4.17)
suhavu/ṭhacchiāi suhao muhapaṃkaasurabhipavaṇaṇivvaviaṃ |
taha piaï paaï/kaḍuaṃ pi osaḍhaṃ/ṭhaṃ jaha ṇa ṇiṭṭhāi || 292 ||
(sukhapṛcchikāyāḥ subhagaḥ mukhapaṅkajasurabhipavananirvāpitam |
tathā pibati prakṛti/bahalakaṭukamapyauṣadhaṃ yathā na nitiṣṭhati ||)
uttamā dhīrā yathā—(gāsa. 5.15)
coria—raa—satthālue putti ! mā bhamasu aṃdhaārammi |
ahiaaraṃ lakkhijjasi tama—ṇivahe dīvaa—siha vva || 293 ||
(cauryarataśraddhāluke putri ! mā bhrama andhakāre |
adhikataraṃ lakṣyase tamonivahe dīpakaśikheva ||)
uttamā 'dhīrā yathā—
suhaa ! tuha virahahuavaha—palitta—hiaoṇha/tthadīha—sasiāe |
taṃmaṃti/dhūmeṃti tīe purao muhāparimalakāḍiḍhaā bhasalā || 294 ||
(subhaga ! tava virahahutavahapradīp‍tahṛdayoṣṇa/tthadīrghaśvasitāyāḥ |
tāmyanti/dhūmāyante tasyāḥ purato mukhaparimalakṛṣṭā bhramarāḥ ||)
uttamọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 6.92)
ekka c‍cia vahuā gahavaïssa mahilattaṇaṃ samuvvahaï |
aṇimisa—ṇaaṇo saalo vi jīe devīkao gāmo || 295 ||
(ekaiva vadhūḥ gṛhapateḥ mahilātvaṃ samudvahati |
animiṣanayanaḥ sakalo 'pi yayā devīkṛto grāmaḥ ||)
uttamā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—(gāsa. 957ve)
piadaṃsaṇarahasukkhitta pahia ! aṇṇeṇa vac‍casu paheṇa |
gahavaïdhūā dullaṃghavāurā iha haaggāme || 296 ||
(priyādarśanarabhasotsikta pathika ! anyena vraja pathā |
gṛhapatiduhitā durlaṅghavāgurā iha hatagrāme ||)
uttamā dhīrọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 5.10)
tuha daṃsaṇasaṃjaṇio vahueṁ lajjāluīeṁ aṇurāo |
duggaamaṇoraho via hiaa vvia jāi pariṇāmaṃ || 297 ||
(tava darśanasaṃjanito vadhvā lajjālukāyā anurāgaḥ |
durgatamanoratha iva hṛdaya eva yāti pariṇāmam ||)
uttamā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.56)
vaaṇeu calaṃta—sīsa—suṇṇāvahāṇa—huṃkāraṃ |
sahi ! deṃttī ṇīsāsaṃtaresu kīsa mha dūmesi ? || 298 ||
(vacaneṣu calacchīrṣaśūnyāvadhānahuṅkāram |
sakhi ! dadatī niḥśvāsāntareṣu kimiti/kasmādasmān dunoṣi ? ||)
uttamā 'dhīrọdhā yathā—
ṇavavarakaragahiakarāe so mae māṇiaavārejje |
vimaavaaṇo ṇiaṃto vilaāe pecchiuṃ tiṇho || 299 ||
(navavarakaragṛhītakarāyā sa mayā mānitaḥ vivāhamaṇṭape |
vimalavadanaḥ paś‍yan vanitāyāḥ prekṣituṃ satṛṣṇaḥ ||)
uttamā 'dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—
katto majjha samāsaṇṇadaḍ‍ḍhavārajiāe sahi ! jīaṃ |
gehaṃgaṇavāṇaṭṭhīe tammi vimaṇe alak‍kaṃte || 300 ||
(kuto mama samāsannadagdhavārajitāyā sakhi ! jīvitam |
gehāṅgaṇāvasthitāyāstasmin vimanasi alakṣyamāṇe ||)
uttamā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 6.72)
maaṇaggiṇo vva dhūmaṃ mohaṇapiṃcchaṃ vva loadiṭhṭhīe |
jovvaṇadhaaṃ va muddhe ! vahasi suaṃdhaṃ cihurabhāraṃ || 301 ||
(madanāg‍neriva dhūmaṃ mohanapiñchikāmiva lokadṛṣṭeḥ |
yauvanadhvajamiva mugdhe ! vahasi sugandhaṃ cikurabhāram ||)
uttamā dhīrā mugdhā yathā—
sahi ! sāhasu teṇa samaṃ ahaṃ pi kiṃ ṇiggaā ? pahāammi |
aṇṇa c‍cia dīsaï jeṇa dappaṇe kāvi sā sumuhī/sāmamuhī || 302 ||
(sakhi ! sādhaya tena samamahamapi kiṃ nirgatā ? prabhāte |
anyeva dṛś‍yate yena darpaṇe kā 'pi sā sumukhī/ś‍yāmamukhī ||)
uttamā 'dhīrā mugdhā yathā—
lajjāvisaṃṭhulāe araṃhallaaṇac‍celaṃtīe |
vāeiṇa paï ā ua emea kare kālavahūe || 303 ||
uttamọdhā mugdhā yathā—
dūsiahiao/dūlihahiia soyaṃ dharei vahuāe vaṇṇiaṃ diaro |
uṇṇāmia-māsala-bāhumūla-ṇivvaṇṇaṇa-saaṇho || 304 ||
(dūṣitahṛdayaḥ so 'yaṃ dhārayati vadhvāḥ varṇitaṃ devaraḥ |
unnāmitamāṃsalabāhumūlanirvarṇanasatṛṣṇaḥ ||)
uttamā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 5.10)
ettāhe c‍cia mohaṃ jaṇei bālattaṇe vi dīsaṃtī/vaṭṭaṃtī |
gahavaï/gāmaṇidhūā visalaā va vạdh‍ḍhaṃtī kāhii aṇaddhaṃ || 305 ||
(etāvatyeva mohaṃ janayati bālatve 'pi dṛś‍yamānā |
gṛhapati/grāmaṇīduhitā viṣalateva vardhamānā kariṣyatyanartham ||)
uttamā dhīrạ̄dho mugdhā yathā—
ṇiddāvasa-maaṇummīlatāraā-vaṃgagholire ṇaaṇe |
gimhāvaraṇhasuttuṭhṭhiāe diaro tuha ṇiaï || 306 ||
(nidrāvaśamadanonmīlattākāpāṅgaghūrṇanaśīle nayane |
grīṣmāparāh‍ṇasup‍totthitāyā devarastava paś‍yati ||)
uttamā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
vahavallaha ! vaḍ‍ḍhaṃtī laammi aṃdolamāṇīṁ oramasu |
paripāḍiparicchaṇavāvaḍāo kuppaṃti kumarīo || 307 ||
{bahuvallabha ! vartamānāḥ latāyāmāndolamānoraskāḥ |
paripāṭīparīkṣaṇavyāpṛtāḥ kupyanti kumāryaḥ ||}
uttamā adhīrọdhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 1.96)
ṇāsaṃ va sā kaole ajja vi tuha daṃtamaṃḍalaṃ bālā |
ubbhibṇa-pulaa-vaï-parigaaṃ rakkhaï varāī || 308 ||
(nyāsamiva sā kapole adyāpi tava dantamaṇḍalaṃ bālā |
udbhinnapulakavṛtiveṣṭanaparigataṃ rakṣati varākī ||)
uttamā adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
ṇava—laa—pahara—kuṇṇiggāe taṃ kaaṃ kiṃ pi suhaa! kamurīe |
jaṃ ajja vi juaïjaṇo ghare ghare sikkhiuṃ mahaï || 309 ||
(navalatāprahārodvig‍nayā tatkṛtaṃ kimapi subhaga! kumāryā |
yadadyāpi yuvatijano gṛhe gṛhe śikṣituṃ kāṅkṣati ||)
uttamā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 2.40)
racchā—païṇṇa—ṇaaṇuppalā tumaṃ sā paḍicchae eṃtaṃ |
dāra—ṇihiehiṃ bālia maṃgalakalasehiṃ va thaṇehiṃ || 310 ||
(rathyāprakīrṇanayanotpalā tvāṃ sā pratīkṣate āyāntam |
dvāranihitābhyāṃ bālaka! maṅ‍galakalaśābhyāmiva stanābhyām ||)
uttamā dhīrā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 3.56)
kaṃ tuggathaṇukkhitteṇa putti! dāraṭhṭhiā puloesi |
uṇṇāmiakalasaṇivesiagghakamaleṇa va muheṇa || 311 ||
(kaṃ tuḍgaṃstanotkṣiptena putri! dbārasthitā pralokayasi |
unnāmitakalaśaniveśitārghakamaleneva mukhena ||)
uttamā adhīrā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 7.7)
gammihisi tassa vāsaṃ mā turasu suaṇu! vaḍ‍ḍhaü miaṃko |
duddhe duddhaṃ viva caṃdiṃmāe ko pecchaï muhaṃ te || 312 ||
(gamiṣyasi tasya pārśvaṃ mā tvarasva sutanu! vardhatāṃ mṛgāṅkaḥ |
dugdhe dugdhamiva candrikāyāṃ kaḥ prekṣate mukhaṃ te ||)
uttamọdhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 3.60)
paḍivakkhamaṃtupuṃje lāaṇṇaüḍe aṇaṃgagaakuṃbhe |
purisasaahiaadharie kīsa thaṇaṃtī thaṇe vahasi? || 313 ||
(pratipakṣamantupuñjau lāvaṇyoṭajāvanaṅgagajakumbhau |
puruṣaśatahṛdayadhṛtau kimiti stanaṃtī stanau vahasi ?||)
uttamā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—
aṃdolaāi bhoiadhūā jahaṇappavāṇapị̄dhāi |
vajjhaṃti gharaparohaḍa—paṃgaṇabhāesu taruṇehiṃ || 314 ||
(āndolanāni grāmaṇīduhitṛ—jaghana—pramāṇa—pīṭhāni |
vadhyante gṛhapaś‍cād‍bhāga—prāṅgaṇabhāgeṣu taruṇaiḥ ||)
uttamā dhīrọdhā madhyā yathā—
saṃdaṭṭhāharajualaṃ kaṃpitakaolaakkhiaṃ sahaï |
laḍaha—vahuāeṁ hasiaṃ puṇo vi diare raïmaṇaṃmi || 315 ||
(saṃdaṣṭādharayugalaṃ kampitakapolalakṣitaṃ rājate |
bhaṭṭavadhvāḥ dārikayā? hasitaṃ punarapi devare ratimanasi ||)
uttamā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—
puṇṇaggi! vāulamaṇo taha haa—kumari tue kao gāmo |
jaha jāo vāulao pariharia—gharaṇṇa—vāvāro || 316 ||
(putri! vyākulamanāstathāhata—kumāri! tvayā kṛto grāmaḥ |
yathā jāto vyākulakaḥ parihṛtagṛhānyavyāpāraḥ ||)
uttamā adhīrọdhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 4.71)
ṇaaṇṇabbhaṃtara—gholaṃta—vāhabhara—maṃtharāe diṭṭhīe |
puṇaruttapecchirīe bālaa! kiṃ jaṃ ṇa bhaṇio si || 317 ||
(nayanābhyantaraghūrṇamānabāṣpabharamantharayā dṛṣṭyā |
punaruktaprekṣaṇaśīlayā bālaka! kiṃ yatra bhaṇito 'si ||)
uttamā adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—
samuhapasāriavāhe tumaṃmmi cittāṇie kumārīe |
mukko aṃdolaaṇapīḍhaāhi appā muhaccea || 318 ||
(saṃmukhaprasāritabāhe tvayi cittānīte kumāryā |
mukta āndolanapīṭhikābhiḥ ātmā mudhaiva ||)
uttamā pragalbhā yathā—
cheāi muddhadiarassa laā taha vi lāṇiaṇṇavilāsā |
saṃ̣dhottipa X X ṣaṇḍha iti pa jaha jaṇeṇa || 319 ||
{chekāni mugdhadevarasya latā tathā 'pi lāvaṇyavilāsāḥ |
ṣaṇḍha ti pa X X X yathā janena ||}
uttamā dhīrā pragalbhā yathā—
eeṇa ccia piasahi! pajjataṃ kiṃ ṇa māṇuse loe? |
jaṃ tassa kavāe esā kie tti savvo jaṇo bhaṇaï || 320 ||
(etenaiva priyasakhi! paryāp‍taṃ kiṃ na mānuṣe loke? |
yat tasya kṛte eṣā kṛtāti sarvo jano bhaṇati ||}
uttamā adhīrā pragalbhā yathā—
saccaṃ jāṇaï daṭ‌ṭhaṃ sarisammi jaṇammi jujjae rāo |
maraü ṇa tumaṃ bhaṇissaṃ maraṇaṃ vi salāhaṇijjaṃ se || 321 ||
(satyaṃ jānāti draṣṭuṃ sadṛśe jane yujyate rāgaḥ |
mriyatāṃ na tvāṃ bhaṇiṣyāmi maraṇamapi ślāghanīyaṃ tasyāḥ ||)
uttamọdhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 3.5)
phuṭṭaṃteṇa vi hiaeṇa suhaa! kaha ṇivvuijjie tammi |
addāe paḍibibaṃ va jaṃmi dukkhaṃ ṇa saṃkamaï || 322 ||
(sphuṭatā 'pi hṛdayena subhaga! kathaṃ nivedyate tasmin |
ārdrādarśe pratibimbamiva yasmin duḥkhaṃ na saṃkrāmati ||)
uttamā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—
cakkamma़iuṃ a salīlaṃ hasiuṃ a savibbhamaṃ haakumārī |
vaṃkaṃ ca puloeuṃ avi e keṇa sikkhaviā? || 323 ||
(caṅkramituṃ salīlaṃ hasituṃ ca savibhramaṃ hatakumārī |
vakraṃ ca pralokituṃ api e kena śikṣāpitā? ||)
uttamā dhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 1.35)
diarassa asutthamaṇassa kulavahū ṇiaakuṅṅalihiāiṃ |
dihaaṃ kahei rāmāṇulaggasomitticariāiṃ || 324 ||
(devarasyāśuddhamanasaḥ kulavadhūrnijaka(nilaya) kuḍyalikhitāni |
divasaṃ kathayati rāmānulag‍nasaimitricaritāni ||)
uttamā dhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—
oucchiā si komui! tumaṃ pi māmi! komuīcaṃdade |
ramiamha jeṇa ajjaṃ so cea parejja suhao ga ga || 325 ||
{āpṛṣṭā 'si kaumudi! tvamapi mātulāni! kaumudīcandra (candre) |
ramiṣyāmo yena adya sa eva . . . subhagaḥ . . . . ||}
uttamā 'dhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—
pāṭhei kulavahue aha vama ga ga ga laï(li)asaalā |
samuccaïsse tammi āvasiuṃ || 326 ||
uttamā adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—
ṇīsesapasuttajaṇammi addharatte vva hivbhagimhamajjhaṇhe |
ahisāresi saüṇṇaṃ kumāri! kaṃ gāmataruṇāṇaṃ ? || 327 ||
(niḥśeṣaprasup‍tajane ardharātre iva (hibbha)—grīṣmamadhyāhne |
abhisārayasi sapuṇyaṃ kumāri! kaṃ grāmataruṇānām ?||)
madhyā yathā— (gāsa. 1.80)
h‍ṇaṇhāṇahaliddābhariaṃtarāi jālāi jālavalaassa |
sohaṃtī kiliṃcaa—kaṃṭaeṇa kaṃ kāhisi kaatthaṃ? || 328 ||
(s‍nānaharidrābhṛtāntarāṇi jālāni jālavalayasya |
śodhayantī kṣudrakaṇṭakena kaṃ kariṣyasi kṛtārtham? ||)
madhyā dhīrā yathā—(gāsa. 1.73)
jaṃ jaṃ so ṇijjhāaï aṃgoāsaṃ mahaṃ aṇimisaccho |
pacchāemi a taṃ taṃ icchāmi a teṇa dīsaṃtaṃ || 329 ||
(yaṃ yaṃ sa nidhyāyatyaṅgāvakāśaṃ mamānimiṣākṣaḥ |
pracchādayāmi ca taṃ tamicchāmi ca tena dṛś‍yamānam ||)
madhyā adhīrā yathā—(gāsa. 3.46)
māmi! hiaaṃ va pīaṃ teṇa juāṇeṇa majjamāṇāe |
ṇhāṇahalid‌dākaḍuaṃ aṇusottajalaṃ piaṃteṇa || 330 ||
(mātulāni! hṛdayamiva pītaṃ tena yūnā majjantyāḥ |
s‍nānaharidrākaṭukamanustroto jalaṃ pibatā ||)
madhyā ụ̄dhā yathā—(gāsa. 3.54)
taha suṇhāe puloio daravaliavaṃkatāraaṃ pahio |
jaha ghāṭi/taḍio vi gharasāmieṇa oṇiccae/oliṃdae vasio || 331 ||
(tathā s‍nuṣayā pralokito daravalitavakratārakaṃ pathikaḥ |
yathā ghāti/tāḍito 'pi gṛhasvāminā alindake uṣitaḥ ||)
madhyā anụ̄dhā yathā—
gijjaṃtāi suṇaṃto ko maṃgalakāla/gāiāṇa geāiṃ |
jaï tassa ṇāmasarisaṃ varassa gottaṃ ṇa hu huvaṃtaṃ || 332 ||
(garjitāni śrṛṇvan ko maṅgalakārakāṇāṃ geyāni |
yadi tasya nāmasadṛśaṃ varātma—gotraṃ na khalu bhavediti ||}
madhyā dhīrọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 720ve.)
diṭṭhāe jaṃ ṇa diṭṭho suhaso suṇhāe/ālaviāe jaṃ ṇa ālatto |
uvaāro jaṃ ṇa kao, taṃ via kaliaṃ chaïllehiṃ || 333 ||
(dṛṣṭyā yanna dṛṣṭaḥ subhagaḥ s‍nuṣayā/ālapitayā yannālāpitaḥ |
upacāro yanna kṛtastadeva kalitaṃ chekaiḥ ||)
madhyā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—
(gāma)chalaaṇo visūraï. . . eṇa bhu/hutaï ira vi kaheu |
kumarīe taruṇasadde āṇāparisaṃkire jāe || 334 ||
(grāma kāmijana khidyate atra tatra kilāpi kathayatu |
kumāryā taruṇasārdhe ājñāparisaṃkramaśīle jāte ||)
madhyā adhīrọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 2.65)
phalahīvāuapuṃṇṇāhamaṃgalaṃ laṃgale kuṇaṃtīe |
vahuāe maṇoharabbhagabbhiṇīe hatthā tharaharaṃti || 335 ||
(kārpāsīkṣetrakarṣaṇavāpana/vāṭaka—puṇyāhamaṅgalaṃ lāṅgale kurvatyāḥ |
vadhvā manorathābhragarbhiṇyā hastau tharatharāyete || }
madhyā adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—(gāsa. 81 0 ve.)
sā aṇṇavaravivāhe sāhārijjaï sahīhi ṇiuṇāhi |
caṃḍālahatthagaaüṇi vva jīe ṇirālaṃbā || 336 ||
(sā anyavaravivāhe saṃdhāryate sakhībhirnipuṇābhiḥ |
caṇḍālahastagataśakuniriva jīvite nirālambā ||)
madhyā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 3.49)
ajja mae gaṃtavvaṃ ghaṇaṃdhaāre vi tassa suhaassa |
vālā/ajjā ṇimīliacchī paaparipāḍiṃ ghare kuṇaï || 337 ||
(adya mayā gantavyaṃ ghanāndhakāre 'pi tasya subhagasya |
bālā/āryā nimīlitākṣī padaparipāṭīṃ gṛhe karoti ||)
madhyā dhīrā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 6.4)
māresi kaṃ ṇa muddhe! imiṇā rattaṃtatikkhavisameṇa |
bhūlaacāvaviṇiggaeṇa addhacchibhalleṇa || 338 ||
(mārayasi kaṃ na mugdhe! anena raktāntatīkṣṇaviṣameṇa |
bhrūlatā—cāpa—vinirgata—tīkṣṇatarā/rdhākṣi—bhallena ||)
madhyā adhīrā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 2.87)
āassa kiṃ ṇu kāhaṃ, kiṃ vocchaṃ, kaha ṇu hohii imaṃti |
paḍhamullaa/guggaasāhasaāriāe hiaaṃ tharaharei || 339 ||
(āgatasya kiṃ nu kariṣyāmi? kiṃ vakṣyāmi? kathaṃ nu bhaviṣyatīdam? iti |
prathamārdra/mod‌gata—sāhasakārikāyā hṛdayaṃ tharatharāyate ||)
madhyọdhā mugdhā yathā—
gah‍ṇaṃtīe ṇavalaaṃ jujjhāojjhie diarahatthāo |
rosaṇikuṃṇirajjaṃtaloaṇo vihasaï paī vi || 340 ||
{gṛh‍ṇantyā navalatāṃ yudhvā ' 'cchidya devarahastāt |
roṣanikūṇitarajyamānalocano vihasati patirapi ||}
madhyā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
o duddhagaṃdhamuhie kumāri! de hou/ devi vva vaṃdaṇijjā si |
aṇṇoṇṇagahiavisamo, gāmoccia/bho/gāmo ccia kuoe/kuo evaṃ || 341 ||
{o dugdhagandhamukhi! kumāri! paś‍ya bhavatu devīya/vandanīyā 'si |
anyonyagrahaviṣamo muktvā grāmocite (bho)grāma eva kuyoge/kuto evaṃ ||}
madhyā dhīrọdhā mugdhā yathā—
putti! bhuaṃgi vva vimukkakaṃcuā sisirapavaṇamaliṇasirī |
bhūmiharuggaavaaṇā pulaïjjasi ia bhuaṃgehiṃ || 342 ||
{putri! bhujaṅgīva vimuktakañcukā śiśirapavanamalinaśrīḥ |
bhūmibharo/dharodgatavadanā pralokyase iha bhujaṅgaiḥ || }
madhyā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
teṇa ira ṇavalaāe diṇṇo paharo imīe thaṇavaṭṭhe |
gāmakumarīhi ajja vi diahaṃ paripāliā bhamaï || 343||
(tena kila navalatayā dattaḥ prahāra etasyāḥ stanapṛṣṭhe |
grāmakumāryāḥ(yeyam)adyāpi divasaṃ pratipālitā bhramati ||)
madhyā adhīrọdhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 771 ve.)
mā mā mua parihāsaṃ deara! aṇahoraṇāe varaīe |
sīammi vi pāsijjaï puṇo vi pāse/tīse kuṇasu chāaṃ || 344 ||
(mā mā muñca parihāsa devara! aprāvaraṇāyā varākyāḥ |
śīte 'pi prasvidyate punarapi pārśve/tasyāḥ kuru cchāyām ||)
madhyā adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
tuha ṇavalaapaharapaḍicchaṇuddhasaccaviasamuhasiṇṇakaraṃ |
ajja vi re! kiṃ pucchasi kumārīaṃ ko tuha daïo/pio tti || 345 ||
