(tava navalatāprahārapratīcchanordhvasatyāpitasammukhasvinnakarām |
adyāpi re! kiṃ pṛcchāsi kumārīṃ kastava dayita/priya iti ||)
madhyamā madhyā yathā—
>sahi! lukkavia sarīraṃ ṇiriṃgipotapasiacchīe |
addiṭṭhāe uṇapecchirīeṁ dīsaṃta dhaṇṇo si || 346 ||
(sakhi! pracchādya śarīraṃ niriṅgipotaṃ paś‍ya sitākṣyā |
adṛṣṭayā punaḥprekṣaṇaśīlayā dṛśryamāna dhanyo 'si ||)
madhyamā dhīrā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 4.70)
kiṃ ṇa bhaṇio si bālaa! gāmaṇidhūāeĕ guruaṇasamakkhaṃ |
aṇimisavaṃkavalaṃtavaaṇaṇaaṇaddhadiṭṭhehiṃ || 347 ||
(kiṃ na bhaṇito 'si? bālaka! grāmaṇīduhitrā gurujanasamakṣam |
animiṣa—vakra—valamāna—vadana—nayanārdhadṛṣṭai ||)
madhyamā adhīrā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 4.69, dra.34.136)
phaṃgucchavaṇiddosaṃ keṇa vi kaddamapasāhaṇaṃ diṇṇaṃ |
thaṇaalasamuhapaloḍ‌ḍhaṃta/ṭṭaṃtaseadhoaṃ kiṇo dhuasi || 348 ||
(phālgunotsavanirdoṣaṃ1 kenāpi kardamaprasādhanaṃ dattam |
stanakalaśamukhapraluṭhatsvedadhautaṃ kimiti dhāvayasi? ||)
madhyamā ụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 7.20)
doaṃgulaa—kappaṭa/kavāḍa/kavālaapiṇaddha—savisesa—ṇīla—kaṃculiā/iā |
dāvei thaṇatthalavaṇṇiaṃ va soṇhā/taruṇī juajaṇāṇaṃ || 349 ||
{dvayaṅguvaka—karpaṭaka—pinaddha/kapāṭāpinaddha—saviśeṣa—nīla—kañculikā/kikā |
darśayati stanasthalavarṇikāmiva s‍nuṣā/taruṇī yuvajanānām || }
madhyamā anụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—
chaṇapiṭhṭhadhūsaratthaṇi॰ || 349a || (pṛ.565)
madhyamā dhīrọdhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 735ve.)
āaṃbacchiṃ vialaṃta—vāha—mābaddha—thaṇaharukkaṃpaṃ |
asamattaṃ cia acchaü/ciṭ‌ṭhaü sihiṇo abbhutthaṇamiṇaṃ te || 350 ||
(ātāmrākṣaṃ vigaladvāṣpamābaddhastanabharotkampam |
asamāp‍tamiva āstāṃ/tiṣṭhatu śikhino 'bhyuttejanamidaṃ te ||
madhyamā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—
ua māhamāsagosaggamajjirī jaï vi tharaï sīeṇa |
ajjā taha vi ṇa iccaï pāmarapajjāliaṃ aggiṃ || 351 ||
(paś‍ya māghamāsagosargamajjanaśīlā yadyapi kampate śītena |
āryā tathā 'pi necchati pāmaraprajvālitamag‍nim ||}
madhyamā adhīrọdhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 3.20)
ekakkamavaïveḍhaṇavivaraṃtaradiṇṇataralaṇaaṇāe |
tui volaṃte bālaa! paṃjarasaüṇāiaṃ tīe || 352 ||
(ekakramavṛtiveṣṭanavivarāntaradattataralanayanayā
tvayi apakrānte/gacchati bālaka! pañjaraśakunāyitaṃ tayā ||)
1. phālgunotsavo 'phāga'—padavācyaḥ |
madhyamā adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 5.41)
jammaṃtare vi calaṇe jīeṇa khu maaṇa! tujjha accissaṃ |
jaï taṃ pi teṇa bāṇeṇa vijjhase jeṇa haṃ viddhā || 353 ||
(janmāntare 'pi caraṇau jīvane khalu madana! tavārcayiṣyāmi |
yadi tamapi tena bāṇena vidhyasi yenāhaṃ viddhā ||)
madhyamā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 3.10)
je samuhāgaavolaṃtavaliapiapesiacchivicchohā |
amhaṃ te maaṇasarā jaṇassa je hoṃti te hoṃtu || 354 ||
(ye saṃmukhāgata-vyatikrānta-valita-priya-preṣitākṣi-vikṣobhāḥ |
asmākaṃ te madanaśarā janasya ye bhavanti te bhavantu||)
madhyamā dhīrā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 2.98)
bahuso vi kahijjaṃtaṃ tuha vaaṇaṃ majjha hatthasaṃdiṭṭhaṃ |
ṇa suaṃ ti jaṃpamāṇā puṇaruttasaaṃ kuṇaï ajjā || 355 ||
(bahuśo 'pi kathyamānaṃ tava vacanaṃ mama hastasaṃdiṣṭam |
na śrutamiti jalpantī punaruktaśataṃ karotyāryā ||)
madhyamā adhīrā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 2.99)
pāāḍia—ṇeha—sabbhāva—ṇibbharaṃ tīe jaha tumaṃ diṭṭho |
saṃvaraṇavāvaḍāe(ṇa) aṇṇo vi jaṇo taha ccea || 356 ||
(prakaṭitas‍nehasadbhāvanirbharaṃ tayā yathā tvaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ |
saṃvaraṇavyāpṛtayā (na) anyo 'pi janastathaiva ||)
madhyamā ụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.32)
kaṃ suaṇu! sūra—ṇamaṇacchaleṇa kulaaṃ/kuviaṃ jaṇaṃ pasāesi |
hāsa—kaḍakkhummīsā na hoṃti devāṇa jokkārā || 357 ||
(kaṃ sutanu! sūryanamanacchalena kulajaṃ/kupitaṃ janaṃ prasādayasi |
hāsakaṭākṣonmiśrā na bhavanti devānāṃ jayakārāḥ ||)
madhyamā anụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 825 ve.)
kaïā jāā kaïā ṇu sikkhiā māuā! haakumārī |
taṃ taṃ jāṇaï savvaṃ, jaṃ jaṃ mahilāo jāṇaṃti || 358 ||
(kadā jātā ? kadā nu śikṣitā? mātaḥ! hatakumārī |
tattaj jānāti sarvaṃ yadyanmahilā jānanti ||)
madhyamā dhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 734 ve.)
kaha de/kaḍue dhūaṃdhāre abbhutthaṇamaggiṇo samappihisi/hii |
muhakamalacuṃbaṇolloluammi vāsaṭhṭhie/pāsaṭhṭhie diare || 359 ||
(kathaṃ/kaṭuke he/sakhi dhūmod‌gāre/dhūmāndhakāre abhyutthā/tejanamag‍neḥ samāpsyate |
mukhakamalacumbanollolupe/ lampaṭe vāsasthite/pārś‍vasthite devare ||)
madhyamā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 7.43)
maṇṇe āaṇṇaṃtā, āsaṇṇavivāhamaṃgaluggīaṃ |
teṇa juāṇeṇa samaṃ, hasaṃti maṃ veasakuḍuṃgā || 360 ||
(manye ākarṇayanta āsannavivāhamaṅgalodgītam |
tena yūnā samaṃ hasanti māṃ vetasanikuñjāḥ ||)
madhyamā adhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā(gāsa. 1.93)
avitiṇhapecchaṇijjeṇa takkhaṇaṃ māmi! teṇa diṭṭheṇa |
siviṇaapīeṇa va pāṇieṇa taṇhaṃ ccia ṇa phiṭṭā || 361 ||
(avitṛṣṇaprekṣaṇīyena tatkṣaṇaṃ mātulāni! tena dṛṣṭena |
svap‍napīteneva pānīyena tṛṣṇaiva na bhraṣṭā ||)
madhyamā 'dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 7.17)
kiṃ bhaṇaï maṃ sahīo! mā mara, dīsi/lakkhihii so jiaṃtīe |
kajjālāo eso, siṇehamaggo ccia/uṇa ṇa hoi || 362 ||
(kiṃ bhaṇatha māṃ sakhyaḥ! mā mriyasva drakṣyate/lakṣiṣyate sa jīvantyā |
kāryālāpa eṣa s‍nehamārga eva na/punarna bhavati ||)
kaniṣṭhā yathā—(gāsa. 865 ve.)
emea maṃdapuṇṇā appattamaṇorahā vivajjissaṃ |
jaṇavāo vi ṇa jāo teṇa samaṃ haliaütteṇa || 363 ||
(evameva mandapuṇyāprāp‍tamanorathā vipatsye |
janavādo 'pi na jātastena samaṃ hālikaputreṇa ||)
kaniṣṭhā dhīrā yathā—(gāsa. 3.31)
tujjha a sohaggaguṇaṃ amahilasarisaṃ a sāhasaṃ majjha |
jāiṇa golāūro vāsārattoddharatto a || 364 ||
(tava ca saubhāgyaguṇamamahilāsadṛśaṃ ca sāhasaṃ mama |
jānāti godāpūro varṣārātro 'rdharātraśca ||)
kaniṣṭhā adhīrā yathā—(gāsa. 1.57)
agaṇiasesajuāṇā vālaa! volīṇa—loa—majjāā |
aha sā bhamaï disāmuhapasāriacchī tuha kaeṇa || 365 ||
(agaṇitaśeṣayuvajanā bālaka! vilīna/vyatikrānta—lokamaryādā |
atha sā bhramati diśāmukhaprasāritākṣī tava kṛte ||)
kaniṣṭhā ụ̄dhā yathā—(gāsa. 769 ve.)
aṇusoaï haliavahū raïkiraṇoluggapaṃḍuracchāaṃ |
raṇṇuṃdūru—daṃtukkhutta—visama—vilaaṃ tilacchettaṃ || 366 ||
(anuśocati halikavadhūḥ ravikiraṇāvarugṇapāṇḍaracchāyam |
araṇyonduradantotkṛttaviṣamavalitaṃ tilakṣetram ||)
kaniṣṭhā anụ̄dhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.28)
ṇīāi ajja ṇik‍kiva! piṇaddha—ṇava—raṃgaāe varaīe |
gharaparivāḍīe paridhāṇāṇi/paheṇaāiṁ tuha daṃsaṇāsāe || 367 ||
(nītānyadya niṣkṛpa! pinaddhanavaraṅgakayā varākyā |
gṛhaparipāṭyā praheṇakāni tava darśanāśayā ||)
kaniṣṭhā dhīrọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 3.29)
savvassammi vi daḍ‌̣dhe gahavaïdhūāa ṇivvui ccea |
jaṃ tīe gāmaḍāhe hatthāhatthiṃ kuḍo gahio || 368 ||
(sarvasminnapi/sarvasva 'pi dagdhe gṛhapatiduhiturnirvṛtireva |
yat tayā grāmadāhe hastāhastikayā kuṭo gṛhītaḥ ||}
kaniṣṭhā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—
jaṇaṇī asaṃkamāṇī jāe vārejjaṇāmmalaṇe . . .|
ṇecchaï dụdh‌ḍhakumārī kurao opoṃtiā houṃ(?) || 369 ||
kaniṣṭhā adhīrọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.59)
āhavaïsuācciesu vi phalahīveṃṭesu uaha vahuāe |
mohaṃ bhamaï pulaïo vilaggaseaṃ/seagalaṃtaṃ—gulī hattho || 370 ||
(gṛhapatisutāvaciteṣvapi kārpāsavṛnteṣu paś‍yata vadhvāḥ |
moghaṃ bhramati pulakito vilag‍na/galat—vedāṅgulirhastaḥ ||)
kaniṣṭhā adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—(gāsa. 5.56)
dhāvaï purao pāsesu bhamaï diṭṭhīpahammi saṃṭhāi |
ṇavalaïāhatthaa haliaütta! de haṃmaü kumārīṃ || 371 ||
(dhāvati purataḥ pārśvayorbhramati dṛṣṭipathe saṃtiṣṭhate |
navalatikāhasta halikaputra! dayasva hanyasva kumārīm ||)
kaniṣṭhā mugdhā yathā—
gāme gaïvaï ṇaṃ bhaṇa sāhasu taṃ ajja keṇa suṇaïṭṭho |
phaggucchaṇacikkille tie hasi (a jadaṇuṭhṭhiaṃ tumae) || 372 ||
kaniṣṭhā dhīrā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.13)
puṭṭhiṃ pusasu kisoari! paḍoghaaṃkolla—pattacittaliaṃ |
cheāhi diarajāāhiṃ ujjue! mā kalijjihisi || 373 ||
{pṛṣṭhaṃ proñcha kṛśodari! paścādṛhāṅkoṭapatracitritam |
(chekābhirdevarajāyābhī ṛjuke! mā jñāsyase/kaliṣyase ||}
kaniṣṭhā adhīrā mugdhā yathā— (gāsa. 5.38)
jo vi ṇa pucchaï tassa vi kahei bhaggāiṁ teṇa valaāiṁ |
aïujjuā varāī ahava pio so haāsāe || 374 ||
(yo 'pi na pṛcchati tasyāpi kathayati bhag‍nāni tena valayāni |
atiṛjukā varākī athavā priyastasyā hatāśāyāḥ ||)
kaniṣṭhā ụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
vevāhiūṇa vahuā sāsuraaṃ doliāe ṇijjaṃtī |
roaï, diaro taṃ saṃṭhavei vaaṇammiṃ cuṃbato || 375 ||
(vivāhya vadhūḥ śvāśurakaṃ dolikayā nīyamānā |
roditi, devarastāṃ saṃsthāpayati vadane cumban ||)
kaniṣṭhā anụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
ajja mae māucchā! sojjhaa/ saïjbhagehe maṇorahabbhariaṃ |
gahavaïuttakaḍillaṃ, diṭṭhaṃ ṇiarūvalāvaṇiaṃ || 376 ||
(adya mayā mātṛṣvasaḥ! (sakhi) rajaka/prativeśikagehe manoharaṃ bhramitam |
gṛhapatiputrakaṭīvastre dṛṣṭaṃ nijarūpalāvaṇyam ||}
kaniṣṭhā dhīrọdhā mugdhā yathā—
āresamuhaṃ bhario cciriḍḍihilleṇotiḍiṃkāuṃ |
jaï tapaḍihalaattetā chette jāmi diarassa || 377 ||
kaniṣṭhā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 741)
jaï vi khu dilliṃdiliā taha ve khu mā putti! ṇaggiā bhamasu |
gahavaïsuāṇa majjhe silaṃpi te pajjharāveti ||
{yadyapi khalu bālā tathā 'pi khalu mā putri! nag‍nikā bhrama |
gṛhapatisutānāṃ madhye śīlamapi te 1patraśoṣāyate ? ||}
kaniṣṭhā adhīrọdhā mugdhā yathā—
diaro pariṇihaï phuḍaṃ suṇhā suṇiuṃ khu ḍukkhiā jāā |
sesiagharavāvārā oruṇṇamuhī paribbhamaï || 379 ||
(devaraḥ pariṇeṣyati sphuṭaṃ s‍nuṣā śrutvā suduḥkhitā jātā |
śoṣitagṛhavyāpārā avaruditamukhī paribhramati ||)
kaniṣṭhā adhīrānụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
bhajjaṃti jāi maüāi saṃkio bharaï tāi valaāiṃ |
gahavaïdhūā—sikkāra—kalaravā—aṇaṇa—saïṇho || 380 ||
{bhajyante yāni mṛdukāni śaṅkito bharati tāni valayāni |
gṛhapatiduhitṛ—sītkārakalaravakarṇanasatṛṣṇaḥ ||}
kaniṣṭhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 714ve.)
jaṃ asaraṇo vva ḍaḍ‌̣dho gāmo sāhīṇabahujuāṇo vi |
saṃbhavisaṃṭhulāṇaṃ taṃ duccariaṃ tuha thaṇāṇaṃ || 389 ||
(yadi aśaraṇa iva dagdho grāmaḥ svādhīnabahuyuvā 'pi |
saṃbhramavisaṃsthulayordṛṣṭvā caritaṃ tava stanayoḥ||)
1. patraśoṣaḥ patajhaḍa—pada—vedyo śiśiravasanta—sandhikālaḥ |
kaniṣṭhā dhīrā madhyā yathā—
thaṇavarajovvaṇṇummahaṇā gavvirī/ummaïa bhamaï tujjha re! jāā |
teṇa tumaṃ kāmijjasi roseṇaṃ ṇa maha asareo/ṇurāao || 382 ||
{stanabharayauvanonmatta—garviṇī bhramati tava re! jāyā |
tena tvaṃ kāmayase roṣeṇa na mamāvasaraḥ/mamānurāgataḥ ||}
kaniṣṭhā adhīrā yathā—(gāsa. 4.79)
rụdh‌ḍhatīa/bhaṃḍaṃtīe taṇāiṃ souṃ diṇṇāiṃ jāiṃ pahiassa |
tāiṃ ccea pahāe ajjā āāḍ‌ḍhaï kuaṃtī/ruaṃtī || 383 ||
(ruṣyantyā tṛṇāni svapituṃ dattāni yāni pathikasya |
tānyeva prabhāte āryā ākarṣati kupyantī/rudatī ||)
kaniṣṭhā ụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 3.57)
vaï—vivara—ṇiggaa—halo eraṃḍo sāhaï vva taruṇāṇaṃ |
ettha ghare haliavahū eddahamettatthaṇī vasaï || 384 ||
(vṛtivivaranirgataphala eraṇḍaḥ sādhayatīva taruṇebhyaḥ |
atra gṛhe halikavadhūḥ etāvanmātrastanī vasati ||)
kaniṣṭhā anụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 6.45)
gāmakumarīo vi hiaaṃ haraṃti/raī vẹdhālaṇa/thaṇaharābhoā |
sā me/saaṇe kusuṃbharāillakaṃcuāharaṇamettā vi || 385 ||
(grāmakumāryo hṛdayaṃ haranti vidagdhānāṃ stanabharābhogāḥ |
sā me/śayane kusumbharañjitakañcukābharaṇamātrā api ||)
kaniṣṭhā dhīrọdhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 6.49)
voḍhaṃ/poḍhasuṇao viva/aṇṇo aṇṇaṃ/ttā mattā paheṇaasurāe |
phalihaṃ a moḍiaṃ mahisaeṇa, ko sāhaü tassa?/ ko tassa sāheu || 386 ||
{vṛddhaśunako vipannaḥ anyo mattaḥ pathi navasurayā praheṇa (utsava) surayā |
karyāsakṣetraṃ ca moṭitaṃ mahiṣakeṇa, kaḥ sādhayatu/kathayatu tasya? ||}
kaniṣṭhā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—
sāmāi sāmalīe॰ (pṛ.567)
kaniṣṭhā adhīrọdhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 5.61)
ua saṃbhamavikkhittaṃ ramiavva—alehalāeĕ suṇhāe |
ṇavaraṃgaaṃ kuḍuṃge, diṇṇaṃ dhaaṃ va aviṇaassa || 387 ||
(paśrya saṃbhramavikṣip‍taṃ rantavyakalampaṭayā s‍nuṣayā |
navaraṅgakaṃ kuñje dattaṃ dhvajamivāvinayasya ||)
kaniṣṭhā adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—
ṇava/raṃ varo vi païbhāi voḍhakumarīeṁ viasiavilā/so |
gāmajuāṇaṃ(daṭṭhuṃ) ṇaïaḍakuḍuṃgabhamaraṃ bhamati/bhamaṃtīe || 388 ||
(kevalaṃ varo 'pi, pratibhāti, prauḍhakumāryā vikasitavilāsam |
grāmayūnāṃ draṣṭuṃ/vā nadītaṭanikuñjabhramaraṃ, bhramati/bhramantyāḥ ||)
kaniṣṭhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.35)
bahalatamā haarāī॰ || 389 || (pṛ.367)
kaniṣṭhā dhīrā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 877)
mahuehi kiṃ va paṃthia॰ || 390 || (pṛ. 367)
kaniṣṭhā adhīrā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.48)
aṃgāṇaṃ taṇuāraa! sikkhāvaa! dīharoviavvāṇaṃ |
viṇaāikkamakāraa! mā mā ṇaṃ pamhasijjāsu || 391 ||
(aṅgānāṃ tanukāraka! śikṣāpaka! dīrgharoditavyānām |
vinayātikramakāraka! mā mā enāṃ prasmariṣyasi/visamareḥ ||)
kaniṣṭhā ụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 2.7)
golāaḍaṭṭhiaṃ pocchiūṇa gahavaïsuaṃ haliasuṇhā |
āḍhattā uttariuṃ, dukkhuttārāeṁ paavīe || 392 ||
(godāvarītaṭasthitaṃ prekṣya gṛhapatisutaṃ halikas‍nuṣā |
ārabdhā uttarituṃ duḥkhottārayā padavyā ||)
kaniṣṭhānụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—
mammasuaka/phalliājahaṇathaṇabharuppahaṇavibbhalā kumarī |
bahuso halāsamammaṃṇamama X X X X haï || 393 ||
{marmasutasphaṭikājaghanastanabharotpraghaṇavihvalā kumārī |
bahuśo X X X X X X X ti ||}
kaniṣṭhā dhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—
avvo mārijjāmo imiṇā pāpā/vāsuassa putteṇa |
jaṃ jaṃ je/pecchaï pahiaṃ taṃ taṃ pavvo/bappo tti vāharaï || 394 ||
(aho! māriṣyāmo 'nena pāpāsutasya putreṇa |
yaṃ yaṃ prekṣate pathikaṃ taṃ taṃ pitariti vyāharati ||)
kaniṣṭhā dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—
aï sahi! vakullāviri chuhihisi gottassa matthae chāraṃ |
atthaccaṃtta/daṃtadiṭhṭheṇa mārivaḍie sāmivalieṇa/hasieṇa || 395 ||
(ayi sakhi! vakrollāpanaśīle lepisyasi gotrasya mastake kṣāram |
atyantadantadṛṣṭena sāmivalitena vihasitena ||)
kaniṣṭhā adhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—
karaseakaddamāa duliāpahuttathaṃsasuho |
seaṃ suehiṃ kulavahū eṇhasiaṃsuo thaṇaso || 396 ||
kaniṣṭhā adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—
ṇavalaahattho/tthe gāmiṇisuammi kumarīeṁ gāmaracchāsu |
puṇaruttamasikha/ttaṃbhamirie culluculāaṃti aṃgāi || 397 ||
{navalatāhasto(ste) grāmaṇīsute kumāryā grāmarathyāsu |
punaruktamaśikṣa bhramaṇaśīlāyā culluculāyanti aṅgāni ||}
dhīrā yathā—gāsa. 1.84)
so tuha kaeṇa suṃdari! taha jhiṇṇo sumahilo haliaütto |
jaha se macchiriṇīeṁ vi doccaṃ jāāe paḍivaṇṇaṃ || 398 ||
(sa tava kṛte sundari! tathā kṣīṇaḥ sumahilo halikaputraḥ |
yathā tasya matsariṇyā 'pi dūtyaṃ jāyayā pratipannam ||)
dhīrọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 5.45)
akaaṇṇua! tujjha kae vā/pāusarāīsu jaṃ mae khuṇṇaṃ |
uppekkhimo alajjira! ajja vi taṃ gāmacikkhallaṃ || 399 ||
(akṛtajña! tava kṛte prāvṛḍ‌rātriṣu yo mayā kṣuṇṇaḥ |
utpaś‍yāmya/utprekṣāmahe alajjāśīla! adyāpi taṃ grāmapaṅkam ||)
dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—(gāsa. 7.48)
tatto c‍cia hoṃti kahā viasaṃti tahiṃ tahiṃ samappaṃti |
kiṃ maṇṇe māucchā! ekkajuvāṇo imo gāmo ? || 400 ||
(tata eva bhavanti kathā vikasanti tatra tatra samāpyante |
kiṃ manye mātṛṣvasaḥ! ekayuvako 'yaṃ grāmaḥ ? ||)
adhīrā yathā—(gāsa. 5.40)
seulliasavvaṃgī gottaggahaṇeṇa tassa suhaassa |
dūiṃ appāhaṃtī/patthāeṃtī tassai a gharaṃgaṇaṃ pattā || 401 ||
(svedārdrīkṛtasarvāṅgī gotragrahaṇena tasya subhagasya |
dūtīṃ sandiśantī/prasthāpayantī tasyaiva gṛhāṅgaṇaṃ prāp‍tā ||)
adhīrọdhā yathā—(gāsa. 3.23)
taï volaṃte vālaa! vahueṁ valiāi taha ṇu ṇaaṇāi |
jaha puṭhṭha/paṭṭhamajjhanivaḍaṃtavāhadhārāoṃ dīsaṃti || 402 ||
(tvayi vyatikrāmati bālaka! vadhvā valite tathā nu nayane |
yathā pṛṣṭhamadhyanipatad‍bāṣpadhārā dṛś‍yante ||)
adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā yathā—(gāsa. 7.96)
eṇhiṃ vārei jaṇo, taïā mūalla/maallio? ja(ka)hiṃ/jahiṃ vi gao ? |
jāhe visaṃ va jāaṃ/visamaṃ savvaṃgapaholiraṃ pemmaṃ || 403 ||
(idānīṃ vārayati janastadā mūkīkṛtāḥ? kutrāpi (vā) gataḥ ? |
yadā viṣamiva jātaṃ sarvāṅgaghūrṇanaśīlaṃ prema ||).
ụ̄dhā yathā—(gāsa. 5.57)
karimaāṇaṃdavaṭaṃ bhāmijjaṃtaṃ vahūeṁ badhūhiṃ |
pecchaï kumārijāro hāsummissehi acchīhiṃ || 404 ||
(kṛtrimamānandapaṭaṃ bhrāmyamāṇaṃ vadhvā vandhubhiḥ |
prekṣate kumārījāro hāsonmiśrābhyāmakṣibhyām ||)
anụ̄dhā yathā—
jaï/ha khellasi pāppullāṃ/upphullaṃ moṭṭīṇehi/ammodhīreṇa pattīhi sasimuhi ! hasaṃtī |
dhaṇṇaṃ kaṃ pi ramīhisi dolāaṃteṇa jahaṇeṇa || 405 ||
(yadi khelasi utphullikāmaho dhairyeṇa pratīhi śaśimukhi! hasantī |
dhanyaṃ kamapi ramiṣyasi dolāyamānena jaghanena ||)
dhīrā mugdhā yathā—
aṃdolaṇalaṃghia—taṭṭhiāeṃ/vaïsihāeṃ diṭṭhe tumammi muddhāe |
āsaṃkhi/ghijjaï kāuṃ karapellaṇaṇic‍calā dolā || 406 ||
{āndolanalaṅghitotthitayā/vartiśikhayā dṛṣṭe tvayi mugdhayā |
āśāsyate kartuṃ karapreraṇaniścalā dolā ||}
dhīrọdhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsā. 4.13)
puṭṭhaṃ pusasu kisoari॰ || 407 || (dra. 15.373)
dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 2.89)
tujjhaṃgarāaseseṇa sāmalī taha khareṇa somālā |
sā ira golātūhe/ūle ṇahāṇū/ṇhāā jaṃbukasāeṇa || 408 ||
(tavāṅgarāgaśeṣeṇa ś‍yāmalā tathā khareṇa sukumārā |
sā kila godātaṭe s‍nātā jambūkaṣāyeṇa ||)
adhīrā mugdhā yathā—(prakāśa. 34.131)
suṇhāe/a hiaaguṇiaṃ dīsaï/dāvaī diarassaṃ chaṇapaīveṇa |
sajjhasa—paaṃpia—tthaṇa—ṇīsāsaṃdolia—siheṇa || 409 ||
(s‍nuṣāyā hṛdayaguṇitaṃ dṛś‍yate devarasya kṣaṇapradīpena |
sādhvasaprakampitastananiḥ śvāsāndolitaśikhena ||)
adhīrọdhā mugdhā yathā—
taṃ kiṃ/kaṃ pi kaaṃ uggiṇapaharabhaavevirīe vahaāe |
paḍiā vi jeṇa ṇāā hatthāhi laāṇa diareṇa || 410 ||
(tat kimapi kṛtamudgīrṇapraharabhayavepanaśīlayā vadhvā |
patitā 'pi yena jñātā hastāllatā na devareṇa ||)
adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 5.82)
ujjaggaraa—kasāia—guruacchī mohamaṃḍaṇavilakkhā |
lajjaï lajjāuïṇī sā suhaa! sahīṇa vi varāī || 411 ||
(ujjāgarakakaṣāyitagurvakṣī moghamaṇḍanavilakṣā |
lajjate lajjālutayā sā subhaga! sakhībhyo 'pi varākī ||)
ụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—
jaha ṇaaṇā saviārā thaṇāṇa jaha uggamo suveso tti |
jaï lahaï jovvaṇasiriṃ tā muddhā kāhii aṇatthaṃ || 412 ||
(yathā na़yane savikāre stanayoryathā udgamaḥ suveśa iti |
yadi labhate yauvanaśriyaṃ tarhi mugdhā kariṣyatyanartham ||)
anụ̄dhā mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.78)
jaṃ jaṃ karesi jaṃ jaṃ ca jaṃpasi/se jaha tumaṃ ṇiaṃsesi/acchesi |
taṃ tamaṇusikkhirīe dīho diaho ṇa saṃpala/ḍaï || 413 ||
(yad yat karoṣi yad yac‍ca jalpasi yathā tvaṃ nivasa/nirīkṣase |
tattadanuśikṣaṇaśīlayā dīrgho divaso na saṃpadyate ||)
dhīrā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 1.21)
asamattamaṃḍaṇa via/c‍ci vac‍ca gharaṃ se sakouhallassa |
volāvia—halahalaassa putti! citte ṇa laggihisi || 414 ||
(asamāp‍tamaṇḍanaiva vraja gṛhaṃ tasya sakautūhalasya |
vyatikrāntautsuṃkyasya putri ! citte na lagiṣyasi ||)
dhīrọdhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 4.95)
ajjāe ṇīlakaṃcuabhariuvvariaṃ vihāi thaṇavaṭṭhaṃ |
jalabhariajalaharaṃtadaruggaaṃ caṃdabiṃbaṃ vva || 415 ||
(āryāyā nīlakañcukabhṛtorvaritaṃ vibhāti stanapṛṣṭham |
jalabhṛtajaladharāntaradarodgataṃ candrabimbamiva ||)
dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—
phaṃgucchaṇadohaliṇā/ā bhamamāṇā putti ! gāmaracchāsu |
gūḍhakkharadiṇṇapaheliappa/ā a keṇāvi bhaṃjihisi || 416 ||
(phālgunotsavadohadinī bhramamāṇā putri ! grāmarathyāsu |
gụ̄dhākṣaradattaprahelikātmā/kā ca kenāpi bhaṅkṣyase ||)
adhīrā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 4.51)
jāo so vi vilakhkho mae vi hasiūṇa gāḍhamuvaụ̄dho |
paḍamosariassa ṇiaṃsaṇassa gaṃṭhiṃ vimaggaṃto || 417 ||
(jātaḥ so 'pi vilakṣo mayā 'pi hasitvā gāḍhamupagūḍhaḥ |
prathamāpasṛtasya nivasanasya granthiṃ vimārgayamāṇaḥ ||)
adhīrọdhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 1.28)
ṇavalaapaharaṃ aṃge jahiṃ jahiṃ mahaï devaro dāuṃ |
romaṃcadaṃḍha/ḍarāī tahiṃ tahiṃ dīsaï vahūe || 418 ||
(navalatāprahāramaṃge yatra yatrecchati devaro dātum |
romāñcadaṇḍarājistatra tatra dṛś‍yate vadhvāḥ ||)
adhīrā 'nụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 2.1)
dhario dhario vialaï uvaeso piasahīhiṃ dijjaṃto |
maaraddhaabāṇapahārajajjare tīeṁ hiaammi || 419 ||
(dhṛto dhṛto vigalatyupadeśaḥ priyasakhībhirdīyamānaḥ |
makaradhvajabāṇaprahārajarjhare tasyā hṛdaye ||)
ụ̄dhā madhyamā yathā—
taruṇehi kaaṃ/ oṃ tosaṃ hasiaṃ(uṇa)dhe/therehi kuṇama īhiṃ/kaamaīhi |
pariṇaa—vaāvacūḍaṃ boḍhaṃ kumariṃ ṇie ūṇa || 420 ||
anụ̄dhā madhyā yathā—
tā kuṇaha kālaharaṇaṃ tuvaraṃtammi vi vare vivāhassa |
jā paṃḍuṇahavaāiṃ hoṃti kumārīeĕ aṃgāiṃ || 421 ||
(tāvat kuruta kālaharaṇaṃ tvaramāṇo 'pi vare vivāhasya |
yāvat pāṇḍunakhapadāni bhavanti kumāryā aṅgāni ||)
dhīrā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 4.57ve.)
sabbhāvaṃ pucchaṃtī bālaa ! roāviā tuha piāe |
ṇatthi vvia kaasavahaṃ hāsuṃmissaṃ bhaṇaṃtīe || 422 ||
(sadbhāvaṃ pṛcchantī bālaka! roditā tava priyayā |
nāstyeva kṛtaśapathaṃ hāsonmiśraṃ bhaṇantyā ||)
dhīrọdhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 7.8)
jaï jūraü ṇāma māmi! paraloa—vasaṇio loo |
taha vi balā gāmaṇiuttavaaṇakamale/ṇaṃdaṇassa valaï diṭhṭhī || 423 ||
(yadi khidyate khidyatāṃ nāma mātulāni! paralokavyasaniko lokaḥ |
tathā 'pi balād grāmaṇīputravadanakamale/nandanasya valate dṛṣṭiḥ ||)
dhīrā 'nụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 857ve.)
kaha ṇu gaā? kaha diṭṭho? kiṃ bhaṇiaṃ? kiṃ va teṇa paḍivaṇṇaṃ? |
eaṃ ccia ṇa samappaï puṇaruttaṃ jaṃpamāṇīe || 424 ||
(kathaṃ nu gatā? kathaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ? kiṃ bhaṇitaṃ? kiṃ vā tena pratipannam? |
evameva na samāpyate punaruktaṃ jalpamānāyāḥ ||)
ụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 3. 37)
païpurao vvia ṇijjaï viccuadaṭhṭha tti jāravejjagha/haraṃ |
sahijaṇa/ṇiuṇasahīkaradhariā bhuajualaṃdoliṇī bālā/ajjā || 425 ||
(patipurata eva nīyate vṛścikadaṣṭeti jāravaidyagṛham |
sakhījanakaradhṛtabhujalatāndolanaśīlā bālā/āryā ||)
anụ̄dhā pragalbhā yathā—
jaha savilāsaṃ hāsaṃ, garaaṃpā (jaha sāūā) aṇujjuā diṭhṭhī |
esā vi jaï kumārī tā ajuāṇo imo gāmo || 426 ||
{yathā savilāso hāsaḥ yathā sākūtā anṛjukā dṛṣṭiḥ |
eṣā 'pi yadi kumārī tarhi ayuvāko 'yaṃ grāmaḥ ||}
mugdhā yathā—(gāsa. 7. 97)
kaha taṃ pi tue, ṇa ṇāaṃ, jaha sā āsaṃdiāṇaṃ bahuāṇaṃ |
kāūṇa apputti/puṃtisiḍiṃuccavaciaṃ tuha daṃsaṇalehaḍā/lā paḍiā || 427 ||
(kathaṃ tadapi tvayā na jñātaṃ yathā sā āsandikānāṃ bahūnāṃ/vadhūnām |
kṛtvā āpūrttiśreṇīṃ/uccāvācikāṃ tava darśanalālasā patitā ||}
madhyā yathā—(gāsa. 3. 21)
tā kiṃ kareu jaï tuṃ/taṃ si tīe vaïveḍhapellia—thaṇīe |
pāaṃguṭṭhaddhakhitta/kkhiṇīsahaṃgīeṁ vi ṇa diṭhṭho || 428 ||
(tat kiṃ karotu yadi tvamasi tayā vṛtiveṣṭananiveśitastanayā |
pādāṅguṣṭhārdhakṣip‍tanissahāṅgayā 'pi na dṛṣṭaḥ ||)
pragalbhā yathā—(gāsa. 2. 93)
golāvisamoāracchaleṇa appā urammi se khitto/mukko |
aṇuaṃpāṇiddosaṃ teṇa vi sā āḍhamuvaụ̄dhā || 429 ||
(godāvarīviṣamāvatāracchalenātmā urasi tasya kṣip‍taḥ |
anukampānirdoṣaṃ tenāpi sā gāḍhamupagụ̄dhā ||)
evaṃ punarbhūsāmānyayoḥ yathāsaṃbhavamuttamādibhedo 'bhyūhanīyaḥ |
(aṣṭau nāyikābhedāḥ)
āsu vāsakasajjā abhisārikā, vipralabdhā, khaṇḍitā, kalahāntaritā, proṣitapatikā, virahotkaṇṭhitā, svādhīnabhartṛkā ceti yathāsaṃbhavamabhyūhanīyāḥ | tatra—
1. vāsakasajjā yathā—(amaruḥ?)
sakhi! sa vijito vīṇādyūte kayā 'pyaparastriyā paṇitamabhavat tābhyāṃ tasmin niśālalitaṃ dhruvam |
kathamitarathā śophālīṣu skhalatkusumāsvapi sthitavati nabhomadhye 'pīndau priyeṇa vilabyate? || 430 ||
2. abhisārikā yathā—(gāsa. 7.7)
gammihisi tassa pāsaṃ mā turasu suaṇu vaḍ̣dheu miaṃko |
duddhe duddhaṃ via caṃdimāeṁ ko pecchaï muhaṃ de? || 431 ||
(gamiṣyasi tasya pārśvaṃ mā tvarasva taruṇi! vardhatāṃ mṛgāṅkaḥ |
dugdhe dugdhamiva candrikāyāṃ kaḥ prekṣate mukhaṃ te? ||)
3. vipralabdhā yathā—(gāsa. 4. 18)
aha sā tahiṃ tahiṃ ccia vāṇīravaṇammi cukkasaṃkeā |
tuha daṃsaṇaṃ vimaggaï, pabbhaṭṭhaṇihāṇaṭhāṇaṃ va || 432 ||
{atha sā tatratatraiva vānīravane vismṛtacyutasaṃketā |
tava darśanaṃ vimārgati prabhraṣṭanidhānasthānamiva ||}
4. khaṇḍitā yathā—(gāsa. 7. 53)
paccūsāgaa navarāaratta kaaloaṇāṇaṃda |
aṇṇattha khaviasavvari ṇahabhūsaṇa diṇavaï ṇamo de || 433 ||
(pratyūṣāgata! navarāgarakta! kṛtalocanānanda! |
anyatra kṣapitaśarvarīka nabho/nakhabhūṣaṇa dinapate namaste ||)
5. kalahāntaritā yathā—
mayā tāvad gotraskhalanahatakopāntaritayā nirụ̄dho nirgacchan bahirahataroṣaḥ priyatamaḥ |
ayaṃ tvākūtajñaḥ sakalasamayācāranipuṇaḥ sakhīloko 'pyasīllikhita iva citre 'dya, kimidam? || 434 ||
6. proṣitapatikā yathā—
bhiamela/gimhaṃ gamei kahakahavi kahaü/vikarahasihi—tāviā vi pahiavahū |
aviraapaḍi/ḍaṃttaṇivbharabāhajalollovarilleṇa || 435 ||
(bhīmilite! grīṣmaṃ gamayati kathaṃ kathamapi kathaṃ/virahaśikhitāpitāpi pathikavadhūḥ |
aviratapradīp‍tani/aviralapatannirbharabāṣpajalollāpaśīlena ||)
7. virahotkaṇṭhitā yathā—
asmin varṣamahe na vartata idaṃ yat kāmadevotsave stheyaṃ putri! nirastayā/nirannayā, tadadhunā kiñcinmukhe dīyatām |
ityukte jaratījanena sutarāmāviṣkṛtkaṇṭhayā tanvaṅgayā parikalpitaṃ kavalanaṃ dhautañca dhārāśrubhiḥ || 436 ||
8. svādhīnabhartṛkā yathā—(gāsa. 3. 61)
ghariṇi—ghaṇatthaṇa—pellaṇasuhellipaḍiassa hoṃtapahiassa |
avasaüṇaṃgāraavāraviṭṭhidiahā suhāaṃ/veṃti || 437 ||
(gṛhiṇīghanastanapreraṇasukhakelipatitasya bhaviṣyatpathikasya |
apaśakunāṅgārakavāraviṣṭidivasāḥ1 sukhāpayanti ||)
1. aṅgārako maṅgalaḥ| vāro divasaḥ| maṅgalavāra ityarthaḥ | kapratyayo 'prāśastyāya| tathā ca māgho 'bhaumadivasamabhimanvate 'thavā bhṛśamapraśastamapi maṅgalaṃ janāḥ'|
svakīyasāmānyapunarbhuvāṃ ca bhidāṃ prapañcaḥ sa ivāvabaddhaḥ |
parasparaṃ proṣitabhartṛkādibhedairvibhinno 'tra nibandhanīyaḥ || 438 ||
iti prapañcaḥ kathito 'ṅganānāṃ kramāt svakīyādivibhedabhinnaḥ |
catuṣprakāraṃ tamamuṃ nibandhan kaviścaturvargaphalaṃ labheta || 439 ||
tadetat sarvasvaṃ bhuvanajayinaḥ puṣpadhanuṣo manuṣyāṇāmekaṃ tadidamasamaṃ jīvitaphalam |
idaṃ tat saukhyānāṃ kulabhavanamādyaṃ tribhuvane yadetat tāruṇyopahitamahimāno mṛgadṛśaḥ || 440 ||
iti mahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakāśe ratyālambanavibhāvaprakāśano nāma | pañcadaśaḥ prakāśaḥ || 15 ||
prākṛtabahalaḥ so 'yaṃ prakāśa āste manīṣiṇāṃ nikaṣaḥ | prākṛtamapi khalu vividhasvarūpamatyantacirarūḍham ||
atha
śrṛṅgaraprakāśe ṣoḍaśaḥ prakāśaḥ
ratyuddīpanavibhāvaprakāśaḥ
idānīmuddīpanavibhāvān vyākhyāsyāmaḥ| tatra ratyādi(kam) utpannānutpanna— (utpannānutpannavibhāvā)di trividham| tatra—
(uddīpanavibhāvāḥ—12)
ratyādeḥ uddīpanavibhāvāḥ—ṛtūpakaraṇetihāsaśravaṇa—deśa—kāla—kalāvicāra— vayo—vayasyopadeśa—sandeśopacāra—daivasampadupakāra—smaraṇādayaḥ| tatra—
(1. ṛtuḥ)
ṛtuḥ ṣọdhā vasanto, grīṣmo, varṣāḥ, śarat, hemantaḥ, śiśira iti| te ca pratyekataścaturdhā sandhirutpattiḥ praụdhiravasitiśceti| tatra—
(1.1 vasantaḥ) śiśiravasantasandhiryathā—
yat patraṃ ślathamūlanālamanavaṃ pātonmukhaṃ vartate yad bhaṅgāṅkurajanmabhiḥ kṣitiruhāṃ snigdhonnatā granthayaḥ |
yacchedaṃ halinīkucoṣmasu himaṃ svādu pravṛttaṃ tataḥ śītārtośca madhośca (kañcana mithaḥsandhiḥ parāvarttate) || 1 ||
yathā vā—
cyutasumanasaḥ kundāḥ puṣpodgameṣvalasā drumā manasi ca giraṃ granthantīme kiranti na kokilāḥ |
atha ca savituḥ śītollāsaṃ lunanti marīcayo na ca jaraṭhatāmālambante klamodayadāyinīm || 2 ||
vasantotpattiryathā—(vikra. 2. 7)
agre strīnakhapāṭalaṃ kuravakaṃ ś‍yamāṃ dvayorbhāgayor bālāśokamupoḍharāgasubhagaṃ bhedonmukhaṃ tiṣṭhati |
īṣad‍baddharajaḥkaṇāgrakapiśā cūte navā mañjarī mugdhatvasya ca yauvanasya ca sakhe! madhye madhuśrīḥ sthitā || 3 ||
yathā vā—(visā. 1. 32)
garbhagranthiṣu vīrudhāṃ sumanaso madhye 'ṅkuraṃ pallavā vāñchāmātraparigrahaḥ pikavadhūkaṇṭhodare pañcamaḥ |
kiṃca trīṇi jaganti jiṣṇu divasairdvitrairmanojanmano devasyāpi cirojjhitaṃ yadi bhavedabhyāsavaś‍yaṃ dhanu || 4 ||
vasantapraụdhiryathā—(visā. 1. 25)
sāmyaṃ saṃprati sevate vicakilaṃ ṣāṇmāsikairmauktikaiḥ kāntiṃ karṣati kāñcanārakusumaṃ māñjiṣṭhadhautāt paṭāt |
hūṇīnāṃ kurute madhūkakusumaṃ lāvaṇyaluṇṭākatāṃ lāṭīnābhinibhaṃ cakāsti ca patad‌va‌ṛntāgrataḥ kesaram || 5 ||
yathā vā—(bārā. 5. 40)
sūte/sāmyaṃ saṃprati dugdhamugdhasubhagaṃ puṣpodgamaṃ mallikā bāhlīkīdaśanavraṇāruṇadalaiḥ puṣpai/patrairaśoko 'ñcitaḥ/ 'rcitaḥ |
bhṛṅīgalaṅghitakoṭikiṃśukamidaṃ kiñcid vivṛntāyate māñjiṣṭhairmukulaiśca pāṭalitaroranyaiva kācillipiḥ || 6 ||
vasantāvasitiryathā—
upasarati vasantasyāvasānaṃ madhūkadrumakusumakaḍāracchāyaviśrāntakāntam |
dadati mudamidānīṃ bhūmayaḥ pāmarāṇāmaviralakhaladhānakṣodakolāhalinyaḥ ||
yathā—(raghu. 16. 50)
snānārdramukteṣvanudhūpavāsaṃ vinyasta—sāyantanamallikeṣu |
kāmo vasantātyayamandavīryaḥ keśeṣu lebhe padamaṅganānām || 8 ||
(1. 2 grīṣmaḥ)
vasantagrīṣmasandhiryathā—
(glānā rātrirnidāghe bata viraca)1—yati drāghimānaṃ dinānāṃ2 vadhnantyasthi pragalbhaṃ viphalasumanasaḥ saṃpratīme madhūkāḥ |
kiñcānyat pānthayūnāṃ hṛdayadhṛtimuṣo bhagnakarpūragaurā rājante lūnasasyāḥ sapadi kṛṣibhuvāṃ sampado nālaśoṣāḥ || 9 ||
1. pūrtirasmatkṛtā 2. drāghimā nandinīnāṃ jo॰ rā॰
yathā vā—(kāmī. pṛ. 110 dasaṃ.)
gehe vāhīkayūnāṃ vahati damanako mañjarīkarṇapūrā— na‍unmādaḥ pāmarīṇāṃ maruti maruvakāmodini vyaktimeti |
sadyobhaṅganusārastrutasurabhisirāśīkaraḥ sāhakāraḥ sarpannambhaśśarāve racayati ca raso recakīcandrakāṇi1 || 10 ||
grīṣmotpattiryathā—
karṇottaṃsaḥ śiśuśukavadhūpiñchanīlaṃ śirīṣaṃ sāntassūtrāḥ parimalamuco mallikānāṃ ca hārāḥ |
muktāgaurairvalayaracanā kandalāgraurvisānāṃ grīṣmārambhe ramayati navaṃ maṇḍanaṃ kāminīnām || 11 ||
yathā vā—(sūmu. 22)
sā/sauhitya—stimitairudañcedalasagrīvābhirāmaṃ muhu— rmadhye 'hnaḥ sphuradarkakarkaśaruci—prāntasthalīvartibhiḥ |
dattāḥ sindhuṣu māhiṣaiḥ kramakṛśastrotassu paṅkodare nidrāmīlitapakṣmapatravivaravyaktāruṇā dṛṣṭayaḥ || 12 ||
grīṣme praụdhiryathā—
apāṃ mūle līnaṃ mṛdu paricitaṃ candanarase mṛṇālīhārādau kṛtalaghupadaṃ candramasi ca |
muhūrtaṃ viśrāntaṃ sarasakadalīkānanatale priyāgạ̄dhāśleṣe nivasati paraṃ śaityamadhunā || 13 ||
yathā vā—
etasmin ghanacandranārdravapuṣo nidrākaṣāyekṣaṇā lị̄dhā/līlā—lolamṛdūllasadbhujalataṃ vyājṛmbhamāṇā muhuḥ |
nirgacchanti śanairahaḥpariṇatau sup‍tā latāmandirāt svedāmbhaḥkaṇadanturastanataṭābhogāḥ kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ || 14 ||
1. recakī śrṛṅgī picakārīpadavācyā hindyām | candrakāṇi cakrākārāṇi cihnāni | raso varṇadravyacitrito dravaḥ raṃgapadavācyaḥ |
grīṣmāvasitiryathā—
śuce/śucau tap‍tāṅgīnāṃ bahulamakarandadravamucaḥ kadambaprālambāḥ stanaparisare pakṣmaladṛśām |
haṭhāllūnoṣmāṇaḥ kamapi mahimānaṃ vidadhate jalakrīḍottīrṇāpriyatamabhujābaddha—śiśirāḥ || 15 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 16. 46)
dinedine śaivalavantyadhastāt sopānaparvāṇi vimuñcadambhaḥ |
uddaṇḍapadmaṃ gṛhagīrdhikāṇāṃ nārinitambadvayasaṃ babhūva || 16 ||
(1.3 varṣā)
grīṣmavarṣāsandhiryathā—(māmā. 9. 17)
utphullārjunasarjavāsita—vahatpaurastyajhañjhāmaru— tpreṅkholaskhalitendranīlaśakalasnigdhāmbudaśreṇayaḥ |
dhārāsiktavasundharāsurabhayaḥ prāp‍tāsta ete 'dhunā gharmāmbhovigamāgamavyatikaraśrīvāhino vāsarāḥ || 17 ||
yathā vā—
vātaprotkṣip‍tadhūlīparimalanasamuddhūlitāṅgaḥ samantād dantodvelladvalākā ' 'valikuṇapaśironaddhalīlābbhrakeśī(śaḥ) |
preṅkhada‌‌vidyutpatākārucirasuradhanuḥ khaṅ‍gakhaṭvāṅgadhārī saṃprāp‍taḥ proṣitastrīpratibhayajananaḥ kālakāpāliko 'yam || 18 ||
varṣotpattiryathā—(sūmu. 14)
kiñcinmudritapāṃsavaḥ śikhikulaiḥ sānandamālokitā bhagnā ' 'vāsarudada‌daridragṛhiṇīśvāsānilairjarjarāḥ |
ete te nipatanti nūtanaghanaprāvṛṭ‍darārambhiṇo viñchāyīkṛtaviprayuktavanitāvaktrendavo bindavaḥ || 19 ||
yathā vā—
dūrodañcita—pakva—tālasaralaiḥ ṣa‌ḍjasvarasvādubhiḥ saṃpratyunmadakekināṃ kalaravairāsūtritasvāgatāḥ |
sadyastāpabharaṃ haranti bharitaṃ prahlādayanto hare— rekākāranivṛttapāṃsupaṭalasvacchāḥ samīrāgamāḥ || 20 ||
varṣāpraụdhiryathā—
etāstāḥ suracāpacitravapuṣo vidyullatālāñchitāḥ kāntāradvipakāntikāntapṛthulā pīnā ghanānāṃ ghaṭāḥ |
yadgarjāmurajāḥ śikhīṇḍivayasāṃ diṅ‌maṇḍalīmañcake— ṣūddaṇḍāṇḍajacaṇḍatāṇḍavarasaiḥ kurvanti nṛttotsavam || 21 ||
yathā vā—
sañchanne jalavāmanairjaladharairvyomni prasup‍te jane deve garjati diṅ‍mukheṣu carati svairaṃ kadambānile |
utkaṇṭhāyati ca pravarṣati ghane dāśān dharā mūrcchati pronmathnanti manāṃsi māṃsalamiladdīrghāndhakārāḥ kṣapāḥ || 22 ||
varṣāvasitiryathā—
mūle lolakarīrakandalaghanāḥ kāṇḍe tataḥ pāṇḍavaḥ kiñcinmeduramaṇḍale paruṣi ca praụdhāsthirūḍhatvacaḥ |
agre sūcchritapatraṣaṇḍagahanāḥ saṃpratyamī prāvṛṣi kṣīṇāyāṃ harito haranti halināṃ cakṣūṃṣi bālekṣavaḥ || 23 ||
yathā vā—(kirātā. 4. 24)
vipāṇḍubhirglānatayā payodharaiśacyutācirābhāguṇahemadāmabhiḥ |
iyaṃ kadambānilabharturatyaye na digvadhūnāṃ kṛśatā na rājate || 24 ||
(1.4 śarat)
(śarat)sandhiryathā—
unmagnavañjulahatāni vanāpagānāmāś‍yānaśaivalataraṅgitasaikatāni |
nimnāvaśeṣasalilāni mano haranti rodhāṃsi haṃsapadamudritakardamāni || 25 ||
yathā vā—
nadyo vahanti kuṭilakramayuktaśuktirekhāṅkabālapulinodarasup‍takṛṣṭāḥ/kūrmāḥ |
etāstaraṅgi—tanu—toyapalāyamānamīnānusārivakadantakarālapā/phālāḥ ||
śaratpravṛttiryathā—
avatarati ghanātyayaḥ kimanyad vikasitakañjamakesarāvataṃsaḥ |
parisarapulineṣu nimnagānāṃ sapadi samāgatarājahaṃsayūthaḥ || 27 ||
yathā vā—(dhva. 47)
haṃsānāṃ ninadeṣu yaiḥ kabalitairāsajyate kūjatā— manyaḥ ko 'pi kaṣāyakaṇṭhaluṭhanādāghargharo nisvanaḥ |
te saṃpratyakaṭhoravāraṇavadhūdantāṅkuraspardhino niryātāḥ kamalākareṣu bisinīkandāgrimagranthayaḥ || 28 ||
śaratpraụdhiryathā—(dhva. 1. 13 locane)
aindraṃ dhanuḥ pāṇḍupayodhareṇa śarad dadhanā ' 'rdranakhakṣatābham |
prasādayantī sakalaṅkaminduṃ tāpaṃ raverabhyadhikaṃ cakāra || 29 ||
yathā vā—
tīvraṃ ravistapati nīca ivācirạdhyaḥ śrṛṅgaṃ rurustyajati mitramivākṛtajñaḥ |
toyaṃ prasīdati muneriva cittavṛttiḥ kāmaṃ daridra iva śoṣamupaiti paṅkaḥ || 30 ||
śaradavasitiryathā—
kedāra eva kalamāḥ pariṇāmanagrāḥ prācīnamāmalakamarghati pākanīlam |
ūrvārukaṃ sphuṭati nirgatagarbhagandhamamlībhavanti ca jarattrīpuṣīphalāni || 31 ||
yathā vā—
tiktādhivāsānyadhunā purāṇamāñjiṣṭhacelacchavidhūsarāṇi |
alambusāyāḥ kusumāni sīmni lolanti mandaṃ marudāhṛtāni || 32 ||
(1. 5 hemantaḥ)
śaraddhemantasandhiryathā—
māṣairmāṃsalitāṃ tilaistilakitāṃ stragdhūsarāṃ dhūsarai— rvallīṃ dūrataraṃ nimīladavaṭāṃ vāṭairvṛtāṃ vrīhibhiḥ |
kārpāsoddhṛṣitāmudārakavanodārāṃ kulutthākulā— mastopadravakodravāmiha mahīṃ dṛṣṭ‍vā jano nandati || 33 ||
yathā vā—
kvāpi pratyagrapākakramakapiśanamanmañjarībhārabhugna— vrihistambābhirāmāḥ, kvacidaruṇaguṇaśreṇibhiḥ, śoṇabhāsaḥ |
etāścetāṃsi saṃpratyadhivasati bhuvaḥ kvāpi nīrandhranīlaṃ prodyad‍godhūmasūcīcayaharitarucaḥ kāmamutkaṇṭhayanti || 34 ||
hemantotpattiryathā—
dvitramucukundamukulas‍tricaturakusumaḥ krameṇa lavalīṣu |
pañcaṣaphalinīkaliko jayati himarturnavāvataraḥ || 35 ||
yathā vā—
praviralaphalinīvanaprasūnaḥ kusumitakundasugandhigandhavāhaḥ |
guṇamasamajayaṃ cirāya lebhe viralatuṣārakaṇastuṣārakālaḥ || 36 ||
hemantapraụdhiryathā—
tirayati taraṇiṃ svaḥśarkarālī karālī sarati saralayāmāḥ saṃpratīmāstriyāmāḥ |
navanibiḍakucoṣmopāsanābhiryuvāna— staruṇataranimajjajjānayo mānayanti || 37 ||
yathā vā—
virahavidhuramutkaṃ lokamutkampayantī navanibiḍajaḍim‍nā haimanīyaṃ himānī |
jayati paramamastraṃ jaitramekaṃ bhavāreradhirajani janīnāṃ pūjyakarmā kucoṣmā || 38 ||
hemantāvasitiryathā—
iha hi vahati kāmaṃ kāmakodaṇḍayaṣṭirdramiḍayuvatigaṇḍaś‍yāmikāṃ kośakāraḥ |
ciracitadalaraktā barhikaṇṭhīpalāṇḍuḥ sphurati ca rucimattā parvaṇāṃ puṇḍrakasya || 39 ||
yathā vā—
śālicchedasamṛddhahālikagṛhā saṃmṛṣṭanīlotpala— s‍nigdhaś‍yāmayavaprarohanivahavyādīrghasīmodarāḥ |
modante parivṛttadhenvanaḍuhacchāyā palālairnavaiḥ saṃsiktadhvanadikṣuyantramukharā grāmā guḍāmodinaḥ || 40 ||
(6. śiśiraḥ)
hemantaśiśirasandhiryathā—
ajña/aṅga—sthaulyaśvayathubhiṣajaḥ saurabheyaprajānāṃ vānti svairaṃ sarasijavanavyādhayo gandhavāhāḥ |
ye tanvanti praśithilabhujāliṅgitapreyasīnāṃ sadyo yūnāṃ surataviratāvardhanārīśvaratvam || 41 ||
yathā vā—
kampante kapayo bhṛśaṃ kṛśajaḍaṃ go 'jāvikaṃ glāyati śvā cullīkuharodaraṃ kṣaṇamapi kṣip‍to 'pi naivojjhati |
śītārtivyasanāturaḥ punarayaṃ dīno janaḥ kūrmavat svānyaṅgāni śarīra eva hi nije nihnotumākāṅkṣati || 42 ||
śiśirotpattiryathā—
bhāsā 'rkasya hataprabhaṃ vikiraṇād dhūmāyamānaṃ manāṅ nirvāṇaiḥ svajanāñcanād valayitaṃ svairbhasmanāṃ rāśibhiḥ |
kiñciccheṣaniśātuṣāramadhurasparśaṃ gṛhārdhāṅgaṇe śayyotthāyamiha vrajanti halināṃ bālāḥ kukūlānalam || 43 ||
yathā vā—
abhinavavadhūroṣasvāduḥ karīṣatanūnapādasaralajanāśleṣakrūrastuṣārasamīraṇaḥ |
galitavibhavasyājñevādya dyutirmasṛṇā ravervirahavanitāvaktraklaibyaṃ bibharti niśākaraḥ ||
śiśiraprọdhiryathā—
dairghyādatra niśāṃ himaikasuhṛdāṃ sīmānamāseduṣo— rmānagranthirabhīṣṭayorvighaṭate gạ̄dho 'pi sāyantanaḥ |
prātaḥ kiñca rataśramārpitatṛṣaḥ sītkārakāraṃ payaḥ pāyaṃ pāyamupānamanti lalanāḥ prakrāntadantagraham || 45 ||
yathā vā—
rātrirvicitrasuratocitayāmadairghyā caṇḍo marud vahati kuṅkumapaṅkasādhyaḥ |
kalyasthitirdviguṇatūlapaṭā kimanyadarhanti cātra vitatāgarudhūpadhūmāḥ || 46 ||
śiśirāvasitiryathā—
pāne 'mbhasoḥ surasanīrasayorna bhāti sparśakriyāsu tuhinānalayorna cātra |
no durbhagāsubhagayoḥ parirambhaṇe ca no sevane ca śaśibhāskarayorviśeṣaḥ || 47 ||
yathā vā—
āśleṣiṇaḥ pṛthutaraklamaśītaśītāmāyāminīṃ ghanamudo rajanīṃ yuvānaḥ |
ūrvormuhurvalanabandhanasandhilolapādāntasaṃvalitatūlapaṭāḥ svapanti || 48 ||
(2. upakaraṇam)
upakaraṇānyanantāni, mālyāṅgarāgānulepana—candana—vastratāmbūlābharaṇamadirā— mandiratalpadīpadhūpādibhedāt | tatra
mālyaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.53)
aśokanirbhartsitapadmarāgamākṛṣṭahemadyuti karṇikāram |
muktākalāpīkṛtasindhuvāraṃ vasantapuṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantī || 49 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 3.55)
srastāṃ nitambādavalambamānā pade pade kesaradāmakāñcīm |
nyāsīkṛtāṃ sthānavidā smareṇa dvitīyamaurvīmiva kārmukasya || 50 ||
aṅgarāgo yathā—(kusaṃ. 7.9)
tāṃ lodhrakalkena hṛtāṅgatailāmāś‍yānakāleyakṛtāṅgarāgām |
vāso vasānābhiṣekayogyaṃ nāryaścatuṣkābhimukhīmanaiṣuḥ || 51 ||
yathā vā—(raghu. 6.60)
pāṇḍyo 'yamaṃsārpitalambahāraḥ klṛp‍tāṅgarāgo haricandanena |
ābhāti bālātapalip‍tasānuḥ sanirjharodgāra ivādrirājaḥ || 52 ||
anulepanaṃ yathā—(māmā. 1.40)
gharmāmbhovisaravivartanairidānīṃ mugdhākṣyāḥ parijanacāru/vāra—sundarīṇām |
tatprātirvihitavicitrapatralekhāvaidagdhyaṃ jahati kapolakuṅkumāni || 53 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 7.15)
vinyastaśuklāguru cakruraṅgaṃ gorocanāpatravibhaktamasyāḥ |
sā cakravākāṅkitasaikatāyāḥ trisrotasaḥ kāntimatītya tasthau || 54 ||
vastraṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.54)
āvarjitā kiñcidiva stanābhyāṃ vāso vasānā taruṇārkarāgam |
prakīrṇapuṣpastabakāvanamrā sañcāriṇī pallavinī lateva || 55 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 7.11)
sā maṅgalas‍nānaviśuddhagātrī gṛhītapatyudgamanīyavastrā |
nirvṛttaparjanyajalābhiṣekā pravṛtta/praphulla—kāśā vasudheva reje || 56 ||
tāmbūlaṃ yathā—
ārdrakramukamāpāṇḍu patraṃ nāgarakhaṇḍakam |
drāviḍīvaktramityeva jaitraṃ tatra manobhuvaḥ || 57 ||
yathā vā—
patraṃ nāgarakhaṇḍamārdrasubhagaṃ pūgīphalaṃ phālayaḥ karpūrasya ca yatra ko 'pi caturastāmbūlayogakramaḥ |
deśaḥ kerala eṣa kelisadanaṃ devasya cetobhuvaḥ— staṃ dṛṣṭ‍vā kuru komalāṅgi ! saphale drāghīyasī locane || 58 ||
abhāraṇaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.42)
kaṇṭhasya tasyāḥ stanabandhurasya muktākalāpasya ca nistalasya |
anyonyaśobhājananād babhūva sādhāraṇo bhūṣaṇabhūṣyabhāvaḥ || 59 ||
yathā vā—(māgha. 3.5)
tasyollasatkāñcanakuṇḍalāgrapratyup‍tagārutmatarat‍nabhāsā |
avāpa bālyocitanīlakaṇṭhapiñchāvacūḍākalanāmivoraḥ || 60 ||
madirā yathā—(māgha. 10.3)
krāntakāntavadanapratibimve bhag‍nabālasahakārasugandhau |
svāduni praṇaditālini śīte nirvavāra madhunīndriyavargaḥ || 61 ||
yathā vā—(kirātā. 9.55)
svāditaḥ svayamathaidhitamānaṃ lambhitaḥ priyatamaiḥ saha pītaḥ |
āsavaḥ pratipadaṃ pramadānāṃ naikarūparasatāmiva bheje || 62 ||
mandiraṃ yathā—(megha. 73)
tatrāgāraṃ dhanapatigṛhādu/nureṇāsmadīyaṃ dūrāllakṣyaṃ sarapatidhanuścāruṇā toraṇena |
yasyodyāne kṛtakatanayaḥ kāntayā vardhito me hastaprāpyastabakanamito bālamandāravṛkṣaḥ || 63 ||
yathā vā—(megha. 63)
vidyutvantaṃ lalitavanitāḥ sendracāpaṃ sacitrāḥ saṅgītāya prahatamurajāḥ s‍nigdhagambhīraghoṣam |
antastoyaṃ maṇimayabhuvastuṅgamabhraṃlihāgrāḥ prāsādāstvāṃ tulayitumalaṃ yatra taistairviśeṣaiḥ || 64 ||
talpaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.82)
tatra haṃsadhavalottaracchedaṃ jāhnavīpulinacārudarśanam |
adhyaśeta śayanaṃ priyāsakhaḥ śāradābhramiva rohiṇīpatiḥ || 65 ||
yathā vā—(māgha. 10.39)
sparśabhāji viśadacchavicārau kalpite mṛgadṛśāṃ suratāya |
sannatiṃ dadhati peturajasraṃ dṛṣṭayaḥ priyatame śayane ca || 66 ||
dīpo yathā—
niryatā parijanena bodhitaḥ pūryamāṇa/sphūrjamānarucirullasaddaśaḥ |
drāvasaṃvalanamāṃsalo 'dhikaṃ dīpakaśca madanaśca didyute || 67 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 1.10)
vanecarāṇāṃ vanitāsakhānāṃ darīgṛhotsaṅganiṣaktabhāsaḥ |
bhavanti yatrauṣadhayo rajanyāmatailapūrāḥ suratapradīpāḥ || 68 ||
dhūpo yathā—(kusaṃ. 7.14)
dhūpoṣmaṇā tyājitamārdrabhāvaṃ keśāntamantaḥkusumaṃ tadīyam |
paryākṣipat kācidudārabandhaṃ dūrvāvatā pāṇḍumadhūkadām‍nā || 69 ||
yathā vā—(māgha. 9.52)
nijapāṇipallavatalaskhalanādabhināsikāvivaramutpatitaiḥ |
aparā parīkṣya śanakairmumude mukhavāsamāsyakamalaśvasitaiḥ || 70 ||
(3. itihāsaśravaṇam)
itihāsaśravaṇaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 5.33)
asminnagṛhyata pinākabhṛtā salīlamābaddhavepathuradhīravilocanāyāḥ |
vinyastamaṅgalamahauṣādhirīśvarāyāḥ srastoragapratisareṇa kareṇa pāṇiḥ || 71 ||
yathā vā—
apetavyāhāraṃ dhutavividhaśilpavyatikaraṃ karasparśārambhapragalitadukūlāntaśayanam |
muhurbaddhotkampaṃ diśi diśi muhuḥ preritadṛśo— rahalyāsutrāmṇoḥ kṣaṇikamiha tatsaṅgatamabhūt || 72 ||
(4. deśaḥ)
deśastvanekadhā, grāmapattanopavanakāntāraparvatasarasīsaritsarassamudravāpīdīrghikā— dibhedāt | tatra grāmaramaṇīyatā yathā—
ābhoginaḥ kimapi saṃprati vāsarānte sampannaśālikhalapallavitopaśalyāḥ |
grāmāstuṣārabharabandhuragomayāg‍nidhūmāvalīvalayamekhalino haranti || 73 ||
yathā vā—
iha hi sajalakulyālīnacillīpraphulla— stabaka—śabalitorustambakustumburūṇi |
upavana navanīlīvāstuka — ś‍yāmalāni klamamuparamayanti grāmakacchasthalāni || 74 ||
pattanaramaṇīyatā yathā—
śriyaḥ padaṃ dvāravatīti nām‍nā purī parītā lavaṇārṇavena |
astyāvṛtevāmararājadhānī nistriṃśanīlena nabhassthalena || 75 ||
yathā vā—
tridivapurasamṛddhispardhayā bhānti yasyāṃ surasadanaśikhāgreṣvāgrahagranthinaddhāḥ |
nabhasi pavanavellatpallavairullasadbhiḥ paramamabhivahantyo vaibhavaṃ vaijayantyaḥ || 76 ||
upavanaramaṇīyatā yathā—(māmā. 6.19)
gạ̄dhotkaṇṭhakaṭhorakeralavadhūgaṇḍāvapāṇḍucchadai— stāmbūlīpaṭalaiḥ pinaddhaphalitavyānamrapūgadrumāḥ |
takkolīphalajagdhamugdhavikiravyāhāriṇastabhda‍uvo bhāgāḥ proṅkhitamātuluṅgavṛtayaḥ preyo vidhāsyanti vām || 77 ||
yathā vā—
tāmbūlīnaddhamugdhakramukatarutalaprastare sānugābhiḥ pāyaṃpāyaṃ kalācīkṛtakadaladalaṃ nārikelīphalāmbhaḥ |
seṃvyantāṃ vyomayātrāśramajalajayinaḥ sainyasīmantinībhi— rdātyūhavyūhakelīkalitakuhakuhārāvakāntā vanāntāḥ || 78 ||
kāntāraramaṇīyatā yathā—(naca. 5.39)
mādyaddantikapolayugmavigaladdānāmbusiktadrumāḥ krīḍatkroḍakulārdhacarvita—patanmustā—rasāmodinaḥ |
antassusthitapānthamantharamarullolallatāmaṇḍapāḥ kasyaitā na haranti hanta hṛdayaṃ vindhyasthalībhūmayaḥ || 79 ||
yathā vā—
imāstā vindhyādreḥ śukaharitavaṃśīvanaghanāḥ bhuvaḥ krīḍāloladviradavadanārugṇataravaḥ |
latākuñje yāsāmupanadi rataklāntaśabarī— kapolasvedāmbhaḥparicayanudo vānti marutaḥ || 80 ||
parvataramaṇīyatā yathā—(māmā. 9.5)
ayamabhinavameghaś‍yāmalottuṅgasānurmadamukhamayūrīmuktasaṃsaktakekaḥ |
śakuniśabalanīḍānokahas‍nigdhavarṣmā vikirati bṛhadaś‍mā parvataḥ prītimakṣṇoḥ || 81 ||
yathā vā—
ye līlāvidhasākṣiṇo murajitaḥ kālārjitaś‍yāmikai— rvṛṣṇīnāṃ ninadanti rukma‍caṣakairadyāpi vāto/pānotsavam |
dṛṣṭā raivatakasya kautukarasāt te yasya senācaraiḥ pratyak—sindhu—samīra—tāḍana—raṇattālīvanāssānava || 82 ||
sarasīramaṇīyatā yathā—(māgha. 4.59)
etasminnadhikapayaśśriyaṃ vahantyaḥ saṃkṣobhaṃ pavanabhuvā javena nītāḥ |
vālmīkerarahitarāmalakṣmaṇānāṃ sādharmyaṃ dadhati girāṃ mahāsarasyaḥ || 83 ||
yathā vā—
bakoṭāḥ(?) pañcā/ pānthānāmiha hi sarasīsīm‍ni sarasā/tā— mamī netrānandaṃ dadhati caraṇācoditamukhāḥ |
dhunānā mūrdhānaṃ galabila—lasatsphāraśaphara— sphuratpucchānaccha—vyatikara—sabāṣpāruṇadṛśaḥ || 84 ||
saridramaṇīyaṃ(yatā) yathā—(urāca. 2.21)
iha samadaśakuntākrāntavānīravīrutprasavasurabhiśītasvacchatoyā vahanti |
phalabharapariṇāmaś‍yāmajambūnikuñjaskhalanamukharabhūrisrotaso nirjhariṇyaḥ || 85 ||
yathā vā—
iha bahulavisarpad‍vālukālaṅghivallī— valayaharitakī/tīrakṣetralekhā vahanti |
dinapariṇatimajjatpāmarīpīnatuṅga — stanataralitabaddhāḥ(ndhā ' ')sannatoyāssravantyaḥ || 86 ||
saroramaṇīyatā yathā—
tṛṣā kimiti tāmyasi vraja manāgidānīmitaḥ sthitaḥ pathikasīmani tvamasi māravīṇāṃ bhuvām |
na paś‍yasi puraḥ sphuracchapharajālahelāvala— ttaraṅgarimārci(rji)tatridaśamārgamagre saraḥ || 87 ||
yathā vā—(urāca. 1.31)
etasmin madakalamallikākṣapakṣavyādhūtasphuradurudaṇḍapuṇḍarīkāḥ |
bāṣpāmbhaḥparipatanodgamāntarāle saṃdṛṣṭāḥ kuvalayino mayā vibhāgāḥ || 88 ||
samudraramaṇīyatā yathā—
niḥśvāsairadhivāsitā madhuripoḥ kalpāntanidrāsu ye yairmanthaśramamantharāḥ phaṇipaterdhautāḥ phaṇābhittayaḥ |
te 'mī kuñjarakumbhapīṭhaluṭhanakṣobhoc‍calacchīkarāḥ kallolāḥ kulaśailakoṭivikaṭāḥ strotaḥpateḥ pātu vaḥ || 89 ||
yathā vā—
mīlattālītamālastabakatarutalasrastarasrastacañcad— guñjākāñcīkalāpaprakaṭītaśabarīmohanaspaṣṭadhārṣṭyā |
yenāmucyanta mocā—likuca—kavacitāḥ prāñcaṭā(?) pratyudīcīṃ kṛcchrāducchrāyakūjatkuraraparabhūtāḥ paścimāmbhodhikacchāḥ || 90 ||
vāpīramaṇīyatā yathā—(megha. 74)
vāpī cāsmin marakataśilābaddhasopānamārgā haimaiḥ sphītā vikacakamalaidīṃrghavaiḍūryanālaiḥ |
yasyāstoye kṛtavasatayo mānasaṃ sannikṛṣṭaṃ nādhyāsyanti vyapagataśucastvāmapi prekṣya haṃsāḥ || 91 ||
yathā vā—
āpātamātrarasike ! sarasīruhasya kiṃ bījamarpayasi mandiravāpikāyām |
kālaḥ kalirjagadidaṃ na kṛtajñamajñe ! sthitvā hariṣyati tavaiva mukhasya lakṣmīm || 92 ||
dīrghikāramaṇīyatā yathā—(raghu. 16.46)
dine dine śaivalavantyadhastāt sopānaparvāṇi vimuñcadambhaḥ |
uddaṇḍapadmaṃ gṛhadīrghikāṇāṃ nārīnitambadvayasaṃ babhūva || 93 ||
yathā vā—(kāsūvṛ. 3.2.13)
pṛṣṭheṣu śaṅkhaśakalacchaviṣu cchadānāṃ rājībhiraṅkitamalaktakalohinībhiḥ |
gorocanāharitababhrubahiḥpalāśam āmodate kumudamambhasi dīrghikāyāḥ || 94 ||
(5. kālaḥ)
kālo 'pyanekadhā, rātridivārkodayapūrvāh‍ṇamadhyaṃdināparāh‍ṇasāyāhnāstamayasandhyā— niśāmukha—tamaḥ—pradoṣacandrodayacandrikāniśīthāpararātrarātriparāvṛttiprabhātādibhedāt |
tatra rātriryathā—
nīyante divasapratap‍takaṭakagrāvoṣmagāḍhak‍vatha— tprārambhāḥ pathikaiḥ klamavyuparamattāpā girigrāmake |
naidāghye kamalāgrakuḍ‍malabhidaḥ paścārdhaśītānila— pratyāśvastamayūranādasubhagā daṇḍodarā rātrayaḥ || 95 ||
yathā vā—
viṣvagvātavikīrṇaśīkarakaṇāsārāḥ sphurad—vidyut— statkālapratibuddhaketakaśikhāgaṇḍo/gandhopadigdhāmbarāḥ |
dātyūhaprasarapraṇāditadiśaḥ pānthapriyāṇāmamū— runmathnanti manāṃsi māṃsalaghanadhvānottarā rātrayaḥ || 96 ||
divaso yathā—
tānyetāni śikhaṇḍitāṇḍavagurūnambhodharāmbare tanvānāni dināni nūnamamṛtasyandīni vandāmahe |
udgạ̄dhā navanīlanīrajadṛśāmatyantamāyāsino bhidyante svayameva yeṣu viṣamā mānagrahagranthayaḥ || 97 ||
yathā vā—(śāku. 1.3)
subhagasalilāvagāhāḥ pāṭalasaṃsargisurabhivanavātāḥ |
pracchāyasulabhanidrāḥ divasāḥ pariṇāmaramaṇīyāḥ || 98 ||
arkodayo yathā—
ayamudayati mudrābhañjanaḥ padminīnāmudayagirivanālībālamandārapuṣpam |
virahavidhurakokadvandvabandhurvibhindan kupita—kapikapola—kroḍatāmrastamāṃsi || 99 ||
yathā vā—
samadataruṇahuṇīgaṇḍaśoṇasya pūṣṇastaralitatimirāṇāṃ tejasāmudgamena |
atijaraṭhakusumbhīkesarod‍gāḍharāgas‍napita iva tadānīmujjvalo jīvalokaḥ || 100 ||
pūrvāh‍ṇo yathā—
ādau pārṣṇiprahāradviguṇitatarasastiryagutkṣip‍tatuṇḍān paścāt kṛṣṭaiḥ khalīnairlaghulalitapadaṃ nartayantasturaṅgān |
tvatsevotkarṣatarṣādahamahamikayā sampatantyaś‍vavārāḥ kārpāsairvāravāṇaiḥ parivṛtavapuṣo vāhayogyā mahīṣu || 101 ||
yathā vā—
niryāti prathamapracāracalitasphāradhvanaḍḍiṇḍima— trastādhoraṇadūranāśitagajenāyaṃ nabhovartmanā |
abhradvāja(ra)ghanāntadolitakaraḥ svarvāhinīṃ gāhituṃ rodhastāḍana—keli—rugṇa—radana—grāmā 'śrirairāvaṇaḥ || 102 ||
madhyāhno yathā—
madhye paṅkini palvalasya viluṭhan potrī nayatyātapā— nuṣṇālurnibhṛtaṃ hṛdeṣu mahiṣaḥ śaivālamabhyasyati |
ākīrṇoṣadhimūla—śīta—surabhiśvāsānilāndolana— prakṣīṇoṣmaṇi līyate vanagiriśvabhrodare śalyakaḥ || 103 ||
yathā vā—(vikra. 2.22)
uṣṇāluḥ śiśire niṣīdati tarormūlālavāle śikhī nirbhidyopari karṇikārakusumānyāsevate ṣaṭ‍padaḥ |
tap‍taṃ vāri vihāya tīranalinīṃ kāraṇḍavaḥ sevate krīḍāveś‍mani caiṣa pañjaraśukaḥ klānto jalaṃ yācate || 104 ||
aparāh‍ṇo yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.33)
sthānamāhnikamapāsya dantinaḥ sallakīviṭapabhaṅgavāsitam |
āvibhātacaraṇāya gṛh‍ṇate vāri vāriruharuddhaṣaṭ‍padam || 105 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 8.35)
uttaranti vinikīrya palvalaṃ gāḍhapaṅkamativāhitātapāḥ |
daṃṣṭriṇo vanavarāhayūthayā daṣṭabhaṅgurabisāṅkurā iva || 106 ||
sāyāhno yathā—
bhartā 'sau mahasāṃ vikāsarabhasottānāṅkapaṅkeruha— prasthānāruṇamaṇḍalaṃ śikhariṇaṃ pratyañcamabhyasyati |
ānim‍nonnatabhāgapuñjitaghanacchāyātapacchedabhṛt prauḍhadvīpi—navīna—carmajaraṭhaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ ca jātaṃ bhuvaḥ || 107 ||
yathā vā—(kirātā. 9.6)
kāntadūtya iva kuṅkumatāmrāḥ sāyavarṇanamabhitvarayantyaḥ |
sādaraṃ dadṛśire vanitābhiḥ saudhajālapatitā ravibhāsaḥ || 108 ||
sūryā(stamayo) yathā—(bārā. 3.10)
māñjiṣṭhīkṛtapaṭṭasūtrasadṛśaḥ pādānayaṃ puñjaya— nnadhyastācalalambinīṃ pariṇatiṃ svairaṃ grahagrāmaṇīḥ |
vātyācakravivartitāmbujarajaś‍chatrāyamāṇaḥ kṣaṇaṃ kṣīṇajyotirito 'pyayaṃ sa bhagavānambhonidhau majjati || 109 ||
yathā vā—
vedayat padamavedayad vadhūrbodhayat kumudamabjamardayat |
rātrimānayadaharnayad balād bimbamambaramaṇeravāñcati || 110 ||
sandhyā yathā—
gharmatviṣi sphuritarat‍naśikhā/lākrameṇa morernitambakaṭakānavagāhamāne |
valgatturaṅgakhuracūrṇitapadmarāgadhūlīva pāta—lalitollasati sma sandhyā || 111 ||
yathā vā—
dik‍kāminīvadanakuṅkumapaṅkacarcā cakrāṅganāhṛdayadāhadavānalarciḥ |
sandhyā rarāja gaganāntaratoyarāśivālapravālamukurāṅkurakomalaśrīḥ || 112 ||
niśāmukhaṃ yathā—
sandhyāṃśukandalitapāṭalapuṣpakośabālendusūcikuṭilodarakesaraṃ ca |
saṃnyastamastabakamāṃsalamūlabhāgamākāśakiṃśukamakāśata vāsarānte || 113 ||
yathā vā—
k‍vāpyastādridarīṣu pūṣṇi patite sāndhye ca dhām‍ni kramāt kiñcitkiñcidudañcati pratikalaṃ mandāsu dṛkchaktiṣu |
etāḥ pak‍va—parūṣaka—cchavimuṣaḥ pūrvaṃ tatastvāyatā jāyante tamasā diśaḥ pariṇamajjambūphalaś‍yāmalāḥ || 114 ||
tamo yathā—
jyotiṣāṃ pathi ca diṅ‍mukheṣu ca kṣmātale ca girikandarāsu ca |
paś‍ya kenacidiva prasāryate kāminīcikuramecakaṃ tamaḥ || 115 ||
yathā vā—
saṅketabandhurviṭanartakīnāṃ niḥṣyandasandarbha ivāmbarasya |
purandhrimmillavinīta/lavarṇo niśāndhakāraḥ pibatīva viśvam || 116 ||
pradoṣo yathā—
ayaṃ līlāgāreṣvadhikabahulo dhūmavalayaḥ śanaiḥ ś‍yāmārambhe pratanu timiraṃ māṃsalayati |
ihaite dīpāśca prasṛtasaralāṃśupratisarāḥ kramāducchidyante drutakanakakāntipratibhuvaḥ || 117 ||
yathā vā—(vikra. 3.2)
utkīrṇāṃ iva vāsayaṣṭiṣu niśālidrālasā barhiṇo dhūpairjālavinirgatairvalabhayaḥ saṃdigdhapārāvatāḥ |
ācāraprayataḥ sapuṣpabaliṣu sthāneṣu cārciṣmatīḥ sandhyāmaṅgalavartikā vibhajate śuddhāntavṛddho janaḥ || 118 ||
candrodayo yathā—(kirātā. 9.23)
dīpayannatha nabhaḥ kiraṇaugheḥ kuṅkumāruṇapayodharagauraḥ |
hemakumbha iva pūrvapayodherunmamajja śanakaistuhināṃśuḥ || 119 ||
yathā vā—
udgarbhahūṇataruṇīramaṇopamardabhug‍nonnatastananiveśanibhaṃ himāṃśoḥ |
bimbaṃ kaṭhorabisakāṇḍakaḍāragaurairviṣṇoḥ padaṃ prathamamagrakarairvyanakti || 120 ||
candrikā yathā—
stanabhuvi navabhā/hāratārakāntirmalayajapatralatāruciḥ kapolo |
vicakilakalikākalāpakalpaḥ śirasi virājati candrikā vadhūnām || 121 ||
yathā vā—
dikkāminīvadanacandanacūrṇamuṣṭis‍trailokyamandiramanoharasaudhabhittiḥ |
hṛṣyanmanoharavipāṇḍarahāsakāntirjyots‍nā śaśāṅkasitakīrttirivollāsa || 122 ||
niśītho yathā—
kapāle mārjāraḥ paya iti॰ || 123 || (pṛ. 582)
yathā vā—(pṛ. 627)
sakhi ! sa vijito vīṇādyūte kayā 'pi parastriyā paṇitamabhavat tābhyāṃ tasmin niśālalitaṃ dhruvam |
kathamitarathā śephālīṣu skhalatkusumāsvapi sthitavati nabhomadhye 'pīndau priyeṇa vilamvyate || 124 ||
apararātro yathā—(māgha. 11.6)
kṣaṇaśayitāvibuddhāḥ kalpayantaḥ prayogā— nudadhimahati rājye kāvyavad durvibhāge/ durvigāhe |
gahanamaparātra—prāp‍ta—buddhi—prasādāḥ kavaya iva mahīpāścintayantyarthajātam || 125 ||
yathā vā—(māgha. 11.4)
praharakamapanīya svaṃ nididrāsatoc‍caiḥ pratipadamupahūtaḥ kenacijjāgṛhīti |
muhuraviśadavarṇāṃ nidrayā śūnyaśūnyāṃ dadadapi giramantarbudhyate no manuṣyaḥ || 126 ||
rātriparāvṛttiryathā—(māgha. 10.91)
iti madamadanābhyāṃ rāgiṇaḥ spaṣṭarāgādanavaratarataśrīsaṅginastānavekṣya |
abhajata parivṛttiṃ sā 'tha paryastahastā rajaniravanatendurlajjayā 'dhomukhīva || 127 ||
yathā vā—(māgha. 11.9)
anunayamagṛhītvā vyājasup‍tā parācī rutamatha kṛkavākostāramākarṇya kalye |
kathamapi parivṛttā nidrayā 'ndhā kila strī mukulitanayanaivāśliṣyati prāṇanātham || 128 ||
prabhātaṃ yathā—(bārā. 7.1)
tārāṇāṃ tagaratviṣāṃ parikaraḥ saṃkhyeyaśeṣaḥ sthitaḥ spardhante 'starucaḥ pradīpakaśikhāḥ sārddhaṃ haridrāṅkuraiḥ |
tantrastambhitapāradadravajaḍo jātaḥ prage candramāḥ paurastyaṃ ca purāṇaśīdhumadhuracchāyaṃ nabho vartate || 129 ||
yathā vā—
stokastokamamūbhirambaratale tārābhirastaṃ gataṃ॰ || 130 || (pṛ. 646)
ṛtūpakaraṇairebhiritihāsopavarṇanaiḥ |
deśakālosevābhiścittajanmā pradīpyate || 131 ||
nātaḥ parataraṃ puṣpadhanuṣastīkṣṇamāyudham |
ṛtūpakaraṇādīnāṃ yadetad rāmaṇīyakam || 132 ||
ṛturupakaraṇaṃ tathetihāsaḥ kathitamidaṃ saha deśakālabhedaiḥ |
pṛthaganabhihitaṃ kalāvicāraprabhṛtikamalpamathopadarśayāmaḥ || 133 ||
(6. kalāvicāraḥ —64)
tatra catuṣṣaṣṭirmūlakalāḥ | tāsu
karmāśrayāś‍caturviṃśatiḥ 24
dyūtāśrayāḥ viṃśatiḥ 20
tato nirjīvāḥ (15)
sajīvāḥ (5)
śayanopacārikyaḥ ṣoḍaśa 16
catasra uttarakalā 04
64 iti catuṣṣaṣṭiḥ |
āsveva avāntarakalānāṃ śatāni pañcāṣṭādaśottarāṇi svaśāstravihitaprapañcāt tānīha na pratanyante, gauravabhayāt | mūlakalāstu saṃkṣepata udāhriyante |
(mūlakalāḥ catuṣṣaṣṭiḥ)
tatra —
6.1. karmāśrayāstāvad— gītaṃ, vāditraṃ, nṛttaṃ, nāṭyaṃ, citraṃ, pustakarma, patracchedyaṃ, lipijñānaṃ, vacanakauśalaṃ, vaicakṣaṇyaṃ, mālyavidhiḥ, gandhayuktiḥ, āsvādya— vidhānaṃ, rañjanajñānaṃ, rat‍naparīkṣā, sīvyam, upakaraṇakriyā, ājīvajñānaṃ, tiryagyonicikitsitaṃ, māyākṛtaṃ, pāṣaṇḍasamayajñānaṃ, krīḍākauśalaṃ, saṃvāhanaṃ, śarīrasaṃskārakauśalamiti | atha—
(6.2 dyutāśrayāḥ)
nirjivadyūtāśrayāḥ — āyaprāp‍tiḥ, (rakṣā/) akṣavidhānaṃ, rūpasaṅkhyā, kriyāmārgaḥ, jīvagrahaṇaṃ, nayajñānaṃ, karaṇajñānaṃ, citrācitravidhiḥ, gūḍharāśiḥ, tulyābhighāraḥ, kṣipragrahaṇam, anuprāp‍tiḥ, lekhāsmṛtyanukramaḥ, chalavyāmohanaṃ, grahaṇā/ glahādānamiti |
(sajīvadyūtāśrayāḥ) sajīvaḥ anāśrayastu — upasthāpanavidhiḥ buddhaṃ, tataṃ, gataṃ, nṛttamiti |
6.3 atha śayanopacārikyaḥ — strīpuruṣabhāvagrahaṇam, (svarāga/) anurāgaprakāśanaṃ, pratyaṅgadānaṃ, nakhadantayorvicārau, nīvīsraṃsanaṃ, guhyasparśānulomyaṃ, paramārthakauśalaṃ, harṣaṇaṃ, samānārthatā, kṛtārthaprotsāhanaṃ, mṛdukrodhapravartanaṃ, kruddhaprasādanaṃ, sup‍tāparityāgaḥ, caramasvāpavidhiḥ, guhyagūhanamiti |
(6.4 uttarakalāḥ)
uttarakalāḥ — sāśrupātaṃ ramaṇasya vīkṣaṇaṃ, svayaṃ śapathakriyā, prasthitānugamanaṃ, punarnirīkṣaṇamiti |
athaitāsāmudāhāraṇāni | tatra—
(6.1 karmāśrayasāsu —24)
1. gītaṃ yathā— vilāsamasṛṇollasanmulaloladoḥkandalī॰ || 134 || (pṛ. 457)
2. vāditraṃ yathā—
nādhanyaiḥ kṣaṇadāvirāmamadhurāḥ kiñcid‍‌vinidrālasa— śrotraiḥ savraṇamugdhacāraṇavadhūdantacchadāyasinaḥ |
śrūyante mṛdupītavaktramarutaḥ paurāṇagītikrama— syālolāṅguliruddhamuktasuṣiraśreṇīravā veṇavaḥ || 135 ||
3. nṛttaṃ yathā—
sadyastāṇḍavitabhru vibhramavalad vyāloladoḥkandalī— helodañcitapīvararastanayugaṃ preṃkhatkaṭākṣacchadam |
kiñcitkuñcitapādāpadmamavatāt tallāsyalīlāyitaṃ pārvatyāḥ purataḥ kalāgamaguroḥ khaṇḍenducūḍāmaṇeḥ || 136 ||
4. nāṭyaṃ yathā—
bāhūtkṣepasamullasatkucataṭaṃ prāntasphuṭatkañcukaṃ gambhīrodaranābhimaṇḍalagalatsvedāvalīvibhramam |
rudrāṇyā mahiṣāsuravyatikaravyāyāmaramyaṃ vapuḥ paryastāvadhi sandhibandhuralasatkeśoc‍cayaṃ pātu vaḥ || 137 ||
5. citraṃ yathā—
tvadālekhye kautūhalataralatanvīviracite vidhāyaikā cakraṃ racayati suparṇāsutamapi |
atha svidyatpāṇistvaritamapamṛjyaitadaparā kare pauṣpaṃ cāpaṃ, makaramupariṣṭāc‍ca likhati || 138 ||
6. pustakarma yathā—(māgha. 3.51)
cikraṃsayā kṛtrimapatripaṅkteḥ kapotapālīṣu niketanānām |
mārjāramapyāyataniścalāṅgaṃ yasyāṃ janaḥ kṛtrimameva mene || 139 ||
7. patracchedyaṃ yathā—
niṣpannastilako 'yameṇanayane ! prāyeṇa (kāstūrikā)— meṣā patralatāsya tasya sadṛśī kiṃ nāma no nirmitā ? |
yasyāśāvijaye himādrimabhitaḥ sainye sa X X tha X X ga ga ga priyairiti bhaṭī(?) lokasya bhūrjeḥ(?) tvabhūt || 140 ||
8. lipijñānaṃ yathā—
śarvāṇīśivayorlalāṭamabhitaḥ kastūrikāḥ mūrdhajaiḥ nyastā maṇḍanakauśalād vijayayā vāṇī padaiścāṭubhiḥ |
anyonyānunanayaprapañcamadhurā dṛś‍yātmadarśodare varṇālī vidhinirmitākṣarataticchāyā sukhāyāstu vaḥ || 141 ||
9. vacanakauśalaṃ yathā—
janaḥ puṇyairyāyājjaladhijalabhāvaṃ jalamuca— stathā 'vasthaṃ cainaṃ nidadhatu śubhaiḥ śuktivadane |
tatastāṃ śreyobhiḥ pariṇatimasau vindati yayā ruciṃ tanvan pīnastani ! hṛdi tavāyaṃ viluṭhati || 142 ||
10. vaicakṣaṇyaṃ yathā—
śubhe ! ko 'yaṃ vṛddho, gṛhaparivṛḍhaḥ, kiṃ tava pitā ? na, me bhartā rātrau vyavahitadṛgatyantabadhiraḥ |
hu huṃ huṃ śrānto 'haṃ śiśiyiṣurihauvāpavarake k‍va yāminyāṃ yāsi, svapihi nanu nirdaṃśamaśake || 143 ||
11. mālyavidhiryathā—(kirātā. 8.37)
priyeṇa saṃgṛhya vipakṣasannidhāvupāhitāṃ vakṣasi pīvarastane |
srajaṃ na kācid vijahau jalāvilāṃ vasanti hi premṇi guṇā na vastuni || 144 ||
12. gandhayuktiryathā—(kusaṃ. 1.9)
kapolakaṇḍūḥ karibhirvinetuṃ vighaṭṭitānāṃ saraladrumāṇām |
yatra srutakṣīratayā prasūtaḥ sānūni gandhaḥ surabhīkaroti || 145 ||
13. āsvādyavidhānaṃ yathā—
anatitaralabandhasvedamadyādigandhaś‍calanaraṭanalolas‍nehasīmantinīnām |
adṛḍhadahanapākaṃ sthālikānāmudañcan madayati hṛdayāntarmāṃsalo māṃsagandhaḥ || 146 ||
14. rañjanavidhānaṃ(/jñānaṃ) yathā 1—(rāghavaḥ) 1.
sahi ṇo puhāi paripīḍiassa malamaggaṇipaḍḍio gahio |
katte aṇovia suttho vahaï hasirī poparā . . . ssa (?) || 147 ||
2.
sahiṇocuhāihaparipīḍiā sabalasaṃgaṇimāṃ gaṇiyaṃ |
egahyikaṃ te aṇo piaddhovaha iha sirīsomarā॰sa || 148 || (jośeraḥ)
1. udāharaṇāryyā rāghavajośerayorvibhinnapāṭhā |
15. rat‍naparīkṣā yathā—
dvau vajravarṇauṃ jagatīpatīnāṃ sad‍‌vipratiṣṭhau na tu sārvajanyau |
yasya . . . śoṇo, yo vā . . . haridrārasasannikāśaḥ ? || 149 ||1
16. sīvyaṃ yathā—
bāhū bālaviśālatārdhakarayoḥ kaṇṭhaḥ sa goṣṭhe mukhe pādārdheṣu jhaṣāḥ phaṇogravaṇayoḥ(?) pṛṣṭhaṃ kaṭāntarbhuvi(dhi ?) |
kṛtyaṃ tairiti kañcukaṃ racayatā manye mahalakṣi(kṣmi ?) te nikṣip‍taḥ kucakumbhayorbhagavatā bhargeṇa kumbhāvapi(?) || 150 ||
17. upakaraṇakriyā yathā—
uṣṇīṣo . . . . . . vakṣasi sphārahāraḥ kāñcīgehe(deśe ?) ma(mra ?) dīyaḥ parikaravasanaṃ, jānunoryogapaṭṭaḥ |
ḍolālīlāsu devyā saha gagana . . laṅghane dīrgharajju— rjīyāde(vaṃ ?) . . vinaikopakaraṇa . vāsukiḥ śaṅkarasya || 151 ||2
18. ājīvajñānaṃ yathā—(māmā. 3.11)
śāstre pratiṣṭhā sahajaśca bodhaḥ prāgalbhyamabhyastaguṇā ca vāṇī |
kālāvabodhaḥ pratibhānavattvamete guṇāḥ kāmadughāḥ kriyāsu || 152 ||
19. tiryagyonicikitsitaṃ yathā—
yadiha yasya niyāmakamauṣadhe pavanapittakapheṣu viṣāṇinām |
tamiha tena yutaḥ śamayatyasāvamṛtatulyabalaḥ khalu gugguluḥ || 153 ||
1. 'sad‍vi॰=yadbhiḥ pra.'—HOS, jośera | sāmudrikā atra dhyānaṃ dadyuḥ | cūrṇamiśraṇena haridrā raktāyate | evamidaṃ paṭhyeta— dvau vajravarṇau jagatīpatīnāṃ bhuvi prasiddhau na tu sārvajanyau | yatropamānaṃ prathamasya śoṇaś‍cūrṇāharidrārasasannikāśaḥ || 149 || 2. evamivedaṃ paṭhyeta— uṣṇīṣo mūrdh‍ni sārdhaṃ śiśuśaśikalayā vakṣasi sphārahāraḥ, kāñcīdeśe mradīyaḥ parikaravasanaṃ jānunoryogapaṭṭaḥ | dolālīlāsu devyā saha gaganatalollaṅghane dīrgharajju— rjīyādeko hi sarvopakaraṇakalano vāsukiḥ śaṅkarasya || 151 ||
20. māyākṛtaṃ yathā—(bhaṭṭi. 14.1)
tato daśāsyaḥ smaravihvalātmā cāraprakāśīkṛtaśatruśaktiḥ |
vimohya māyāmayarāmamūrdh‍nā sītāmanīkaṃ prajighāya yoddha‍um || 154 ||
21. pāṣāṇḍasamayajñānaṃ yathā—(māmā. 5.1)
ṣaḍadhika—daśanāḍīcakramadhya—sthitā—tmā hṛdi vinihitarūpaḥ siddhidastadvidāṃ yaḥ |
avicalitamanobhiḥ sādhakairmṛgyamāṇaḥ sa jayati pariṇaddhaḥ śaktibhiḥ śaktināthaḥ || 155 ||
22. krīḍākauśalaṃ yathā—(amaru. 19)
ekatrāsanasaṃsthite priyatame paścādupetyādarā— dekasyā nayane pidhāya vihitakrīḍānubandhacchalaḥ |
tiryagvakritakandharaḥ sapulakaḥ premollasanmānasā— mantarhāsalasatkapolaphalakāṃ dhūrto 'parāṃ cumbati || 156 ||
23. saṃvāhanaṃ yathā—
kadalatalaniṣaṇṇaṃ vartma — viśrāntiheto— rvrajati janakaputrītyāśayā (paryyayeṇa)1 |
agaṇitanijakhedaḥ sādhusaṃvāhanābhiḥ paricarati ca hṛṣyan lakṣmaṇo rāmabhadram || 157 ||
24. śarīrasaṃskārakauśalaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 7.9)
tāṃ lodhrakalkena hṛtāṅgatailāmāś‍yānakāleyakṛtāṅgarāgām |
vāso vasānāmabhiṣekayogyaṃ nāryaścatuṣkābhimukhaṃ vyanaiṣuḥ || 158 ||
(6.2 dyutāśrayāsu—20)
(nirjīvadyūtāśrayāḥ —15)
25. āyaprāp‍tiryathā—
dyūtaṃ devi ! rame, kimasti ? vṛṣabho, nā 'yaṃ kṣamaḥ ka(va)rṣaṇe candro 'yaṃ, kimanena ? bhūṣaṇamidaṃ, khaṇḍena kiṃ bhūṣyate ? |
1. vāsasaḥ palloveneti jo.rā.
nāgo 'yaṃ śubhalocane, ! paśupate ! mṛtyuḥ kathaṃ gṛhyatā— mitthaṃ śaṅkaraśailarājatanayāsañjalpitaṃ pātu vaḥ || 159 ||
26. rakṣā/akṣavidhānaṃ yathā—
utsevakaṃ vighātaṃ ca X X X danvaṃ(?) tathā |
rājño dāye dāye vicita X X X kūpam(?) || 160 ||
27. (rūpa ?)saṃkhyā yathā—
siaṇucaṃpaṇe kahaṃ vịdhālisaṃsaapāsaṭṭhijalarā araṃkahomahuṃ nisihicaüddhahapālosaüttāria |
aṃkaho ga ga tuhiṃdaṇḍāhipadasahiujāṇa jāṇahimajja— ṇiṭṭhaajjavākikkuramamikariṃcaṃtīsapāiṭṭha(?) || 161 ||
28. kriyāmārgo yathā—
kacaṭatapayaśākhyaiḥ sap‍tavargaiḥ sametaṃ suvinihitapadārthaiḥ sap‍tagaṃ nābhisaṃsthaiḥ |
sahṛdayajanahṛdyaṃ kūpaśāstraṃ pravakṣye viṭapaṭukapaṭānāṃ yoṣitāṃ krīḍanāya ||
29. jīvagrahaṇaṃ yathā—
mantrī koṇacatuṣkaṃ tu najaḥ/gajaḥ sāgraṃ tadeva tu |
ratho dṇḍasthitaṃ hanyāt bahiḥkoṇāṣṭakaṃ hayaḥ || 163 ||
30. nayajñānaṃ yathā—
gajāśvau yadi labhyete dāhamekāṃ parityajet |
mantriṇāṃ vājisaṃyuktaṃ kecidicchanti naukayā || 164 ||
31. karaṇajñānaṃ yathā—
ṇaciāṇāelasac‍ce apelayagāra X X latīe vīsattho |
addhi avarāviāivaa tīe maeṇa sac‍cavio || 165 ||
32. citrācitravidhiryathā—
game naṣṭe caraṃ kuryāc‍care naṣṭe ca sāhasam |
sāhasasya paribhraṃśe kuryāllumpacaluṃpacaḥ || 166 ||
33. gūḍharāśiryathā—
tāmraparṇītaṭe yasya prāvartyata vadhūjanaiḥ |
dyūtaṃ mauktikapuñjeṣu vidrumā hāragopanaiḥ || 167 ||
34. tulyābhighāro yathā—
muṣṭyā mudgaṃ kṣipati bhavataḥ sā samāje 'pi yūnāṃ svidyatpāṇiḥ spṛśāti kamalāṃ madhyametyaṅguliṃ te |
tvāṃ na brūte viditamapi sā yat samānābhighāra— dyūte tanvī tadalamamunā tac‍caritrāśayā naḥ || 168 ||
35. kṣipragrahaṇaṃ yathā—
tathā gṛhītastanvaṅgyā vijayopārjitaḥ paṇaḥ |
yathā dhanyādharoṣṭhena hariteti jitaṃ mayā || 169 ||
36. anuprāp‍tiryathā—
āśleṣe prathamaṃ krameṇa vijite hṛdye 'dharasyārpaṇe kelīdyūtavidhau paṇaṃ priyatame kāntāṃ punaḥ pṛcchati |
sāntarhāsaniruddhasaṃbhṛtarasodbhedasphuradgaṇḍayā svairaṃ śāravisāraṇāya nihitaḥ svedāmbugarbhaḥ karaḥ || 170 ||
37. lekhāsmṛtyanukramo yathā—
āropayasi mudhā kiṃ nāhamabhijñā tvadaṅagasaṅgasa |
divyaṃ varṣasahastraṃ sthitvaivaṃ yuktamabhidhātum || 171 ||
38. chalavyāmohanaṃ yathā—
ekenābhyadhikena yāmyahamatha dyūte catuṣke 'ś‍manā (?) jñātenābhyadhike 'pi vā tava jayo vāhyāṃ(?) girernandini ! |
anyūnānadhike punaḥ paṇa iti vyāmohayan vāka‍chalai— rdvāvāvāmadhigantumadritanayādyūte haraḥ pātu vaḥ || 172 ||
39. grahaṇā/glahādānaṃ yathā—
ko 'yaṃ bhāmini ! bhūṣaṇaṃ, kitava ! te śoṇaḥ kathaṃ ? kuṅa‍kumāt॰ || 173 || (dra.10.110)
(sajīvadyūtāśrayāḥ —5)
40. upasthānavidhiryathā—
tvatkāṅkakāravijaye tava rāma ! laṅkā sītā ca te punariyaṃ bhavatastu dārāḥ |
matkāṅkakāravijaye tu mamādhipatyaṃ tasyāṃ ca te puri kalatrajane ca tasmin || 174 ||1
41. buddhaṃ yathā—(māgha. 8.32)
mugdhatvādavidita—kaitavaprayogā gacchantyaḥ sapadi parājayaṃ taruṇyaḥ |
tāḥ kāntaiḥ saha karapuṣkareritāmbuvyātyukṣīmabhisaraṇaglahāmadīvyan || 175 ||
42. tataṃ yathā—
sakhi ! sa vijito vīṇādyūte kayā 'pyaparastriyā॰ || 176 || (pṛ. 953)
43. gataṃ yathā—
āghūrṇaṃśca gatāgataiḥ pratirudhaṃ krāmannasau glāhate tiryātye ca catuṣkakoṇagatayormadhye na yūno yudhā |
yāvatyājimanud‍gato 'yamaparairiṣṭaglahāvāp‍taye paś‍yaiṇākṣi ! samāhvayairupavadhugrāmyo janaḥ krīḍati || 177 || 2
44. nṛttaṃ yathā—(megha. 73)
tasyopānte sphaṭikaphalakā kāñcanī vāsayaṣṭi— rmūle baddhā maṇibhiranatiprauḍhavaṃśaprakāśaiḥ |
tālaiḥ śiñjadvalayasubhagairnartitaḥ kāntayā me yāmadhyāste divasavigame nīlakaṇṭhaḥ suhṛd vaḥ || 178 ||
(6.3 śayanopacārikyaḥ —16)
45. strīpuruṣabhāvagrahaṇaṃ yathā—(śāku. 2.11)
abhimukhe mayi saṃhṛtamīkṣitaṃ hasitamanyanimittakṛtodayam |
vinayavāritavṛttiratastayā na vivṛto madano na ca saṃvṛtaḥ || 179 ||
46. svarāga(/anurāga)prakāśanaṃ yathā— (gāsa. 3.54)
taha soṇhāe pulaïo daravaliāpaṃgatāraaṃ pahio |
jaha vārio vi gharasāmieṇa vasio uvaṇivvae || 180 ||
(tathā s‍nuṣayā pralokito daravalitāpāṅgatārakaṃ pathikaḥ |
yathā vārito 'pi gṛhasvāminā uṣita alindake ||)
1. rāmaṃ rāvaṇo vakti—tvad‌vijaye sarvaṃ tava, madvijaye punarmame'ti | atra tvatkāṅkakāra—matkāṅkakāra'—śabdau 'tava—mamā'—rthakau jñeyau | 2. atra dyūtaparibhāṣāḥ kāś‍cidupanibaddhāḥ |
47. pratyaṅgadānaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.14)
sasvaje priyamuronipīḍitā prārthitaṃ mukhamanena nāharat |
mekhalāpraṇayalolatāṃ gataṃ hastamasya śithilaṃ rurodha sā || 181 ||
48–49. nakhadantayorvicārau yathā—
iyamadharavilag‍nā kāntadantapraṇālī hara़ti hṛdayamāstāṃ kiṃ śrameṇāpareṇa ? |
abhinavanakhalekhālaṅ‍kṛtaṃ bāhumūlaṃ kathayasi kimu bāle ! bālabandhacchalena || 182 ||
50. nīvīsraṃsanaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.4)
nābhideśanihitaḥ sakampayā śaṅkarasya rurudhe tayā karaḥ |
tad‍dukūlamatha cābhavat svayaṃ dūramucch‍vasitanīvibandhanam || 183 ||
51. guhyasparśānulomyaṃ yathā—(amaru. 101)
kānte talpamupāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ bandhanāt tadvāsaḥ ślathamekhalāguṇadhṛtaṃ kiñcinnitamve sthitam |
etāvat sakhi ! vedmi kevalamahaṃ, tasyāṅgasaṅge punaḥ ko 'sau ? kā 'smi ? rataṃ nu kiṃ ? kathamiti svalpā 'pi me na smṛtiḥ || 184 ||
52. paramārthakauśalaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 5.50)
māmi ! sarisakkharāṇaṃ vi, attha(atthi)viseso paappiavvāṇaṃ |
ṇehamaïāṇa aṇṇo aṇṇo uvarohabhaṇi/maïāṇaṃ || 185 ||
(mātulāni ! sadṛśākṣarāṇāmapyartha(asti)viśeṣaḥ prajalpitavyānām |
s‍nehamayānāmanyo 'nya uparodhabhaṇitā/mayānām ||}
53. harṣaṇaṃ yathā—
nāndīpadāni ratināṭakavigh‍naśāntāvājñākṣarāṇi paramāṇyathavā smarasya |
daṣṭe 'dhare praṇayinā vidhutāgrapāṇeḥ sītkāraśuṣkaruditāni jayanti nāryāḥ || 186 ||
54. samānārthatā yathā—(gāsa. 1.5)
tāva c‍cia raïsamae mihuṇā/mahilā—ṇaṃ vibbhamā virāaṃti |
jāva ṇa kuvalaadalasacchaaāi muuleṃti ṇaaṇāiṃ || 187 ||
(tāvadeva ratisamaye mithunānāṃ/mahilānāṃ vibhramā virājante |
yāvanna kuvalayadalasadṛśāni mukulanti/mukulībhavanti nayanāni ||)
55. kṛtārthaprotsāhanaṃ yathā—(māgha. 10.88)
viśramārthamupagūḍhamajasraṃ yat priyaiḥ prathamaratyavasāne |
yoṣitāmuditamanmathāmādau tad dvitīyasuratasya babhūva || 188 ||
56. mṛdukrodhapravartanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 1.27)
paṇaakuviāṇaṁ doṇha vi aliapasuttāṇaṁ māṇaïllāṇaṃ |
ṇic‍calaṇiruddhaṇīsāsadiṇṇakaṇṇāṇa ko mallo || 189 ||
(praṇayakupitayordvayorapyadalīkaprasup‍tayormānavatoḥ |
niścalanirudvaniḥśvāsadattakarṇayoḥ ko mallaḥ ||)
57. kruddhaprasādanaṃ yathā—(urāca. 3.37)
asminneva latāgṛhe tvamabhavastanmārgadattekṣaṇaḥ sā haṃsaiḥ kṛtakautukā ciramabhūd godāvarīsaikate |
āyāntyā paridurmanāyitamiva tvāṃ vīkṣya baddhastayā kātaryādaravindakuḍ‍malanibho mugdhaḥ praṇāmāñjaliḥ || 190 ||
58. sup‍tāparityāgo yathā—(urā. 1.2)
jṛmbhāvijṛmbhitadṛśaḥ prathamaprabuddhalakṣmīkarāmburuhalālanalālasasya |
gātrāpavṛttibharakharvitaśeṣamavyādavyāhataṃ murajitaḥ kṛtakaprasup‍tam || 191 ||
59. caramasvāpavidhiryathā—(māgha. 11.13)
avirataratakhedāyāsajātaśramāṇāṃ caramamapi śayitvā pūrvameva prabuddhāḥ |
aparicalitagātrā kurvate na priyāṇāmaśithilabhujacakrāśleṣabhedaṃ taruṇyaḥ ||
60. guhyagūhanaṃ yathā—(māgha. 10.82)
prekṣaṇīyakamiva kṣaṇamāsan hrītabhaṅguravilocanapātāḥ |
saṃbhramadrutagṛhītadukūlacchādyamānavapuṣaḥ suratāntāḥ || 193 ||
(6.4 uttarakalāḥ —4)
61. sāśrupātaṃ ramaṇasya vīkṣaṇaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 3.36)
tuṣāraleśākulitotpalābhe paryaśruṇī maṅgalabhaṅgabhīruḥ |
agūḍhabhāvā 'pi vilokane sā na locane mīlayituṃ viṣehe || 194 ||
62. svayaṃ śapathakriyā yathā—
dhanyāḥ stha yāḥ kathapatha priyasaṃgame 'pi visrabdhacāṭukaśatāni ratāntareṣu |
nīvīṃ prati praṇihitaśca karaḥ priyeṇa sakhyaḥ ! śapāmi yadi kiñcidapi smarāmi || 195 ||
63. prasthitānugamanaṃ yathā—
vanabhuvi saha patyā prasthitāṃ vīkṣyaṃ sītāṃ॰ || 196 || (pṛ. 866)
64. punarnirīkṣaṇaṃ yathā—(śāku. 6.9)
itaḥ pratyādeśāt svajanamanugantuṃ vyavasitā gṛhe tiṣṭhetyuc‍cairvadati guruśiṣye gurusame |
punarduṣṭiṃ bāṣpaprasarakaluṣāmarpitavatī mayi krūre yat, tat saviṣamiva śalyaṃ dahati mām || 197 ||
(7. vayaḥ)
vayaḥ avasthā tac‍caturdhā — sandhiḥ, utpattiḥ, praụdhiḥ atipraụdhiśca | tatra
1. sandhiryathā—
ṇaaṇāṇa kira thaṇārubbhihatiujjarapahaṃavaḍaṃ |
tāi asikkhaṃtipatīsāvaleavaaṇaṃ hoṃtataruṇīo || 198 ||
(nayanayoḥ ki ! stanoruhatirujjvalaprālambapaṭam |
tadaśikṣitapatisāvalepavacanaṃ bhaviṣyattaruṇyaḥ || ?)
yathā vā—(bārā. 3.21)
samantāt sābhogaṃ na tu kucavibhāgāñcitamuro nitambaḥ svāṃ lakṣmīmabhilaṣati nādyāpi labhate |
dṛśorlīlāmudrā sphurati ca na cātisthitimatī tadasyāstāruṇyaṃ prathamamavatīrṇaṃ vijayate || 199 ||
2. utpattiryathā—(kusaṃ. 1.31)
asaṃbhṛtaṃ maṇḍanamaṅgayaṣṭeranāsavākhyaṃ karaṇaṃ madasya |
kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyāt paraṃ sā 'tha vayaḥ prapede || 200 ||
yathā vā—(urāca. 6.35)
tathā kiñcit kiñcit kṛtamidamahobhiḥ katipayai— ryatetad vistāristanamukulamāsīnmṛgadṛśaḥ |
vayass‍nehākūtavyatikaraghano yatra madanaḥ pragalbhavyāpāraścalati hṛdi mugdhaśca vapuṣi || 201 ||
3. praụdhiryathā—(kusaṃ. 1.40)
anyonyamutpīḍayadutpalākṣyāḥ stanadvayaṃ pāṇḍu tathā pravṛddham |
madhye tathā ś‍yāmamukhasya tasya mṛṇālasūtrāntaramapyagamyam || 202 ||
yathā vā—(sūmu. 11)
smitaparicitā vṛttirvācāmapāṅgataraṅgitaṃ nayanayugalaṃ pādanyāso nitambabharālasaḥ |
ahaha sutanorlīlāsūtraiḥ kṛtaṃ padamaṅgake vahatu madanaḥ śobhāmātraṃ dhanurnanu saṃprati || 203 ||
4. atipraụdhiryathā—
udaramidamanindyaṃ māninīśvāsalāvyaṃ stanataṭapariṇāho dorlatālehyasīmā |
sphurati ca vadanendurdṛkpraṇālīnipeya— stadiha sṛdṛśi ! kalyāḥ kelayo yauvanasya || 204 ||
yathā vā—
vahatu dhanurasaṅgādaikṣavaṃ vaiṇavaṃ vā praharatu ca pṛṣatkaiḥ kausumairāyasairvā |
tadapi makaraketurmūrdh‍ni dhanvīśvarāṇāmiyamiha yuvabhāvaṃ yāvadaṅgīkaroti ||
(8. vayasyopadeśaḥ)
vayasyopadeśo yathā—
vayaṃ vaktuṃ mithyā madhuramavidheyātmavacaso yathāryaṃ(rthaṃ) ced brūyāḥ (bhavati) syanunanaya (tadamuṣyānanunayaḥ) |
sukhā(—svādābhīṣṭapriya—)rasikayā (mugdhahṛdaye) tvayā mānaḥ kasmādayamabudhabodhāya vihitaḥ || 206 ||1
1. padye 'tra koṣṭhakeṣvasmad‍kṛtā pūrttiḥ |
yathā vā—(sūmu. 12)
prakāro mānasya priyasakhi ! yadīdṛk k‍vacidapi śruto vā dṛṣṭo vā kathayatu tadā 'yaṃ tava janaḥ |
priyaṃ pādāpāntapraṇatamavadhūya tvamadhunā vṛticchedre paś‍yaspapaharasi hṛṣyantyasuhṛdaḥ || 207 ||
(9. sandeśaḥ)
sandeśo yathā—(megha. 109)
etasmānmāṃ kuśalinamabhijñānadānād viditvā mā kailīnādasitanayane ! mayyaviśvāsinī bhūḥ |
s‍nehānāhuḥ kimapi virahe dhvaṃsinaste 'pyabhogā— diṣṭe vastunyupacitarasāḥ premarāśībhavanti || 208 ||
yathā vā—(megha. 107)
śāpānto me bhujagaśayanādutthite śārṅgapāṇau māsānanyān gamaya caturo locane mīlayitvā |
paścādāvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tamātmābhilāṣaṃ nirvekṣyāvaḥ pariṇataśarac‍candrikāsu kṣapāsu || 209 ||
(10. upacāraḥ)
upacāro yathā—(śāku. 3.19)
kiṃ śītalaiḥ klamavinodibhirārdravātaiḥ saṃcālayāmi nalinīdalatālavṛntaiḥ |
aṅke nidhāya karabhoru ! yathāsukhaṃ te saṃvāhayāmi caraṇāvuta padmatāmrau ||
yathā vā—
lolāṃśukasya pavanākulitāṃśukāntaṃ॰ || 211 || (vesaṃ. 2.23 pṛ. 967)
(11 daivasaṃpad)
daivasaṃpad yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.299)
mānamasyā nirākartuṃ pādayorme/rnipatiṣyataḥ |
upakārāya diṣṭyedamudīrṇaṃ ghanagarjitam || 212 ||
yathā vā—
seyamanabhrā vṛṣṭistadidamavṛṣṭīha kandalījanma |
tadidamakandali kusumaṃ tadidamakusumaṃ phalaṃ ceti || 213 ||
(12. upakārasmaraṇa)
upakārasmaraṇaṃ yathā—(māmā. 4.8)
tanme manaḥ kṣipati yat sarasaprahāramālokya māmagaṇitaskhaladuttarīyā |
trastaikahāyanakuraṅgaviloladṛṣṭirāśliṣṭavatyamṛtasavalitairivāṅaiḥ || 214 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 9.10)
sarasakusumakṣāmairaṅgairanaṅgamahājvara— ściramaviratonmāthī soḍhaḥ pratikṣaṇadāruṇaḥ |
tṛṇamiva tataḥ prāṇān moktuṃ mano vidhṛtaṃ tayā kimaparamato nirvyūḍhaṃ yat karārpaṇasāhasam || 215 ||
kalāvicārapramukhā apīdānīṃ prakāśitāḥ |
ādigrahaṇato 'nye 'pi lakṣaṇīyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ || 216 ||
sañjīvanamanaṅgasya sukhāyatamātmanaḥ |
ṛtvādīnāmiyaṃ bhaṅgiḥ śṛṅgārasyāpi jīvitam || 217 ||
upaniṣadupadiṣṭā seyamuddīpanānāṃ tribhuvanavijayāp‍tau vaijayantī smarasya |
tadupahitaviśeṣād‍bodhasaṃskārajanyā nanupadamanubhāvāneva saṃbhāvayāmaḥ || 218 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śṛṅagāraprakāśe ratyuddīpanavibhāvaprakāśo nāma
|| ṣoḍaśaḥ prakāśaḥ || 16 ||
anākalitamaṃśato 'pyabhinavādibhiḥ śāradā—mahī—matimatāṃvarairyadapi śāradāvaibhavam |
tadetadupadīkarotyayamiheti saṃpaś‍yatāṃ vidāṃ bhavati vismayo, nidhibhṛto 'pyaho daurvidhī ||
atha
śṛṅgāraprakāśe sap‍tadaśaḥ prakāśaḥ
anubhāvaprakāśaḥ
idānīmanubhāvaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | tatra vibhāvaiḥ prabuddhasaṃskārasya nāyakāderye smṛtīcchādveṣaprayat‍najanmāno manovāgbuddhiśarīrārambhāḥ te 'nubhūyamānatvād ratyādīnā— manantarabhavanāc‍ca anubhāvāḥ | tatra—
1. (mana)—ārambho yathā—(māmā. 1.21)
tāmindusundaramukhīṃ suciraṃ vibhāvya cetaḥ kathaṃ kathamapi vyapavartate me |
lajjāṃ vijitya vinayaṃ vinivārya dhairyamunmathya mantharavivekamakāṇḍa eva || 1 ||
yathā vā—
āścaryamutpaladṛśo vadanāmālendu॰ || 2 || (dra. 11.84)
2. vāgārambho yathā—(māmā. 4.3)
cirādāśātantus‍truṭatu bīsinīsūtrabhiduro mahānādhirvyādhirniravadhiridānīṃ prasaratu |
pratiṣṭhāmavyājaṃ vrajatu mayi pāriplavadhurā vidhiḥ svāsthyaṃ dhattāṃ, bhavatu kṛtakṛtyaśca madanaḥ || 3 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 4.4)
samānapremāṇaṃ janamasulabhaṃ prārthitavato vidhau vāmārambhe mama samucitaiṣā pariṇatiḥ |
tathā 'pyasmin dānaśravaṇasamaye 'syāḥ pravigala— tprabhaṃ prātaścandradyuti vadanamantardahati mām || 4 ||
3. buddha‍yārambho yathā—
pramlānotpalakomale sakhi ! dṛśau nīlāñjanenāñcite॰ || 5 || (dra. 10.467)
yathā vā—(amaru. 18)
ekatrāsanasaṃsthitiḥ parihṛtā pratyudramād dūrata— stāmbūlānayanacchalena rasabhāśleṣo 'pi saṃvigh‍nitaḥ |
ālāpo 'pi na miśritaḥ parijanaṃ vyāpārayantyā 'ntike kāntaṃ pratyupacārataścaturayā kopaḥ kṛtārthīkṛtaḥ || 6 ||
4. śarīrārambho yathā—
kṛtvā vāmakaraṃ nitambaphalake līlāvalanmadhyayā vyāvṛttastanama (ñcitāsyakamalaṃ kṛ—)tvā tayā māṃ prati |
prā(tarmugdha—)navendranīlamaṇimanmuktāvībhramāḥ sapremaprahitāḥ smarajvaramuco dvitrāḥ kaṭākṣacchaṭāḥ || 7 ||
yathā vā—
deśairantaritā śataiśca saritāmurvībhṛtāṃ kānanai— ryat‍nenāpi na yāti locanapathaṃ kānteti jānannapi |
ud‍grīvaścaraṇārdharuddhavasudhaḥ kṛtvā 'śrupūrṇāṃ dṛśaṃ tāmāśāṃ pathikastathā 'pi kimapi dhyāyan muhurvīkṣate || 8 ||
(ete ca pratyekaṃ) dvādaśaprakārā bhavanti | tatra
(1) (mana)—ārambhāḥ— bhāvaḥ, hāvaḥ, helā, śobhā, kāntiḥ, ud‍dīp‍tiḥ, mādhuryaṃ, dhairyaṃ, prāgalbhyam, audāryaṃ, sthairyaṃ, gāmbhīryamiti |
(2) vāgārambhāḥ— ālāpaḥ, pralāpaḥ, vilāpaḥ, anulāpaḥ, saṃlāpaḥ, apalāpaḥ, sandeśaḥ, atideśaḥ, nirdeśaḥ, upadeśaḥ, apadeśaḥ, vyapadeśa iti |
(3) buddha‍yārambhāḥ— rītiḥ, vṛttiḥ, pravṛttiriti | tatra ca
1. (catasro) rītayaḥ — pāñcālī, gauḍīyā, vaidarbhī, lāṭīyā ceti |
2. catasro vṛttayaḥ — bhāratī, ārabhaṭī, kaiśikī, sāttvatī ceti |
3. catasraḥ pravṛttayaḥ —paurastyā, ụdhra(aụdhra)māgadhī,dākṣiṇātyā,āvantyā ceti |
(4) śarīrārambhāḥ— līlā, vilāsaḥ, vicchittiḥ, vibhramaḥ, kilakiñcitam, moṭṭāyitam, kuṭṭamitam, bibbokaḥ, lalitam, vihṛtaṃ, krīḍitam, keliriti |
athaiteṣāṃ lakṣaṇodāharaṇāni |
(1. (mana)ārambhāḥ —12)
mano 'bhilāṣe hāvaḥ/bhāvaḥ| sa yathā—
atrāntare kimapi vāgvibhavātirikta.........(dra.pṛ. 625)
(sūcyam—(mana)ārambhasya 'hāvataḥ' vāgārambhasya 'saṃdeśaṃ' yāvad granthaḥ khaṇḍito 'tra|—)
(2. vāgārambhāḥ —12)
(7. saṃdeśaḥ)
kālindītaṭabhūmayo 'pi tava re! no yānti cintāspadam || 9 ||
8. taduktamityataduktamityatideśaḥ| yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.78)
sa te duhitaraṃ sākṣāt sākṣī viśvasya karmaṇām |
vṛṇute varadaḥ śambhurasmatsaṃkrāmitaiḥ padaiḥ || 10 ||
9. so 'yamahamityādirnirdeśaḥ| yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.63)
ete vayamamī dārāḥ kanyeyaṃ kulajīvitam |
brūta yenātra vaḥ kṛtyamanāsthā bāhyavastuṣu || 11 ||
10. śikṣāheturupadeśaḥ| yathā—(śāku. 4.18)
śuśrūṣasva gurūn, kuru priyasakhīkṛtyaṃ sapatnījane bharturviprakṛtā 'pi roṣaṇatayā mā sma pratīpaṃ gamaḥ |
bhūyiṣṭhaṃ bhava dakṣiṇā parijane bhāgyeṣvanutsekinī yāntyevaṃ gṛhiṇīpadaṃ yuvatayo vāmāḥ kulasyādhayaḥ || 12 ||
11. anyārthakathanamapadeśaḥ| yathā—
āsāiaṃ avṇāeṇa॰ || 13 || (pṛ. 1248)
12. vyājāntareṇa vyapadeśaḥ| yathā—
mahuehi kiṃ vi bālaaṃ (paṃthia) || 14 || (gāsa. 877, vajjā 491 pṛ.370) iti vāgārambhā dvādaśa|
(3. buddha‍yārambhāḥ —12)
buddhayārambheṣu
(3.1. rītiḥ) vacanavinyāsakramo rītiḥ|
sā caturdhā— pāñcālyādibhedāt|
1. pañcālādiṣu bhavā pāñcālī| yadanatidīrghasamāsam anatisphuṭabandhamupacāravṛttimat pādānuprāsaprāyaṃ yogarụ̄dhimad vacaḥ, sā pāñcālī |
nātidīrghasamāsā yathā—
dhīrāsta eva dhavalāyatalocanānāṃ tāruṇyadarpaghanapīnapayodharāṇām |
kṣāmodaroparilasattrivalīlatānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ' 'kṛtiṃ vikṛtimeti mano na yeṣām || 15 ||
anatisphuṭabandhā yathā—
vilāsamasṛṇollasanmusalaloladoḥkandalī॰ || 16 || (pṛ.457)
upacāravṛttimatī yathā—(ratnā 2.13)
parimlānaṃ pīnastanaghanasaṅgadubhayataḥ॰ || 17 || (dra. 7.107)
pādānuprāsavatī yathā—(kāvyāda. 1.56)
candre śaranniśottaṃse kundastabakavibhrame |
indranīlanibhaṃ lakṣma saṃdadhātyalinaḥ śriyaḥ || 18 ||
yogarụ̄dhimatī yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.33)
sthānamāhnikamāpāsya dantinaḥ sallakīviṭapabhaṅgavāsitam |
āvibhātacaraṇāya gṛh‍ṇate vāri vāriruharuddhaṣaṭ‍padam || 19 ||
2. gauḍādiṣu bhavā gauḍīyā| yadatidīrghasamāsaṃ parisphuṭabandhaṃ nātyupacāravṛttimat pādānuprāsayogi yogarụ̄dhiparamparāgarbhaṃ vacaḥ, sā gauḍīyā |
atidīrghasamāsā yathā—
śūnya—grāmaṭikopakaṇṭha-racita-kṣudraika-kūpīpayaḥ— paryāyāhita-seka-śākika-haritkaccha-pradeśodbhavāḥ |
asmin hanta! haranti hālikakarakrīḍāvimardasphuṭa— tvakkorvārukagandhagandhitajarad‍gomāyavo vāyavaḥ || 20 ||
parisphuṭabandhā yathā—
guñjatkrauñca-nikuñjara‍‌-kuñjara-ghaṭānistīrṇakarṇajvarāḥ prākpratyagdharaṇīdhra-kandara-jaratpārīndra-nidrādruhaḥ |
laṅkāṅkatri—kakutpratidhvanighanāḥ paryantayātrājaye yasyā bhremuramandadundubhiravairāśārudho ghoṣaṇāḥ || 21 ||
nātyupacāravatī yathā—
lāvaṇyasindhuraparaiva hi keyamatra yatrotpalāni śaśinā saha saṃp‍lavante |
unmajjati dviradakumbhataṭī ca yatra yatrāpare kadalikāṇḍamṛṇāladaṇḍāḥ || 22 ||
pādānuprāsayoginī yathā—
lolallāṅgūlavallīvalayitavakulānokahaskandhagolai— rgolāṅgūlairnadadbhiḥ pratirasitajaratkandarāmandireṣu |
ṣaṇḍeṣūddaṇḍapiṇḍītagarataralanāḥ prāpire yena velā— mālambyottālatāla—sphuṭitapuṭakinībandhavo gandhavāhāḥ || 23 ||
yogarụ̄dhiparamparāgarbhā yathā—(māgha. 3. 33)
madhyesamudraṃ kakubhaḥ piśaṅgīrvyākurvatī kāñcanabhittibhāsā |
turaṅgakāntāmukhahavyavāhajvāleva bhittvā jalamullalāsa || 24 ||
3. vidarbhādiṣu bhavā vaidarbhī| yadasamastam atisukumārabandham anupacāravṛttimat, sthānānuprāsayogi, yogavṛttimad vacaḥ, sā vaidarbhī| tatra—
asamastā yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.4)
manīṣitāḥ santi gṛheṣu devatāḥ tapaḥ kva vatse! kva ca tāvakaṃ vapuḥ |
padaṃ saheta bhramarasya pelavaṃ śirīṣapuṣpaṃ, na punaḥ patattriṇaḥ || 25 ||
atisukumārabandhā yathā—(visā. 1.18)
kathaya kimiha bāle! kā tvamityullapaṃstāṃ jhaṭiti kila dukūlasyāñcale dhārayāmi |
agamadatha niketaṃ kvāpyasau śārayantī nava—kuvalaya—mālā—māṃsalairdṛṣṭipātaiḥ || 26 ||
anupacāravṛttimatī yathā—(megha. 79)
ś‍yāmāsvaṅgaṃ, cakitahariṇīprekṣite dṛṣṭipātaṃ vaktracchāyāṃ śaśini, śikhināṃ barhabhāreṣu keśān |
utpaś‍yāmi pratanuṣu nadīviciṣu bhrūvilāsān hantaikasthaṃ kvacidapi na te caṇḍi! sādṛś‍yamasti || 27 ||
sthānānuprāsayoginī yathā—
śithilaśithilaṃ nyasya svairaṃ dhanuśśikhare śiro nayanasalilaiḥ kurvan maurvīlatāmaparāmiva |
ahaha vikalaḥ śrutvā śrutvā ghanastanitadhvaniṃ kimapi kimapi dhyāyannāryo na yāti, na tiṣṭhati || 28 ||
yogavṛttimatī yathā—(kusaṃ. 5. 58)
yadā budhaiḥ sarvagatastvamucyase na vetsi bhāvasthāmimaṃ kathaṃ? janam |
iti svahastālikhitaśca mugdhayā rahasyupālabhyata candraśekharaḥ || 29 ||
4. lāṭādiṣu bhavā lāṭīyā| yadīṣatsamastam, anatisukumārabandhaṃ, nātyupacāravat, lāṭīyānuprāsavat yaugika(yoga) rụ̄dhimad vacaḥ, sā laṭīyā |
īṣatsamastā yathā—
etāni nissahatanorasamañjasāni॰ || 30 || (pṛ. 565),
anatisukumārabandhā yathā—(kāvyāda. 1. 70)
maṇḍalīkṛtya barhāṇi kaṇṭhairmadhuragītibhiḥ |
kalāpinaḥ pranṛtyanti kāle jīmūtamālini || 31 ||
nātyupacāravatī yathā—(śāku. 2.10)
anāghrātaṃ puṣpaṃ, kisalayamalūnaṃ kararuhai— ranāviddhaṃ ratnaṃ, madhu navamanāsvāditarasam |
akhaṇḍaṃ puṇyānāṃ phalamapi ca tadrūpamanaghaṃ na jāne bhoktāraṃ kamiha samupasthāsyati vidhiḥ || 32 ||
lāṭīyānuprāso yathā—(megha. 99)
aṅgenāṅgaṃ pratanu tanunā gāḍhatap‍tena tap‍taṃ sāstreṇāstradravamaviratotkaṇṭhamutkaṇṭhitena |
uṣṇoccha‌vāsaṃ samadhikatarocch‌vāsinā dūravartī saṅkalpaistairviśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ || 33 ||
yogarụ̄dhimatī yathā—(rā. ca. 1.18)
tasya cakruścamatkāraṃ vyatītasamayā api |
smitārdramukulodbhedāḥ kadambavanarājayaḥ || 34 ||
(3.2. vṛttiḥ)
ceṣṭāviśeṣavinyāsakramo vṛttiḥ| sā 'pi caturdhā — bhāratī,ārabhaṭī, kaiśikī, sāttvatī ceti |
(1. bhāratī)
yā vākpradhānā nṛvaraprayojyā strīvarjitā saṃskṛtapāṭha‌yaktā |
svanāmadheyairbharataiḥ prayojyā sā bhāratī nāma bhavettu vṛttiḥ || 35 ||
(nā. śā. 20.26)
tasyā aṅgāni catvāri— prarocanā, prastāvanā, vīthī, prahasanamiti | (tatra)
1. vaktavyārthapraśaṃsāparaṃ vacaḥ prarocanā; yathā—(mavīca. 1.7)
prācetaso munivṛṣā prathamaḥ kavīnāṃ yat pāvanaṃ raghupateḥ praṇināya vṛttam |
bhaktasya tatra samaranta mamāpi vācastāḥ suprasannavacasaḥ kṛtino bhajantām ||
2. prastutavastūpapādanāvasarasūcakaṃ vacaḥ prastāvanā; yathā—(ratnā. 1.6)
dvīpādanyasmādapi madhyādapi jalanidherdiśo 'pyantāt |
ānīya jhaṭiti ghaṭayati vidhirabhimatamabhimukhībhūtaḥ || 37 ||
3. ud‍ghātyakādīnāmaṅgānāṃ pravṛttirvīthī| tāni — ud‍ghātyakaḥ, kathod‍ghātaḥ, prayogātiśayaḥ, pravṛttakaḥ, valgita/avalagitamityādīni trayodaśa | teṣu — ud‌ghātyako yathā—
ko visamo saṃsāre॰ || 38 || (pṛ. 708)
evaṃ kathod‍ghātādayo 'pi daśarūpakāderudāhāryāḥ |
4. svadharmacalitānāṃ tāpasādīnāmupahāsaparaṃ vacaḥ prahasanam; yathā—
śramaṇaḥ śrāvakavadhvā suratavidhau daśati nādharaṃ dattam |
madirākṣi! māṃsabhakṣaṇamasmatsamaye niṣiddhamiti || 39 ||
(2. ārabhaṭī)
āviddhagatirārabhaṭī; yathā— (nāśā. 20.65)
pustāvapātaplutalaṅghitāni chedyāni māyākṛtamindrajālam |
citrāṇi yuddhāni ca yatra vṛttiṃ tāṃ tādṛśīmārabhaṭīṃ vadanti || 40 ||
tasyā api catvāryevāṅgāni— saṃkṣip‍takaḥ, avapātaḥ, vastūtthāpanaṃ, sampheṭaḥ iti |
1. māyendrajālanepathyādibhiḥ vastusaṃkṣepaḥ saṃkṣip‍takaḥ; yathā—
rakṣasā mṛgarūpeṇa॰ || 41 || (raghu. 12.53 dra.12.120)
2. bhayādibhirvidravādikarmasu praveśanirgamanamavapātaḥ; yathā—
mṛgarūpaṃ parityajya॰ || 42 || (urā. 2.22; dra. 12.121)
3. avidravaḥ savidravo vā sarvarasabhāvasamāso vastūtthāpanaṃ; yathā—
rāhoścandrakalām॰ || 43 || (māmā. 5.28; dra 10.97)
4. nānāstrayuddhaniyuddhādibhiḥ sasaṃrambhasaṃprahāraḥ sampheṭaḥ yathā—
kṛṣṭā yena śiroruheṣu || 44 || (vesaṃ. 3.42; dra.14.133)
(3. kaiśikī)
śrṛṅgāraprāyā kaiśikī |
