yā ś‍lakṣṇanepathyaviśeṣayuktā || 45 || (nāśā. 20.53; dra.12.34)
tasyā api catvāryevāṅgāni— narma, narmasphañjaḥ, narmasphoṭaḥ, narmagarbha iti |
1. āsthāpitaśrṛṅgāraṃ vaco viceṣṭitaṃ vā 'pi saparihāsaṃ narma| yathā—
vayaṃ tathā nāma yathā ' 'ttha || 46 || (māmā. 7.1; dra.7.96)
2. prathamasaṅgame bhayāvasānaṃ sambhogāśrayaṃ vākyādikarma narmasphañjaḥ| yathā—
prāp‍tā 'sau vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ priyasutā saṅketaṣaṇḍaṃ sakhe! || 47 || (dra.12.125)
3. āvirbhūtābhilāṣānubhāvabhāvayorakāṇḍa eva sambhogabhaṅgo narmasphoṭaḥ| yathā—
kathaya kimiha bāle! kā tvamityullapaṃstāṃ || 48 || (pṛ. 973)
4. kāryahetoḥ svarūpavijñānādipracchādanaṃ narmagarbhaḥ| yathā—
athājināṣāḍhadharaḥ || 49 || (kusaṃ. 5.30; pṛ.718)
(4. sāttvatī)
sattvapradhānā sāttvatī |
yā sāttvateneha guṇena yuktā || 50 || (nāśā. 20.36, śrṛ.12.35, pṛ.699) tasyā api catvāryevāṅgāni—utthāpakaḥ, parivartakaḥ, saṃlāpakaḥ, saṅghātyaka iti |
1. parasparāsūyayā artheṣūtthānamutthāpakaḥ| yathā—
prahara namatu cāpaṃ prākprahārapriyo 'haṃ || 51 || (mavīca. 2.49, śrṛ.12.128, pṛ.718)
2. prastutārthatyāgādanyārthabhajanaṃ parivartakaḥ| yathā—
munimabhimukhatāṃ ninīṣavo yāḥ || 52 || (kirātā. 10.40 pṛ.719)
3. sadasi nānāvākyairmitho 'dhikṣepaḥ saṃlāpakaḥ| yathā—(vesaṃ. 3.40)
kathamapi na niṣiddho duḥkhinā bhīruṇā vā || 53 || (pṛ. 719)
4. kāryamantrārthaprabhāvadaivādibhiḥ saṅghātabhedaḥ saṅghātyakaḥ| yathā—
apaś‍yadbhiriveśānaṃ || 54 || (kirātā. 15.2, pṛ.719)
(3.3. pravṛttiḥ)
veṣavinyāsakramaḥ pravṛttiḥ |
sā caturdhā paurastyaụdhramāgadhī—dākṣiṇātyā—āvantyādibhedāt| tatra—
1. paurastyaiḥ pravartitatvāt paurastyā| yathā—
tāṭaṅkavalganataraṅgitagaṇḍalekham || 55 || (pṛ. 700)
yathā vā—(ratnā. 1.20)
pratyagramajjanaviśeṣavibhaktamūrtiḥ || 56 || (pṛ. 702)
2. ụdhra/aụdhramāgadhī yathā—
ārdrārdracandanakucārpitasūtrahāraḥ sīmantacumbisicayaḥ sphuṭabāhumūlaḥ |
dūrvāprakāṇḍarucirāsvagurūpabhogād gauḍāṅganāsu cirameṣa cakāstu veṣaḥ || 57 ||
yathā vā— (X X X X khaṇḍitam)
3. dākṣiṇātyā yathā—
āmūlato valitakuntalacārucūḍaś‍cūrṇālakapracayalāñchitaphālabhāgaḥ |
kakṣāniveśanibiḍīkṛtanīvireṣa veṣaściraṃ jayatu kuntala/keralakāminīnām || 58 ||
yathā vā—
keśāḥ supuṣpagaṇḍūṣā jaghane maṇimekhalā |
hāro raktāṃśukaṃ bhadraṃ veṣaḥ syādāndhrayoṣitām || 59 ||
4. āvantyā yathā—
pāñcālanepathyavidhirnarāṇāṃ strīṇāṃ punarnandatu dākṣiṇātyaḥ |
vandāmahe vandyatamaṃ punastamanyonyasambhinnamavantideśe || 60 ||
yathā vā—(vikra. 3.12)
sitāṃśukā maṅgalasūtrabhūṣaṇā viviktadūrvāṅ‍kuralāñchitālakā |
vratopavāsojjhitagarvavṛttikā mama prasannā vapuṣaiva lakṣyate || 60a ||
manovāgbuddhijārambhāḥ krameṇaite pradarśitāḥ |
ataḥ śarīrajārambhaprakāro 'yaṃ prapañcyate || 61 ||
manovāgbuddhijanmāna ārambhāstu sahastraśaḥ |
bharatādipraṇītatvāt kiṃ tvihaite na darśitāḥ || 62 ||
līlādayo 'dhara—kapola—vikalpa—1hāsai— rbhrūtārakāpuṭaviceṣṭitavīkṣitāni |
ṣaṭ‍‌triṃdeva ca dṛśo bharatapraṇītāḥ kāvyakriyopakaraṇārthamathoddha‌riyante || 63 ||
(śarīrārambhāḥ —12)
tatra —
1. śarīrārambheṣu iṣṭajanānukṛtirlīlā; yathā— (gāsa. 4.78)
jaṃ jaṃ karesi jaṃ jaṃ, ca jaṃpase jaha tumaṃ ṇiacchesi |
taṃ taṃ aṇusikkhirīe dīho diaho ṇa saṃpaḍaï || 64 ||
(yadyat karoṣi yad yajjalpasi yathā tvaṃ nirīkṣase |
tattadanuśikṣaṇaśīlāyā dīrgho divaso na saṃpadyate ||)
1. vāsaiḥ jo॰, rā॰
2. netrabhrūvaktrakarmaṇāṃ viśeṣeṇa lasanaṃ vilāsaḥ; yathā—(māmā. 1.28)
sabhrūvilāsamatha so 'yamitīva nāma sapratyabhijñamiva māmavalokya tasyāḥ |
anyonyameva catureṇa sakhījanena muktāstadā smitasudhāmadhurāḥ kaṭākṣāḥ || 65 ||
3. vibhūṣaṇādināmanādaravinyāso vicchittiḥ; yathā—
aṅgāni candanarajaḥparidhūsarāṇi tāmbūlarāgasubhago 'dharapallavaśca |
acchāñjane ca nayane vasanaṃ tanīyaḥ kāntāsu bhūṣaṇamidaṃ; vibhavastu śeṣaḥ || 66 ||
4. bhūṣaṇādīnāmasthānaprayogo vibhramaḥ; yathā—
cakāra kācit sitacandanāṅke kāñcīkalāpaṃ stanabhārapṛṣṭhe |
priyaṃ prati preṣitacittavṛttirnitambabimbe ca babandha hāram || 67 ||
5. smitaruditahasitādīnāṃ harṣādasakṛdekīkaraṇaṃ kilakiñcitam; yathā—
pāṇipallavavidhūnanamantaḥ sītkṛtāni nayanārddhanimeṣāḥ |
yoṣitāṃ rahasi gadgadavācāmastratāmupayayurmadanasya || 68 || (kirātā. 9.50)
6. iṣṭajanakathāyāṃ tadbhāvabhāvanotthito vikāro moṭṭāyitam; yathā— (māgha. 9.64)
tava sā kathāsu parighaṭṭayati śravaṇaṃ yadaṅgulimukhena muhuḥ |
ghanatāṃ dhruvaṃ nayati tena bhavad‌guṇapūgapūritamatṛp‍tatayā || 69 ||
7. keśastanādharādigrahaṇād duḥkhe 'pi sukhabuddhiceṣṭā kuṭṭamitam; yathā— (kirātā. 9.49)
ādṛtā nakhapadaiḥ parirambhāś‍cumbitāni ghanadantanipātaiḥ |
saukumāryaguṇasambhṛtakīrttirvāma eva surateṣvapi kāmaḥ || 70 ||
8. abhīṣṭaprāp‍tāvamānagarvasambhāvanādarakṛto vikāro bibbokaḥ; yathā—
nirvibhujya daśanacchadaṃ tato vāci bharturavadhīraṇāparā |
śailarājatanayā samīpagāmālalāpa vijayāmahetukam || 71 || (kusaṃ. 8. 49)
9. sukumāratayā karacaraṇāṅganyāso lalitam; yathā—(māgha. 7.19)
gurutarakalanūpurānunādaṃ salalitanartitavāmapādapadmā |
itaradanatilolamādadhānā padamatha manmathamantharaṃ jagāma || 72 ||
10. vaktavyasamaye 'pi vacasā 'nabhibhāṣya kriyānuṣṭhānaṃ vihṛtam; yathā—
patyuḥ śiraścandrakalāmanena || 73 || (kusaṃ. 7.19, pṛ॰ 888)
11. vālyakaumārayauvanasādhāraṇo vihāraviśeṣaḥ krīḍitam; yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.29)
mandākinīsaikatavedikābhiḥ sā kandukaiḥ kṛtrimaputrakaiśca |
reme muhurmadhyagatā sakhīnāṃ krīḍārasaṃ nirviśatīva bālye || 74 ||
12. kriḍitameva priyatamaviṣayaṃ keliḥ; yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.74)
iti dvijātau pratikūlavādini pravepamānādharalakṣyakopayā |
nivartitabhrūlatamāhite tayā vilocane tiryagupāntalohite || 75 ||**
viniṣkramo visargaḥ; yathā—(śāku. 3.22)
muhuraṅgulisaṃvṛtādharoṣṭhaṃ pratiṣedhākṣaraviklavābhirāmam |
mukhamaṃsavivarti pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kathamapyunnamitaṃ, na cumbitaṃ tu || 76 ||
praveśo vinigūhanam (nāśā. 8.143); yathā—
majjhimarebhāgaagāḍhajjhasurasīmaṃtio subhāvei |
ijjāṇitthāmubbhiṇṇahāsathe o huro aharo(?) || 77 ||
dantairgrahaṇaṃ sandaṣṭakam (nāśā. 8.143); yathā— (māgha. 17.2)
sarāgayā strutaghanagharmatoyayā karāhatidhvanitapṛthūrupīṭhayā |
muhurmuhurdaśanavighaṭṭitoṣṭhayā ruṣā nṛpāḥ priyatamayeva bhejire || 78 ||
saṃhitodgamaḥ samudraḥ (nāśā. 8.143); yathā— (gāsa. 1. 22)
āarapaṇāmioṭṭhaṃ aghaḍiaṇāsaṃ asaṃgaaṇiḍālaṃ |
vaṇṇaghaalippamuhīeṁ tīeṁ paricuṃbaṇaṃ bharimo || 79 ||
{ādarapraṇāmitoṣṭham aghaṭitanāsam asaṃgataniṭilam |
varṇaghṛtalip‍tamukhyāstasyāḥ paricumbanaṃ smarāmaḥ ||}
** ita ārabhya visargāt pūrvaṃ yāvanmahān granthapātaḥ| līlādīnāmanantaramadharakarmāṇi, teṣāṃ lakṣaṇodāharaṇāni, tatra avatārikā, ṣaṇṇāmadharakarmaṇāṃ nāmata uddeśaḥ, vivartanakampanayoḥ prathamadvitīyayorlakṣaṇodāharaṇāni ca truṭitāni| dṛś‍yatāṃ nā. śā. 8.142—5|
(kapolārambhāḥ —6)
atha kapolārambhāḥ — kṣāmaṃ, phullam, pūrṇaṃ(ghūrṇaṃ), kampitaṃ, kuñcitaṃ, samaṃ (nāśā. 136–141) ceti | tatra—
1. avanataṃ kṣāmaṃ ; yathā—
parikṣāmakapoleṣu pulakodbhedacāruṣu |
kāntāvaktreṣu kā 'mbhojeṣvavardhata tadā dhṛtiḥ || 80 ||
2. vikasitaṃ phullaṃ ; yathā (pṛ॰ 1059) —
kapole jānakyāḥ karikalabhadantadyutimuṣi smarasmeraṃ gaṇḍoḍḍamarapulakaṃ vaktrakamalam |
muhuḥ paś‍yañ śṛṇvan rajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭagranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ || 81 ||
3. unnataṃ pūrṇaṃ/ghūrṇaṃ ; yathā—(gāsa. 1.96)
ṇāsaṃ va sā kaole ajja vi tuha daṃtamaṃḍaṇaṃ/laṃ bālā |
ubbhiṇṇapulaavaï—veḍhaparigaaṃ rakkhaï varāī || 82 ||
(nyāsamiva sā kapole adyāpi tava dantamaṇḍanaṃ bālā |
udbhinnapulakaparivṛtiveṣṭanaparigataṃ rakṣati varākī ||)
4. sphuritaṃ kampitaṃ ; yathā—
ekatrāsanasaṃsthite priyatame paścādupetyādarāt॰ || 83 || (pṛ.959)
5. saṃkucitaṃ kuñcitaṃ ; yathā—
mā addalasāaḍirīe saṃkuiagaṃḍapāsāe |
hasitaṃ(aṃ)adhomuhīe kiṃ varaaṃ saṃbharantīe || 84 ||
(mā ārdrālasādarāyā saṅ‍kucitagaṇḍapāśāyāḥ |
hasitamadhomukhyāḥ kiṃ varakaṃ saṃsmarantyāḥ ||)
6. prakṛtisthaṃ samaṃ ; yathā—(sūmu. 96/97)
pāyāt payodhiduhituḥ kapolāmalacandramāḥ |
yatra saṃkrāntabimbena hariṇā hariṇāyitam || 85 ||
(hāsārambhāḥ —6)
atha hāsārambhāḥ — smitaṃ, hasitaṃ, vihasitam, upahasitam, apahasitam, atihasitaṃ ceti |
1. īṣaddhasitaṃ smitaṃ; yathā— (kusaṃ. 1.44)
puṣpaṃ pravālopahitaṃ yadi syānmuktāphalaṃ vā sphuṭavidrumastham |
tato 'nukuryād viśadasya tasyāstāmroṣṭhaparyastarucaḥ smitasya || 86 ||
2. dṛṣṭadaśanakānti hasitaṃ ; yathā—
timiraniruddhabhīmarajanīmukhacandrikayā gaṇapatitāṇḍavābhinayadarśanadīpikayā |
abhibhavasi tvamadya śaśinaḥ śriyamutkaṭayā daśanamayūkhamañjaritayā hasitaprabhayā || 87 ||
3. tadeva kiñcitsaviśeṣaṃ vihasitaṃ; yathā—
cyutāmindorlekhāṃ ratikalahamag‍naṃ ca valayaṃ samaṃ cakrīkṛtya prahasitavatī śailatanayā |
avocad yaṃ paś‍yetyavatu sa śivaḥ, sā ca girijā, sa ca krīḍācandro daśanakiraṇāpūritatanuḥ || 88 ||
4. tadeva sotprāsamupahasitaṃ; yathā—
sa eṣa bhuvanatrayaprathitasaṃyamaḥ śaṅkaraḥ॰ || 89 || (pṛ. 540)
5. tadeva sāvajñamapahasitaṃ; yathā—
ghuṇapraghuṇabhaṅgu(raṃ) paśupateḥ purāṇajā(?)(/purāṇās‍traka)1 nirīkṣya bhujamaṇḍalībalamadād vikīrṇaṃ mayā |
sa eṣa na titikṣate samarasīm‍ni sīradhvajaḥ samaṃ hasata he mukhānyasamametadud‍ghaṭṭakam || 90 ||
6. hāsaprakarṣo 'tihasitam; yathā—(seba. 1.7)
jassa vilaggaṃti ṇahapphuḍapaḍisaddā disā—aḍa—paḍikkhaliā |
joṇhakallolā via sasidhaalāsu raaṇīsu hasiaccheā || 91 ||
1. khaṭ‍vāṅgasaṃjñamas‍tram |
(yasya vilaganti nabhaḥ—sphuṭapratiśabdāḥ dik‍taṭapariskhalitāḥ |
jyot‍s‍nākallolā iva śaśidhavalāsu rajanīṣu hasitacchedāḥ ||)
(bhrūkarma —7)
atha bhrūkarmāṇi— utkṣepaḥ,pātanaṃ, bhrūkuṭiḥ, caturaṃ, (ni)kuñcitaṃ, recitaṃ, sahajamiti |
1. bhruvorudgatarutkṣepaḥ samamekaikaśo 'pi vā (nāśā. 8.119) | yathā—(rat‍nā. 2.20)
bhrūbhaṅge sahasodgate 'pi vadanaṃ nītaṃ parāṃ namratā— mīṣanmāṃ prati bhedakāri hasitaṃ noktaṃ vaco niṣṭhuram |
antarbāṣpajaḍīkṛtaṃ prabhutayā cakṣurna visphāritaṃ kopaśca prakaṭīkṛto dayitayā, muktaśca na praśrayaḥ || 92 ||
2. samamekaikaśo vāpi pātanaṃ syādadhogatiḥ | yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.60)
tasmai śaśaṃsa praṇipatya nandī śuśrūṣayā śailasutāmupetām |
praveś‍yāmāsa ca bharturenāṃ bhrūkṣepamātrānumatapraveśām || 93 ||
3. bhruvormūlasamutkṣepo bhrukuṭiḥ (nāśā. 8.121), yathā—(śāku. 5.23)
mayyeva vismaraṇadāruṇacittavṛttau vṛttaṃ rahaḥ praṇayamapratipadyamāne |
bhedād bhruvoḥ kuṭilayoratilohitākṣyā bhag‍naṃ śarasanamivātiruṣā smarasya || 94 ||
4. kiñciducchvāsād bhruvormadhurāyatatā caturaṃ (nāśā. 8.122) yathā—
stimitavikasitānāmullasad‍bhrūlatānāṃ masṛṇamukulitānāṃ prāntavistārabhājām |
pratinayananipāte kiñcidākuñcitānāṃ vividhamahamabhūvaṃ pātramālokitānām || 95 ||
5. ekasyā ubhayorvā 'pi mṛdubhaṅge nikuñcitaṃ (nāśā. 8.123) yathā—
mānayogyāṃ karomīti priyasthāne sthitāṃ sakhīm |
bālā bhrūbhaṅgajihyākṣī paś‍yati sphuritādharā || 96 ||
6. ekasyā eva lalitādutkṣepāderudrecitaṃ bhruvaḥ | (nāśā.8.123)yathā—(śāku. 3.12)
unnamitaikabhrūlatamānanamasyāḥ padāni racayantyāḥ |
kaṇṭakitena prathayati mayyanurāgaṃ kapolena || 97 ||
7. svābhāvikaṃ sahajaṃ (nāśā. 8.124) yathā—
asyā smeramivānanaṃ madhurayā kāntyā kapolasthale madhyasthe 'pi jane vilolavalitabhrūlekhamālokitam |
yātaṃ mandapadaṃ ghanasya jaghanasyaivāpāradhena yat tat sāmyapriyamanyathā mama manojātāni mā(sā) śaṅkate || 98 ||
(tārākarma —9)
atha tārākarmāṇi(nāśā. 8.96)— bhramaṇaṃ, valanaṃ(gamanaṃ), pātanaṃ, calanaṃ, saṃpraveśanaṃ(praveśaḥ), vivartanaṃ, samud‍vṛtaṃ, niṣkra/ṣkrāmaḥ, prākṛtaṃ ceti |
1. tārayo(ś‍cakṣuḥ) puṭāntarmaṇḍalā ' 'vṛttiḥ bhramaṇaṃ; yathā—(nāśā. 8.102)
bhramiṣu kṛtapuṭāntarmaṇḍalāvarti cakṣuḥ pracalitacaturabhrūtāṇḍavairmaṇḍayantyā |
karakisalayatālairmugdhayā nartyamānaṃ sutamiva manasā tvāṃ vatsalena smarāmi || 99 ||
2. tryaśraṃ gamanaṃ(valanaṃ) (nāśā. 8.99); yathā—
mithyāmīladāralapakṣmaṇi valantyantaḥ kuraṅgīdṛśo dīrghāpāṅgasarittaraṅgatarale talponmukhaṃ cakṣuṣi |
patyuḥ kelimataḥ kathāṃ viramayannanyonyakaṇḍūyanaiḥ ko 'yaṃ vyāharatītyudīrya niragāt savyājamālījanaḥ || 100 ||
3. adho 'vasraṃsanaṃ pātanaṃ (nāśā. 8.98); yathā—(megha. 46)
tvayyādātuṃ jalamavanate śārṅgiṇo varṇacaure tasyāḥ sindhoḥ pṛthumapi tanuṃ dūrabhāvāt pravāham |
prekṣiṣyante gaganaviṣayād dūramāvarjya dṛṣṭī— rekaṃ muktāguṇamiva bhuvaḥ sthūlamadhyendranīlam || 101 ||
4. vilolatā calanaṃ; yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.56)
sugandhiniḥśvāsavivṛddhatṛṣṇaṃ bimbādharāsannacaraṃ(ra)dvirepham |
pratikṣaṇaṃ saṃbhramaloladṛṣṭirlīlāravindena nivārayantī || 102 ||
5. antaḥpraveśanaṃ praveśaḥ (/saṃpraveśanam) (nāśā. 8.99); yathā—(harṣaca. 1.2)
harakaṇṭhagrahānandamīlitākṣīṃ namāmyumām |
kālakūṭaviṣasparśajātamūrcchāgamāmiva || 103 ||
6. kaṭākṣo vivartanaṃ (nāśā. 8.101); yathā—
śriyaḥ kṣīrāmbhodhernijavinayanamreṇa vapuṣā śanairuttiṣṭhantyāḥ valanalulitendīvaradṛśaḥ |
kaṭākṣo mandākṣastimitavalitabhrurharimanu prakīrṇaḥ kālindīlaghulaharivṛttirvijayate || 104 ||
7. samunnatiḥ samuda‍vṛttaṃ (nāśā. 8.101); yathā— (rat‍nā. 2.10)
kṛcchreṇoruyugaṃ vyatītya suciraṃ bhrāntyā nitambasthale madhye 'syāstrivalītaraṅgaviṣame niṣpandatāmāgatā |
mad‍dṛṣṭiḥ stimiteva samprati śanairāruhya tuṅgau stanau sākāṅkṣaṃ muhurīkṣate jalalavaprasyandinī locane || 105 ||
8. nirgamo niṣkramaḥ (/niṣkrāmaḥ) (nāśā. 8.101); yathā— (kusaṃ. 3.71)
tapaḥparāmarśavivṛddhamanyorbhrūbhaṅgaduṣprekṣyamukhasya tasya |
sphurannudarciḥ sahasā tṛtīyādakṣṇaḥ kṛśānuḥ kila niṣpapāta || 106 ||
9. svābhāvikaṃ prākṛtaṃ (nāśā. 8.101); yathā—(kusaṃ. 7.36)
ityadbha‍utaikaprabhavaḥ prabhāvāt prasiddhanepathyavidhervidhātā |
ātmanamāsannagaṇopanīte khaḍ‍ge niṣaktapratimaṃ dadarśa || 107 ||
(akṣipuṭakarma —9)
athākṣipuṭakarmāṇi — unmeṣaḥ, nimeṣaḥ, prasṛtaṃ, (saṅa‍)kuñcitaṃ, samaṃ, vivartitaṃ, sphuritaṃ, pihitaṃ, vitāni(/li)tamiti (nāśā. 8.112) |
1. puṭaviśleṣa unmeṣaḥ (nāśā. 8.113); yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.3)
kaitavena śayite kutūhalāt pārvatī prati mukhaṃ nipātitam |
cakṣurunmiṣati sammitaṃ priye vidyudāhatamiva nyamīlayat || 108 ||
2. puṭasamāgamo nimeṣaḥ (nāśā. 8.113); yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.84)
kevalaṃ priyatamādayālunā jyotiṣāmavanatāsu paṅ‍‌ktiṣu |
tena tatparigṛhītavakṣasā netramīlanakutūhalaṃ kṛtam || 109 ||
tuṣāraleśākulitotpalābhe paryaśruṇī maṅgalabhaṅgabhīruḥ |
agūḍhabhāvā 'pi vilokane sā na locane mīlayituṃ viṣehe || 110 ||1
(kirātā. 3.36)
4. īṣatsaṅkocaḥ saṅ‍kucitaṃ (nāśā. 8.114); yathā—
yasyārātinitimbinībhirabhito vīkṣyāmbaraṃ prāvṛṣi sphūrjadgarjitanirjitāmbudhiravasphārābhravṛndākulam |
utsṛṣṭaprasabhābhiṣeṇanabhayaspaṣṭa—pramodāśrubhiḥ kiñcitkuñcitalocanābhirasakṛt prāp‍tāḥ/ghrātāḥ kadambānilāḥ || 111 ||
5. svābhāvikaṃ samaṃ (nāśā. 8.114); yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.47)
kiñcitprakāśastimitogratārairbhrūvikriyāyāṃ virataprasaṅgaiḥ |
netrairavispanditapakṣmamālairlakṣyīkṛtaghrāṇamadhomayūkhaiḥ || 112 ||
6. samuda‍vṛttaṃ vivartitaṃ (nāśā. 8.114); yathā—(vesaṃ. 4.10)
paryāp‍tanetramacirodgatacandrakāntamudbhidyamānanavayauvanaramyacihnam |
prāṇāpahāraparivartitadṛṣṭi dṛṣṭaṃ karṇena tat kathamivānanapaṅkajaṃ te || 113 ||
7. spanditaṃ sphuritaṃ (nāśā. 8.114); yathā—(megha. 92)
ruddhāpāṅgaprasaramalakairañjanas‍nehaśūnyaṃ pratyādeśādapi ca madhuno vismṛtabhrūvilāsam |
tvayyāsanne nayanamuparispandi śaṅke mṛgākṣyā mīnakṣobhākulakuvalayaśrītulāmeṣyatīti || 114 ||
1. prasṛtamityasya tṛtīyabhedasyodāharaṇaṃ nopalabhyate |
8. sthagitaṃ pihitaṃ (nāśā. 8.115); yathā—(kirātā. 8.50)
udasya dhairyaṃ dayitena sādaraṃ prasāditāyāḥ karavārivāritam |
mukhaṃ nimīlannayanaṃ natabhruvaḥ śriyaṃ sapat‍nīvadanādivādade || 115 ||
9. abhihataṃ vitāli(/ni)taṃ (nāśā. 8.115); yathā—(gāsa. 5.60)
pāaḍiaṃ sohaggaṃ taṃvāe uaha goṭṭhamajjhammi |
duṭṭha(c‍ca)vasahassa siṃge akkhi(ccha)uḍaṃ kaṃḍuatīe || 116 ||
(prakaṭitaṃ saubhāgyaṃ gavā paśyata goṣṭhamadhye |
dṛṣṭavṛṣabhasya śṛṅge 'kṣipuṭaṃ kaṇḍūyantyā ||)
(avalokanaprakārāḥ —9)
(nāśā. 8.107–110) avalokanaprakārāḥ — samaṃ, sāci, parāvṛttam, anuvṛttam, vilokitam, ālokitam, pralokitam, ullokitam, avalokitaṃ ceti |
1. saumyasamatāraṃ samaṃ; yathā—
dehasthā darpaṇe yasya paś‍yati pratimāmumā |
anyārdhābhyāmivotpannamardhanārīśvarāntaram || 117 ||
2. pakṣmāntargatatryaśratāraṃ sāci (nāśā. 8.107); yathā— (gāsa. 2.48)
ṇiddālasa—parighummira—taṃsa—valaṃtaddhatāraāloā |
kāmassa vi duvvisahā, diṭṭiṇivāā sasimuhīṇaṃ || 118 ||
(nidrālasaparighūrṇanaśīlatryaśravaladardhatārakālokāḥ |
kāmasyāpi durviṣahā dṛṣṭinipātāḥ śaśimukhītām ||)
3. paścād valitagrīvaṃ (nāśā. 8.33) parāvṛttaṃ; yathā—(māmā. 1.32)
yāntyā muhurvalitakandharamānanaṃ tad āvṛttavṛntaśatapatranibhaṃ vahantyā |
digdho 'mṛtena ca viṣeṇa ca pakṣmalākṣyā gāḍhaṃ nikhāta iva me hṛdaye kaṭākṣaḥ || 119 ||
4. rūpavarṇanāyuktamanuvṛttaṃ; yathā—
lāvaṇyasindhuraparaiva hi keyamatra yatrotpalāni śaśinā saha saṃplavante |
unmajjati dviradakumbhataṭī ca yatra yatrāpare kadalakāṇḍamṛṇāladaṇḍāḥ || 120 ||
5. agrato dṛṣṭaṃ vilokitaṃ; yathā—(kirātā. 13.35)
vilokanenaiva tavāmunā mune ! kṛtaḥ pavitro 'smi nivarhitāṃhasā |
tathā 'pi śuśrūṣurahaṃ garīyasīrgiro 'thavā śreyasi kena tṛpyate ? || 121 ||
6. sahasā dṛṣṭamālokitaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 13.35)
tatra kārmukadharaṃ mahābhujaṃ paś‍yati sma sahasā vanecaram |
sannikāśayitumagrataḥ sthitaṃ śāsanaṃ makaraketuvidviṣaḥ || 122 ||
7. pārśvato dṛṣṭaṃ pralokitaṃ (nāśā. 8.109) yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.69)
athendriyakṣobhamayugmanetraḥ punarvaśitvād balavannigṛhya |
hetuṃ svacetovikṛterdidṛkṣurdiśāmupānteṣu sasarja dṛṣṭim || 123 ||
8. ūrdhvaṃ dṛṣṭamullokitaṃ; (nāśā. 8.109) yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.20)
śucau caturṇāṃ jvalatāṃ śucismitā havirbhujāṃ madhyagatā sumadhyamā |
vijitya netrapratighātinīṃ prabhāmananyadṛṣṭiḥ savitāramaikṣata || 124 ||
9. adhodṛṣṭamavalokitaṃ (nāśā. 8.109); yathā—
ākāśayānataṭakoṭikṛtaikapādā staddhemadaṇḍayugalānyavalambya hastaiḥ |
kautūhalāt tava taraṅgavighaṭṭitāni paś‍yanti devi! manujāḥ svakalevarāṇi || 125 ||
(dṛṣṭayaḥ —36)
atha kāntādyāḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ ṣaṭ‍‍triṃśat | tatra —
harṣaprasādajanitātyarthaṃ (nāśā. 8.47) kopāmarṣaṃsamanmathā bhrūvikṣepakaṭākṣā ca kāntā; yathā— (māmā. 1.30)
stimitavikasitānāmullasad‍bhrūlatānāṃ masṛṇamukulitānāṃ prāntavistārabhājām |
pratinayananipāte kiñcidākuñjitānāṃ vividhamahamabhūvaṃ pātramālokitānām || 126 ||
proda‍vṛttaniṣṭabdhapuṭā sphuradud‍vṛttatārakā 'tyarthabhītā bhayānakā; yathā—(sebaṃ. 2.42)
saaradaṃsaṇahitthā ākkhittosariavevamāṇasarīrā |
sahasā lihia vva ṭhiā ṇipphaṃdaṇirāaaloaṇā kaviṇivahā || 127 ||
(sāgaradarśanatrastāḥ ākṣip‍tāpasṛtavepamānaśarīrāḥ |
sahasā likhitā iva sthitā nisspandanirāyatalocanāḥ kapinivahāḥ ||)
hāsyā yathā— (nāśā. 8.49)
sarabhasaharakaṇṭhagrāhasaṃmīlitākṣī viṣamaviṣavitāpā mūrcchitā veti sāsre |
śaravaṇabhavavaktre vīkṣitaṃ lolatāraṃ jayati khalu bhavānyāḥ sālasaṃ sasmitaṃ ca || 128 ||
patitordhvapuṭā sāsrā manyumantharatārikā nāsāgrānugatā ca karuṇā (nāśā. 8.50); yathā—
tārāpreṅkhaṇavītabāṣpapayaso yat‍nena sañcāritāḥ sītāyāḥ savidhasthiteṣu ca mṛgadvandveṣu vīrutsu ca |
bāle valkalacīravāsini javādullaṅghya gambhīratāṃ saumitrau ta patanti vatsalatayā putrasya te dṛṣṭayaḥ || 129 || (bārā.6.44)
sāś‍caryod‍vṛttatārakā ākulitapakṣmāgrā vikasitā samā ad‍bhutā (nāśā. 8.51); yathā—
tadetadasitollasad‍dyutiśarīramasminnabhū— nmamātidṛḍhapīḍanairamitatṛp‍tirāliṅgakaiḥ |
yadullasati vismayād bata nipītavatyaḥ purā navapraṇayavibhramākulitamālatīdṛṣṭayaḥ || 130 || (māmā.9.38)
krūratārakā bhrakuṭikuṭilā ca raudrā (nā.śā. 8.51); yathā—(kirā. 14.49)
patatsu śastreṣu vitatya rodasī samantatastasya dhanurdudhūṣataḥ |
saroṣamulkeva papāta bhīṣaṇā baleṣu dṛṣṭirvinipātaśaṃsinī || 131 ||
dīp‍tā vikasitā kṣubdhā gambhīrā samatārakotphullamadhyā ca vīrā (nā.śā.8.53) ; yathā—
tā se cira majjha theṇihu a kaaṃ |
taha maā paḍi dia. . . . . . . ammi ṇisaṇṇā || 132 ||
nikuñcitapuṭāpāṅgā ghṛṇopaplutatārakā saṃśliṣṭasthirapakṣmā ca bībhatsā (nāśā. 8.53) yathā—
triśūlabhinnāndhakaraktadhārāmāsvādayantyāṃ yudhi kālarātrau |
harārdhadehe mṛḍatāṃ mṛḍānyāṃ dṛṣṭirghṛṇāghūrṇitatārakā vaḥ || 133 ||
'vyākośā s‍nehamadhurā smitatārābhilāṣiṇī' sānandabhrūkṣatā ca s‍nigdhā (nāśā. 8.56);
yathā—(urāca. 3.23)
vilulitamatipurairbāṣpamānandaśoka— prabhavamava/pasṛjantī pakṣmalottāni dīrghā |
s‍napayati hṛdayeśaṃ s‍nehanissyandinī te dhavalamadhuramugdhā dugdhakulyeva dṛṣṭiḥ || 134 ||
calā hasitagarbhā viśattārā nirnimeṣā kiñcidākuñcitā ca hṛṣṭā (nāśā. 8.55) |
yathā—(māmā. 8.11)
kathayati tvayi sasmitamālatīvalitalolakaṭākṣaparāhatam |
varadapaṅkajamullasitatrapālidhuradṛṣṭi sakhī namayiṣyati || 135 ||
kiñcitsaṃruddhatārambhā ardhasrastottarapuṭā sāsramandasañcāriṇī ca dīnā (nā. 8.56);
yathā—(śāku.6.9)
itaḥ pratyādeśāt svajanamanugantuṃ vyavasitā gṛhe tiṣṭhetyuc‍cairvadati guruśiṣye gurusame |
punardṛṣṭiṃ bāṣpaprasarakaluṣāmarpitavatī mayi krūre yat, tat saviṣamiva śalyaṃ dahati mām || 136 ||
'rūkṣā sthiroda‍vṛttapuṭā niṣṭabdhoda‍vṛttatārakā' bhrukuṭīkuṭilā ca kruddhā (nāśā. 8. 57);
yathā—
eṃto vi ṇa sac‍cavio gose pasaraṃtapallavāruṇacchāo |
majjaṇataṃbesu mao, taha sama/maataṃbesabu loaṇesu amariso || 137 ||
{āgacchannapi na dṛṣṭaḥ prātaḥ prasara—tpallavāruṇacchāyaḥ |
majjanatāmrayormadastathā madatāmrayorlocanayoramarṣaḥ ||}
saṃsthitatārakā vikasitā samattvā ca dṛp‍tā (nā.śā.8.60), yathā— (urāca. 6.19)
dṛṣṭistṛṇīkṛtajagattrayasattvasārā dhīroddhatā namayatīva gatirdharitrīm |
kaumārake 'pi girivad gurutāṃ dadhāno vīro rasaḥ kimayametyuta darpa eva || 138 ||
(bhayāñcitadṛṣṭerlakṣaṇodāharaṇāṃśastruṭitaḥ) (nā.śā.8.61)

alasalulitamugdhasnigdhanisspandamandairadhikavikasadantarvismayasmeratāraiḥ |
hṛdayamaśaraṇaṃ me pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kaṭākṣairapahṛtamapaviddhaṃ pītamunmūlitaṃ ca || 139 ||
samatārā samapuṭā niṣkampā (śūnanyadarśinī) bāhyārthāgrāhiṇī (kṣāmā/śyāmā) śūnyā (nā.śā. 8.65) yathā— (visā. 1.41)
yad bhrūlate taralite yadudaṅgulīkaḥ pāṇiḥ puro yadapi cakṣuralabdhalakṣyam |
utsūtritādharadalaṃ ca yadāsyamasyā— statkārya/kāvyakarmaṇi niṣaktamavaimi cetaḥ || 140 ||
praspandapakṣmā nātyarthamukulā ca malinā (nāśā. 8.64); yathā—
devyāḥ santatabāṣpavāripaṭalacchannekṣaṇāyāḥ karaṃ cūḍāratnasamarpaṇāya bahuśo yātaṃ vṛthaivānyataḥ |
bhrāmyantaṃ patadaśrupūritadṛśo hastaṃ mamāpyekato dṛṣṭ‍vā tatra niśācarairapi nijaḥ svāmī ciraṃ ninditaḥ || 141 ||
śramapramlāpitapuṭā kṣāmā 'stāñcitalocanā sannā patitatārakā ca śrāntā (nāśā. 8.67); yathā—
klamodayamlāpitapatrasampuṭā puṭāntasaṃ(pātita)—gharmabindavaḥ |
dṛśo bhṛśonmīlitaraktarājayo (madhau yuvatyo nu latā la—)1 santi || 142 ||

kiñcidañcitapakṣmāgrā patitordhvapuṭā trapā 'dhogatatārā ca salajjā (nāśā. 8.68) | yathā— (raghu. 7.23, kusaṃ. 7.75)
tayorapāṅgapratisāritāni kriyāsamāpattiṣu 1kātarāṇi |
hnīyantraṇāmānaśire manojñāmanyonyalolāni vilocanāni || 143 ||
mlā/glānabhrūpuṭapakṣmā śithilasā klamapraviṣṭatārā mandasañcāriṇī ca glānā (nāśā. 8.67); yathā—

kiñciccalā 'sthirā kiñcidunnatā tiryagāyatā |
mụ̄dhā cakitatārā ca śaṅkitā (nāśā. 8.68)| yathā—
apetavyāhāraṃ dhutavividhaśilpavyatikaraṃ karasparśārambhapragalitadukūlāntaśayanam |
muhurbaddhotkampaṃ diśi diśi muhuḥ proritadṛśo— rahalyāsutrāmṇoḥ kṣaṇikamiha tat saṅgatamabhūt || 145 ||
viṣādavistīrṇapuṭā, paryastāntā nimeṣiṇī, ki़ñcinniṣṭabdhatārā ca viṣaṇṇā yathā— (urā. 3.16)
abhyāsādanugacchati priyatametyāśvāsanapreritā śūnyaṃ mārgamavetya/kṣya khedavivaśā duḥkhaṃ nivṛttāṃ tataḥ |

aṅgulībhiriva keśasañcayaṃ sannigṛhya timiraṃ marīcibhiḥ |
kuṅ‍malīkṛtasarojalocanaṃ cumbatīva rajanīmukhaṃ śaśī || 147 ||

antarmodānubhavamasṛṇastrastaniṣkampapakṣma vyaktaṃ śaṃsatyaciramanayordṛṣṭimākekarākṣam || 148 || (māmā. 4.2)

dharmaśrṛṅgāraḥ, arthaśrṛṅgāraḥ, kāmaśrṛṅgāraḥ, mokṣaśrṛṅgāraḥ iti yaduktaṃ1, tadidānīṃ vyākhyāyate | tatra —
(dharmaḥ)
dharmo nāma śrutismṛtivihitaḥ ācāraḥ pravṛttinivṛttiniyamanarūpaḥ |
(1. pravṛttirūpaḥ —10)
pravṛttirūpo daśadhā, vāṅ‍manaḥkāyakriyābhedāt | tatra—
vā(cā)......hitaṃ, priyaṃ,.....(satya)māp‍taṃ ca brūte |
manasā ca āstikyaṃ, dayām, anīpsāṃ ca bhāvayati |
kāyena gurudevatopāstiṃ, dānaṃ, ārtatrāṇaṃ ca karoti | tatra
(vācā)
1. hitaṃ yathā—
yadi sarvasya sarvatra nopakārāya jāyate |
tadanena sugup‍tena jihvāmāṃsena ko guṇaḥ? || 1 ||
2. priyaṃ yathā—(mavīca. 4.35)
vīreṇa te vijayamāṅgalikena patyā vṛtradruhaḥ praśamiteṣu mahābhayeṣu |
kṣatraprakāṇḍagṛhiṇībahumānapūjāmūrjasvalāṃ tvayi śacī manasā karotu || 2 ||
3. satyaṃ yathā—(urāca. 5.22)
eṣa sāṃgrāmiko nyāya eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ |
iyaṃ hi raghusiṃhānāṃ vīracāritrapaddhatiḥ || 3 ||
4. āp‍taṃ yathā—(śāku. 7.32)
śāpādasi pratihatā smṛtikoparūkṣe bhartaryapetatamasi prabhutā tavaiva |
chāyā na mūrcchati malopahataprasāde śuddhe tu darpaṇatale sulabhāvakāśā || 4 ||
1. trayodaśaprakāśārambhe 794 pṛṣṭhe ﻿
(manasā)
5. āstikyaṃ yathā—
kiṃ bījaṃ śreyasāṃ? dharmaḥ; satāṃ kiṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ? yaśaḥ |
lakṣmyāḥ ko bandhurutsāhaḥ; siddheḥ kiṃ sādhanaṃ? nayaḥ || 5 ||
6. dayā yathā—(nāgā. 4.10)
ārtaṃ kaṇṭhagataprāṇaṃ parityaktaṃ svabāndhavaiḥ |
trāye nainaṃ yadi tataḥ kaḥ śarīreṇa me guṇaḥ? || 6 ||
7. parasvānīp‍sā yathā—(śāku. 6.26)
yena yena viyujyante prajāḥ snigdhena bandhunā |
sa sa pāpādṛte tāsāṃ duṣyanta iti ghuṣyatām || 7 ||
8.(kāyena gurudevatopāsanā yathā)
nandigrāme jaṭāṃ bibhradabhiṣicāryapāduke |

(2. nivṛttirūpaḥ —5)
1. nṛśaṃsatānivṛttiḥ yathā—
kā nītiratisandhānaṃ; ko dharmaḥ ? prāṇināṃ vadhaḥ |
yadi kṣatriyadharmo 'yam? adharmo vada kīdṛśaḥ? || 10 ||
2. parasvābhidhyānivṛttiḥ yathā—(raghu. 16.8)
kā tvaṃ śubhe! kasya parigraho vā? kiṃ vā madabhyāgamakāraṇaṃ te? |
ācakṣva matvā vaśināṃ raghūṇāṃ manaḥ parastrīvimukhapravṛtti || 11 ||
3. niṣiddhasevānivṛttiḥ yathā—(śāku. 5.29)
mūḍhaḥ syāmahameṣā vā vadenmithyeti saṃśaye |
dāratyāgī bhavāmyāho parastrīsparśapāṃsulaḥ || 12 || ﻿
4. steyanivṛttiḥ yathā—(māgha. 2.40)
ālapyālamidaṃ babhroryat sa dārānapāharat |
kathā 'pi khalu pāpānāmalamaśreyase yataḥ || 13 ||
5. hiṃsānivṛttiḥ yathā—
so 'sti yad yacca tanmāṃsamubhayoḥ paśryatāntaram |
ekāsya kṣaṇikā prītiḥ prāṇairanyo viyujyate || 14 ||
(3. niyamarūpaḥ —10)
atha niyamarūpaḥ| so 'pi daśadhā, vāṅ‍manaḥkāyakriyādibhiḥ| tadyathā nitya— naimittikayoratyāgaḥ, svajātidharmā/svadharmādavicalanaṃ, sadṛśaireva saṃbandhaḥ, lokāgamaviruddhairasaṃsargaḥ, nyāyato 'rthādhigamaḥ, gurvājñānatikramaḥ, aprārthanābhaṅgaḥ, pratijñānirvāhaḥ, samarādapalāyanaṃ, gobrāhmaṇārthe prāṇādiparityāgaḥ, iti| tatra—
1. nityāparityāgo yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.48)
tanmuhūrtamanumantumarhasi prastutāya niyamāya māmapi |
tvāṃ vinodanipuṇaḥ sakhījano valguvādini! vinodayiṣyati || 15||
naimittikātyāgo yathā—(mavīca. 1.15)
ayaṃ ca yajamānena yakṣyamāṇasya me gṛhāt |
preṣitastena vātsalyādanujanmā kuśadhvajaḥ || 16 ||
2. svajātidharmādavicalanaṃ yathā—
taireva saha yoddhavyaṃ krīḍā ' 'sīd yaiḥ sahaiva naḥ |
aho! nisargahiṃstrasya paś‍ya kṣattrasya raudratā || 17 ||
3. sadṛśaiḥ sambandho yathā—(mavīca. 1.57)
janakānāṃ raghūṇāṃ ca sambandhaḥ kasya na priyaḥ? |
yatra dātā grahītā ca svayaṃ kuśikanandanaḥ || 18 ||
4. lokāgamaviruddhairasaṃsargo yathā—(kirātā. 14.22)
vayaṃ kva varṇāśramarakṣaṇocitāḥ kva jātihīnā mṛgajīvitacchidaḥ |
sabhā/hāvakṛṣṭairmahatāmasaṅgataṃ bhavanti gomāyusakhā na dantinaḥ || 19 || ﻿
āgamaviruddhairasaṃsargau yathā—(kirātā. 14.21)
sakhā sa yuktaḥ kathitaḥ tvayā yadṛcchayā 'sūyati yastapasyate |
guṇārjanocchrāyaviruddhabuddhayaḥ prakṛtyamitrā hi satāmasādhavaḥ || 20 ||
5. nyāyato 'rthādhigamo yathā—(raghu. 7.70)
iti śirasi sa vāmaṃ pādamādhāya rājñāmudavahadanavadyāṃ tāmavadyādapetaḥ |
rathaturagarajobhistasya rūkṣālakāgrā samaravijayalakṣmīḥ saiva mūrtā babhūva || 21 ||
6. gurvājñānatikramo yathā—(urā. 1.13)
nidhāya śirasīcchayā samucitaṃ pituḥ śāsanaṃ prayātumabhi kānanaṃ vyavasitasya me tvaṃ kila |
tadarthaparipanthinī vaśitayeva mā bhūriti praṇantumapi nāgato yadahamamba! tat kṣamyatām || 22 ||
7. aprārthanābhaṅgo yathā—(raghu. 11.2)
kṛcchralabdhamapi labdhavarṇabhāk taṃ dideśa munaye salakṣmaṇam |
apyasupraṇayināṃ raghoḥ kule na vyahanyata kadācidarthitā || 23 ||
8. pratijñānirvāho yathā—(bārā. 6.11)
mayā mūrdhni prahve pituriti kṛtaṃ/dhṛtaṃ śāsanamidaṃ sa rakṣo yakṣo vā bhavatu sa bhavān vā raghupatiḥ |
nivartiṣye so 'yaṃ bharatakṛtarakṣāṃ nijapurīṃ samāḥ samyaṅ‍ nītvā vanabhuvi catastraśca daśa ca || 24 ||
9. samarādapalāyanaṃ yathā—
vṛddhatvadoṣāt praśamād bhayād vā yatsatyamiṣṭaṃ mama naiva yuddham |
rakṣovraṇāṣṭāpadadanturantu yanme vapuḥ kṣatriyatā 'tra hetuḥ || 25 ||1
10. gobrāhmaṇārthe prāṇādiparityāgaḥ sa/gavārtho yathā—(raghu. 2.45)
sa tvaṃ madīyena śarīravṛttiṃ dehena nirvartayituṃ prasīda |
dināvasānotsukabālavatsā visṛjyatāṃ dhenuriyaṃ maharṣaiḥ || 26 ||
1. pakṣo vṛṇāṣṭāpadadantatantu yanme kṛte — rāghavaḥ HOS. vṛṇīyanāṣṭāpadamātrakaṃ tu yanme kutaḥ — jośeraḥ | mūlaṃ tvasmatkalpitam | ﻿
brāhmaṇārthe yathā—(raghu. 2.44)
mānyaḥ sa me sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ sargasthitipratyavahārahetuḥ |
gurorapīdaṃ dhanamāhitāgnernaś‍yat purastādanupekṣaṇīyam || 27 ||
so 'yaṃ pravṛttinivṛttiniyamarūpaḥ śrutismṛtivihita ācāro dharmaḥ| yathocyate—
pretya ceha ca yat karma kriyamāṇaṃ guṇāvaham |
vāṅ‍manaḥkāyaniṣpannaṃ sa dharma iti kīrtyate || 28 ||
(dharmaśrṛṅgāraḥ)
tatra pravartamānasya ratyādāvanatimāno dharmaśrṛṅgāraḥ | tatra—
pravṛttirūpe yathā—(śāku. 1.20)
asaṃśayaṃ kṣatraparigrahakṣamā yadāryamasyāmabhilāṣi me manaḥ |
satāṃ hi sandehapadeṣu vastuṣu pramāṇamantaḥkaraṇapravṛttayaḥ || 29 ||
yathā ca nivṛttirūpe—(śāku. 5.28)
kumudānyeva śaśāṅkaḥ savitā bodhayati paṅkajānyeva |
vaśināṃ hi paraparigrahasaṃparkaparāṅ‍mukhī vṛttiḥ || 30 ||
yathā vā niyamarūpe—(nīti. 74)
nindantu nītinipuṇā yadi vā stuvantu lakṣmīḥ samāviśatu gacchatu vā yatheṣṭam |
adyeva vā maraṇamastu yugāntare vā nyāyyāt pathaḥ pravicalanti padaṃ na dhīrāḥ || 31 ||
tatra bhāratī vṛttiḥ, paurastyā pravṛttiḥ, pāñcālī rītiḥ, svakīyā nāyikā, dhīrodāttaśca nāyaka iti| tatra—
bhāratī vṛttiḥ; tadanurūpasvarūpāṅgatvāt| tathā hi— (nāśā. 22.25)
yā vākpradhānā nṛvaraprayojyā strīvarjitā saṃskṛtapāṭhyayuktā |
svanāmādheyairbharataiḥ, prayojyā sā bhāratī nāma bhavet tu vṛttiḥ || 32 ||
tadaṅgāni prarocanā, prastāvanā, vīthī, prahasanamiti| sā tu—
'vākpradhānā' ityanena śrutismṛtyuktavidhivākyānāmavaś‍yavidheyatāṃ pratipādayati |
'nṛvaraprayojyā' ityanena adhikāriṇo nirdiśati | ﻿
'strīvarjitā' ityanena anadhikāriṇo nirasyati |
'saṃskṛtāpāṭhyayuktā' ityanena 'antarvedyāṃ na mlecchitavyam' ityabhidhatte ||
aṅgeṣu prarocanayā arthavādaṃ dyotayati| vaktavyārthe praśaṃsāparaṃ hi vacaḥ prarocanā |
prastāvanayā itikartavyatākramaṃ bodhayati| prastutavastūpapādanāvasarasūcakaṃ hi vākyaṃ prastāvanā|
vīthyā 'pi paripraś‍nottarapratyuttarādibhiranuvādavidhānāt viparyayajñānasaṃśayādīn apanayati| ud‍ghātyakādīnāmaṅgānāṃ pravṛttiparipāṭī vīthī |
prahasanena tu svadharmānna calitavyamiti niyamayati| svadharmacalitānāṃ hi tāpasādīnāmupahāsaparaṃ vacaḥ prahasanam |
seyaṃ bhāratī vṛttiḥ caturaṅgā 'pi dharmaśrṛṅgārasya aṅgam ||
